In his mind, scenes from his past cultivation process, where he comprehended the Heavenly Dao, resurfaced one by one.

The entire process of Heavenly Dao Mr. Bai descending through his Saint Embryo, the Saint Embryo itself, and all the subtle changes that occurred within his own body...

Every detail reappeared completely in Li Fan's mind.

It was fortunate that the Dao Transformation Stone had just completed its transformation; otherwise, its original medium-grade quality would not have withstood such consumption.

"That's right, it was due to my carelessness that Heavenly Dao Bai found an opportunity to borrow the embryo to return to life."

"But looking at it from another angle, Heavenly Dao Bai's body was always my Saint Embryo. In other words, it was another version of me."

"It was just occupied by him."

"The Incarnation of the Heavenly Dao is me..."

"I am the Incarnation of the Heavenly Dao..."

Li Fan's eyes grew brighter, and his thoughts churned endlessly.

As if possessed, he repeatedly uttered these two sentences from his mouth.

If an outsider were present at this moment, witnessing this scene, they would probably think Li Fan had gone mad from qi deviation.

But in fact, Li Fan's mind was clearer than ever before.

"Just like when I used the Vast Sea Pearl to observe the evolution of Heaven and Earth's killing intent and comprehended a divine ability called 'Formless Killing Intent.'"

"Heavenly Dao Bai was born through my Saint Embryo, and through this, I fortunately shared the same body as the Heavenly Dao."

Li Fan's gaze seemed to pierce through the sky of the Spiritual Wood Realm, reaching directly to the Vast Yellow Realm.

The myriad faces of living beings seen through the Profound Heaven Mirror, the changes in the Vast Yellow Realm observed through multiple reincarnations...

All these insights lingered in his heart.

An inexplicable aura began to emerge from Li Fan.

Like a stone sculpture, Li Fan was in a state of enlightenment, frozen in place.

After an unknown amount of time, at the very moment he was about to succeed in his enlightenment, Li Fan suddenly woke up with a start.

"No, I'm not truly trying to become the Incarnation of the Heavenly Dao."

"I only want to borrow the authority of the Heavenly Dao..."

"That was close..."

Even with Li Fan's current state of mind, a cold sweat broke out.

Because if he truly solidified the connection with the Heavenly Dao of the Vast Yellow Realm, and this change within himself was something he actively pursued, it might not be something he could undo through Return to Truth.

After all, Return to Truth only changed the world; Li Fan himself remained unchanged.

"Luckily, I reacted in time."

Chapter 1030: A Flash of Locking the Abyss

Li Fan was only one step away from fully comprehending that divine ability, yet he lingered at this threshold for another half a month. This was specifically to ensure his state of mind would not be influenced by the Heavenly Dao of the Vast Yellow Realm.

"A gentleman is not born different; he excels at borrowing from things," Li Fan, now enlightened, recited slowly. His figure flickered, instantly appearing outside the Spirit Wood Realm.

With the divine ability newly achieved, Li Fan needed to find a suitable place to test its power.

"This technique, [Feigning the Heavenly Dao], shares a similar essence with my [Formless Killing Intent]. Both borrow the mandate of heaven for their use. While they can borrow the authority of heaven and earth, they also carry the risk of being discovered and consequently punished by heaven."

"For the first test, I must find a place where the Heavenly Dao of the Vast Yellow Realm is relatively weak."

With this thought, Li Fan's form turned into a dotted line in the air, speeding directly towards the Cloud Sea.

The Cloud Sea was an area where the fragments of the Heavenly Law Realm and the Vast Yellow Realm had not yet completely merged. Like a splinter stuck deep in flesh and blood, the Vast Yellow Realm could only fully integrate it after a great cleansing by the Blazing Sea Incineration years later. In the Cloud Sea, the Heavenly Dao of the Vast Yellow Realm was significantly weaker than in the Native State Domain.

Before long, Li Fan arrived at an uninhabited sea area. Standing above the clouds, he held his breath and focused his spirit, then cast the newly comprehended [Feigning the Heavenly Dao].

The world in Li Fan's eyes instantly changed. It was as if he had returned to the [Root of Heaven and Earth], where countless interwoven vertical and horizontal fine threads constituted all things in heaven and earth. Everything within the giant net had to operate according to the rules of these fine threads—the existence known as the laws of heaven and earth.

Li Fan's physical body seemed to vanish into thin air, while his spiritual will slowly merged into this giant net. In an instant, the pressure from the countless vertical and horizontal threads nearly tore his soul apart. In this brief moment, Li Fan glimpsed the fundamental laws governing the operation of heaven and earth. He also seemed to see countless events unfolding within the Vast Yellow Realm.

However, this merging with the Great Dao of heaven and earth lasted only for an instant before Li Fan actively stopped it. If he had continued, his soul would have been torn into countless fragments by the immense force and integrated into these myriad laws of heaven and earth. Perhaps a Heavenly Dao Li might be born in the future, but that would not be Li Fan.

After withdrawing from the state of merging with heaven and earth, Li Fan seized the fleeting moment while the profound and mysterious enlightenment in his heart had not yet faded, and reactivated the [Method of False Equivalence].

This time, he did not reach the point of merging his soul with heaven and earth. He merely attempted to connect the interwoven threads of the laws of heaven and earth to his own body. Every time a thread touched him, Li Fan felt as if a great mountain was pressing down upon his head.

With the Extreme Void and Inverse Balance coupled with the Soul Burning Method operating at their peak, he mitigated the burden on his physical body. Li Fan continuously connected the threads of law into his body, like drawing lines from the giant net of heaven and earth to form a self-entwined thread ball.

When Li Fan felt he had reached the limit his body could bear, he stopped connecting further threads.

"Is this the weight of the principles of heaven and earth?"

Currently, Li Fan felt as if he was pinned under the Five Elements Mountain, unable to move. Only by truly coming into contact with the majestic power of heaven and earth could one genuinely feel how terrifying the power of heaven and earth was.

"The Longevity Realm is about overthrowing these great mountains and reversing the principles of heaven and earth..."

"I still have a long way to go."

Li Fan's eyes flickered, and he temporarily suppressed this thought. He focused on his current state. Although immobile, Li Fan's vision was broader than ever before, seeing further and more than when he used the Vast Sea Pearl to observe the transformation of the Cloud Sea from sea to mulberry fields.

From a high vantage point, the five prefectures surrounding the Cloud Sea were all within Li Fan's sight. The living beings were like ants, all visible at a glance.

Furthermore, various incomprehensible murmurs sounded in his ears. These did not come from any unspeakable monsters but from the very mechanisms of heaven and earth operating by themselves. The Great Dao is said to be silent. Heaven and earth are like a constantly running, extremely precise machine, and in the process of their evolution, they constantly emit their own roaring sounds. However, ordinary people could never perceive this; only when one, like Li Fan, became a part of the Great Dao of heaven and earth could they hear a fraction of the complex sounds of heaven and earth.

Because he was in the Cloud Sea, upon careful distinction, Li Fan discovered that the majority of these murmurs concerned the evolution of heaven and earth in the Cloud Sea. The most obvious among them was the brewing Blazing Sea Incineration. Li Fan also heard the arrangements of heaven and earth regarding the Azure Wind Trapped Sword.

But what surprised Li Fan was that the heavenly sounds regarding the Azure Wind Trapped Sword ranked only third among the noisy clamor. And the second...

Li Fan followed the direction indicated and cast his gaze. It was extremely deep beneath the Ten Thousand Immortal Island, a dark place still obscured even from the perspective of heaven and earth. The soul of heaven and earth named [Golden Seal], coiled like a chain, constantly suppressing the darkness below.

"The Tunnel to the Netherworld?" A word instantly surfaced in Li Fan's mind.

In his 115th life, the entire Ten Thousand Immortal Island was captured by the Five Elders Society. The Tunnel to the Netherworld beneath the island was subsequently exposed. He acted as the interim City Lord, and while receiving the task of rebuilding the Immortal City, he was also ordered by the First Grandmaster to set up the Profound Heaven Locking Abyss Formation to seal the Tunnel to the Netherworld again.

"It turns out that as the Tunnel to the Netherworld constantly expanded, the suppression of the Ten Thousand Immortal Island had slowly lost its effect."

"Perhaps this is also why strange occurrences often happen in the Cloud Sea."

"Heaven and earth have been quietly dealing with it without the awareness of any cultivator."

Li Fan suddenly understood. The Profound Heaven Locking Abyss Formation had a style very similar to the Profound Heaven Sect. According to the relevant information Li Fan found in the Profound Heaven Mirror, they all consistently stated that it was inherited from the ancient Profound Heaven Sect. However, with Li Fan's current understanding of formations, he could see at a glance that although this formation was ingenious, it clearly had not reached the level of an immortal-grade formation. It was even far inferior to the Reversing Life and Death Great Formation.

"The anomalies arose from the fusion process between the Vast Yellow Realm and other cultivation worlds."

"This formation existed during the time of the Profound Heaven Sect. This indicates that at that time, when the Vast Yellow Realm captured other worlds using the Floating Starry Sky Great Formation, problems with anomalies had already begun to emerge."

"However, the energy level of the formation also shows that the anomalies were not severe at that time. Such a rudimentary formation was sufficient to cope."

"But as the number of fused worlds increased day by day, this Profound Heaven Locking Abyss Formation..."

"...has become somewhat inadequate."

Using the spare computing power of the Dissolution Disc in his mind, Li Fan deduced a brand-new Locking Abyss Formation with ten times the sealing capacity in a matter of breaths. Li Fan shook his head slightly, "After so many years, the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance still refuses to make progress, treasuring ancient relics from a thousand years ago as treasures."

Chapter 1031: The Strangeness of Congyun Erupts

Li Fan said this as a matter of course.

However, he also knew that the reason he could so easily upgrade the Profound Heaven Locking Abyss Formation was entirely due to the advantage of the Dissolution Disc.

Not to mention it was the super version after the fusion of two lifetimes.

If it were an ordinary level of Dao Integration Formation Master, they probably wouldn't be able to understand this ancient great formation.

Li Fan thought this way and withdrew his gaze from the entrance of the Tongyou Tunnel.

The frequent eruptions of strangeness in the Vast Yellow Realm should have been something that happened five hundred years later.

It was clear that the Vast Yellow Realm in this life would not live that long.

"Let me try out the power after falsely deceiving the Heavenly Dao."

Li Fan concentrated his spirit and locked onto the thin thread connected to the Golden Seal, the Soul of Heaven and Earth.

Then he exerted a slight force, borrowing the might of Heaven and Earth to convey a wrong command.

He commanded the Golden Seal to return to Heaven and Earth.

At the entrance of the Tongyou Tunnel, the Golden Seal appeared somewhat confused by this inexplicably appearing command.

If it left now, there would clearly be a risk of a large-scale eruption of strangeness for a period of time.

However, the Soul of Heaven and Earth was an manifestation of the will of Heaven and Earth, so there was no possibility of itself defying its own will.

Therefore, after hesitating for a moment, the Soul of Heaven and Earth, the Golden Seal, changed back from the shape of a golden chain to a human body.

Then it slowly faded and finally disappeared between Heaven and Earth.

The moment the Golden Seal disappeared.

Li Fan saw a large amount of dark, violent energy gushing out from the black, unobservable area below.

It was shapeless and formless, yet it spread outwards like a living thing.

The reaction of Heaven and Earth to this dark substance was also very swift.

A sense of impending discovery suddenly surged in Li Fan's heart, and he decisively severed the connection with the giant net of Heaven and Earth.

At the same time, he quickly fled the Sea of Congyun.

Perhaps because it was busy dealing with the crisis of strangeness, Heaven and Earth did not notice Li Fan, who had falsely proclaimed the decree and interfered.

Li Fan observed from afar that after the Golden Seal dispersed, two new Souls of Heaven and Earth were about to be born in the Sea of Congyun.

Li Fan, having made a small test of his strength, was very satisfied with this divine ability of "falsely deceiving the Heavenly Dao."

The Soul of Heaven and Earth was of a higher level than the Change of Heaven and Earth.

Since he could borrow the mandate of Heaven and mobilize the Souls of Heaven and Earth.

It would naturally not be a problem to mobilize the Changes of Heaven and Earth within a certain range.

"I can even use this method to first create chaos within the Vast Yellow Realm, and then guide the situation to 'create' the Souls of Heaven and Earth needed to solve the problems." Li Fan's thoughts scattered, letting his imagination run wild.

"However, doing so would surely make Heaven and Earth notice the abnormality. It can only be done once, and its use is limited."

Li Fan, having moved far away from the Sea of Congyun, continuously monitored the situation after the leak in the Tongyou Tunnel entrance through the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

It appeared peaceful and utterly calm.

There were no signs of any abnormality.

However, before the cultivators could notice, some strange things began to gradually happen on the Ten Thousand Immortal Island.

In the Qianli Hall.

"Seeing ghosts, how can this month's accounts not balance?"

Jiao Xiuyuan frowned deeply and recalculated this month's profits.

He found that he had actually lost money.

His vital energy surged, and he felt like he was about to spit out a mouthful of old blood uncontrollably at any moment.

Jiao Xiuyuan forcibly suppressed the irritability in his heart and meticulously checked it again.

The result was correct.

"That's not right, I clearly remember making a small profit this month, how could I lose money?"

Jiao Xiuyuan was a bit puzzled.

He stopped receiving customers, closed the main door, and meticulously pulled out all the transactions that occurred on the Ten Thousand Immortal Island this month.

Finally, he discovered the problem. "Yes, there is one account that has not been collected yet."

"Who was the debtor?"

Jiao Xiuyuan muttered to himself, and as he continued to search, the expression on his face became more and more serious.

Because he discovered that the person who owed him money had inexplicably disappeared.

Not only did he have no memory of it in his mind, but there was also no information about this person in the Heavenly Profound Mirror anymore.

It was as if this person had never existed at all.

"This..."

Jiao Xiuyuan's first reaction was that he had encountered a powerful being.

"Which friend is playing a joke on Jiao?"

A trace of anger appeared on his dark face.

But soon Jiao Xiuyuan became somewhat confused.

"It's just about ten thousand contribution points, is it worth it?"

Jiao Xiuyuan, having calmed down, had already sensed that something was wrong.

After going out to inquire, he verified his guess.

"Indeed, it's more than one person who has inexplicably disappeared."

Jiao Xiuyuan's eyes darted around, and he immediately took out a jade slip, carving his findings into it.

The eruption of strangeness in the Sea of Congyun was not the only incident.

On one island, all the residents turned into faceless monsters overnight.

When each person looked in the mirror, they saw themselves as normal. But when they looked at others, they only saw a faceless profile.

Moreover, they could not understand what the others were saying to each other.

In extreme terror, the people on the island slaughtered each other, and in the end, only one survivor remained.

There was also a fishing boat that went out to sea to fish. When it returned to the island, the crew members did not appear for a long time.

The residents of the island curiously boarded the boat to check, only to find that all the crew members had turned into skeletons.

The inside of the boat seemed as if several hundred years had passed, becoming dilapidated.

...

All sorts of bizarre and strange things like this.

Even Li Fan, the instigator, was amazed by them.

"Each instance of strangeness should correspond to a corresponding rule. If one can crack the secret of this rule when the strangeness erupts, not only can they survive, but perhaps they can also master a part of the power of this new rule."

"If cultivators are the representatives of the power of the old laws of Heaven and Earth, then these new laws..."

"Perhaps a completely new power system will emerge."

After merging with Heaven and Earth, Li Fan's comprehension seemed to have improved quite a bit.

He thought of many things in an instant.

"However, these so-called new laws only exist temporarily during the fusion process. When the Vast Yellow Realm finishes devouring and merging, the old laws will be restored."

"These new laws will naturally be heresies to be eliminated."

"Moreover, the Heavenly Venerable of Transmission of Dharma and even the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance should not allow such power to exist in the world."

"But I hope that the more of this existence, the better."

Observing in secret, Li Fan discerned the potential benefits hidden within this disaster.

He immediately set off again for the Sea of Congyun, attempting to search for living beings who had survived the strangeness and mastered its power.

Under the perspective of Heaven and Earth, those continuously wriggling, worm-like dark substances were clearly visible.

There was no risk of being affected.

Li Fan observed from the periphery every place he went.

It must be said that it was extremely difficult for ordinary living beings to survive in the strangeness.

Li Fan passed by more than a dozen places where strangeness had erupted, but he did not find a single survivor.

But his efforts were not in vain; finally, on an island named Fan Yong, he found his target.

Chapter 1032: The Weak Devour the Strong

Fan Yong Island, an island true to its name.

Fan means fence. Yong means useless.

This island was located in an extremely remote sea area, with no other islands within a thousand miles. However, perhaps precisely because of this reason, the spiritual energy in this sea area was all concentrated on Fan Yong Island, leading to favorable weather and extremely abundant resources on this large island every year.

Even without any human cultivation, the naturally grown crops were enough to ensure the island residents had no worries about food or clothing.

Even the several large warehouses on the island were completely filled with grain, and no one cared that they were slowly rotting.

And this situation seemed to have persisted since the creation of the Sea of Congyun.

This also created a phenomenon: the residents of Fan Yong Island had no pressure to survive. Every day, besides eating and sleeping, the most they did was an activity called "toss and fight."

The two sides fought naked. The winner would gain the loser's social status for one month: they would gain the right to dispose of the other's assets and exercise the other's status powers.

Except for actions that endangered the island, there were no taboos.

The loser could only watch helplessly as the other became another version of themselves for that month.

Spending all their wealth, sleeping with their spouse...

Of course, if they felt unconvinced, they could challenge again after a month.

However, if they were defeated again the second time, the one-month duration would double to two months.

And so on.

As the only and most popular form of entertainment on the island, every time a toss and fight was held, almost all the people of Fan Yong Island would come to watch.

People cheered and shouted, the contestants' eyes turned red, and the relatives of the contestants were extremely nervous.

However, after the most recent toss and fight ended, something incredible happened to all the spectators.

The winner actually transformed into the appearance of the loser right before everyone's eyes!

And the original loser disappeared inexplicably in public!

What was even stranger was that despite such a bizarre phenomenon occurring, the island residents did not stop their toss and fight competitions.

Instead, their enthusiasm grew even more intense.

To win someone over, truly winning everything they had! Was there anything more exciting than this?

Initially, people did view this new toss and fight with this mindset.

But soon, they realized something was wrong.

Panic then began to spread across Fan Yong Island.

But the toss and fight did not stop because of this...

Because this game was long beyond their control.

Under the shroud of strangeness, at least half the population of Fan Yong Island participated in a toss and fight every day. It took effect forcibly, regardless of the will of both parties.

The loser disappeared, and the winner transformed into the loser's appearance.

It wasn't just their physical form and appearance that changed.

Even their physical abilities would change accordingly.

Only the core remained, with the winner dominating, having devoured the loser's memories.

Furthermore, during the competition, both parties' minds would be affected to some extent. They would go all out and would not intentionally concede.

As time went by day by day, the toss and fight continued without interruption, and the island's population rapidly decreased.

Some people could not bear it and chose to end their own lives.

The rest transformed their identities through endless competitions.

When Li Fan finally found the sole survivor of Fan Yong Island and sorted out the entire sequence of events from the tens of thousands of chaotic memories in his mind, he couldn't help but feel a surge of fear.

The dark strange power on Fan Yong Island had disappeared.

The strange creature before him, shaped like a cylinder with facial features almost submerged by flesh, leaving only a few vertical lines, was the final winner.

This being was originally the weakest on Fan Yong Island. Due to its massive weight, even raising an arm or moving was difficult, so in every toss and fight, it couldn't even fight back, only passively taking beatings and losing the competition.

But the will within this body was a collection of over one hundred thousand people from Fan Yong Island. The dominant will belonged to the absolute strong being who had always won.

Every victory seemed to devour something from the opponent to enhance itself. Now, this one person's weight in the overall will was greater than everyone else's combined.

However, after experiencing such a nightmarish scene, this meatball was on the verge of collapse.

It sat blankly on the ground, its face filled with confusion.

But when Li Fan appeared before it, it instinctively initiated a toss and fight challenge.

At that instant, Li Fan vaguely sensed a dark power erupting from the other party's body, like invisible tentacles reaching out to cling to him.

But Li Fan snorted coldly and concealed his tracks.

The darkness missed its target.

The large fat creature then continued to sit blankly in place.

Li Fan had a premonition that if he hadn't dodged the toss and fight just now.

If he had become the winner, he too would have ended up with the current appearance.

Whether his cultivation realm would be preserved was unknown.

"This ability..."

Li Fan immediately thought of Mo Ru Bin's mirror-like substitution.

However, what happened on Fan Yong Island was clearly weaker and more restricted than Mo Ru Bin's.

But if utilized properly, it was definitely a remarkable ability.

Although it seemed that this toss and fight ultimately caused the winner to constantly degenerate toward weakness...

This was in the case of the strong defeating the weak.

What if the weak defeated the strong?

Wouldn't it allow for a rapid transformation of strength in a short time just by relying on this ability?

Generally speaking, weakness meant defeat, and strength meant victory.

But for Li Fan, there were many ways to achieve victory through weakness.

Thinking of this, Li Fan became interested.

He casually grabbed a Foundation Establishment cultivator outside, ignoring the cultivator's terrified gaze, and directly immobilized it with a worm parasite.

Then he threw it in front of the fat sphere.

Driven by instinct, the fat sphere initiated a toss and fight invitation with the Foundation Establishment cultivator.

Although the fat sphere's body could barely move, the soul dominating it was powerful.

It looked at the healthy but immobile body before it, and its previously confused eyes instantly burst with a fierce light of survival.

It struggled, taking almost half a day to finally complete the match.

However, to its immense disappointment, although it won the competition, it did not transform into the opponent's appearance.

It paused, then immediately understood the reason.

Because this competition was not fair.

External forces had interfered with the match...

Therefore, the match result was invalid!

Thinking of the suddenly appearing being that did not originally belong to the islanders, it instantly realized that there was someone else hidden on the island!

And...

Such a means to immobilize people was highly likely to be a legendary Immortal Master!

Thinking of this, its heart filled with excitement.

Chapter 1033: A Duel of Justice

Tears streamed down his face as the round body struggled to bow on the ground.

He begged the Immortal Master to save his life.

Only then did Li Fan reveal his figure.

“It seems that when outsiders interfere, the rules become void. Only by winning the match entirely by oneself is it valid,” Li Fan thought to himself.

Without wasting words with the sphere, he gazed at the opponent, and an invisible force descended.

While crushing the tens of thousands of wailing thoughts in the opponent's mind, turning them into mental nourishment, he also performed liposuction surgery on the opponent.

Half a day later, the survivor, who had regained his normal shape and whose consciousness was now powerful enough to be comparable to an ordinary Nascent Soul cultivator, slowly awoke.

“Jiang Nian’er, the residents of your Fanyong Island occupy a blessed land, yet you are complacent day after day, disrespecting heaven’s grace. Therefore, heaven has sent down a heavenly punishment, causing this calamity for you.”

“I value heaven’s virtue of valuing life, and seeing that you are truly pitiful, I have intervened to save you.”

Li Fan’s voice was like thunder, and his spiritual sense directly poured into the opponent's mind, searing his words in like a brand.

“Thank you, Immortal Master, for your grace, thank you, Immortal Master, for your grace…”

Before long, Jiang Nian’er, who had recovered his normal appearance, wept profusely and kowtowed repeatedly on the ground.

“I only wish to follow the Immortal Master from now on, serving as a beast of burden, to repay this great debt of rebirth…” Jiang Nian’er said sincerely, his consciousness having been shaped by the collective thoughts of over a hundred thousand mortals.

Li Fan did not reply, but said sternly, “This is a calamity, but also a tremendous opportunity.”

“You wish to be my disciple…”

“You are not yet qualified. First, follow by my side as a Dao boy. We will see your performance in the future; if you satisfy me…” Li Fan said lightly.

Jiang Nian’er kowtowed his thanks again, not daring to look up.

“He is a test for you!”

Li Fan pointed at the Foundation Establishment cultivator who was immobilized beside them.

“Cultivators in this world are divided into Qi Refining, Foundation Establishment…”

After briefly introducing the cultivation methods of the Profound Yellow Realm, Li Fan continued, “This person is a late-stage Foundation Establishment cultivator.”

“You must defeat him with your own strength!”

“My patience is limited; I will only give you fifteen days.”

Jiang Nian’er’s body instantly stiffened. Although he didn't know the exact strength of a late-stage Foundation Establishment cultivator, he had seen the Immortal Masters flying in the sky before—masters of movement, weather manipulation, and summoning rain. How could a mere mortal like him possibly defeat such a being? What could fifteen days accomplish?

Li Fan noticed Jiang Nian’er’s fear and smiled, “Rest assured, I won't ask you to do something meaningless that leads to death.”

With a light touch on Jiang Nian’er’s brow, Li Fan transmitted a Golden Core cultivation method and a beginner’s guide to simple formations.

“With what I teach you, it will be enough for you to deal with him.”

“Of course, if you cannot digest these contents within fifteen days…”

“Then the lucky one will become him,” Li Fan said with a smile toward the unknown Foundation Establishment cultivator.

Jiang Nian’er’s heart tightened, and he immediately sat down to contemplate the teachings Li Fan had imparted.

“Absorb the essence of heaven and earth to control its energy…”

Starting from the most basic cultivation knowledge, a brand new world of immortal cultivation slowly unfolded before Jiang Nian’er’s eyes. Although his spiritual sense strength was almost equal to that of a Nascent Soul cultivator, Jiang Nian’er clearly had not adapted to how to utilize this power. He still read word by word, slowly, as if afraid of missing any detail, just like a mortal.

It was not until night fell that he suddenly jolted awake. Had half a day passed already? Thinking of the fifteen-day deadline of death, immense, invisible pressure flooded his mind.

“No, no. I must be faster, faster.” It must be said that Jiang Nian’er was worthy of being the ultimate winner among over a hundred thousand people. He quickly learned not only to skim read but also to multitask. While studying the introductory cultivation method, he also began to ponder the formations.

Three days later.

Li Fan sensed a fluctuation of spiritual energy from Jiang Nian’er.

“Qi Refining in three days; his aptitude is average.” Due to the erosion by the gloomy and strange power, Jiang Nian’er’s immortal-mortal miasma was almost gone. Although the step of removing the miasma from his body was skipped, three days to achieve qi induction into the body was by no means poor aptitude. However, Li Fan had seen too many geniuses, so his standards were naturally higher. Aptitude was never what Li Fan cared about in Jiang Nian’er, so he didn't pay it much mind. Instead, he continued to observe his choices.

He was not disappointed. After successfully entering the Qi Refining stage and cultivating for a period, realizing he absolutely could not advance further within the remaining twelve days, Jiang Nian’er devoted almost all his subsequent energy to studying the introductory formation Li Fan had given him.

The introductory formation taught by Li Fan was more than enough in terms of power to trap and kill a Foundation Establishment cultivator. Furthermore, it had been specially simplified by him so that a Qi Refining cultivator could use it.

“As long as you aren't too foolish and forget to accumulate the spiritual energy needed to maintain the formation,” Li Fan smiled mysteriously.

In truth, who won or lost was irrelevant to him. The winner would inherit the strange power and could not escape his grasp, serving him either way. What Li Fan truly desired was to observe the specific changes that occurred when identities were devoured under the operation of the strange rules.

“The strange rules can actually be seen as the principles of heaven and earth,” he mused. “They are principles born from the transitional period during world fusion, principles not recognized by the Heavenly Dao of the Profound Yellow Realm.”

“Cultivators who carry the strange inevitably suffer heavenly condemnation.”

“But that heavenly condemnation thing…” Li Fan shook his head slightly in his heart; he truly wasn’t afraid of it!

The fifteen days flew by in the blink of an eye.

“The time is up, begin,” Li Fan suddenly spoke that day, breaking the island’s peace. Simultaneously, he instantly released the restriction on the Foundation Establishment cultivator.

The Foundation Establishment cultivator had remained conscious and heard all of Li Fan’s conversation.

“A mere Qi Refining cultivator who has only practiced for a little over ten days dares to try and defeat me?”

“A profound humiliation; I must wash it away with your blood…” His eyes turned blood-red. The moment he regained freedom, he summoned his Foundation Establishment wondrous object.

A straight wooden stick appeared in the sky, instantly locking onto Jiang Nian’er, about to attack and crush him.

However… he suddenly found his vision blurring, and the opponent’s figure vanished inexplicably.

“What?” The Foundation Establishment cultivator was startled. He looked around and found himself inexplicably standing in a sea of bamboo. The previous experience on the deserted island seemed like an illusion.

Outside the formation, Jiang Nian’er, while barely maintaining the [Bamboo Sea Dragon Trapping Formation], breathed a sigh of relief.

Chapter 1034: The Demonic Shadow Lingers in the Heart

Before Li Fan released the restriction on the Foundation Establishment cultivator, Jiang Nian’er had already awakened from his cultivation.

His spirit was highly alert, and the process of setting up the formation began to repeat over and over in his mind.

Now a Qi Refining cultivator, he knew very well that against an opponent at the Foundation Establishment realm, he could not withstand even a single move.

Either the opponent would kill him in one blow, or...

He would have to set up the formation before the opponent could strike!

Facing life and death, Jiang Nian’er pushed his potential to the extreme.

Although it was the first time he was setting up the formation, it was accomplished instantly, as if he had practiced it thousands of times.

Looking at his opponent confusedly searching for a way out within the [Bamboo Sea Dragon Trapping Formation], Jiang Nian’er knew he had already won half the battle.

Next, it depended on who could endure longer, him or his opponent.

A trace of determination flashed in Jiang Nian’er’s eyes, and he once again squeezed his potential.

The speed at which he absorbed the surrounding spiritual energy of heaven and earth quickened a bit.

“Over a hundred thousand people on the island, and I’m the only one who survived! How can I die here!”

“Even if you are a Foundation Establishment cultivator, you won’t win against me!”

A trace of ferocity surged in Jiang Nian’er’s heart.

Correspondingly, the heaven and earth within the Bamboo Sea Dragon Trapping Formation changed color. Countless bamboo leaves, like emerald flying knives, whistled and rushed towards the Foundation Establishment cultivator.

...

“It seems winning this battle won’t be a big problem for him.”

Every subtle change in Jiang Nian’er was clearly visible to Li Fan.

While helping Jiang Nian’er reshape his body, Li Fan had also filled his body with informants.

After all, to observe the process of the strange swallowing in detail, one must have some preparation beforehand.

This fair duel did not last long.

He was just an ordinary Foundation Establishment cultivator, who probably exhausted all his energy just to barely exchange for a Foundation Establishment cultivation technique.

It was clear that he knew nothing about formations. After raging uselessly in the Trapping Dragon Formation for a long time, he was finally completely defeated.

His breath was faint, not far from death.

Jiang Nian’er did not overconfidently dismantle the formation immediately.

Instead, he stood outside the formation and silently watched his opponent: “I won this contest.”

“Here it comes...” Li Fan’s spirit jolted.

Under the perspective of heaven and earth, he clearly saw that as Jiang Nian’er spoke these words, the previously silent gloom instantly surged.

Like a swelling, monstrous shadow beast, it enveloped the Foundation Establishment cultivator.

Then it completely swallowed him.

Jiang Nian’er’s original body became somewhat blurry.

The strange dark power completely connected him with the Foundation Establishment cultivator.

It was like a giant hand forcibly kneading them together.

A moment later...

Jiang Nian’er vanished from the spot.

The dying Foundation Establishment cultivator in the formation suddenly flashed a sharp light in his eyes.

As if a withered tree saw spring, the aura of his body became thousands of times more vigorous.

He stood stunned for a long time, then fully absorbed all the memories in the Foundation Establishment cultivator’s mind.

“The weak are prey to the strong, this is the way of heaven and earth. Who let you lose...” He muttered to himself, his eyes gradually changing from confusion to determination.

Li Fan could see that in Jiang Nian’er’s Sea of Consciousness, the consciousness belonging to the original Foundation Establishment cultivator was wailing unwillingly like a ghost.

Other than that, there were no other means of resistance. He was easily suppressed by Jiang Nian’er.

Familiarizing himself with his new body, Jiang Nian’er slowly stood up and waved his hand to dispel the Trapping Dragon Formation.

Then he slowly bowed before Li Fan.

“How does the strength of a Foundation Establishment cultivator feel?” Li Fan asked with a smile.

“Very strong. But compared to senior...” Jiang Nian’er dared not look up.

“Heh heh, with this ability, as long as you continue to devour step by step. From Foundation Establishment to Golden Core, and then to Nascent Soul...” “Won’t you surpass me sooner or later.”

As soon as Li Fan said this, Jiang Nian’er was instantly struck as if by lightning, and his body trembled uncontrollably.

Because these words were exactly what he had just thought deep in his heart!

Without any evasive excuses that a junior shouldn’t dare to think, Jiang Nian’er’s heart turned icy cold.

He knew that his small life hung on the other party’s mere thought. Maintaining the posture of his forehead touching the ground, he dared not move.

After an unknown amount of time, Jiang Nian’er felt all his clothes soaked with cold sweat.

Only then did he hear Li Fan’s voice ring out.

“Get up.”

Jiang Nian’er instantly felt a wave of relief wash over him.

“The higher a cultivator’s realm, the greater the gap between realms.”

“There are countless who can defeat Golden Core with Foundation Establishment. But those who can defeat Longevity with Dao Integration...”

“There have been none since ancient times.”

“If you want revenge against me, then first reach the Longevity realm.”

Jiang Nian’er felt as if he had fallen into an ice cellar. The joy of winning the duel instantly vanished completely.

“Longevity realm...”

These three words pressed down on him like a mountain and a sea, making it hard for him to breathe.

After waiting for almost half a day, he still hadn't heard the other party speak again.

Jiang Nian’er finally mustered his courage and looked up.

He saw that the mysterious person’s figure had disappeared at some unknown time.

Jiang Nian’er was stunned for a moment, looked around, and indeed, only he remained on Fan Yong Island.

His body exhausted, Jiang Nian’er sat down heavily on the ground.

All the events since the strange outbreak surged into his mind, like the ebb and flow of the tide.

Finally, it subsided.

“Wen Nianyu...”

“From now on, I am Wen Nianyu.”

Jiang Nian’er first checked the items on his body, then flew towards the direction of Myriad Immortals Island.

His initial flight path was still somewhat erratic, but later it became a straight line, and his speed increased faster and faster.

...

Li Fan’s figure slowly reappeared.

“This kid’s adaptability is not bad.”

“Let him return to the Myriad Immortals Alliance first, and see if the Alliance officials can detect the strange power he possesses.”

Li Fan had already seen the fusion and swallowing process very clearly just now.

In fact, Jiang Nian’er was already of little use to him.

However, Li Fan had a vague feeling that perhaps with Jiang Nian’er’s methods and way of doing things, he might bring some surprises.

“The strange power is actually a rule of heaven and earth and can also be utilized.”

“Previously, there was the method of using it to forge Fen Tian Arrows, which could even cause widespread disruption to the Profound Net that had already replaced the heavens.”

“If mapped to the Heavenly Dao of the Profound Yellow Realm, it would mean chaos in the natural order and rampant strangeness across several prefectures.”

Having found and completed a research objective, Li Fan did not immediately leave the叢云 Sea. Instead, he continued to travel among the numerous locations where strange outbreaks had occurred.

Occasionally, he saw cultivators from the Heavenly Secret Hall and Martial Arts Hall of the Myriad Immortals Alliance coming to handle the situations, but most of the areas had already fallen into dead silence.

In the 叢云 Sea region, facing such a large-scale outbreak of strangeness, they were clearly struggling.

However, this situation improved with the return of Gongsun Qixuan.

Gongsun Qixuan, the person in charge of the Heavenly Secret Hall in the 叢云 Sea.

He was sickly and had the appearance of a scholar.

He had always been responsible for monitoring the strange situations within the 叢云 Sea.

Chapter 1035: The Yellow Realm's Self-Circulation

Li Fan had met Gongsun Qixuan a long time ago.

In several subsequent lifetimes, this person's shadow seemed to be behind the anomalies of the Profound Net.

Including in this current life, where he was inexplicably transferred to the headquarters of the Formation Hall of the Myriad Immortals Alliance to participate in the development of the Heavenly Profound Spirit Locking Formation...

All of these indicated that Gongsun Qixuan was extraordinary.

After several communications with the clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror, Li Fan also gained some understanding of Gongsun Qixuan's identity.

He was an observation subject and a human template used by the Heavenly Profound Mirror when creating human avatars.

As for why Gongsun Qixuan was chosen from the many cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, the clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror explained it was random, a matter of luck.

Li Fan naturally did not believe this.

Based on his memories and observations, Gongsun Qixuan possessed an aura somewhat similar to the clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

Li Fan even suspected that he might be another human avatar of the Profound Heaven Realm.

If one searched the Heavenly Profound Mirror for information about this person, everything appeared normal on the surface. However, digging deeper revealed that all the intelligence was fabricated.

Before taking up his post in the Congyun Sea, his whereabouts were an utter mystery, unknown to anyone.

As if sensing the peeking Li Fan, Gongsun Qixuan subtly glanced towards the sky.

But he quickly retracted his gaze, coughed lightly, and directed his subordinates in handling the strange occurrences.

The method of handling them was also peculiar. He took out a small straw doll woven from withered grass from his embrace.

He tossed it into the air.

Then, the subordinates of the Heavenly Secret Hall very tacitly placed even smaller straw dolls in various corners of the area where the strangeness erupted.

Under Li Fan's observation, the dark power of the strangeness did not corrode these Heavenly Secret Hall cultivators who had rashly entered.

Instead, they were deeply attracted by the small straw dolls they held.

Like long dragons, they were siphoned into the straw dolls.

"Hmm?"

Li Fan was immediately interested.

Upon closer inspection, Li Fan found that these straw dolls seemed to possess a life of their own. As the dark power flowed in, their faces displayed different expressions: strange smiles, pain, anger, and so on.

He could even hear faint rustling sounds from them.

These straw dolls acted as nodes, absorbing the dark power and then transferring it to the largest straw doll suspended in the air.

The action to clear the strangeness lasted for three days.

Finally, the strangeness spreading in that area completely disappeared, and the normal Heavenly Dao of the Profound Yellow Realm regained the upper hand.

When Gongsun Qixuan retrieved the straw doll from the air, something happened that made Li Fan's pupils contract.

On the surface, it seemed as if Gongsun Qixuan was putting the straw doll back into his embrace.

But in reality...

He looked more like he had opened a giant mouth and fiercely swallowed the straw doll.

In an instant, Li Fan felt a layer of darkness envelop Gongsun Qixuan.

And his coughing became even more frequent.

It only slightly improved when he rushed to the next location of strange outbreaks.

Of course, Gongsun Qixuan did not use straw dolls for every strange event.

For the vast majority, after detailed investigation confirmed there was no risk of spreading, Gongsun Qixuan ordered the locations sealed off.

Li Fan, watching from the clouds, pondered, "For minor hazards, we wait for the Heavenly Dao of the Yellow Realm to naturally complete the digestion. For those that are not managed and intensify, we use paper figures to suck them into ourselves."

In Li Fan's view now, Gongsun Qixuan had become an aggregate of numerous anomalies.

A chilling mix of twisted and chaotic rules intertwined within him.

If he were to die suddenly, and the aggregate of anomalies within him erupted all at once, perhaps several prefectures would be instantly devastated.

"No wonder I always felt something strange about this fellow whenever I met him."

"Incorporating the Dao with the body..."

"This is probably something a cultivator's body cannot accomplish."

A flicker of apprehension flashed in Li Fan's eyes, and he increased the distance of his tracking slightly.

He then recalled that Gongsun Qixuan, merely by using the fabricated phrase "[Heavenly Profound Spirit Locking, Yellow Return Unity]," could actually deduce the future.

Li Fan instantly formed a conjecture about Gongsun Qixuan's true identity.

"If the Heavenly Profound Mirror wanted to simulate a human avatar, with its status as an immortal artifact and its lofty mindset, how could it possibly truly observe and learn from ordinary humans?"

"And to accomplish something, the easiest way is to look for precedents, to learn from those who have gone before..."

"So..."

A sharp light flashed in Li Fan's eyes, and many clues instantly converged.

"The object of study for an immortal artifact must naturally be an existence that has already succeeded in human transformation, one that is also an immortal artifact!"

"Gongsun Qixuan should be one of the immortal artifacts from the Yellow Realm that disappeared long ago, which has manifested as a human!"

Considering that the Kun Gan Bone Hand held by Ou Shangtian previously might be the remains of an immortal, everything in the Yellow Realm participates in the operation of the Heavenly Dao and the world's cycle.

Those missing immortal artifacts were very likely the same.

"Transforming into a human, or becoming a heavenly wonder, or perhaps..."

Li Fan suddenly began to understand where the almost heaven-defying abilities of the Transmitter Jiang came from.

"Perhaps they also came from the transformation of an immortal artifact..."

Having figured out the key points, Li Fan's gaze towards Gongsun Qixuan was now completely different.

It was tinged with greed amidst apprehension, along with a degree of caution and vigilance.

Immortal artifacts, as long as they carried the word 'immortal,' were existences that absolutely could not be underestimated.

Moreover, Gongsun Qixuan had already fallen into the sight of the Heavenly Profound Mirror, and was now burdened with countless anomalies, like a time bomb ready to explode at any moment.

"Although he is a rare treasure, he is visible but untouchable."

Li Fan stared intently for a long time, finally letting out a faint sigh and slowly withdrawing his gaze.

"Besides, in this life, I am still in a cooperative relationship with the Heavenly Profound Mirror. The main quest is still to sever the True Immortal Net first."

"No rush, his true identity has been discovered by me. There will be plenty of opportunities later..."

The desire in Li Fan's eyes slowly disappeared.

Below, Gongsun Qixuan, however, frowned slightly, as if sensing something.

He performed a quick calculation.

But he could not deduce anything concrete.

Scenes of Li Fan's past encounters with Gongsun Qixuan replayed in Li Fan's mind.

"It seems his original form might have been an immortal artifact related to deduction."

"But based on his current performance, his power seems to have diminished significantly after transforming into a human."

Li Fan stroked his chin.

"However, this gives me some inspiration."

"There are still many secrets waiting to be uncovered in the Yellow Realm."

"In those days, the Yellow Realm had many existences close to immortal artifacts. Not to mention the fusion with numerous cultivation worlds—do so many worlds not possess existences of equivalent caliber?"

"Even if some were taken away by the Transmission, there should still be stragglers."

"I was constrained before. In reality, it's not limited to artifacts; humans could also be greater treasures."

Chapter 1036: Mountains and Rivers Enter the Spirit Wood

Li Fan observed Gongsun Qixuan from a distance for a while longer, but ultimately managed to slip away without alerting him.

Passing by Myriad Immortal Island, Li Fan glanced again towards the deep void below.

The Golden Seal, a soul of heaven and earth that he had summoned away with his false heavenly mandate, had reappeared at some point, suppressing the entrance to the Tunnel of Deep Nether.

The various strange occurrences had been dealt with and resolved, and the source had been sealed.

It seemed that the Sea of Clustered Clouds had returned to the peaceful good days of before.

However, from his perspective of heaven and earth, Li Fan could discern the consequences of the outbreak of strangeness.

The Crimson Flame, a soul of heaven and earth that had received orders from the Sea of Burning, had clearly become even more powerful than before.

The faint heat emanating from it made even Li Fan inwardly startled.

A realization suddenly dawned on Li Fan: "A severe illness requires a strong medicine. It seems the Heavenly Dao of the Yellow Realm has become ruthless this time. Perhaps the Sea of Clustered Clouds will completely disappear before long."

Scenes of the seabed being completely exposed as the seawater evaporated, a purgatorial sight, flashed before his eyes.

Li Fan shook his head slightly and did not linger any longer in the Sea of Clustered Clouds.

"The divine ability of the False Deceptive Heavenly Dao has been tested. When the time is ripe, I can instantly extract a large amount of the life changes of heaven and earth and convert them into my own sustenance."

"What I need to do next is to instigate a struggle between these two great deities."

Li Fan couldn't help but look towards the unseen location of the Immortal Ruins in the sky.

Calculating against immortals was inherently an extremely dangerous endeavor.

Not to mention immortals, even Li Fan would vaguely sense the hidden schemes of his enemies.

"All arrangements must erupt at the same time. The moment the two immortals turn their gaze, the first thing they will see will be each other."

"They should overlook me. Hmm..."

Li Fan pondered for a moment, "It's possible they might spare a sliver of power to crush this insignificant insect like me as well."

"..."

No matter how he thought about it, he could not eliminate this possibility.

Li Fan's heart grew heavy again.

After all, a True Immortal was an existence capable of destroying the Yellow Realm with a single glance.

With his current strength, resisting the might of a True Immortal was still too difficult.

"I need to accumulate more strength."

"Being entangled in this world was an unavoidable predicament."

"To survive the lingering might of the True Immortals, perhaps the only way is to use their strength against them."

Li Fan's thoughts churned, and without realizing it, he had returned to the Spirit Wood Realm.

"Hmm?"

Only then did he notice that a group of newcomers seemed to have arrived in the Spirit Wood Realm.

A scan of his divine sense revealed that these were Shang Tianci and Yan Fangzhou, who, after strenuous persuasion, had finally brought their companions from the Mountain and River Pavilion to visit.

Most of these people were under fifty years old, yet their lowest cultivation level was the Nascent Soul stage, truly proving them to be favored children of heaven.

They generally came from renowned families and noble clans, possessing extraordinary vision.

When they saw the scenery of the Spirit Wood Realm, although a flicker of curiosity crossed their eyes, they were not overly shocked.

"Brother Shang, Brother Yan, this is the supreme scenery of the myriad worlds you mentioned? Heh heh, isn't that a bit of an exaggeration?"

"Indeed, although the blessed lands of my family cannot compare to the grandeur here, in terms of sheer beauty of the scenery, we are certainly not inferior to this place."

A total of thirteen young cultivators spoke up, teasing lightly.

They smiled, and it was a normal discussion, not intended to mock.

Shang Tianci was about to explain when he suddenly heard Li Fan's mental transmission.

"Take them to the statue of the True Immortal."

Shang Tianci's expression shifted slightly, and the words on the verge of his lips immediately changed: "Heh heh, actually, there is one more sight in the Spirit Wood Realm that you all have not yet seen. If the wonders of the Spirit Wood Realm were a stone, this realm would occupy nine parts of it."

Upon hearing this, everyone became interested.

"Brother Shang, don't keep it hidden any longer, hurry up and take us there!"

"Yes, yes! Since we are here, how can we miss it?"

The crowd urged him on. Shang Tianci revealed a slight smile, "Alright, everyone follow me."

Not long after, the group arrived at the circular hall at the entrance of the Spirit Wood Realm.

Seeing Shang Tianci stop there, the crowd looked suspiciously, "Brother Shang, what trick are you playing? What's so interesting about this shabby circular hall?"

"Yes, when we came before, wasn't this the first building we saw?"

"Could it be that there is... something hidden inside?"

The crowd murmured amongst themselves.

Shang Tianci cupped his hands in salute, "Everyone will know when they come in and see."

With that, he strode into the circular hall first.

The others exchanged glances, but being skilled and bold, they followed without much hesitation.

The bright sunlight instantly vanished upon entering the hall.

The view became dim.

But in the darkness, a stone statue was so clear.

As if possessing some magical power, it firmly captured their gazes.

...

Half a day later.

A group of twelve slowly emerged from the circular hall.

They seemed unchanged from before they entered, but they were now devout believers of the Compassionate Immortal of the Mortal Dust.

Li Fan watched the backs of these young people and slowly nodded.

"Although their innate talent is not much different from those people in the Separate Realm, fortunately, their strength is already established, so I don't need to spend effort cultivating them."

Li Fan assigned them the first and only task for joining the sect.

To deduce the method for forging the 【Primordial Golden Elixir】 after his foundation establishment.

As a means to completely break free from the cultivation system of the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable, Li Fan had not forgotten about it.

Even if each lifetime would only yield a small harvest, accumulating little by little, one day he might finally find the way to break free.

"Or, if I can meet the Mysterious Heaven King in this lifetime, perhaps the deduction process can be greatly advanced," Li Fan thought silently.

...

Calmly, another month passed.

The fluctuation transmitted from the Ultimate Dissolution Disc made Li Fan's eyes narrow: "Is there finally a result?"

The deduction regarding the restriction set by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable had finally made a breakthrough.

The time it took far exceeded Li Fan's expectations.

Li Fan squinted, feeling the schemes continuously transmitted by the Dissolution Disc.

The restriction placed by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable on the Mysterious Heaven Mirror could be summarized as: "Deeply rooted and gnarled, reaching into the bone marrow. Rooted in the Yellow Realm heaven and earth, becoming one with it."

Therefore, the solution provided by the Dissolution Disc was to pare flesh, scrape bone, bleed, and pull tendons.

Although it sounded somewhat terrifying, in reality, it meant tracing the veins and pathways left in the world by the Mysterious Heaven Mirror, following them step by step to dismantle the restriction one by one.

It was not a clever approach, but a direct and crude method of breaking it.

Moreover, it seemed that in the deduction of the Ultimate Dissolution Disc, this was the only way to break the restriction of the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable.

This was also why, even with the current capabilities of the Dissolution Disc, it still required such a long time.

"Perhaps when the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable set up this restriction back then, they never imagined someone would break it in this manner."

"Because someone capable of this would likely already possess near-immortal power, able to directly destroy the restriction rather than using this simplest and most direct method."

Chapter 1037: Mustard Seed Hides the Deliverance

After spending another half a month ensuring there were no major issues with the Dissolution Disc's plan to break the restriction, Li Fan did not delay. He immediately contacted Mo Ru Bin and the clone of the Mysterious Heaven Mirror to inform them of the situation.

Mo Ru Bin studied the extremely complex formations recorded in the jade slip for a long time. After finishing, he massaged his temples and frowned, "I can't make head or tail of it. You'd better go ask the Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone again. After all, once it's confirmed, it will be difficult to change."

The human clone of the Mysterious Heaven Mirror carefully read through the contents of the jade slip, and his eyes gradually lit up. "Wonderful, indescribably wonderful." "Great skill without artistry, simple in appearance yet complex in reality, pointing directly to the Great Dao..."

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone was immersed in it for a long time before suddenly looking up sharply at Li Fan, "How did you deduce such a formation?" There was still a deep look of suspicion in his eyes. Clearly, the Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone did not believe Li Fan had such capability.

Li Fan smiled, his eyes darting around. Recalling his earlier speculation about the immortal artifact transforming, he opened his mouth and said, "Me? I can't deduce such a complex formation." "However, everyone has their specialty. What you and I cannot do does not mean others cannot." "Do you think your Mysterious Heaven Mirror is the strongest in the Profound Yellow World?" "Our Profound Heaven Sect was once an immortal treasure..."

Li Fan snorted, his words abruptly stopping. The Mysterious Heaven Mirror stared intently at Li Fan, as if trying to see through him. However, regrettably, he could not discern anything from his face.

After a moment of silence, the Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone took the initiative to speak, "Alright. Regardless of how you obtained this method to break the restriction, based on my judgment, it should be able to break the restriction left by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable." "However..." The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone suddenly changed the subject, "To ensure absolute safety, we must first verify it."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes, "Verify? How do we verify?"

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone said slowly, "The restriction left by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable was not entirely used on me..." "Hmm?"

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone paced back and forth, seemingly deep in thought. After a long while, he slowly said, "To maintain the stability of the Profound Yellow World, the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable once purged almost all unstable factors in the Profound Yellow World." "I call it the Cleansing of the Profound Yellow." "What could be eliminated was thoroughly eliminated. What could not be eliminated..." "Was permanently sealed by restrictions."

Li Fan also showed a look of interest on his face, "There's such a thing..."

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone was unconcerned, "Otherwise, why would the Profound Yellow World be so peaceful? Merging various worlds, yet maintaining peace for the vast majority of its history..." "This in itself is an incredible thing."

Li Fan slowly nodded, acknowledging the other party's statement. One must know that even in the mortal Great Profound, there was the saying that long periods of division must unite, and long periods of unity must divide. Since the Great Calamity rebirth, the Profound Yellow World had always been a bipolar contention between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Five Elders' Council. Although there were occasional wars and friction, they were more like means to regulate the overall number of cultivators. Behind this, there must have been factors secretly controlled by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable.

"So, which restriction do we use for the test? Will it alarm the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable?" Li Fan was extremely interested in the unstable factors the Mysterious Heaven Mirror mentioned that had been sealed by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable, and he immediately asked.

"I am also considering it." The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone frowned deeply, seemingly caught in a difficult choice. After a long time, he gave his answer. "The sealed object must not pose a great threat. When the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable sealed these things back then, they often left a trace of attention. Although thousands of years have passed, we cannot guarantee that the attention has completely disappeared." "It is best to choose something sealed in a fit of rage by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable back then, something that poses no actual threat to the Profound Yellow World, but was sealed merely because it provoked the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable. To the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable, it would be like swatting away a mouse. After so many years, the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable might have long forgotten about it."

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone's eyes grew brighter as he spoke. Finally, he looked at Li Fan, "Have you ever heard of the Deliverance Sect?"

"Deliverance Sect?" Li Fan's heart shook. His expression changed drastically, revealing a trace of anger, "Isn't that one of the ten heretical sects from back then? Don't tell me you want me to break their seal?"

Li Fan immediately waved his hand and refused, "Impossible! These traitors, if I don't kill them all, how could I possibly save them?" "Hmph, it seems the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable still has some redeeming qualities. Sealing these trash for so long..." "Transmission Law Celestial Venerable, well done!"

It seemed the mention of the Deliverance Sect touched a nerve with Li Fan. His entire demeanor suddenly became somewhat unstable, alternating between cold laughter and agitation.

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone observed Li Fan for a moment before explaining, "Hehe, you don't need to worry about this aspect. The members of the Deliverance Sect should have long been killed by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable. What the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable sealed were merely some arrangements left behind by the Deliverance Sect." "Those things have penetrated deep into the Profound Yellow World and are difficult to remove. Even the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable could not completely destroy them, so they could only be sealed." "It's just dead things. If you test the restriction-breaking method and succeed, as long as you don't touch the things inside, no anomaly will appear. This is the most suitable place I have screened for a preliminary test."

Hearing the words of the Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone, the densely packed paper figures monitoring everything in the Profound Yellow World instantly flashed in Li Fan's mind.

"Deliverance Sect..." Countless thoughts flashed through his mind in an instant, and finally, his expression gradually stabilized. "If that's the case, where is the location sealed by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable for the Deliverance Sect?" "I will listen to you and go give it a try." "But..." "This trip is quite dangerous. Do you have any compensation for me?" Li Fan's gaze was sharp.

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone immediately looked somewhat helpless. "I haven't fully recovered yet. We can discuss it after you return successfully." "As for the location of the Deliverance Sect's seal..." The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone's expression turned serious again. He snapped off another segment of his finger and handed it over.

"It's just a coordinate, why make it so troublesome? Just say it directly..." Li Fan was somewhat puzzled, until he examined the contents of the finger, and his words suddenly stopped. "Hiding a mustard seed within a vast space... Does the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable actually possess such a method?" Li Fan looked somewhat stunned.

The Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone cautioned, "You must strictly follow the size and position, otherwise, you will not only fail to find the location of the Deliverance Sect but might even get lost in the void."

Li Fan firmly memorized the contents recorded in the finger, then crushed it in his hand. According to the record, the Deliverance Sect had been reduced a hundred thousand times by the Transmission Law Celestial Venerable and permanently hidden within the void of the Profound Yellow World.

(End of Chapter)

Chapter 1038: The Seventy-Two Labyrinths

It was like an organ of the human body being shrunk down to a cell.

Currently, the Deliverance Sect was hidden within the void of Gou Mang Prefecture in the Myriad Immortal Alliance, invisible and unknown to ordinary people.

Li Fan followed the coordinates given by the Mysterious Heaven Mirror clone and arrived at a position thirty-six thousand feet above Gou Mang Prefecture.

The entrance to the Deliverance Sect was located here.

The Deliverance Sect, having been shrunk a hundred thousand times, was originally like dust. Combined with the concealment provided by the Transmission Law Restriction, even with Li Fan's current observation skills, despite knowing the outcome beforehand, he could not detect any trace of the Deliverance Sect while investigating.

Li Fan pondered for a moment, then silently circulated the Limitless Abundance and Void Art, subsequently severing a small portion of his divine soul.

After the divine soul left his body, it transformed into a small Li Fan appearance, becoming a ray of white light that burrowed into the tiny void ahead.

As the surrounding objects magnified thousands of times, the space around Li Fan’s soul clone rapidly expanded.

The soul clone sped through the vast void, searching for traces of the Deliverance Sect's entrance nearby.

To enter the Deliverance Sect, finding the entrance was the first step.

"It's not just a simple reduction in size; the space itself is layered in multiple directions here."

Not long after, sensing the familiar aura of the Transmission Law Restriction, Li Fan abruptly stopped.

Upon careful discernment, Li Fan discovered a region of the void not far away that seemed to have a piece of mirror embedded within it, exhibiting a slight disharmony.

An ordinary person would hardly notice it, but Li Fan had deduced and cracked the Transmission Law Restriction countless times in the Dissolution Disc, so he was naturally very familiar with it.

Without hesitation, he flew toward that "mirror surface."

As if suddenly passing through an invisible bubble, in an instant, Li Fan felt the spatial orientations above, below, left, and right around him invert multiple times.

A slight dizziness washed over him. Li Fan knew he had stepped into the second layer of space.

After entering the inner space, in addition to the correct passage, many "forks in the road" were set up.

Once one stepped onto them, they would be teleported into other illusory void labyrinths designed to confuse.

There were no exits, only continuously magnifying, microscopic levels.

Forget returning to search for the Deliverance Sect again; even just not getting lost was an extremely difficult task.

Fortunately, possessing the correct answer, Li Fan proceeded cautiously. After penetrating seventy-two layers of space, he finally saw a mountain body floating in the void in the distance.

The seventy-two layers of space had been shrunk one hundred thousand times.

The void was no longer the conventionally pitch-black darkness but a bizarre pale purple.

Along the boundaries illuminated by the purple light, thin lines occasionally flashed rapidly.

They left only a faint trace before quickly vanishing without a trace. Their speed was so great that even Li Fan could not capture them.

More strangely, in this space, at irregular intervals, an indeterminate number of purple light orbs would illuminate, like suns or clusters of stars, briefly lighting up the area before quickly disappearing.

...

Against the backdrop of these strange scenes, the Deliverance Sect in the distance exuded an even more eerie aura.

Li Fan’s soul clone slowly approached the mountain body.

After passing through a layer of barrier protection, he officially entered the interior of the Deliverance Sect.

It seemed to be an independent space. Sounds finally reached Li Fan’s ears again.

There was no specific sound, only the presence of sound. Unlike the absolute silence during the process of delving into the seventy-two layers of space, sound existed here.

Li Fan was currently at the foot of the mountain.

Looking at the single stone staircase extending upwards before him, Li Fan attempted to fly directly up the mountain.

He hadn't flown far before his vision blurred, and Li Fan found himself directly back where he started.

"I wonder if this is due to the Transmission Law Restriction or the Deliverance Sect's original sect-protecting method?"

Li Fan thought this, abandoning the idea of flying and ascending the mountain path step by step.

"Hmm?"

After taking a few steps, his feet suddenly halted.

"Was that an illusion?" Just now, it seemed a figure had run past him, heading straight up the mountain.

Li Fan did not "see" the figure's existence, but he distinctly felt it.

"Playing tricks..."

Li Fan let out a cold snort and continued forward.

Indeed, every time he climbed a certain distance up, he felt the appearance of that ghostly figure. Some went up the mountain like him, while others came down from the mountain.

The frequency of their appearance grew more and more frequent, and...

"Each appearance brings a more distinct sensation."

A look of gravity appeared on Li Fan's face.

In the beginning, it was merely like a gentle breeze. By now, when the figures brushed past him, he could very clearly feel a cold, clammy dampness.

So much so that this soul clone felt as if a mortal running a long distance on the hottest day of summer—his body drenched in sweat...

"Sweat?"

Li Fan suddenly jolted awake and immediately sensed something was wrong.

He scanned his body with his divine sense; nothing seemed abnormal. He then cast the Water Mirror Technique and looked into the mirror surface.

Li Fan’s scalp tingled momentarily.

It turned out the shadowy figures that had brushed past him had not disappeared. Instead, they were stacking and overlapping, one after another, all clinging to his back.

What shocked him even more was that without the reflection in the mirror, Li Fan had absolutely no awareness of this!

As if sensing Li Fan's gaze reflected in the mirror, the previously blurry faces of those shadows gradually became visible.

Countless pale faces, overlapping each other, shifted continuously. Their voices sounded intermittently in Li Fan’s ears.

"Go up the mountain, go up the mountain..."

"Run! Run away!"

"Fellow Daoist, give me a ride. This mountain path is a bit too difficult to walk."

"So tired. So tired. We should be near the exit."

...

As these voices sounded, Li Fan was horrified to find that his body began to move according to the different contents of these words.

It wanted to go up the mountain, yet it also desperately wanted to flee this place. Neither side would yield to the other.

"Hiss..."

In this stark contradiction, as if being pulled forcefully from both front and back, Li Fan's body was instantly torn in half.

"That's it, that's it..."

Both sides seized their respective portions and let out cheers of delight.

Then, these figures each took half of a body and went their separate ways, one moving rapidly up the mountain path and the other down.

As if contaminated by these shadows, the two halves of Li Fan’s remains also seemed to be covered in a thick shadow.

Amidst the erosion and transformation of time and light, these separated halves quietly reformed into two complete bodies.

Outside the Deliverance Sect, in the normal space of the Profound Yellow World, Li Fan observed the scenes transmitted by his two soul clones, revealing an expression of interest.

One to the left, one to the right; one going up, one coming down. Both images presented simultaneously.

Chapter 1039: The Power to End the Tribulation

With the mysterious figures leading the way, the two soul clones did not encounter any further tearing incidents.

Moreover, the speed at which they traveled on the mountain path increased several times, and the surrounding scenery rapidly flashed by.

The only thing that puzzled Li Fan was that even though his initial appearance point was at the foot of the Deliverance Sect, and he hadn't climbed much up the mountain, the path leading down seemed just as long as the path up.

It was as if there was no end.

After an unknown amount of time.

The scenes before the eyes of the two soul clones blurred, and the vague figures enveloping them vanished.

As the surroundings quieted down, they looked left and right.

The scenery around them was identical: a small courtyard with white walls and a half-closed red wooden door. The walls were mottled with patches of red, which looked like blood, and patches of green, which were moss growing in the cracks of the wall.

In the main body of Li Fan, observing the identical scenes transmitted by his two soul clones, his expression was somewhat indescribable.

“Two Deliverance Sects? What is going on?”

Without thinking for long, he controlled the two soul clones to push open the red wooden door and walk into the small courtyard.

The red door did not creak despite its age and disrepair; instead, it opened silently, giving a sense of unreality.

The moment he stepped into the courtyard, Li Fan felt a pair of hands suddenly grab his ankles.

This happened in both locations simultaneously.

However, when he looked down, he saw nothing. But the chilling feeling emanating from the depths of his soul was undeniable.

“This time, I must make the Heavenly Profound Mirror pay dearly. He didn't mention at all that the Deliverance Sect was this bizarre.”

This thought flashed through his mind. The two soul clones ignored the strange sensations coming from beneath their feet and continued to explore deeper into the courtyard.

The door to the central hall was tightly shut and could not be opened.

There were only stone doors on the left and right, leading to unknown places.

This was the situation in both scenes where the two clones were located.

“Interesting.” Li Fan’s eyes flickered.

He first tried to attack the central hall. However, even if the hall was destroyed, it instantly reverted to its original state.

Li Fan then sent his two soul clones to enter the stone doors on the left and right, respectively.

The scene before his eyes flickered.

When Li Fan could see his surroundings clearly, he couldn't help but be slightly taken aback.

Because behind the stone door was an image identical to the courtyard he had just been in!

It was still the central hall with its door tightly shut, flanked by stone doors on the left and right!

“This…”

The way back had disappeared; they could only continue to explore forward.

After some thought, Li Fan made a decision. After a moment of wriggling, the two soul clones each split into two individuals again.

Four soul clones in total, each heading towards a different stone door.

The scene continued to change.

As expected, what greeted their eyes was the same scene as before.

Li Fan frowned and continued to split his soul.

Eight soul clones slowly floated into the stone doors.

Sixteen, thirty-two, sixty-four, one hundred and twenty-eight…

After splitting into one thousand and twenty-four individuals, the soul clone exploring the Deliverance Sect finally could no longer continue to split.

Looking at the left and right doors beside the soul clones, Li Fan knew the first exploration was a failure.

“Did I go in the wrong direction, falling into a trap? Or is this…”

“A trial of the Deliverance Sect?”

Li Fan pondered for a moment, then severed nearly a third of his soul.

Even with the aid of the Limitless Balance and Void Method to replenish his soul power, Li Fan felt a wave of dizziness.
