This third of his soul was different from the simple clones before; it carried a large amount of the Five Elements power that had been drawn out.

This was enough to support this soul in completing multiple splits.

“Go.” Watching the soul disappear into the void, Li Fan quickly began to recover his injuries while continuing to observe the images transmitted by the soul.

Just as before, the soul soon entered the Deliverance Sect.

It was torn apart again by the mysterious figures and entered small courtyards above and below.

What surprised Li Fan was that he couldn't find the previous clones that had entered. It seemed they had entered different spaces.

Li Fan’s heart stirred, and he commanded the previous one thousand and twenty-four clones to self-destruct simultaneously.

As the sensation of sight disappeared, the soul deep within the Deliverance Sect felt no change.

“They’ve isolated the perception.”

“Worthy of being one of the Ten Ancient Immortal Sects.”

Not yet reaching a state where he could ignore the arrangements here, Li Fan had no choice but to follow their rules to explore.

This time, supported by the ceaseless power of his soul, Li Fan moved forward smoothly.

Every time he entered a small courtyard, he split into two individuals to explore separately.

This continued for seventy-two times.

Outside the Deliverance Sect, the Dao Transformation Stone in Li Fan’s sea of consciousness emitted an unprecedented bright light.

Innumerable identical scenes were displayed within the Dao Transformation Stone.

“Fortunately, these extremely similar scenes reduced the processing burden. Otherwise…”

Li Fan knew this was his limit.

If he split again, his soul could still sustain it.

But his main body would be forced to cut off all the sensory images. Otherwise, there was a risk of his sea of consciousness being overloaded.

The remaining clones now only had a faint wisp of their former selves.

They were almost invisible.

Without any power attached, even a mortal strike could probably dissipate them.

But they still drifted slowly toward their respective entrances according to Li Fan’s main body’s instructions.

More images surged in simultaneously, causing Li Fan’s thoughts to momentarily freeze.

Then…

It was as if countless projected clones finally converged into a single point.

After a dizzying rotation, they merged back together.

It took some time to adapt to the single stream of images.

Li Fan squinted, observing his surroundings.

It was still the small courtyard he had seen countless times.

However, there were no longer stone doors on the left and right walls.

Li Fan looked at the central hall, lost in thought.

He walked slowly forward and gently pushed open the door.

In the darkness, a black dot seemed to appear, absorbing all the surrounding light.

Then, it erupted with a thousandfold speed.

Scenes rapidly played out before Li Fan’s eyes.

“Tribulation is coming; it is a great tribulation, but also an opportunity.”

“If we can successfully overcome this tribulation, we shall exist forever through all calamities…”

“Among endless possibilities, that sliver of opportunity indeed exists.”

“Only by seeking life in death.”

“Not bad. If the Profound Yellow World can survive the great tribulation, we can also borrow the power of the tribulation to achieve transcendence.”

“Then, let’s begin.”

…

In the darkness, it seemed like many identical figures were rapidly conversing.

And as the scenes continued to unfold, Li Fan was astonished to discover that these figures had all transformed into the appearance he had seen before.

Those paper figures that densely filled the heaven and earth!

Li Fan’s spirit was shaken, and he wanted to watch further.

But he felt the surrounding dark space suddenly tremble.

All the illusory scenes vanished.

When Li Fan could see things again…

Chapter 1040: The Secret of the Book of Crossing Calamities

Above the gloomy great hall, several thin lines crisscrossed.

Paper figures, all seemingly identical but with subtle differences in facial expressions upon closer inspection, hung neatly on these thin lines.

The passage of time had caused these paper figures to appear withered and pale yellow, as if faded.

As Li Fan abruptly broke in, countless paper figures floated up without wind, swaying eerily.

Li Fan felt, for a moment, that the gazes of all these paper figures were focused on him.

As if bound by chains, Li Fan’s spirit instantly lost the ability to move on its own.

Fortunately, slowly, these swaying paper figures settled down again.

The pressure exerted on Li Fan also gradually lessened.

After returning to normal, Li Fan did not choose to act rashly. Because he vaguely sensed that there was still a gaze in the hall fixed upon him.

Li Fan looked in the direction of the sensation and saw that something seemed to be hidden in the shadows ahead.

It was like a venomous snake tightly watching its prey, ready to strike at any moment.

He slowly approached.

Li Fan still chose not to move rashly, but waited quietly for the shadow to continue to draw nearer.

Meeting unchanging with all changes.

The pressure brought by the approaching shadow increased every moment for Li Fan.

The faint whispers in his ears also seemed to urge Li Fan to act quickly.

But Li Fan, who had discerned all the subtle changes around him, inwardly sneered.

During this period of static observation, he had already glimpsed the secret within.

The approach of the shadow and the life-and-death pressure it brought were completely illusory.

It was intended to force anyone who entered the hall to attack the shadow.

And the true face of that shadow was...

Li Fan's vision suddenly changed, and the shadow receded, revealing its true appearance: a heavily riddled rope.

The aura emanating from it was something Li Fan was extremely familiar with.

It was the restriction left by the Celestial Lord of Transmitting Law!

"The Crossing Calamities Sect is indeed not simple; even the restriction left by the Celestial Lord of Transmitting Law has been corroded to this extent."

"No wonder I encountered the trial methods of the Crossing Calamities Sect on the mountain path and in the small courtyard."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes slightly and scanned the countless paper figures in the hall.

The faces of the paper figures now seemed to all wear strange smiles.

Then they changed to innocent expressions.

"From the fleeting glimpse of the image just now, it seems these paper figures are all transformed from cultivators of the Crossing Calamities Sect?"

"But there are too many paper figures."

Li Fan pondered, releasing a trace of spiritual power, attempting to pluck a paper figure hanging on a thin line.

As expected, the spiritual power passed through empty air.

The paper figures in the hall seemed to be completely illusory existences, without physical form.

Li Fan separated another wisp of divine sense, wanting to connect with the paper figures, but still could not touch them.

"It seems that a secret art of the Crossing Calamities Sect must be used to manipulate these paper figures."

"Destroy the restriction here, then..."

Li Fan's eyes flickered, and in a moment, he changed his mind.

"I won't destroy it; instead, I will repair this restriction!"

The way the Crossing Calamities Sect operated truly disgusted Li Fan. Like a coward hiding in its shell, they chose to merge with the Profound Yellow World to avoid disaster.

Relying entirely on potential saviors.

Although effective, it was truly unworthy of the bearing that the Ten Sects of the Immortal Path should possess.

More critically, Li Fan felt deeply uncomfortable within the Crossing Calamities Sect at all times, as if they were naturally opposed, making him restless and uneasy.

The split soul stood still in the hall, while the main body, outside the Crossing Calamities Sect, began to use the Dissolution Disk to reverse-engineer and break the formation. With the lesson learned from before, it only took seven days to successfully deduce the magic formation used to repair the restriction of the Celestial Lord of Transmitting Law.

Li Fan in the gloomy great hall immediately took action.

"Creation and destruction are two paths to the same end. If I can successfully repair the restriction of Transmitting Law, it means my deduction of the restriction of Transmitting Law is correct, and I can also destroy it."

It was as if he held a seven-colored brush, sketching in the air.

Correspondingly, the rope in the center of the hall, which was originally somewhat rotten, slowly became animated again.

Light enveloped the gloomy hall once more.

But Li Fan's action seemed to anger the countless paper figures hanging there.

They shook violently again, their facial expressions turning to anger.

They stared intently at Li Fan.

Instantly, sounds like ghost wailing and demon howling echoed in Li Fan's ears.

"Noisy!"

Li Fan roared, completely unmoved. Instead, he accelerated the repair process.

The roars of the paper figures could not stop Li Fan at all.

The rope representing the restriction reappeared from the center of the hall and spread towards the doorway.

"Boom!"

After a violent tremor, Li Fan returned to outside the hall.

He was still in the empty small courtyard, but the great hall had shrunk to the size of a toy.

It was fixed in the center of the open space by the restricting rope.

Only then did Li Fan notice the traces of the destroyed restriction hidden in the shadows.

The great hall continued to shake and tried to struggle.

Li Fan's gaze turned cold, and he continued the repair work.

When the restriction in the small courtyard was repaired, the scene shifted, and Li Fan returned to the front of the stone steps leading up the mountain.

The restriction here was the most complex.

But fortunately, most of it was relatively intact; this single mountain path was the only part missing due to the erosion by the power of the Crossing Calamities Sect.

When Li Fan completed the missing parts of the restriction, this mountain path naturally disappeared without a trace.

The scene before his eyes shrank again.

The so-called Crossing Calamities Sect finally revealed its original appearance.

Sealed by layers of restrictions, it was a book opened in the middle.

There were no words in the book, only reliefs of mountains and scenes of cultivators.

As the book naturally turned its pages, the appearance presented within also changed.

However, they were all silhouette-like, looking comical and bizarre.

Looking at the book before him, Li Fan observed carefully for a long time, deep in thought.

"The Crossing Calamities Sect was indeed exterminated by the Celestial Lord of Transmitting Law back then."

"But this is exactly what they sought. Seeking life in death, the entire sect transformed into another mode of existence."

"This book..."

"Has a bit of the flavor of the Creation Slab. However, the Creation Slab records all things in the Profound Yellow Realm, while this Book of Crossing Calamities only concerns matters within the Crossing Calamities Sect."

"That was the original case. But the people of the Crossing Calamities Sect have already turned into paper figures, spread throughout the Profound Yellow World. Therefore, they can also use the eyes of the paper figures in this Book of Crossing Calamities to glimpse all things in the Profound Yellow World."

Among the fleeting images constantly flipping past, Li Fan occasionally saw some familiar scenes from the Profound Yellow World, pondering to himself.

At this point, Li Fan's goal for this trip had actually been achieved.

He had verified that the magic formation targeting the restriction of Transmitting Law was not problematic.

But looking at the Book of Crossing Calamities being suppressed anew by the power of the restriction of Transmitting Law, Li Fan’s thoughts could not help but stir again.

Chapter 1041: Dual Cultivation of Yin and Yang

As the saying goes, a thief does not leave empty-handed.

This exploration of the Crossing Calamities Sect indeed took a lot of effort.

To return empty-handed would truly not be Li Fan's style.

Li Fan’s soul division rubbed his chin. After pondering for a long time, he immediately had an idea.

Outside the Book of Crossing Calamities, Li Fan set up another layer of restrictions created by himself.

With Li Fan's current strength, he still could not deal with the Book of Crossing Calamities without its seal being suppressed.

Creating something from nothing was much more difficult than repairing it.

One-third of his divine soul was completely depleted without successfully completing it.

Fortunately, Li Fan's main body, squatting outside this space, had already supported with another third of his divine soul power long ago.

After two months, he finally managed to completely set up a new restriction outside the Book of Crossing Calamities.

Under the suppression of the dual restrictions, the flipping frequency of the Book of Crossing Calamities became even faster.

Even the paper figure silhouettes within it became indistinct.

Sensing that the seal's strength was fine, Li Fan then began to dismantle the original restriction left by the Transmitting Law.

While breaking it apart, he maintained the highest mental vigilance at all times.

At the same time, his main body quietly retreated a thousand miles away to observe if any changes occurred.

The facts proved that Li Fan's worries were unnecessary.

Until the Transmitting Law restriction was completely removed, no anomalies occurred.

Li Fan couldn't help but breathe a sigh of relief.

Looking at the Book of Crossing Calamities before him, he enveloped it with his divine soul and returned along the original path from the micro-dust space.

The soul division did not return to the main body but instead returned to the Spirit Wood Realm alone in advance.

Li Fan's main body went to report to the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone.

"Why did it take so long? I thought you ran into some trouble," the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone asked, having changed its identity again, now dressed in a vibrant red dress as a charming woman.

Li Fan paused, his expression stiffening.

He glanced at the other three mortals in the room who were completely naked and asked in disbelief, "You are..."

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone was unconcerned by Li Fan's shock.

"It's just that I've comprehended a new path of cultivation."

"A life without intimacy is incomplete. Since I am to incarnate as a human, I must experience everything humans should experience."

Li Fan sized up the peerless face transformed by the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone, his expression strange, "But you didn't have to transform into a female body, did you?"

"I must experience both male and female. It's just a matter of order," the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone shook its head and changed the topic, "What's the situation on your end?"

"The formation for breaking the restriction has no problems. If everything goes according to plan, it won't be long before you successfully break free. However..." Li Fan paused, "That Crossing Calamities Sect seems a bit strange? When I arrived there, the Transmitting Law restriction was already somewhat loose. After I completely broke the restriction, the Crossing Calamities Sect actually disappeared right before my eyes." Li Fan said with a hint of annoyance.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone narrowed its eyes slightly.

Seemingly contemplating something, it spoke after a moment, "No need to worry. As long as the tribulation of the Profound Yellow World has not passed, those people of the Crossing Calamities Sect will always be in that state."

"The only things they can do are some despicable tricks that cannot see the light of day."

Li Fan took the opportunity to ask, "Do you mean that if the Profound Yellow World successfully passes the tribulation one day, the people of the Crossing Calamities Sect might actually be resurrected?"

A trace of killing intent flashed in his eyes. The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone let out a cold laugh, "It's only a possibility. They wanted to transform into paper figures to survive the tribulation, but they never expected that the time for the tribulation to pass would be so long."

"After transforming into paper figures for nearly ten thousand years, how could there be no side effects? So you can completely consider them all dead."

Li Fan nodded slowly upon hearing this.

After a moment of silence, he asked again, "Before I came, I inquired around. It seems the Crossing Calamities Sect has some sort of tribulation-aiding person who can help them pass the tribulation? Is this true?"

"If there is such a marvelous thing, I must kill this tribulation-aiding person to prevent the Crossing Calamities Sect from rising again," Li Fan said righteously.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone frowned, "According to the cultivation techniques of the Crossing Calamities Sect, there indeed exists a tribulation-aiding person."

"The people of the Crossing Calamities Sect stand outside the fray, avoiding disaster. But they can sense the trend and variables of the tribulation. The one who can influence the disaster is the so-called tribulation-aiding person. However..."

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone sneered, "If it were an ordinary tribulation, the Profound Yellow World would naturally have a person of destiny arise to turn the tide and save everything."

"But in the face of an extinction-level grand tribulation, the Profound Yellow World itself is struggling to survive, so where would there be any person of destiny?"

"And it's even more impossible to find a tribulation-aiding person who can end the tribulation."

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone suddenly fell silent, as if recalling something.

After a long while, it spoke in a faint tone, "If such a person really exists, perhaps all the cultivators in the entire Profound Yellow World would have to exert all their strength to help them. Even teaching them the methods, I'm afraid, would require a personal visit."

A barely perceptible gleam flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

He let out a dry laugh and chimed in, "You are right. To preserve our lives, we still have to rely on ourselves."

"Relying on a so-called savior like the Crossing Calamities Sect is truly unreasonable. It's good that they died!"

After briefly touching upon the Crossing Calamities Sect, Li Fan, having verified the dismantling of the restriction, asked the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone for some benefits.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone did not go back on its word. "In the time you were away, I observed human life in my female form and gained new insights."

"They can serve as a reference for you."

Li Fan's expression changed, and he was about to refuse.

However, upon seeing what the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone handed over, he swallowed the words forming on his lips.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone held a crescent-shaped piece of white jade in its hand, emitting a gentle aura.

Just by getting close, Li Fan felt his spiritual power and divine soul operate more smoothly.

"This is..."

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone had a slight look of pride on its face, "They say a lone yang does not last long. I observe that you seem not to have enjoyed the union of yin and yang for quite some time, right?"

"Lone yang is indeed powerful, but without the aid of yin energy, it is inevitably flawed."

"This is something born from my observation of the human female body. It is called the [Long Moon Yin Jade], and it can assist you!"

Li Fan's expression became very strange upon hearing this.

Seeing Li Fan's hesitant appearance, the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone earnestly advised, "Dual cultivation of yin and yang is also the great way of heaven and earth; you need not reject it."

"Moreover, this Long Moon Yin Jade is a manifestation of pure law, so even if you have cleanliness issues, it won't affect you."

Li Fan half-heartedly accepted the long jade and placed it in his embrace.

As expected, there was no need for formal refinement.

Just keeping it in his embrace felt like spring returning to a withered tree within his body. His already extremely strong aura seemed to have inexplicably broken through its limit and become even more powerful.

Chapter 1042: Comprehending the New Law of World Destruction

If the impact on his physical body was still within expectation, the changes produced in the Five Elements Great Grotto Heavens under the action of this yin energy greatly surprised Li Fan.

The five grotto heavens, which were originally clearly separated and did not interfere with each other, showed a faint tendency to merge.

A roar like a dragon's cry emerged within the grotto heavens. Amidst the constant tremors, the speed of the five-element circulation almost doubled.

Although the overall strength did not increase much, the already astonishing endurance and tenacity had made another breakthrough.

Li Fan's divine sense locked onto the Long Moon Yin Jade in his embrace, his expression changing in an undefinable way.

"The union of heaven and earth, the harmony of yin and yang. The Heavenly Profound Mirror did not deceive me; this is indeed what I was lacking before."

"However..."

Li Fan's floating thoughts soon settled down: "It can only add icing on the cake; it cannot send charcoal in snowy weather."

"No matter how much the Five Elements Great Grotto Heavens are enhanced, there is a limit. To directly confront a Longevity Realm cultivator, I still need a breakthrough to a major realm."

Having gained benefits, Li Fan no longer wasted time with the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone and directly asked for the next course of action.

The Heavenly Profound Mirror clone pondered, "The Spirit Sealing Plan within the Immortal Alliance has been roughly drafted. However, based on past experience, it will take a considerable amount of time from drafting to formal implementation."

"Unless there is an unexpected incident that can stimulate things."

With that, the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone secretly transmitted a piece of information to him.

After listening, Li Fan couldn't help but give the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone a thumbs-up.

"I will have the brothers in the cult handle this immediately, and we will definitely give the Myriad Immortal Alliance a big surprise."

Li Fan eagerly transformed into a rainbow and departed.

The stillness in the city resumed its flow, and soon after, sounds of lingering sweetness filled the room.

The Hidden Grotto Heaven met Mo Rubin and conveyed the Heavenly Profound Mirror clone's plan before Li Fan finally returned to the Spirit Wood Realm.

In the underground secret chamber, the soul-fragment solemnly suppressed the Book of Crossing Calamities.

Relying on the soul-fragment's own strength alone was naturally insufficient.

However, by relying on the newly laid out transmission restrictions and the combined power of the Spirit Wood Realm's overall grand formation, it could be firmly suppressed.

"Du'e Sect..."

Li Fan looked at the book before him, where silhouettes of black and yellow constantly flashed, and once again sent a wisp of divine sense into the Book of Crossing Calamities.

This time, due to the completion of the restrictions, Li Fan did not enter the strange small courtyard through the mountain steps.

Instead, yellowed pages, like screens of light covering the sky, surrounded Li Fan.

On the light screens, faint and blurry glimpses could vaguely be seen.

Only the general scene was visible; the details could not be made out clearly.

"It seems I need to be a true disciple of the Du'e Sect."

Li Fan shook his head slightly and withdrew from the Book of Crossing Calamities.

In fact, with the existence of the Heaven Measuring Ruler in this life, the surveillance function of the paper figures from the Book of Crossing Calamities had become negligible for Li Fan.

However, the Book of Crossing Calamities possessed a convenience that the Heavenly Profound Mirror could not match.

That is, the paper figures of the Du'e Sect were genuinely rooted in the Profound Yellow Realm and deeply integrated into the world's pulse lines.

Previously, when facing the Inheritor Jiang, Li Fan had attempted the 'Erase' character technique.

He had originally thought it would stir up a storm in the Profound Yellow Realm, but it was easily quelled by the Inheritor Jiang. Later, he learned that this was because the power of the 'Return to Ruin' in the Ruins of Return could constantly trace back and continuously dilute the impact brought by the 'Erase' character technique until it was completely eliminated.

Through the previous failure, Li Fan thus learned the correct way to use the 'Erase' character technique. Only by first eroding the Profound Yellow Realm as much as possible in large quantities, and then erupting all at once. Only then could it become an incurable disease, beyond saving.

However, secretly spreading the 'Erase' character technique in the Profound Yellow Realm carried a considerable risk. Who knew if some mighty figure would emerge from a corner to stop Li Fan's mad actions.

With the Book of Crossing Calamities, the dense network of paper figures spread throughout the Profound Yellow Realm became the best tools for propagation and infection!

"As long as the Book of Crossing Calamities is eroded, the gray mold spots can instantly infect the vast majority of the Profound Yellow Realm through the countless paper figures. By then, even true immortals will be beyond help!"

A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

If the Profound Yellow Realm were regarded as a giant, then the Du'e Sect paper figures would be like nerve endings implanted in the body, reaching every part.

And the 'Erase' character technique would be like a fatal toxin, capable of spreading rapidly throughout the entire body through these nerve endings.

Although Li Fan might not actually do this, he had mastered another means of world destruction besides inciting the immortals of the Immortal Ruins.

"Moreover, this method of world destruction is not like the instantaneous destruction of the True Immortal Eye. Instead, it involves a slow process towards demise. In order to save themselves, perhaps the trump cards of the Myriad Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Association, including those hidden figures who care deeply for the Profound Yellow, will all be exposed."

Thoughts surged, and Li Fan's cold eyes, devoid of emotion, fell upon the Book of Crossing Calamities: "Du'e Sect..."

"Well done!"

Having figured out the ultimate use of the Book of Crossing Calamities, Li Fan did not leave the underground secret chamber.

Instead, he continued to study this sole inheritance of the Du'e Sect.

Li Fan was greatly interested in the methods the Du'e Sect used to root themselves throughout the Profound Yellow Realm.

...

While Li Fan was in seclusion studying, a considerable ripple quietly arose within the Myriad Immortal Alliance, shaking the high-ranking members of the Immortal Alliance collectively.

The cause of the disturbance was a Golden Core cultivator who mysteriously died within the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

This person had been cultivating in an enlightened state within the Heavenly Profound Mirror space until his contribution points were exhausted, and he was expelled by the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

Only then was his corpse revealed to everyone.

Because he had been dead for some time, the phenomenon of a cultivator falling in the sky did not appear, thus obscuring the cause of his death.

After an investigation, it was hastily concluded as "going mad during cultivation" and was dropped.

Who knew this was only the first incident? In the following two months, multiple reports emerged from various parts of the Immortal Alliance about cultivators suffering various accidents while cultivating in the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

Some experienced rampant hallucinations, forcing their cultivation to stop midway, and they were even severely injured.

Some even died on the spot.

If the Myriad Immortal Alliance could barely accept the death of one or two cultivators, then the subsequent abnormality of the Heavenly Profound Mirror completely panicked the entire Alliance.

Because the trading function of the Heavenly Profound Mirror also seemed to have some problems.

Not only would there be a certain probability of error in the settlement of contribution points during trades, but the contribution points originally held by cultivators could also be directly zeroed out due to incorrect settlements.

Chaos spread, and it seemed that various functions of the Heavenly Profound Mirror were gradually being affected.

After a meticulous investigation, the Immortal Alliance finally determined that these abnormalities were caused by the Heavenly Profound Mirror being attacked by petty thieves.

However, the Heavenly Profound Mirror was, after all, an immortal artifact level existence with strong self-repair functions.

As time passed, all these confusions would eventually disappear on their own.

Chapter 1043: The Flaw in the Heavenly Profound Mirror

Although the result of the investigation brought some ease to the people of the Immortal Alliance, an unavoidable question was placed before everyone.

What if such chaos erupts again next time?

The loss caused by the Heavenly Profound Mirror being shut down for a single day was immeasurable.

The culprit had vanished without a trace, and there was no way to know how he managed to affect the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

Let alone prevent his actions.

If this sort of thing happened every so often, then the Myriad Immortal Alliance truly would never know peace.

Was there any method to avoid the invasion of such chaos?

The pressure thus fell upon the lineage of the Mirror Keepers.

In the end, Cang, the Mirror Keeper, stepped forward. He stated that the Heavenly Profound Mirror, being an immortal artifact, possessed the ability to self-learn and evolve.

Regarding an attack it had already experienced once, the Heavenly Profound Mirror could completely immunize itself against the damage through its own deductions.

The reason the Heavenly Profound Mirror currently seemed inactive was twofold: firstly, it chose not to act as a means of resistance; secondly, the restrictions on the transmission of teachings also had a certain impact on the subjective initiative of the Heavenly Profound Mirror, leaving it willing but unable.

The explanation from Mirror Keeper Cang received unanimous approval from the entire lineage of Mirror Keepers.

After a thorough investigation, the Teachers of the Law also had to acknowledge this conclusion.

Thus, the solution to the problem became clear.

Either strengthen the control over the Heavenly Profound Mirror to force it to deduce and mend its own flaws, or relax the restrictions on the transmission of teachings, unsealing a portion of the Heavenly Profound Mirror’s abilities as an exchange.

One was oppression, the other was compromise.

After intense discussion, the radical leaders ultimately gained the upper hand.

The plan for the Spirit Sealing of the Profound Heaven, which had already been put on the agenda, was chosen to be implemented as quickly as possible.

In the Myriad Immortal Alliance, the will from the highest level was always executed with the utmost speed.

In all the states of the Myriad Immortal Alliance, elite formation masters were rapidly drawn to the headquarters of the Formation Planning Hall.

To cooperate with the grand plan of Spirit Sealing the Profound Heaven.

An unusual atmosphere began to spread throughout the Myriad Immortal Alliance.

The Hidden Grotto-Heaven.

"To escape, the Heavenly Profound Treasure Mirror is truly willing to pay a heavy price. It even intentionally exposes its own flaws," Mo Ruxin remarked with some emotion.

"What flaws? They are merely feigned weaknesses. If it wished, it could repair these so-called flaws in an instant," after contemplating something for a long time following Mo Ruxin's words, Li Fan slowly spoke, a look of disdain on his face.

The chaos that had occurred in the Myriad Immortal Alliance was, naturally, the stimulating tactic taught by the clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

Those cultivators who suffered losses due to the abnormality of the Heavenly Profound Mirror were not people Li Fan and the other person hired to impersonate.

It was genuinely a mistake caused by the Heavenly Profound Mirror being attacked.

"Once used, this flaw becomes useless. It holds little significance in this lifetime."

"However, if used properly, every subsequent reincarnation means an opportunity to briefly plunge the Heavenly Profound Mirror into chaos," Li Fan mused inwardly.

"How is the Spirit Sealing plan proceeding?" Li Fan inquired.

"Don't worry, it’s going very smoothly. Personally wielding the body I currently possess, the formation array to break the restriction on the transmission of teachings has already been secretly laid." "Speaking of which, this array to break the restrictions is truly ingenious. I was initially worried that the formation masters in the Formation Planning Hall might see through it. But later I discovered that they couldn't discern the subtleties of this restriction-breaking array at all!"

"When the spirit sealing is successful, that will be the day the Heavenly Profound Mirror is freed!" Mo Ruxin’s tone carried a trace of long-unfelt excitement.

"The chief of the Formation Planning Hall has already been turned by us. Those Teachers of the Law certainly won't personally come to the front line of array setting. Naturally, there is no risk. Even if someone suddenly felt like taking a look, with the complexity of the restriction-breaking array, it's not something they can comprehend," Li Fan replied with great confidence.

Mo Ruxin nodded in agreement, "Among the Teachers of the Law, few are truly skilled in formations. And they are all lazy and people who don't bother with the actual facts."

After a moment of silence, Li Fan spoke again, "I have also met with the clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror again. He expressed that once he is freed, he will definitely cooperate in searching for the trace of the Heavenly King."

"After all, his words also revealed a desire to escape this Dark Star Sea."

Mo Ruxin said with a sigh, "Yes, besides the Heavenly King, there is truly no one else we can rely on to lead us out."

He suddenly changed the subject, "However, we cannot completely trust this Heavenly Profound Treasure Mirror. Back then, when our Profound Heaven Sect mysteriously fell, it, as an immortal artifact, didn't help at all, which clearly indicates something fishy. We must be cautious."

Li Fan frowned slightly upon hearing this, "What should we do?"

Mo Ruxin showed Li Fan an object. In the illusory light projection, there was distinctly an ancient bronze mirror emitting a green glow.

"What is this?"

"The main body of the Heavenly Profound Mirror is currently sealed in the headquarters of the Myriad Immortal Alliance. Or rather, the Immortal Alliance headquarters was forged from the main body of the Heavenly Profound Mirror."

"The Heavenly Profound Mirror breaking free is an attempt to swap itself out with the perfect sub-body. But it certainly cannot take away this bronze mirror main body, otherwise, it would surely alarm the entire Myriad Immortal Alliance and even the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law!"

Mo Ruxin’s eyes shone brightly, "We can use this as leverage for threat. Before we have completely left the Profound Yellow World, it must still have some connection with its main body. If it betrays us, we will trigger the connection, exposing the fact that it has broken free. At that point, even if we and the Myriad Immortal Alliance cannot handle it, the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law certainly can."

"You must know, the Teacher of Law Jiang has a method to directly contact the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law."

Li Fan pondered for a moment and couldn't help but praise, "You've considered everything thoroughly."

"However, among the Teachers of the Law, is Jiang the only one who knows the method to proactively contact the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law?" Li Fan asked.

Mo Ruxin nodded, "Only Jiang is the most valued by the Teaching Artifact. As for the other Teachers of the Law..."

He frowned, "In my opinion, rather than being confidants, they seem more like tools."

"Tools?" Li Fan thought about the actions of the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law over the years and immediately understood.

...

After fully discussing the details of the plan, just as Mo Ruxin was about to leave, Li Fan showed him a newly acquired ability.

Li Fan's hand emitted a disheartening withered yellow light, which seemed to penetrate directly into the space of the Profound Yellow World.

The yellow light continuously spread outwards, flowing towards the broken space.

"Brother Xingwang, what are you doing?" Mo Ruxin was somewhat surprised.

"The space of the Profound Yellow World is already unstable now, you doing this..."

His words abruptly stopped as Li Fan moved.

Because Li Fan withdrew his right hand from the pitch-black void, a yellow paper figure appeared clearly in his hand.

"What is this?" Mo Ruxin’s expression immediately became serious.

"Just cleaning up trash. Some people have truly poor manners," Li Fan said faintly.

Chapter 1044: Supplementing Heaven’s Defect with Pills

The withered yellow paper figure seemed like a living thing, struggling in Li Fan’s hand. Its face showed expressions of anger and strangeness. It even emitted faint, sharp cries, its body wriggling desperately, trying to break free.

But it was doomed to never escape Li Fan’s palm.

After briefly explaining the origins of the Due Process Sect’s paper figures to Mo Ruxin, Li Fan exerted a little force. The paper figure in his hand let out a tragic scream. Then, the yellow color gradually faded, and the paper figure became transparent.

But its faint outline did not disappear; it still existed within the Profound Yellow World.

“Brother Xingwang, if you hadn’t reminded me, I really wouldn’t have noticed all these paper figures scattered throughout the Profound Yellow World!” Mo Ruxin was both surprised and angry. “This Due Process Sect truly seeks death!”

“You can’t deny it. Although the method is extremely vile, it is indeed effective. Rooted in the world, coexisting with the Profound Yellow Heaven and Earth. Even after being cleared away like this, they can regenerate relying on the imprints left in the world. No wonder the Heavenly Venerable Teacher of Law had no good way to deal with the Due Process Sect back then.” As he spoke, Li Fan pulled another paper figure from the deep space and violently crushed it.

“In any era, there are always these parasitic types of people in the world. This is also why some people in the Sect objected to saving the Profound Yellow World back then, preferring to leave on their own.”

“If the world salvation truly succeeds, and this Due Process Sect reappears… that would truly be disgusting to the extreme.” Mo Ruxin’s expression was also very gloomy.

“It doesn’t matter. The Profound Yellow World is at this stage; it’s likely beyond saving. The Due Process Sect’s end will only be to be buried along with the Profound Yellow World in the Immortal Ruins.” Li Fan was quite calm.

Mo Ruxin also calmed down. “Brother Xingwang is right; the main business is what matters.”

“The forbidden formation is about to be completed. You need to prepare in advance as well. We can act at any time.”

Li Fan nodded in agreement.

Watching Mo Ruxin’s receding back, Li Fan’s thoughts were completely different from what he said.

“Hoping that the Heavenly King of Profound Darkness, who has been missing for many years, will lead them to escape the Dark Star Sea…”

“I’m afraid the result is destined to disappoint you. But it’s understandable. The Heavenly King of Profound Darkness’s personal charm is indeed worthy of his Twelve Law Kings desperately pursuing his traces even after ten thousand years.”

“Savior of the Profound Yellow World, huh.”

Li Fan’s face showed no joy or sorrow, and he quietly returned to the Spirit Wood World.

Compared to the desolate scenes at the beginning of this world, the current Spirit Wood World truly had a bit of a ‘Ten Thousand Realms Union’ flair.

The concentration of spiritual energy was no longer below that of the ordinary regions of the Profound Yellow World, and its reserves in formation arts and artifact refining techniques were even surpassing the Profound Yellow World.

The various factions within the Spirit Wood World were executing tasks according to Li Fan’s will.

After fully mastering all the popular pill recipes of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, the Medicine King Sect successfully developed a pill called the ‘Deficiency Supplementing Pill’. Although the name was unremarkable, it originated from the concept of ‘The Heavenly Dao has defects, supplement them with pills’. After cultivators swallowed it, they would gain a large amount of cultivation from the pill, and their realms would rapidly increase.

Even better, the Deficiency Supplementing Pill could postpone the bottlenecks brought about by the tribulation of heaven. As long as the pills were continuously taken, there would be no worries about bottlenecks.

Of course, the side effects were quite potent. The more Deficiency Supplementing Pills one consumed, the stronger the dependence would become. This was not about addiction, but rather that after taking an excessive amount of the Deficiency Supplementing Pills, the amount of cultivation gained from one’s own practice would become smaller and smaller. In the end, they could only rely on the Deficiency Supplementing Pills to gain cultivation. However, the cultivation in one Deficiency Supplementing Pill was fixed, and the higher the realm, the more cultivation was needed.

According to the deductions of Liu Ruchen and others, this Deficiency Supplementing Pill could support a cultivator’s practice up to the Deity Transformation realm at most.

Beyond that, even if one spent their entire life taking pills, they might not accumulate enough cultivation.

The side effects of the Deficiency Supplementing Pill did not stop there.

Although the Deficiency Supplementing Pill was called ‘Supplementing the Defects of the Heavenly Dao’, in reality, it was just a pill used to gain cultivation, lacking the miraculous power to seize the creations of heaven and earth. However, after cultivators swallowed the Deficiency Supplementing Pill, a conceited thought of wanting to mend the defects of the Heavenly Dao would vaguely arise in their hearts.

The highest were only Deity Transformation cultivators, yet they desired to perform the act of mending heaven. This could only lead to their own demise.

According to Liu Ruchen, the name of the Deficiency Supplementing Pill was not arbitrarily chosen by them. Rather, when the pill was successfully formed, the laws resonating with the Great Dao of Heaven and Earth caused the pill’s name to appear mysteriously. As for why this pill that could increase cultivation received the name ‘Deficiency Supplementing’, the Medicine King Sect and others were also puzzled.

But this did not hinder the use of the Deficiency Supplementing Pill.

Li Fan did not pay much attention to its side effects. As large quantities of Deficiency Supplementing Pills were distributed, the level of cultivators in the various small worlds rapidly increased.

Soon, over a hundred Golden Core cultivators emerged.

The clone Li Qing also led them into the secret realm of the Chaoyuan Sect according to the plan.

This was the first feasible test. If it could succeed, then in the future, the Spirit Wood World could mass-produce Nascent Soul cultivators.

...

In contrast, the progress of the Artisan Layman in modifying Tianyang was much slower.

Theory, after all, differed from practice.

The difficulties encountered in truly constructing an Immortal-grade puppet were much greater than imagined. Fortunately, the Artisan Layman, Fang Zaizhi, and Tianyang were all enjoying themselves, so after observing for a while, Li Fan chose not to disturb them.

“I only need to obtain their research before the end of this world.”

In the underground secret chamber, Li Fan’s mind settled.

In a trance, his vision continuously rose until it reached the sky, looking down upon the land of the Spirit Wood World.

The vast Spirit Wood World appeared only palm-sized in Li Fan’s eyes.

Various places emitted a moist green light, and the grand formation was like intricate patterns carved on the world’s surface, faintly visible.

After the Ultimate Dissolution Disc completed its upgrade and transformation, Li Fan re-refined the Spirit Wood World with formations.

It could be said that this small world could now be regarded as a large-scale magical treasure of Li Fan.

With a thought, Li Fan summoned the Return to Truth panel.

The feedback from Return to Truth also followed.

“Do you wish to use an idle anchor point to replace a bound item?”

Li Fan pondered for a moment before ultimately deciding not to make a choice for the time being.

Although the development of the Spirit Wood World to its current scale was hard-earned, if Li Fan were to live another life, he could definitely rebuild it, perhaps even better.

Anchor points were hard to come by, and if they had to be used to replace bound items, they must be used on items that were extremely difficult to replicate and would be lost forever if missed.

“I have used three anchor points. The initial anchor point was the moment I first crossed over to this world.”

“The second anchor point was at the peak of Dissolution Mountain, with the Boundless Sea Pearl as the foundation-building wondrous object, at the late stage of Foundation Establishment.”

“The third anchor point was also at Dissolution Mountain, with ‘Return to Truth’ as the foundation-building wondrous object, also at the late stage.”

“Perhaps after this world ends, I can set another anchor point.”

Chapter 1045: Heaven and Earth Reflected in the Mirror

Cultivating from the Foundation Establishment stage to the Nascent Soul stage, even with Li Fan's current proficiency, would take a considerable amount of time.

Moreover, the things he was encountering now were increasingly dangerous, and there might be unforeseen complications during this process. The Foundation Establishment stage was difficult to handle.

Therefore, it was reasonable for Li Fan to want to set another anchor point.

“If my plan goes smoothly, before this world ends, I might be able to take advantage of the struggle between the Faceless True Immortal and the Immortal Ruins Immortals to frantically extract the transformation of Xuanhuang that generates life, achieving the Spirit Transformation realm.”

“Starting every subsequent life at the Spirit Transformation cultivation level, comparable to the Longevity Realm, would make plotting anything infinitely easier.”

Li Fan's eyes flickered: “Currently, I still have two blank anchor points…”

The new Five Elements Cave Heaven was still gestating, and Li Fan’s conjectures on how to add new anchor points had yet to be verified.

However, at the Root of Heaven and Earth in Tianling Prefecture, Li Fan had already found the corresponding paper figures in the Book of Avoiding Calamities. As soon as the new Cave Heaven showed signs of gestating, Li Fan would perceive it immediately.

When Li Fan previously studied the Book of Avoiding Calamities, although he lacked the secret techniques of the Calamity-Avoiding Sect and could not achieve complete control, he could still obtain information about one or two key positional paper figures.

Not long ago, the paper figure Li Fan took out from the Hidden Cave Heaven in front of Mo Rubing had a mark of his own placed on it, making it convenient for him to check the situation there at any time.

“Everything is ready, only the east wind is missing.”

“Tianxuan Mirror, Xuan Tianwang…”

Li Fan sat cross-legged in the Spirit Wood World, his gaze seemingly passing through layers of world barriers, reaching directly to the headquarters of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance in the Xuanhuang World.

Mo Rubing did not keep Li Fan waiting long.

Three months later, the Heaven Sealing Array of Xuan Tian was about to be completed.

Li Fan and Mo Rubing met again in the Hidden Cave Heaven.

“The moment the prohibition-breaking formation is completed, it will inevitably cause some impact on the Immortal Alliance headquarters.”

“I have secretly controlled some cultivators at the headquarters. At that time, they will riot and disrupt the hearing. Are you ready on your side?” Mo Rubing's face held a rare seriousness.

Li Fan nodded: “Don't worry, I have already made contact. As soon as I receive your signal, the Five Elders Council will cooperate to attack the Immortal Alliance headquarters. Hmph, how could they miss the unprecedented opportunity to attack the Immortal Alliance headquarters?”

“It’s all thanks to the Tianxuan Mirror acting as an insider; otherwise, they wouldn't even know the location of the Immortal Alliance headquarters.”

“However, the strength the Five Elders Council can mobilize is limited. The highest is only the Spirit Transformation realm, and even with the advantage of artifacts, they won't last long.”

In these three months, Li Fan had also established contact with the Five Elders Council.

He easily persuaded them to attempt this venture.

However, he did not explicitly state that it was to help the Tianxuan Mirror escape, but only that he was seeking a crucial item at the headquarters of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance.

Although the Five Elders Council was very interested in stirring up trouble at the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance headquarters, they had no intention of completely tearing off the facade for the time being.

Therefore, the help they could provide was limited. Those Spirit Transformation cultivators were not native to the Five Elders Council; they were merely loyal agents cultivated within the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance.

The Five Elders Council stated this on the surface, but it could not be ruled out that they might secretly make other plans.

After all, an opportunity to infiltrate the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance headquarters…

It was a rare opportunity that came once in a thousand years!

…

Mo Rubing handed an ancient bronze mirror to Li Fan, instructing: “Take this item and wait outside to provide support. You must be within the central four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance; otherwise, the distance will be too great, and I won't be able to sense you.”

“After the prohibition is broken, the Xuan Tian Treasure Mirror will first reside in me. Then, after we meet, it will be transferred to this bronze mirror.”

Hearing this, Li Fan couldn't help but examine the small mirror in his hand, which was faintly covered with rust. It seemed quite old.

“This was also a World Artifact back then, but its spirituality was lost during the great catastrophe. Only the main body remains.”

“It is sufficient to serve as a temporary residence for the Xuan Tian Treasure Mirror.”

“As for what happens after…”

Mo Rubing pondered for a moment: “It will probably merge with its human body.”

Li Fan was slightly surprised: “In that case, won't there be no retreat…”

“No…” Li Fan suddenly realized with alarm.

“The Tianxuan Mirror is so decisive?”

The human body of the Tianxuan Mirror, according to its own words, was a means of proving the Dao. As long as the main body existed, the human body could not be completely destroyed. Even if destroyed, it could quickly regenerate.

But if the human body merged with the Tianxuan Mirror, then once the Tianxuan Mirror was destroyed, it would probably truly disappear from this world.

Mo Rubing seemed to sense Li Fan's thoughts and shook his head slightly: “Even without the main body, how can the spirit of an immortal artifact be so easily erased? I think even if a Dao Ancestor made a move, they might not truly annihilate it. Unless it’s an existence like an Immortal, they can truly harm it. We shouldn't worry about him.”

“However, this lack of retreat also proves that he is not playing any tricks behind the scenes,” Li Fan agreed.

“Yes, it seems so for now. But we cannot let our guard down. Besides a few specific individuals, we should not trust anyone else,” Mo Rubing said again, clearly affected by the destruction of the Tianxuan Sect back then.

Li Fan naturally did not refute.

After finalizing the details of the operation, Mo Rubing’s figure faintly disappeared.

Li Fan quietly flew to a cave abode in Shuo Feng, Tianquan Prefecture, and waited patiently.

The area within five hundred miles around this cave abode had been purchased by Immortal Venerable Feixue. No other cultivators frequented it, making it relatively safe.

Hiding within, Li Fan looked at the sky with his eyes, while his mind pondered the location of the Immortal Alliance headquarters.

The central four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance were all connected to the Immortal Alliance headquarters.

“When I entered and exited the Immortal Alliance headquarters, I entered through these four prefectures.”

“It seems the spatial nodes have all been opened…”

“It seems the main body of the Tianxuan Mirror must be quite large.”

Time slowly passed as Li Fan pondered.

Half a day later, a strange tremor in the heaven and earth attracted Li Fan’s attention.

The sky had somehow been stained with a trace of bizarre green.

As if being bombarded by something, the earth trembled violently, and continuous roars echoed in the sky.

Cracks appeared between heaven and earth, as if the end of the world had arrived, and the entire world was about to shatter!

“Such a huge commotion?”

Li Fan was surprised, but the ancient bronze mirror in his embrace showed no reaction.

The anomalies in heaven and earth did not disappear but became more pronounced.

The most obvious was the sky, which unexpectedly reflected the shadow of the earth. It was as if the sky had turned into a mirror, illuminating everything on the ground!

Li Fan looked at this scene and suddenly had a bad feeling.

Squinting his eyes, he concealed his figure. But whether it was an illusion or not, Li Fan seemed to see his own figure in the reflection above.

Chapter 1046: Like a Turtle in a Jar Again

In the central four prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, a very distinct dividing line appeared between heaven and earth.

On either side of the dividing line, the scenes on the earth and in the sky corresponded to each other.

It was as if a mirror surface divided heaven and earth.

And the cracks spreading from the dividing line seemed to indicate that this world was about to collapse!

Seeing this scene that resembled the end of the world, a sudden realization dawned in Li Fan's mind: "So, Tianyu, Tianchen, Tianshu, and Tianquan, these four central prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, were actually forged from the main body of the Sky Profound Mirror!"

"Using a mirror to change heaven and earth..."

Li Fan's expression gradually became serious.

Such important information, the Sky Profound Mirror had never revealed before.

Either it meant that the Sky Profound Mirror's desire for freedom was fake, and it had merely put on a show in front of Li Fan and Mo Rubing, with the goal of trapping the guest.

Or, even the Sky Profound Mirror itself had forgotten that its main body was used to forge the heaven and earth of the four prefectures of Profound Yellow!

The unease in his heart grew stronger, and Mo Rubing still had not appeared.

Li Fan was about to leave directly, but when he quietly flew to the border of Tianquan Prefecture, he was horrified to discover that the Yuan Devouring White Mist that had previously spanned heaven and earth had disappeared at some point.

In its place was an invisible light barrier, sealing off the four prefectures!

Entry and exit were impossible!

In this situation, Li Fan immediately recalled the time when he first encountered the Crimson Flame Burning Sea and fled in panic, only to be trapped and killed in the Sea of Congyun!

However, compared to that time, Li Fan had grown too much.

Without excessive panic, Li Fan steadied himself and returned to the center of Tianquan Prefecture, casually finding a cultivator's cave dwelling and hiding within.

With the Ultimate Dissolution Disc, the defensive formations of these cave dwellings were negligible to him.

The architecture within the cave dwelling was in the style of a small waterside courtyard, with no traces of cultivators residing there.

It should have been one of the many properties of the cave dwelling owner.

However, all the necessary facilities for a cave dwelling were present. Li Fan found the Sky Profound Branch Mirror and cautiously tested the source essence of the Sky Profound Mirror he carried.

"It hasn't failed."

"Many topics about the anomalies in the four prefectures have appeared in the Sky Profound Mirror, but they were locked and deleted the moment they appeared."

"Fortunately, I can still see the post history."

Li Fan quickly scanned the information in the Sky Profound Mirror.

"What's going on? Is the sky falling?"

"Could it be that the Five Elders Council is attacking again? I knew it, after suffering such a huge loss last time, how could the Five Elders Council just let it go!"

"All teleportation methods have failed, entry and exit are blocked! The central four prefectures are completely sealed off!"

"Fellow Daoists, it's best to hide in the cave dwellings to take refuge and not venture out rashly. That's all I can say..."

...

Most of the posts were meaningless utterances from cultivators in their panic.

However, because the number of posting cultivators was too large, Li Fan still found some useful information.

"Something big has happened! I just came out of the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters, and it seems like a fight broke out inside!"

"Stop spreading rumors and sowing discord. The Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters is such an important place, how could someone dare to fight there arbitrarily?"

"I saw it with my own eyes! Just as I was about to leave, I heard a deafening explosion. Then I vaguely saw the scene of over a hundred figures suddenly erupting! That was close, I almost didn't make it out."

"Hiss..."

The conversation abruptly ended here.

Similarly, there were some cultivators asking about being expelled from the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters.

"The plan discussed with Mo Rubing is consistent..."

Li Fan pondered for a moment, took out a white jade horn, and crushed it fiercely.

A moment later, a sharp sound, audible only to specific cultivators, spread out from this location.

This was the signal for the death warriors of the Five Elders Council to make their move.

Seeing nearly a hundred black shadows flying into the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters along the cracks between heaven and earth from a distance, Li Fan very cautiously changed to another cave dwelling to hide. "I don't know what exactly happened inside."

Before figuring things out, Li Fan did not act rashly but chose to wait and see.

The roar between heaven and earth grew louder and louder.

The accumulated cracks became more numerous, shocking to behold. It seemed as if the entire heaven and earth could crack open at any moment.

What made the cultivators in the four prefectures even more uneasy was that with such a major change, no one from the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters had come forward to explain the situation and offer reassurance.

This sense of dread lasted for the time it takes for half an incense stick to burn.

The intermittent sounds of thunder gradually subsided, and the cracks running across heaven and earth slowly closed.

A cultivator's figure appeared on the sky screen. Li Fan instantly recognized this person.

One of the Law Transmitters, Chen.

His expression was solemn, his eyes filled with killing intent.

Chen's voice, like thunder, spread across heaven and earth, declaring that the small disturbance within the Myriad Immortals Alliance had been quelled and there was no need to panic.

However, to thoroughly investigate the accomplices of the culprits, the blockade of the four prefectures would temporarily remain in place.

The cultivators in the four prefectures must cooperate with the investigation.

...

After speaking, Chen hurriedly left and disappeared from the sky screen.

He left behind the cultivators of the four prefectures who were discussing amongst themselves, their emotions unsettled.

"Could it be that Mo Rubing was captured?" Li Fan couldn't help but think.

But then he thought again that Mo Rubing's cultivation techniques were strange, and even if his plans were exposed, it would probably not be so easy to capture him. So, he felt a bit relieved.

After that, Li Fan hid in the new hiding place for three days, maintaining the highest vigilance to prevent his exposure.

During this time, black-clothed cultivators from the Myriad Immortals Alliance came to search, but they failed to discover the hiding Li Fan.

And Li Fan also noticed that those black-clothed cultivators seemed to be just going through the motions.

They quickly went through the motions and moved on to the next search location.

"Interesting."

Watching their attitude, Li Fan became thoughtful.

The blockade and the extensive search lasted for ten days.

Initially, the cultivators in the four prefectures were somewhat cooperative, but as time went on and there was no hope of returning to normal, discontent gradually spread.

The cultivators residing in the four prefectures of Tianquan were undoubtedly the most core and important part of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Such an unexplained blockade was bound to not last long.

After ten days, facing the increasingly surging wave of opposition, the Alliance finally lifted the restrictions on the four prefectures.

The reflection of the ground scene in the sky slowly dispersed, and the white mist barrier reappeared at the borders of the four prefectures.

However, the massive cracks reaching from heaven to earth did not disappear.

They were like wounds on heaven and earth, reminding the cultivators of the change that had occurred not long ago, and the unreality of this world.

Li Fan did not leave immediately but continued to lie low in the hidden cave dwelling. After another month, the impact of this matter finally subsided, and people rarely talked about it anymore. Only then did he quietly leave.

From beginning to end, he never received any message from Mo Rubing.

Whether it was a cry for help or a warning, there was none.

Li Fan went to Weidu, where the human avatar of the Sky Profound Mirror was located.

The human avatar was nowhere to be seen.

Chapter 1047: The Game of Truth and Deception

Above Weidu, Li Fan remained silent.

According to the memories of the mortals in the city, the human avatar of the Sky Profound Mirror disappeared the day after the unrest in the four prefectures began.

After searching around, he found no trace of the other party.

Squinting his eyes, Li Fan did not give up and went to the hidden blessed land where he had previously met Mo Rubing.

There were no signs of any cultivator having visited.

“Could it be…”

“That Mo Rubing ran away with the Sky Profound Mirror?”

This thought suddenly surfaced in Li Fan’s mind.

The Dao Transformation Stone glowed blue, and Li Fan quickly reviewed the entire plan from beginning to end.

This time, he did not view it from his own perspective, but purely from the perspective of an outsider.

From saving Mo Rubing at the very beginning.

Then feigning madness and pretending to be Sun Xingwang to gain Mo Rubing’s trust.

The two of them plotted to obtain information about the Profound Heaven King from the Sky Profound Mirror.

The initial steps of the plan seemed to have been very successful. Until the final step, something unknown went wrong.

...

Scenes flashed rapidly before Li Fan’s eyes.

Looking at his seemingly flawless performance, and Mo Rubing who acted along with him, Li Fan’s face twitched.

Although he had vaguely confirmed that Mo Rubing might have tricked him, Li Fan still held a sliver of hope.

Returning to the Spirit Wood Realm, he abruptly interrupted the research of Craftsman Hermit and handed over the ancient bronze mirror that Mo Rubing had given him.

“A... a Boundary Artifact?”

The Craftsman Hermit’s expression instantly became very strange.

He secretly glanced at Li Fan, then carefully organized his words, “Forgive my poor eyesight, this seems to be...”

“What seems? Isn't it just the most ordinary bronze mirror? Look at this patina, good heavens, who knows where it was dug up from.” Fang Zaizhi, in this lifetime, had not yet witnessed Li Fan’s might, so he spoke boldly and directly.

“I understand. Thank you for your trouble, Fellow Daoist Craftsman.” Li Fan’s face showed no emotion, and he vanished before the two of them.

“What’s the fuss about, wasting our time...” Fang Zaizhi was very dissatisfied with Li Fan’s interruption and was about to complain, but he was directly interrupted by the Craftsman Hermit.

“Say less. The honored envoy’s mood does not seem very pleasant,” the Craftsman Hermit said softly.

...

In the underground secret chamber of the Spirit Wood Realm.

Li Fan held the small mirror with its greenish patina in his hand, his expression completely frozen.

“Boundary Artifact...”

“Interesting.”

With a bang, Li Fan exerted slight force and crushed the bronze mirror into pieces.

“After so many cycles of reincarnation, this is the first time someone has played a trick on me.”

At this point, even if Li Fan was unwilling to admit it, he could not deny the fact.

Mo Rubing might not have taken his identity as a Dharma King of the Profound Heaven Cult seriously from the beginning. However, during their interaction, he discovered that Li Fan’s strength might be worth utilizing. Thus, he played along, using Li Fan’s power to release the Sky Profound Mirror.

Poor Li Fan had always thought his acting was convincing.

However, looking back, there were indeed many loopholes that could not be explained by the madness induced by the cultivation technique.

For example, besides recalling some past events, Li Fan’s speech and behavior were vastly different from the real Sun Xingwang.

For example, Li Fan displayed astonishing formation skills at many critical moments.

And then there’s...

“Perhaps my contact with the human avatar of the Sky Profound Mirror ultimately exposed me.”

The Profound Heaven Treasure Mirror was the treasure of the Profound Heaven Cult. As the most important figure in the cult, the Twelve Dharma Kings must have been very familiar with it.

“These are two figures from the Profound Heaven Cult who conspired to deceive me, an outsider.”

“Very good. As expected of the prodigies chosen by the Profound Heaven King to bear the shared responsibility of saving the world...”

“Excellent!”

Li Fan was not enraged by being tricked.

Instead, he suddenly burst into loud laughter.

Because he finally felt that things were truly interesting.

The constant cycles of reincarnation had made Li Fan increasingly detached towards the beings of the Profound Yellow Realm.

He viewed them as NPCs in a game that could be reset and refreshed endlessly.

Once he had enough information, he could even predict their reactions to certain words.

Even figures like the Heavenly Doctor, the Transmitter of Teachings, the Immortals of the Immortal Ruins, and the Faceless True Immortal were seen by Li Fan as slightly stronger bosses.

But reality was not a game after all.

Just like how the Heavenly Doctor suddenly read his mind back then, the Dharma King Mo Rubing of the Profound Heaven Cult had taught Li Fan a lesson.

The cultivators of the Profound Yellow Realm were not so easily fooled!

Because they were real, living beings!

“It doesn’t matter. You can trick me for one lifetime, but can you trick me for every lifetime?”

There was no sense of dejection from failure; instead, Li Fan’s eyes were filled with eagerness.

“Moreover, this lifetime isn’t over yet!”

With a cold snort, Li Fan closed his eyes and began to ponder countermeasures.

The first thing to clarify was what exactly happened at the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance that day.

Even after such a long time, this remained a strictly sealed mystery.

Without the Transmitter of Teachings as an inside agent, Li Fan had returned to his previous state of being blind.

He had no knowledge of the movements or information concerning the upper echelons of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

“It seems some channels must be held in my own hands. Relying on others is still not enough.”

“I still need my own Transmitter of Teachings...”

“But fortunately, I have obtained enough information in this lifetime. I can start trying gradually later.”

Having deeply experienced the benefits of having an inside agent, Li Fan naturally would not abandon the idea.

However, that was something for after this lifetime.

For now, there was no way to further inquire about the news. Thus, Li Fan chose the most common method.

One word: wait!

Many secrets cease to be secrets as time passes.

Although it was top-secret information that could not be obtained now, it might not be so later.

The level of secrecy would decrease over time, coupled with the divine power of the Worry-Free Heavenly Venerable.

Li Fan believed that if he paid a high enough price later, he could definitely ascertain the truth from the direct participants of the incident.

And what he needed to do was wait patiently.

However, Li Fan was not idle during the waiting period.

The various matters in the Spirit Wood Realm proceeded as usual, but the dissemination of the Joint Federation of Myriad Worlds and the lineage of the Faceless True Immortal were suspended.

He needed to remain vigilant until Mo Rubing and the Sky Profound Mirror were found.

Although he still could not fully understand what happened at the Immortal Alliance headquarters that day, judging by the simultaneous disappearance of Lu Xichan and the Shuo Feng family, the Myriad Immortals Alliance leadership had clearly implemented a purge against potential traitors.

Many people had disappeared inexplicably.

Li Fan secretly collected the list of these missing persons.

At the same time, he kept inquiring about potential witnesses to that day’s events.

Five years later.

Chapter 1048: Five Years of Heaven and Earth Change

Nine Mountains Prefecture.

After five years of development, this sole free trade prefecture within the Myriad Immortals Alliance territory had undergone earth-shattering changes.

From being desolate and uninhabited, it had become prosperous and thriving.

Looking around, the continuous plains were occupied by cultivators' cave residences, guarding the central Nine Mountains Trade City.

After several expansions, the trade city's size had increased by nearly tenfold compared to the beginning, yet it still could not satisfy the ever-growing trade demands.

Every cultivator newly arriving in the city was filled with excitement and curiosity, lost in the dazzling array of goods within the city.

Zhao Xian knelt on the ground, respectfully bowing to the faceless stone statue situated in the shadow above.

Then he walked out of the secret chamber, opened the shop door, and began his first business operation after restocking.

He didn't need to promote actively; before long, the shop was crowded with cultivators coming to shop.

The product descriptions and prices were all clearly marked, so cultivators could complete their purchases independently without the shop owner needing to do it personally.

There was no haggling, because in the Nine Mountains Prefecture, goods often sold out immediately after being put on display.

This was partly due to the fact that all the goods available for sale in the Nine Mountains Prefecture were rare specialties from various prefectures.

But the fundamental reason was...

Zhao Xian maintained a full smile, but inwardly sighed, "No wonder everyone wants to come to the Nine Mountains Prefecture now. They all say even a pig lying down can make a fortune, and it truly isn't an exaggeration."

"Three years ago, the transaction function of the Sky Profound Mirror was suddenly shut down, preventing cultivators from trading freely. However, the demand for trade could not disappear. Thus, five major trade cities emerged across the land in a short time, barely taking over the transaction function of the Sky Profound Mirror."

"This Nine Mountains Prefecture is the largest among them, with the greatest quantity of goods."

"Not only are cultivators from various prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance coming here to trade, but cultivators from the Five Elders' Council are also selling their specialties and purchasing goods here."

Zhao Xian looked at the endless stream of people in the shop, filled with gratitude. "It's also thanks to the help of the envoy; otherwise, as a mere Nascent Soul cultivator from Congyun Sea, how could I have afforded to buy a property here?"

Although half of the shop's profits had to be turned over, even so, the speed at which he earned contribution points was far faster than in his hometown.

"As long as I accumulate for ten years, I can not only pay off all my debts but even purchase the Spirit Transformation cultivation method and the 'Heaven and Earth Genesis Transformation' at a discount within the Federation."

"If I can achieve Spirit Transformation, my status in the future will be completely different!"

"Even if things don't go perfectly, I can definitely become a guest elder back in Congyun Sea. After all, the entire Congyun Sea only has two Spirit Transformation cultivators overseeing it."

Zhao Xian envisioned a beautiful future, his eyes growing increasingly fervent.

After an unknown amount of time, the successful sale of an item displayed in the shop jolted Zhao Xian awake.

It was an object that appeared to be a very ordinary white jade statue. It was purely a decorative item, with no special functions attached. If one had to point out anything special about this white jade statue, it would be the appearance of the woman carved into it.

Stunning beauty, lifelike.

However, because the asking price was excessively high, reaching two hundred thousand contribution points, it had been on display in the shop for over two years without selling.

And today, someone had actually bought it. This statue was related to a task assigned by the envoy!

Zhao Xian suppressed the excitement in his heart and quickly stepped forward, "Fellow Daoist, please stay!"

A cultivator dressed in a black Daoist robe, hidden in the shadows with an indiscernible appearance, paused.

However, he ignored Zhao Xian and left without looking back.

Zhao Xian didn't pursue him.

He just revealed a meaningful smile and quietly went into the underground secret chamber.

He knelt before the faceless stone statue.

"Envoy, someone bought that white jade statue."

Even though it wasn't the first time reporting work to the envoy, Zhao Xian was still extremely nervous. He held his breath and calmed his spirit, not daring to have any stray thoughts.

After offering his respects, Zhao Xian waited patiently.

Not long after, an icy voice sounded in his mind. "I know."

After that single sentence, there was silence.

But Zhao Xian could keenly sense a sacred aura descending upon him and then vanishing.

And his cultivation base suddenly increased significantly without any warning.

Joy was evident on his face. Zhao Xian quickly kowtowed several more times.

"With the envoy's bestowed grace, even with my aptitude, I should be able to reach Spirit Transformation within a hundred years."

"Those so-called prodigies who are usually so arrogant are far inferior to me."

Zhao Xian was exceedingly pleased in his heart and treated the affairs of the Myriad Worlds Federation with even greater seriousness.

...

Spirit Wood Realm.

Li Fan had already locked onto the location of the cultivator who purchased the white jade statue.

"It's him, he's still alive."

The cultivator's disguise naturally couldn't fool Li Fan's eyes. After cross-referencing with the list in his mind, Li Fan quickly confirmed the person's identity.

Jia Yiyuan, a former reception staff member at the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters.

He happened to be on duty during the time the incident occurred at the Immortal Alliance headquarters.

After the event, Jia Yiyuan's family was erased from existence. A total of three hundred and forty-two cultivators above the Golden Core stage, none survived.

And Jia Yiyuan himself had vanished without a trace.

Unexpectedly, he would appear in the Nine Mountains Prefecture today.

After a brief moment of thought, Li Fan knew why he would make the move to purchase the white jade statue.

The white jade statue was crafted by Li Fan himself, and indeed, it had nothing special about it.

But the figure carved on the statue was extraordinary; it was a very important person Li Fan had secretly investigated over the years.

After the upheaval at the Immortal Alliance headquarters that day, the Myriad Immortals Alliance launched a bloody purge.

Countless cultivators were liquidated, and even many innocent cultivators were implicated.

However, where there is oppression, there is resistance.

Some cultivators within the Immortal Alliance did not stand by and watch this massacre but extended aid to those innocent people.

They were powerful and resourceful, and under the high-pressure pursuit of the Immortal Alliance, they managed to save numerous cultivators' lives.

The woman carved on this white jade statue was one of these "saviors."

She seemed to have appeared out of nowhere; the Myriad Immortals Alliance knew nothing about her life.

Yet, she knew the Myriad Immortals Alliance intimately. She could know about some top-secret orders before they were even issued.

She would save people before the executioner's blade fell.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance was furious and placed a bounty on her capture, but with no results.

They couldn't even ascertain her appearance.

The reason Li Fan knew what she looked like was because he had soul-searched a cultivator she had saved.

Unfortunately, that person knew little about his savior.

In his mind, Li Fan had only seen a face of unparalleled beauty.

Chapter 1049: The Defector and Dharma Preacher

"To spend 200,000 contribution points to buy her statue, it seems this Jia Yiyuan was also saved by this 'Fairy of Salvation.'"

"And his strength is not bad, he is quite confident in himself. Not afraid of any tricks on the statue..."

"It's just a pity he ran into me."

Li Fan noticed that the methods he had left on the statue were gradually being removed, and the sensing image was slowly becoming blurry.

However, these methods were merely superficial appearances.

The true connection between him and the statue was through the primordial energy essence of the Faceless True Immortal. That was a power far surpassing the mortal realm, and Li Fan was not afraid that anyone could clear it away.

Although the image was somewhat blurry, Li Fan could still faintly see the situation on the statue's side.
