Even though he had deduced countless possible scenarios in his mind, at this point, there were too many factors involved. It was unrealistic for everything to proceed exactly as rehearsed in the plan.

Li Fan could only react as events unfolded.

But what he did not expect was that before the third step of his plan unfolded, an inexplicable change occurred, catching him off guard.

One day, after a deathmatch involving hundreds of cultivators concluded, a strange bloody vortex inexplicably appeared and swallowed all the brewing phenomena of cultivator deaths!

The bloody vortex appeared everywhere in the Profound Yellow Realm where cultivators had fallen.

People speculated about the origin of this vortex, but it had no impact on the increasingly intense killing intent in their hearts.

The slaughter continued.

Li Fan looked up at the increasing number of bloody holes in the sky, faintly sensing a familiar aura from them.

"Reversing Life and Death?"

"At this critical moment, the Heavenly Venerable of Rebirth is about to succeed in his enlightenment?"

As if to confirm Li Fan's conjecture, not long after, boundless crimson light erupted from the holes in the sky.

Besides bathing the world in a bloody hue, the images of continuous, majestic palaces also appeared in the firmament.

The cultivators on the ground could not see the details of the palaces, but only the central "Mansion of Rebirth" caught the eyes of all cultivators!

As the words "Mansion of Rebirth" appeared in their minds, information about it naturally followed.

Death is not true death, but reincarnation and rebirth?

In that instant, all cultivators simultaneously ceased their fighting, deeply shocked by this immense change in heaven and earth.

Unlike the Mansion of Rebirth Li Fan had experienced before, the Mansion of Rebirth in this lifetime could not be manipulated by the Myriad Immortal Alliance. It had become a principle of the Profound Yellow Realm akin to "Dharma cannot be cultivated simultaneously," and no method other than reversing the principle again could affect it.

Correspondingly, the specific details of reincarnation were unknown to any cultivator at this moment. They only knew that from now on, there was a "Mansion of Rebirth" in the world, which would completely change the future landscape of the Profound Yellow Realm.

How to reincarnate, and whether memories and cultivation would remain after reincarnation—these answers would only be revealed when a cultivator completed a full cycle of reincarnation.

However, the fact that death was not the end but reincarnation directly influenced the choices of the cultivators. The psychological burden of taking a life was greatly reduced. Every cultivator in the Profound Yellow Realm turned into a vicious villain, engaging in life-and-death struggles at the slightest displeasure.

But for Li Fan, the death of cultivators no longer posed a threat to the Profound Yellow Realm, thus losing its meaning.

"What is this Mansion of Rebirth?"

Li Fan took the initiative and questioned the Dharma Transmitter Zhou and the others.

(End of Chapter)

Chapter 1069: Trouble Rises Again from the Earth Veins

"If I'm not mistaken, someone has succeeded in reversing the principles of life and death?"

"The Profound Yellow Realm actually hides such a person? Such important information, and you didn't tell me in advance?"

Li Fan's voice held a trace of annoyance.

"With the existence of the Mansion of Rebirth, even if a large number of cultivators die, it probably won't pose a threat to the Profound Yellow Realm."

"It seems the plan to coerce Dharma Transmitter Jiang to show himself is going to fail." Li Fan sighed deeply.

Dharma Transmitter Zhou looked puzzled.

"You might not believe it, but we Dharma Transmitters know nothing about this new Celestial Venerable of Longevity."

"I mean, not just the three of us who were banished. Even those currently in the Dharma Transmitter Council are the same!" Dharma Transmitter Zhou stated with certainty.

After speaking, she stared at Li Fan suspiciously, "This Celestial Venerable of Longevity, is he really not one of your World Alliance members?"

"My first reaction was..."

"How is that possible!" Li Fan immediately shook his head in denial.

The two looked at each other, seeing the surprise and doubt in the other's eyes.

"It seems that after expanding for so many years, the Profound Yellow Realm is deeper than I imagined." Dharma Transmitter Wei's eyes were profound, and his brows were tightly knitted. "This new Celestial Venerable must have also infiltrated the Profound Yellow Realm at some point and settled down here."

"However, judging by his style of action, he has been cultivating quietly all these years, minding his own business. As long as we don't provoke him, it should be fine."

Li Fan suddenly recalled the countless corpses frozen in the Great Array of Reversing Life and Death.

He remained silent.

"The sudden appearance of the Celestial Venerable of Rebirth was indeed difficult to predict. However, it is too early to say that our plan has failed." At this moment, Dharma Transmitter Huang, who had been silent, suddenly spoke.

Li Fan and the others immediately turned to look at Huang.

"In fact, we are only one step away from forcing Jiang out."

"The spiritual energy mutation in the Profound Yellow Realm, causing cultivators to become bloodthirsty, is a major event that profoundly changes the landscape of the Profound Yellow Realm."

"Shouldering the responsibility of maintaining stability in the Profound Yellow Realm, the Myriad Immortals Alliance must investigate and resolve this matter. As long as we eliminate all the Alliance members sent to investigate, Jiang will eventually have to step forward."

"Anyway, since the phenomenon of cultivator deaths no longer appears, even if we act, we won't be exposed." Huang said as a matter of course.

Dharma Transmitters Zhou and Wei both had strange expressions upon hearing this.

Li Fan nodded slightly in agreement.

"This is indeed a viable method."

"Then I will trouble you."

"However, we cannot pin all our hopes on Jiang taking the initiative. I will return and apply to the Alliance to see if a new world-ending plan can be activated."

As Li Fan spoke, he did not wait for a response and immediately disconnected the communication with the three Dharma Transmitters.

"After the appearance of the Mansion of Rebirth, the lives of cultivators can no longer be used as a threat."

"We still need to start from the Profound Yellow Realm itself."

The "Nothing" Character Art had already been used once when facing Dharma Transmitter Jiang.

Although Dharma Transmitter Jiang did not seem to retain any related memories after returning to the Origin, this time it was only to force him to appear and then use him to resolve Mo Rubin, not to truly become enemies with him.

Therefore, choosing the "Nothing" Character Art was not a good idea.

Li Fan pondered for a moment, then shifted his focus back to the mutated Dao One Worms.

After a period of reproduction, the Dao One Worms releasing slaughtering spiritual energy had quietly occupied a large continuous area beneath the Profound Yellow Realm.

However, under Li Fan's deliberate control, besides normal reproduction and releasing spiritual energy, they had not done anything else out of line. Otherwise, with their current scale, if they were to cause another great stench in the Profound Yellow Realm, it would be easy to do so.

After careful consideration, Li Fan changed his operational approach.

The hostile target shifted from the cultivators of the Profound Yellow Realm to the Profound Yellow Realm itself.

To prevent being resented by Heaven and Earth, and to avoid any accidents when deceiving the Heavenly Dao and absorbing the changes about to occur in the Profound Yellow Realm in the future.

The subsequent manipulation of the insect swarm would all be carried out by the Immortal Puppet Li Fan.

The mutated Dao One Worms, upon receiving the command from the Insect Mother, instantly became active.

They did not fly towards the surface but continued to burrow deeper underground.

Following the flow of earth vein spiritual energy, they began to gnaw on the branches of the Earth Vein Ancient Tree hidden within.

Li Fan had not forgotten that this Earth Vein Ancient Tree had secretly instigated Lin Ling to rebel against him from time to time before.

Although Lin Ling was deterred by the power Li Fan displayed and ultimately chose to abandon darkness for light, this did not mean the matter was over.

Lin Ling was currently serving as a laborer in the Alliance to atone for her past mistakes. Now it was time to settle accounts with the Earth Vein Ancient Tree.

The Earth Vein Ancient Tree was rooted deep underground. Its roots spread throughout the Profound Yellow Realm. But its main body was, after all, just a massive tree.

Although it was somewhat difficult to consume, in the face of countless, boundless mutated Dao One Worms, there was no tree they could not gnaw through.

The Dao One Worms underground went berserk, disregarding their own lives to devour the ancient tree roots scattered throughout the earth veins.

The Earth Vein Ancient Tree was already integrated with the earth veins. When the ancient tree roots in a certain area were completely destroyed, the direct consequence was... collapse.

Terrifying collapses, capable of leveling mountains and filling seas.

Without any warning, large-scale ground collapse disasters began to occur in certain areas of the Profound Yellow Realm.

Even though most cultivators lived on the floating Celestial Cities and were not threatened, the incident immediately drew serious attention from the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Their response was much faster than before; on the second day of the ground collapse incidents, an investigation team was dispatched to various locations to find out what was happening.

Li Fan sent a message to the three Dharma Transmitters, asking them to cooperate secretly.

Astonished by the endless tricks of the Alliance, the three Dharma Transmitters cooperated fully, each using their divine abilities to quietly apprehend all the Immortals Alliance investigation teams.

The first wave of personnel sent out all went missing inexplicably, and the Myriad Immortals Alliance suddenly realized something was wrong.

Thus, the second time they sent a team to supervise the investigation, there were two Dharma Transmitters leading the way.

Upon receiving the message, Li Fan, clad in the Heavenly Sun Immortal Armor, arrived at the confrontation site of the Dharma Transmitters as the ultimate combat force.

"No aura of the Profound Heaven Sect's cultivation technique was detected. It seems they were not possessed by that Dharma King." Dharma Transmitter Zhou secretly transmitted her voice.

"What should we do?"

"Reason with them and appeal to their emotions. If that doesn't work, we can only temporarily suppress them. Once everything returns to normal, we can release them." Dharma Transmitter Wei quickly made a decision.

While the four were discussing, the two Dharma Transmitters opposite them showed looks of shock and rage upon seeing the sudden appearance of Zhou, Wei, and the others.

"I didn't expect it was you causing trouble behind the scenes?"

"You proposed leaving the Dharma Transmitter Council yourselves back then. Even if you are dissatisfied now, you shouldn't commit such sins!"

The Dharma Transmitter named Chu looked full of disappointment.

(End of Chapter)

Chapter 1070: The Plan Succeeds, Finally Appearing

Facing the accusations of their former companions, Dharma Transmitter Zhou, Wei, and Huang all remained calm, their expressions like ancient, still water.

Knowing the personalities of the other two, they did not choose to try persuading them with words.

Instead, they directly took action, intending to subdue these two Dharma Transmitters first!

"Enough nonsense, let's see the real skill under our hands!"

Huang struck first. With a fierce shout, golden light simultaneously shot from the ferocious eyes of his two heads.

The light instantly immobilized Chu and Shen from a distance.

At the same time, Dharma Transmitters Zhou and Wei also unleashed their full capabilities.

Above Dharma Transmitter Zhou's head, the reflection of her private small world instantly emerged. Everyone seemed to be pulled into that hazy, dreamlike world, confronting each other atop towering buildings illuminated by lights of different colors.

Zhou's attire also transformed into a black metallic battle armor never seen before. It looked somewhat similar to the Immortal Puppet armor worn by Tianyang's incarnation.

Twenty-four flying swords, emitting overflowing cold radiance, deployed behind Zhou like a ring of light.

As Zhou's thoughts flashed, sword after sword sliced through the sky, shooting rapidly towards Chu and Shen.

The speed and sharpness of the flying swords seemed capable of piercing space itself, carving out streaks of black fissures, like black dragons roaring in anger.

After launching the flying swords, the twenty-four swords behind Zhou did not disappear.

They merely became illusory shadows.

After the rotation of all twenty-four swords was completed, the very first flying sword completed its transformation from illusory to solid.

Thus began another round of rapid sword fire!

Endless, without cease!

Besides the destructive power of the flying swords themselves, Li Fan, who had set up a formation to lock down the battlefield and was observing from the sidelines, actually faintly detected traces of changes in the flow of time within these successive waves of sword attacks!

Outside the Yuan Dao Continent and the Immortal Ruins, Li Fan had experienced this feeling before. He would not mistake it!

Although the change in the flow of time was minute, it existed nonetheless. This showed that Dharma Transmitter Zhou had actually gained some comprehension of the laws of time!

Compared to Zhou, Dharma Transmitter Wei's attacks possessed a quality of great craft lacking in apparent skill.

With every move, he constantly waved black beams of light, one horizontal and one vertical. Intersecting horizontally and vertically, they formed cages that seemed to carry the weight of worlds. The opponents' movements and reaction speeds all experienced varying degrees of delay. And as more and more cages were stacked, the slowing effect became more pronounced.

Dharma Transmitter Huang was not to be outdone.

His emaciated body closed in on Chu and Shen, opting for the most direct close-quarters combat. Each punch and kick seemed imbued with infinite brute strength, forcing the two Dharma Transmitters into a desperate defense.

It had to be said that as Dharma Transmitters, Chu and Shen's strength was indeed not weak.

Chu was covered in constant, infinite white light that could dissolve any attack.

Shen was skilled in wielding a whisk, where countless white filaments could transform into different weapons to attack the enemy.

These two were not inferior to any cultivator at the Dao Integration stage.

But the strength among Dharma Transmitters was generally comparable. Zhou and the others had a numerical advantage with three against two.

Furthermore, with Li Fan secretly restraining them using formations...

So the outcome of this battle held no suspense.

It took a full seven days to subdue these two Dharma Transmitters.

Although defeated, they remained unyielding: "If you have the guts, kill us!"

Dharma Transmitter Zhou shot a look at Chu: "Did you think that just because I left the Dharma Transmitter Council, I completely forgot everything about the Dharma Transmitters?"

"With the protection of the Heavenly Venerable's life-saving restrictions, even if you could kill us, you would be marked."

Wei then slowly explained: "Brothers, you misunderstand. We did this out of necessity."

He then detailed the reasons why the Dharma King Mo Rubin of the Profound Heaven Sect had secretly possessed a Dharma Transmitter.

"I have personally verified it," he emphasized again.

Chu snorted coldly, full of disbelief: "Nonsense! How powerful are we Dharma Transmitters? Moreover, we are protected by the Heavenly Venerable's restrictions, how could we possibly be possessed without a sound?"

Shen, however, looked somewhat doubtful and uncertain. Recalling the anomalies before the Immortal Alliance Dharma Transmitter Council meeting, he fell into contemplation.

Dharma Transmitter Zhou sneered: "It doesn't matter if you don't believe it. Anyway, we can't count on trash like you. Just wait and see. When Jiang arrives, after we explain everything to him, we will initiate the [Dharma Transmitter's Oath]. Then, the truth will become clear!"

Hearing the name [Dharma Transmitter's Oath], Shen and Chu instantly fell silent.

They understood the weight of those words.

Only those without malicious intent would dare to voluntarily propose a trial by the Dharma Transmitter's Oath.

"Could it be..."

The two exchanged glances and fell into silence.

Li Fan watched the arguments among the Dharma Transmitters from the side, saying nothing.

The inexplicable disappearance of the two Dharma Transmitters who came to investigate the sinkhole incident was certainly a major event that would shake the entire Immortal Alliance.

The Dharma Transmitter Council convened urgently to discuss countermeasures.

Although several people, including Dharma Transmitter Feng, held opposing views, the vast majority in the council believed that this matter should be reported to Dharma Transmitter Jiang immediately.

The minority yielded to the majority.

Ultimately, Dharma Transmitter Jiang in the [Guiyuan Realm] was indeed alerted.

Looking at the various investigations regarding the sinkhole incident presented before him, Jiang nodded: "I had already vaguely sensed something about this matter before. Many strange little insects have suddenly appeared beneath the Xuanhuang Realm. They can produce a special spiritual energy that incites the killing desires in cultivators' hearts; the previous slaughter in the Xuanhuang Realm was caused by them."

"Not only changing the temperament of the Xuanhuang Realm cultivators, but now they are also destroying the foundations of the Xuanhuang Realm..."

Dharma Transmitter Jiang looked at the assembled Dharma Transmitters before him, who dared not approach in person due to fear of his [All Things Are Like Me] trait and were only communicating via illusory projection. A trace of disappointment flickered in his eyes.

He sent out a beam of white light: "I have already found a method to kill these kinds of little insects. You just need to follow the instructions."

"As for the disappearance of Chu and Shen..."

"I will make a personal trip."

Dharma Transmitter Jiang's figure instantly vanished from the Guiyuan Realm, his voice echoing for a long time.

...

After assisting in the capture of the two Dharma Transmitters, Li Fan made an excuse and temporarily separated from the three Dharma Transmitters Zhou.

His main body returned to the Spirit Wood Realm to lie dormant, leaving only the Immortal Puppet Li Fan outside.

The occasional premonition flickering in his mind told him that the arrival of Dharma Transmitter Jiang was not far off.

As expected, just one day later, Jiang arrived, following the faint clues.

"It's actually you people?"

Seeing that the culprits causing the unrest in the Xuanhuang Realm were their former companions.

Even for someone with Jiang's mental fortitude, a hint of shock appeared on his face.

"It was merely a scheme forced upon us to compel you to show yourself." Facing Jiang, even the usually arrogant Huang adopted a much gentler attitude.

Dharma Transmitter Zhou spoke frankly, without shame.

Chapter 1071: Heart Clear, No Shame

The field of power of [All Things Are Like Me] had already covered the surroundings, and Jiang could sense that Zhou and the others were not lying.

This time, it was his turn to find it somewhat difficult to accept.

He was certainly aware of the disturbance at the Immortal Alliance headquarters five years ago. However, the incident was quickly quelled, and the outcome was merely a change of administrators among the Dharma Transmitters who presided over governance. There were no casualties.

As the one primarily responsible for maintaining the safety and stability of the Xuanhuang Realm, he had not intervened.

In his view, as long as the operation of the Immortal Alliance was unaffected, it made no difference who was in charge.

After all, those fellows in the Dharma Transmitter Council were all pretty much the same.

However, if remnants of the Xuantian Sect had infiltrated the Dharma Transmitter Council and were secretly plotting something that endangered the Xuanhuang Realm, the nature of the matter would be entirely different.

The Heavenly Venerable had entrusted him with the heavy responsibility of supervising the Myriad Immortal Alliance, and now such a huge oversight had occurred—it was absolutely his dereliction of duty!

"I will definitely investigate this matter thoroughly," he said solemnly to Zhou, Huang, and Wei, guaranteeing them.

"Without delay, please accompany me back to the Immortal Alliance headquarters."

With that, Jiang looked at the Immortal Puppet Li Fan beside him. "This Daoist friend should come along too. If you hadn't alerted me, I might still have been kept in the dark."

It was merely a puppet body, so Li Fan naturally had nothing to fear and immediately agreed.

Dharma Transmitter Jiang waved his hand gently, creating a spatial tunnel to the Immortal Alliance headquarters out of thin air, and stepped into it first.

Sensing the familiar yet long-absent aura on the other side of the tunnel, Zhou, Huang, and Wei all had complex expressions.

After taking a deep breath, they entered one after another.

As soon as the Immortal Puppet Li Fan followed them into the Immortal Alliance headquarters, he heard three distant bell tolls coming from the horizon.

"The Dharma Transmitter Great Bell. Three tolls of the bell spread throughout Xuanhuang. No matter where one is, whether willing or not, as long as one hears this bell ring, all Dharma Transmitters must return to the Immortal Alliance headquarters within one day."

"It has been a long time since I heard it," Dharma Transmitter Wei said with some emotion.

Zhou and Huang also showed similar sighs in their eyes.

The Immortal Alliance headquarters entered a state of emergency lockdown: entry was permitted, but exit was not.

In the deepest part of the Immortal Alliance headquarters, a circular assembly hall materialized out of thin air.

Dharma Transmitters arrived one by one in the hall, their expressions solemn.

Although they didn't know the reason Jiang had summoned them, since the Great Bell had sounded, something momentous must be about to happen.

As the number of attendees increased, faint discussions began to arise in the hall.

"Huh? Even Hua is here? I haven't seen her for about a thousand years since she became immersed in the small paradise world she created, right?"

"Forget Hua. Even those few who were exiled, like Zhou and the others, have returned."

"When was the last time we had such a lively gathering?"

...

When all the surviving Dharma Transmitters in the Xuanhuang Realm had assembled, the conference officially began.

Including Dharma Transmitter Jiang, there were a total of twenty-eight.

With the addition of Immortal Puppet Li Fan, the total participants in the assembly numbered twenty-nine.

Li Fan secretly glanced at Dharma Transmitter Feng, also known as Mo Rubin.

Strangely, he showed no fear.

He didn't even display any panic or surprise upon seeing Li Fan appear. Instead, he nodded slightly in acknowledgment.

"Interesting," Li Fan thought with a cold smile, returning the nod.

Dharma Transmitter Jiang was concise and clear, explaining to everyone the possibility that Kings of Law from the Xuantian Sect might have infiltrated them.

This immediately caused an uproar among the Dharma Transmitters.

"The Xuantian Sect? They had been destroyed long ago when we started our uprising. Are they still lingering after so many years?"

"This... possessing a body without triggering the Heavenly Venerable's restrictions? Isn't that a bit alarmist?"

"Interesting, truly interesting. A perfect toy, hehehe..." The reactions of the crowd varied.

Under the gaze of everyone, Dharma Transmitter Zhou took out the small puppet that Li Fan had given him, which was constantly running the Xuantian Sect's cultivation method.

Buzz, buzz, buzz...

As soon as the small puppet appeared, it reacted immediately.

As if alive, its eyes suddenly opened, staring directly at the four individuals in the hall, including Dharma Transmitter Feng.

"Previously, only three Dharma Transmitters had a reaction. Has another one been possessed in such a short time?" Zhou felt shocked and angry.

"Everyone, this is the evidence!" Zhou immediately proclaimed loudly, briefly explaining the operating principle of the small puppet.

Gaze after gaze locked onto Feng and the other three.

Dharma Transmitter Jiang's expression also darkened. "You..."

Before he could finish his interrogation, Feng interrupted him. "I object to Zhou's statement."

"A cultivation method proves nothing."

"The Xuantian Sect's cultivation methods are inherited from the Immortal Realm. I was fortunate enough to obtain a few volumes and, out of sheer interest, began cultivating them. What is wrong with that?"

"After some practice, I found that it was indeed extraordinary. So, I shared the remaining cultivation methods with my brothers."

"Is there anything wrong with that?"

Feng spoke eloquently.

He surveyed the surroundings with sharp eyes, showing no embarrassment from having his conspiracy exposed. "Brothers, ask yourselves honestly, if an immortal cultivation method were placed before you, could you suppress the impulse not to cultivate it?"

"I doubt many of you could do that, right?"

At these words, the assembly hall fell into a strange silence.

After pondering for a moment, many Dharma Transmitters felt that what Dharma Transmitter Feng said was not entirely unreasonable.

Yes, what was wrong with a cultivation method?

Could one be condemned solely based on the method one practiced?

If so, probably not many of the Dharma Transmitters present were entirely innocent.

Even Dharma Transmitter Jiang fell into contemplation for a moment.

"As for the accusation of being possessed by Xuantian Sect evildoers and plotting against the Immortal Alliance..."

After a brief silence, Dharma Transmitter Feng spoke passionately again. "I am willing to voluntarily accept the scrutiny of the [Oath of the Dharma Transmitter] to demonstrate that I have not forgotten my original intention."

He declared resolutely.

"I am also willing."

"My heart will never change."

The other three Dharma Transmitters who had shown traces of Xuantian Sect aura also spoke out generously in succession.

Li Fan exchanged glances with Dharma Transmitter Zhou and the others, a bad premonition suddenly surging in his heart.

However, the arrow was already on the string, and there was no turning back.

Under Jiang's presidency, the scrutiny of the Oath of the Dharma Transmitter officially commenced.

In the circular assembly hall, the Dharma Transmitters closed their eyes slightly, murmuring words to themselves.

Above the void, countless figures of sacrificed and fallen pioneer Dharma Transmitters seemed to appear.

Dense and numerous, they nearly filled the entire space of the hall.

Dharma Transmitter Feng stood motionless in the center of the circular hall, under the gaze of countless eyes.

"I, Dharma Transmitter Feng."

"My original intention to save Xuanhuang from fire and water has never changed."

"This is true now, and it will be in the future."

He first summarized, and then spoke fluently, expressing his true feelings just as openly.

Chapter 1072: How Can an Oath Be Easily Changed

"Back then, I was an orphan with no home, barely clothed and fed. I struggled for survival every day, living in constant fear."

"After the fortune of joining as a member of the Dharma Transmitters, my destiny changed, and I truly understood the meaning of life."

The voice of Dharma Transmitter Feng echoed in the circular assembly hall, his face filled with recollection.

Next, Feng vividly described the brutality of fighting against the Ten Immortal Sects back then, and the cautious concealment during the great catastrophe. He also recounted the excitement when the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission reappeared after thousands of years and rebuilt the Myriad Immortal Alliance on the ruined cultivation wasteland.

His words seemed to transport the Dharma Transmitters present back to that turbulent era.

Finally, Dharma Transmitter Feng stated decisively, "I, Feng Rui, will always be loyal to the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission and forever loyal to the Myriad Immortal Alliance."

"For all generations, without any disloyalty!"

"Just like back then!"

Feng did not play any ambiguous word games but spoke directly.

Above the circular assembly hall, the phantom images of the countless fallen pioneers emitted a faint glow, shining upon Feng Rui.

Feng Rui held his head high and chest out, proudly accepting the scrutiny of everyone present. It was as if this was the highest honor.

All the Dharma Transmitters present, including Jiang, felt an inexplicable emotion.

They knew that Feng Rui had passed the test of the Oath of the Dharma Transmitter.

Zhou, Wei, and Huang subtly glanced at Li Fan, whose expression was solemn.

Feng Rui returned from the center of the assembly hall. A thunderous applause erupted from the other Dharma Transmitters, showing respect and congratulation.

Next, the other Dharma Transmitters who were detected to have the techniques of the Profound Heaven Sect spoke in turn.

Without exception, they all perfectly passed the review of the Oath of the Dharma Transmitter.

"Fellow Daoist, what is going on?"

"Could it be that you have been fabricating lies and deceiving us from the very beginning?" Wei's face looked unsightly, and he openly questioned loudly in front of the assembled Dharma Transmitters.

This question, seemingly born of anger from being deceived, was actually a tactic to shift the focus and draw a line.

The Immortal Puppet Li Fan's expression remained unchanged.

The situation in the circular assembly hall was indeed somewhat unexpected. It had exceeded his capacity to handle, and he was waiting for a resolution from the main body.

Li Fan, controlling the puppet remotely from the Spirit Wood Realm, pondered for a moment, ultimately deciding not to show the recording from the formation that captured Mo Rubing taking over Feng Rui.

Because the other party could simply counter by saying, "The recorded footage is fabricated," and turn the tables.

After all, Feng Rui had now passed the test of the Oath of the Dharma Transmitter, legally verifying his identity as a Dharma Transmitter.

"This Feng Rui is actually sincerely loyal to the Dharma Transmission..."

"There are two possibilities for this situation."

"Either the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission is actually the Profound Heaven King. The Myriad Immortal Alliance and the former Profound Heaven Sect are two sides of the same coin. Mo Rubing can naturally speak of this openly."

"Or..."

"Mo Rubing has already left the Dharma Transmitter Feng. The current Feng Rui is truly the Dharma Transmitter."

"What is the truth?" Li Fan's main body's thoughts raced.

The scenes of his past interactions with Mo Rubing replayed in his mind.

Although they were merely acting, the true meaning behind some of the words was difficult to conceal or change.

Li Fan immediately made a decision.

"Even if I guessed wrong, it's just the loss of an Immortal Puppet."

Without any mental burden, Li Fan issued instructions.

In the circular assembly hall, the Immortal Puppet Li Fan faced the questioning gazes of the Dharma Transmitters without offering any explanation.

Instead, he looked directly at Dharma Transmitter Jiang and said, "I have something to say to you privately."

This statement immediately caused dissatisfaction among some present.

Everyone was a brother; what was there that could only be said to Dharma Transmitter Jiang? The hall stirred.

However, seeing Li Fan's sincere eyes, Jiang thought for a moment before agreeing to his request.

Jiang waved his hand gently, and a circular partition appeared in the center of the circular assembly hall.

The phantom images of the heroic spirits appeared outside the partition, blocking the view from the outside.

Li Fan’s body flew into it uncontrollably.

"You can say what you need to say now. Only I can hear it here," Dharma Transmitter Jiang said calmly.

"How well do you know Feng Rui and the other three?" Li Fan asked with a smile.

"Every move of every Dharma Transmitter within the Myriad Immortal Alliance escapes my notice. Everything they do, every resource they use from the alliance, is under my control. However, I choose to turn a blind eye. In fact, they are all aware of this."

Li Fan then asked, "Then, in your opinion, among the twenty-seven people present today besides you, how many can pass the Oath of the Dharma Transmitter?"

"It seems strange to you that Feng Rui and the four of them passed the oath test so perfectly, doesn't it?"

Dharma Transmitter Jiang fell silent.

He had observed the words and actions of these Dharma Transmitters over the years.

He naturally knew that they had indeed been somewhat excessively reckless.

However, it had not affected the overall stability of the alliance. They were also companions who had crawled out of piles of corpses together in the past.

He had simply turned a blind eye.

But to believe that after all these years, their original intentions had not changed...

He did not believe it.

Perhaps there were some, but only a very few.

After Feng Rui and the four passed the great oath perfectly, appearing just and noble, Dharma Transmitter Jiang knew that something was not right.

However, being pointed out by an outsider, he still felt a slight emotion.

After pondering for a moment, Dharma Transmitter Jiang replied, "Regardless, they publicly completed the oath verification. This shows they are still qualified to hold the position of Dharma Transmitter. Except for the Heavenly Venerable, no one can strip them of their power."

"As for those who play tricks behind the scenes..."

"I will personally deal with them and root them out."

Li Fan immediately nodded, "I can assist you."

Dharma Transmitter Jiang gave no affirmative reply.

The circular partition disappeared, and only Jiang reappeared in the center of the hall.

"The suspicions against Feng Rui and the others have been cleared. They remain the most loyal Dharma Transmitters of the Myriad Immortal Alliance!"

"Just like all of you!"

"As for that villain who slandered and spread rumors, I have already eliminated him."

Jiang shouted, setting the final tone for this incident.

The other Dharma Transmitters responded with applause.

After some superficial official talk, Jiang announced the end of the meeting.

The Dharma Transmitters left one after another.

However, Feng Rui and the other three were kept back by Dharma Transmitter Jiang via voice transmission, saying he needed to ask them about specific details.

Feng Rui and the three naturally told him everything they knew.

After understanding the situation of the past period in detail from them, Dharma Transmitter Jiang nodded slightly and let them leave.

Only he remained in the circular assembly hall.

At this moment, Li Fan’s figure slowly materialized.

Chapter 1073: Grand Celestial Venerable of Profound Yellow

“If I guessed correctly, Feng Rui and the others were indeed possessed.”

“However, this possession technique is quite peculiar. It can even return the body.”

Dharma Transmitter Jiang frowned as he spoke.

Li Fan also pondered, “But where there is existence, traces must be left behind. During the time of possession, it still had an irreversible impact on their souls and bodies.”

“Certain spiritual characteristics of that Dharma King of the Profound Heaven Sect still remain on them.”

Dharma Transmitter Jiang narrowed his eyes, “That Dharma King is called Mo Rubing? Truly a remarkable and admirable figure.”

Li Fan only nodded, offering no further evaluation.

“They still retain memories from the time they were possessed. However, from their perspective, these events were jointly accomplished through discussions with Mo Rubing.”

“As for Mo Rubing’s current whereabouts…”

“He took his leave and disappeared over a year ago. To express his gratitude for the time they spent together, he even left behind several cultivation techniques from the former Profound Heaven Sect as payment,” Dharma Transmitter Jiang continued to explain.

“It was likely a tactic to mislead our perception. But it did work, at least it made me waste so much time,” Li Fan said with a touch of self-mockery.

“But where did he go? Is the Celestial Profound Mirror of the Myriad Immortal Alliance still the original Celestial Profound Mirror?”

“I will investigate this matter,” Dharma Transmitter Jiang said with a solemn expression. “As for your physical body…”

“I still need to give them an explanation.”

Dharma Transmitter Jiang’s dark pupils suddenly locked onto the Immortal Puppet Li Fan.

As if pulled into a void, the body of the Immortal Puppet Li Fan was slowly submerged by nothingness. In a moment, it completely vanished from existence.

...

In the Spirit Wood Realm, sensing the last image transmitted from the Immortal Puppet body, Li Fan shook his head slightly. He was not surprised by Dharma Transmitter Jiang’s sudden action. After all, the accusation, or rather, the slander, of failure against a Dharma Transmitter was an unforgivable major offense. Someone had to take responsibility, even if only nominally.

Before destroying his Immortal Puppet body, Dharma Transmitter Jiang had sent him a voice transmission, informing him that the investigation into Profound Heaven King Mo Rubing would now proceed underground. Any findings would be communicated through Dharma Transmitter Zhou.

“Jiang is probably the only reliable one among the Dharma Transmitters,” Li Fan thought. “To learn Mo Rubing’s whereabouts, I still have to wait for his investigation results.”

Having been led by the nose by Mo Rubing several times, Li Fan couldn’t help but feel frustrated. What worried him even more was that Mo Rubing had been missing for nearly a year. During the time Li Fan controlled the Myriad Immortal Alliance, he had utilized the massive computing power of the Celestial Profound Mirror, surely for matters related to the whereabouts of the Profound Heaven King. He hadn't reappeared for so long. Had he found the missing Profound Heaven King? Or perhaps he wasn't looking for the Profound Heaven King at all, but had used the methods left by the former Profound Heaven Sect to escape this dark sea of stars?

Amidst a slight disturbance of his mind after a long silence, Li Fan finally received the results of Dharma Transmitter Jiang’s investigation.

In Dharma Transmitter Zhou’s private small world, the new Immortal Puppet body appeared again.

“The Celestial Profound Mirror is still the same Celestial Profound Mirror. However, using too much computing power damaged its fundamental origin,” Zhou reported. “It’s likely that many of the mirror’s functions will be suspended for a long time.”

“It chose to remain silent regarding Mo Rubing’s whereabouts.”

“However, Jiang visited the Mirror Keeper and the lineage of the Illusionary Sage. By combining the power of the three authorities, they forcefully retrieved the previous deduction records from the Celestial Profound Mirror.”

“They finally found the possible destination of that Dharma King of the Profound Heaven Sect,” Zhou’s tone was unusually grave.

Li Fan looked serious, awaiting the rest. The result that required damaging the fundamental origin of an immortal artifact just to deduce it was clearly a matter of great importance.

After a pause, Dharma Transmitter Zhou lowered his voice and began to speak slowly.

“Do you know that corresponding to the physical Profound Yellow Realm, there is another illusory world in existence?” Zhou first asked a seemingly unrelated question.

Li Fan’s heart skipped a beat, and he nodded, “I naturally know this. You cultivators of the Myriad Immortal Alliance call it the [Fallen Immortal Realm].”

“Correct, Fallen Immortal.”

“When this immortal perished, they took one last look at the Profound Yellow Realm. Thus, everything in the world, from great mountains and rivers to tiny ants and insects, was completely mirrored in this illusory world! What kind of divine power is this!” Dharma Transmitter Zhou exclaimed, his tone filled with a degree of yearning.

“Then, have you ever considered who this immortal with unimaginable divine power was, and why they perished?”

“I was indeed full of curiosity before. Could it be that you know?” Li Fan asked.

“Actually, I didn’t know before. But based on the deduction results of the Celestial Profound Mirror, we might be able to make a guess,” Zhou admitted frankly.

“Do you still remember the method to enter the Fallen Immortal Realm?”

“Method?” Li Fan immediately recalled the rather strange ritual. Four things were required: an ordinary hemp robe, a full stalk of grain, a small and exquisite model house, and a lifelike miniature donkey cart. The four items were placed in the four corners of the space. Then, one had to take the first step, facing the hemp robe, and quietly chant: “Fortune arises for the Profound Yellow Immortal Venerable.” The second step required turning toward the full grain stalk and sincerely murmuring in one’s heart: “Fortune arises for the Profound Yellow Celestial Lord.” The third step involved looking at the exquisite house and whispering with bated breath: “Fortune arises for the Profound Yellow Supreme Emperor.” The fourth step was to gaze at the cart loaded with goods, and finally murmur in one’s heart: “Fortune arises for the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable.”

“In fact, the answer is often right on the surface of the riddle,” Zhou’s expression was solemn. “This Fallen Immortal is the [Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable]!”

“The hemp robe, grain, house, and donkey cart precisely correspond to clothing, food, shelter, and transportation—the four basic necessities of human survival that are indispensable. This is precisely the duty of the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable!”

“Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable?!” Li Fan was deeply shaken.

“Profound Yellow corresponds to the Profound Yellow Realm. Celestial Venerable…”

“Does that refer to the Longevity Celestial Venerable?”

“But putting them together, I don’t quite understand,” Li Fan frowned, completely perplexed. “Can a Longevity Realm expert possess such immortal-like might?”

“Ordinary Longevity Realm experts certainly cannot achieve such seemingly incredible feats. But the [Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable] absolutely can,” Zhou explained to Li Fan.

“The Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable is not a specific person, but a title.”

“Imagine, if a cultivator in a world could achieve complete unity of mind and body with the world’s Heavenly Dao—to the point where [My heart is the heart of heaven, my will is the will of heaven]—then naturally, nothing in the world could escape their eyes. The Grand Celestial Venerable of Profound Yellow is such a person.”

As Zhou explained, Li Fan immediately recalled his own relationship with the Spirit Wood Realm.

Chapter 1074: The World’s Peculiar Creation

Li Fan himself was only at the Nascent Soul Realm.

However, from the very beginning of the Spirit Wood Realm's development and upgrade, he had continuously used [Array Refining] to deepen his control over this small world.

Now, after incorporating and merging other small worlds like the Empire, the Spirit Wood Realm was not much smaller than the so-called "Cultivation World" of ancient times.

And Li Fan, this "Nascent Soul cultivator," still firmly held control over the Spirit Wood Realm.

To him, it was like a refined magic treasure; the birth and demise of the world were merely a matter of a single thought.

In a sense, possessing this absolute control over the world, he was actually a veritable [Spirit Wood Celestial Venerable].

Comparing this, it was easy to understand what kind of existence the [Grand Celestial Venerable of Profound Yellow] truly was.

It was just that Li Fan achieved control through a shortcut when the world was still weak.

As for the Grand Celestial Venerable of Profound Yellow…

"Will in unison with Heaven." Li Fan instantly thought of Mr. Bai.

The scene of the Heavenly Sword Sect forging swords in the Fallen Immortal Realm.

When Mr. Bai revealed his true strength in the Heavenly Sword Sect, the senior disciple of the Heavenly Sword Sect exclaimed in shock: "You are…"

Afterward, his attitude became extremely respectful, and his hostility towards Mr. Bai vanished.

Situ Yao, being the strongest expert of the Heavenly Sword Sect and a Longevity Realm existence, could be so respectful; besides strength, status must also have been a more important factor.

Moreover, almost every scene Li Fan experienced in the Fallen Immortal Realm was vaguely connected to Mr. Bai, as if guided or pointed toward something.

This made him hesitant to explore the Fallen Immortal Realm too deeply now.

If Mr. Bai had nothing to do with that Fallen Immortal, Li Fan would be the first to disbelieve it.

...

While Li Fan was contemplating, the Transmission Master Zhou continued his explanation.

"The Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable is different from ordinary Longevity Celestial Venerables."

"There can be many Longevity Celestial Venerables according to the ancient method, but there can only ever be one Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable in the world at a time."

"The ancient method of Longevity steals the authority over longevity items in the world. The Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable, however, possesses the full authority of the Heavenly Dao. The gap between them is immeasurable."

"Actually, the information recorded by the Immortal Alliance hinted that the operation of the Profound Yellow Realm's Heavenly Dao shows traces of 'personification.' For example, the soul of heaven and earth is humanoid. For example, the Heavenly Dao also displays emotions like joy, anger, sorrow, and hatred, which can be seen from the unusual phenomena after cultivators perish."

"This is actually the influence of the [Grand Celestial Venerable of Profound Yellow] on the operation of the Profound Yellow Realm's Heavenly Dao. Even though the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable is no longer present, this influence continues."

Hearing this, Li Fan instantly recalled the Heavenly Dao Bai, whom he had "resurrected" through a fortunate encounter.

And the divine ability he had recently comprehended, the False Heavenly Dao.

"Heaven's heart, human will. The principle of heaven and man…"

Li Fan pondered thoughtfully.

But his thoughts were quickly interrupted by Zhou’s next words.

"You must know that in ordinary cultivation worlds, this situation of 'a human controlling heaven' does not occur."

"At most, cultivators might gain some authority over the Heavenly Dao through a gift from heaven."

"The Profound Yellow Realm is very special…"

"And from the deduction results of the Heaven Profound Mirror this time, this special mode of Heavenly Dao operation might originate from the first Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable."

"He made certain modifications to the Profound Yellow Realm."

"It is even possible that the entire Profound Yellow Realm was created by this Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable!" Hearing this, Li Fan was stunned.

He had initially assumed that the first Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable spoken of by Zhou might be King Xuantian.

However, creating the entire Profound Yellow Realm…

This was clearly beyond King Xuantian’s capability.

Li Fan immediately pressed: "Creating Profound Yellow? What exactly does that mean?"

"The entire Profound Yellow Realm is like a perfect creation. Although it has absorbed other worlds over thousands of years, its core is still the original Profound Yellow Realm from many years ago. The reason the Heaven Profound Mirror damaged its origin was precisely because it was trying to deduce the location of the [Heart of Profound Yellow] that governs the entire world."

"There, there might be a way to inherit the function of the [Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable]!" Transmission Master Zhou whispered.

"This is something even the former Transmission Celestial Venerables could not accomplish. If this Cult Master of the Xuantian Sect achieves it…"

"The consequences are unimaginable!"

Li Fan organized his thoughts.

From the clues currently available, the Profound Yellow Realm might be the creation of a mighty being.

This mighty being did not take the Profound Yellow Realm with him after ascending.

He only left behind the method named [Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable], which could, to some extent, completely control the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao.

King Xuantian and Mr. Bai should both have been Profound Yellow Celestial Venerables.

From this, it seemed that to become a Grand Celestial Venerable who controls a realm, one must satisfy certain conditions and pass the screening of the Heavenly Dao.

After Mr. Bai perished, the position of Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable has been vacant.

But the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao still maintains the operation of the world according to the methods left behind by the former Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable.

For example, when Li Fan once used the [Great Method of Swallowing Heaven and Devouring Earth] to frantically increase his cultivation by devouring earth veins, he broke through the shackles of the Heavenly Tribulation, only to be suppressed by the Profound Yellow Heaven's Hand. This was a sign of the Heavenly Dao operating according to existing rules.

And now, Mo Rubin was using the immense computing power of the Heaven Profound Mirror to analyze the entire Profound Yellow Realm.

He was trying to find the so-called [Heart of Profound Yellow] and become the next [Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable].

"Perhaps by becoming the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable, one can inherit the memories of the predecessors and uncover what exactly happened to King Xuantian back then…" At this point, Li Fan had grasped Mo Rubin's motivation for going to such great lengths.

"Then where is this so-called Heart of Profound Yellow?" Li Fan immediately asked.

Transmission Master Zhou extended a finger and pointed toward the sky.

Then he pointed to the surroundings.

"It is right here. Or rather, it is everywhere."

"As long as certain specific conditions are met, one should be able to enter the Heart of Profound Yellow and participate in some kind of trial process."

"If one can pass successfully, upon exiting, one can transform into the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable." Transmission Master Zhou shrugged.

Li Fan keenly sensed a critical point and asked: "When the Transmission Celestial Venerable created the new method, achieving Longevity required reversing the principles of heaven and earth. Then this Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable…"

A shadow flashed in Transmission Master Zhou's eyes: "This is what worries us the most. Theoretically, due to the influence of the new Celestial Venerable method, the process of succeeding as the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable will fail."

"But…"

"It cannot be ruled out that ascending to the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable can directly bypass the rules established by the Celestial Venerable himself."

"After all, ordinary Longevity Realm cultivators reverse and occupy a single principle of heaven and earth, whereas the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable leaps to the top, directly gaining control authority over all principles of heaven and earth."

Chapter 1075: The Final Solution to the Fallen Immortal Mystery

"Since the Celestial Venerable created the new method, no new Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable has been born. So what exactly will happen..."

"No one knows."

Transmission Master Zhou's expression was solemn.

Li Fan did not reply.

In his mind, Mr. Bai's words resurfaced: "The immortal path ahead cannot be trod, the Transmission Celestial Venerable is above."

If his guess was not wrong, the reason why Mr. Bai, with the body of an ordinary person, ascended in one step was because he attained the status of the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable.

However, he paid with his life to reverse the principle that "mortals cannot slay immortals," creating the Immortal-Mortal Miasma.

This indirectly showed that even the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable did not have a very good way to deal with the principles of heaven and earth that had already been reversed.

"If the Profound Yellow Realm is regarded as some kind of exquisite creation, the original Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable possessed all the permissions of this creation."

"But because Transmission Law found a flaw in the existence of this creation, he reversed the principles of heaven and earth, creating a new authority out of thin air, and he can continuously erode the existing authority of the Profound Yellow Realm."

"This has almost led to the current situation where the Profound Yellow Realm has changed its master."

It was the same analogy of the Profound Yellow Realm being a prison house.

The being who originally created the Profound Yellow Realm left a master control room in the prison.

The Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable was the codename for the person who could enter the master control.

In the master control room, one could understand everything about the Profound Yellow Realm with ease.

It was even easy to create Celestial Wonders representing certain laws with bare hands.

However, one day, a highly skilled uninvited guest suddenly arrived in the prison.

He actually used some means to cut off the master control room's control over a certain part of the prison and subsequently took control for himself.

And he also developed a large number of believers in the prison.

By directly changing the walls, he was modifying the prison, gradually eroding it.

For the modified and newly built parts, the master control room naturally lost control over them as well.

"...

"It seems that the current Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable's power is greatly diminished."

"At least, he may not be Transmission Law's match."

"However..."

Li Fan's eyes flickered.

He was clear about his own situation; he probably could not meet the conditions to become the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable.

However, he could find a person who met the conditions, someone as sincere and benevolent as Xuan Tian King or Mr. Bai.

After that person became the contemporary Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable, he could then instigate a battle between them and Transmission Law, to probe the depth of Transmission Celestial Venerable.

While thinking this, Li Fan frowned and asked, "So the situation is so urgent, shouldn't we do something now?"

"If Mo Ru'bin really becomes the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable, things will become difficult to handle."

Transmission Master Zhou also showed a helpless expression: "It's not that we don't want to do anything, but there really isn't any good solution."

"Many of us have already tried, but we can't even pass the first hurdle to become the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable."

"Of course, if you are interested, you can try it yourself."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes: "Oh?"

"It's the same ritual for entering the Fallen Immortal Realm. You just need to perform it in reverse." Transmission Master Zhou said.

"Hmm?" Li Fan was somewhat surprised.

"Alright, I will try." After gathering all the latest information about Mo Ru'bin, the Immortal Puppet Li Fan took his leave.

In the secret chamber of the Spirit Wood Realm, Li Fan took out four essential items and placed them in the four corners.

Then he reversed his steps and chanted something.

Transmission Master Zhou said that the Immortal Alliance had already sent nearly ten thousand cultivators to try, but none had succeeded.

Originally, Li Fan did not have much hope for himself.

But what he did not expect was that after completing the reversal ritual, a familiar dizziness instantly struck him.

"I actually succeeded?" Li Fan was greatly surprised.

The thought only had time to appear in his mind before his vision went dark, and he slowly lost consciousness.

"Junior Brother, Junior Brother?"

A somewhat familiar voice sounded.

"What are you thinking? Why have you been spacing out for so long?"

Li Fan slowly regained his senses and looked around.

What met his eyes made him somewhat stunned.

A young cultivator wearing a purple and white Daoist robe, with a purple lightning mark carved between his brows, was looking towards him.

"This scene..."

It was too familiar to him!

Wasn't this the "Ning Yuan Obtains the Longevity Fruit" that he encountered every time he entered the Fallen Immortal Realm?

"I'm back in the Fallen Immortal Realm again? No difference?"

"No!"

Li Fan instantly understood.

"This is the trial to become the Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable?"

"It's exactly the same as what I encountered when I entered the ordinary Fallen Immortal Realm?"

"What is this..."

Even with Li Fan's current composure, facing this somewhat unbelievable event, his mind was still shaken, filled with incredulity.

If becoming the Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable's trial was an important, once-in-a-lifetime examination, then the content of this exam was exactly the same as the practice papers he usually did!

How could this astonishing discovery not shock him?

From the first time he entered the Fallen Immortal Realm, Li Fan knew that what he experienced was different from all other cultivators.

But he did not know why this bizarre phenomenon occurred.

However, now, Li Fan had a vague answer in his mind.

"Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable..."

"Profound Yellow Clear Heart Incantation, Profound Yellow Refinement Heart Incantation, Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Incantation..."

"The Profound Yellow Clear Heart Incantation is the method circulated among the common people to clear the Immortal-Mortal Miasma in mortals' bodies."

"And the Immortal-Mortal Miasma was left behind by Mr. Bai when he reversed the principles of heaven and earth!"

Li Fan's thoughts raced, and the face of Mr. Bai, with a smiling expression and kind eyes, instantly appeared before him.

"That's right. Mr. Bai was compassionate after all."

"Although he reversed the principles of heaven and earth and created the Immortal-Mortal Miasma, from the overall perspective, it was to protect more future mortals from being slaughtered by cultivators, and it might even be a part of some salvation plan."

"But it also cut off the path for mortals to pursue immortality."

"So, while creating the Immortal-Mortal Miasma, he also left a way to break it for the people."

"If one is determined to seek immortality, it is not impossible."

"Even, someone like me, with an extremely firm will..."

Li Fan frowned.

"Someone like me..."

"The desire for the Dao is so sincere that it overlooks everything else. In Mr. Bai's eyes, I am probably not a good person."

"So..."

Li Fan thought of the "Reversed Cultivation Heart" required to temper the Immortal Heart Incantation.

He also thought of the various scenes he encountered in the Fallen Immortal Realm after cultivating the Profound Yellow Refinement Heart Incantation.

It was more like some kind of guidance.

"Ning Yuan Obtains the Longevity Fruit. To achieve perfect conditions, one must find a way to save all the mortals in the city."

"And the second act, the Change in the Beast Taming Sect, and the third act, the Heavenly Sword Sect Forging Swords..."

"To achieve perfection, they probably also need to conform to the way the Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable acts."

"Guiding me toward goodness? Or, even if I can't, making my actions appear benevolent by reversing the cultivation heart."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes, instantly connecting everything.

Chapter 1076 Suddenly Returning to the Dreamscape

"Junior Brother?"

"Why have you been in a daze for so long? Could it be that you're thinking about all the fun places I mentioned to you earlier?"

"Don't worry, once this matter is settled. Whether it's the Red Dust Pavilion or the Drunken Immortal Tower, your Senior Brother will definitely take you to experience them thoroughly!"

The voice of Zhang Qianmo startled Li Fan out of his deep thought.

"Protect the mortals of Ningyuan City from disaster..." Looking at the somewhat unserious Zhang Qianmo before him, Li Fan’s heart stirred slightly.

Li Fan was not particularly interested in becoming the Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable.

Not to mention that under the new system of laws, the power of the Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable was greatly diminished compared to its peak, making it impossible for one person to suppress an entire realm.

Becoming a Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable would inevitably lead to directly confronting the two ruling organizations of the Profound Yellow Realm, possibly even provoking the Transmission of the Dharma to personally intervene.

Although not particularly fearful, rashly choosing to clash with the Transmission of the Dharma before understanding its true strength was unwise.

Furthermore, even if he could truly become the peak Profound Yellow Great Celestial Venerable capable of suppressing a realm, so what?

Power inevitably comes with responsibility. Becoming a Profound Yellow Celestial Venerable meant being trapped, more deeply bound to the Profound Yellow Realm than an ordinary Longevity Celestial Venerable, making it even harder to break free.

Li Fan's goal was not just the Longevity Realm.

What he craved was to leave this pitch-black sea of stars, sealed by high walls, and attain true transcendence and freedom.

However...

Having lofty ideals did not prevent him from first verifying whether the test of the [Heart of Profound Yellow] was indeed as he guessed.

Having already experienced the scenario of [Ningyuan Obtaining the Longevity Fruit] too many times, this time with a clear objective, Li Fan quickly devised a plan.

"Senior Brother, while I was distracted just now, I seemed to have a dream," he said slowly, feigning a slightly bewildered expression.

"What?" Zhang Qianmo was taken aback.

"Senior Brother, have you secretly cultivated a purple Golden Core?" Li Fan did not answer directly, but asked again.

Upon hearing this, Zhang Qianmo's eyes instantly sharpened: "How did you know?"

A dangerous aura instantly erupted from him, subtly locking onto Li Fan.

Li Fan seemed completely unaware of this, only showing a face full of shock: "What I saw in my dream was actually real?"

"En?" Zhang Qianmo's expression grew stern.

"Does Senior Brother remember the person named Chu Liang?" Li Fan immediately recounted everything he had "dreamt" about—the incident where they were about to be besieged by ruffians in Ningyuan City.

"Now that you mention it, I do recall. There was indeed such a person back then..."

"He actually joined some Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance and plotted against the secret arts of our Purple Cloud Sect?" A purple light flashed in Zhang Qianmo's eyes, his killing intent palpable.

Saying that, he was about to fly into the city to drag out the hidden insects and kill them one by one.

"Senior Brother, wait a moment!" Li Fan quickly stopped Zhang Qianmo.

"This is just a scene I encountered in a dream, there is no substantive evidence. If it's all baseless, wouldn't that be..."

Zhang Qianmo said coldly, "If we kill them, so what? Would anyone dare to punish us for such a trivial matter?"

Li Fan smiled bitterly, "It was hard enough to get permission to descend the mountain by completing the task of collecting the Longevity Fruit. If we stir up some trouble, perhaps Master won't allow us to leave the mountain in the future. It's better to be cautious."

Upon hearing this, Zhang Qianmo's killing intent finally subsided slightly.

"How about this, we first send a message outside the city to summon Steward Song Hesong. We'll capture him directly. If he resists and truly displays a level of cultivation beyond what he should possess..."

Li Fan paused: "...Then it proves that the scene I foresaw in my dream is correct. With this evidence, it will be easier to explain to the sect."

Zhang Qianmo pondered for a moment and nodded slightly, "Junior Brother's thoughts are thorough. Let's do it that way."

Thus, the two quietly approached Ningyuan City and sent a message from a distance.

After quite some time, Song Hesong arrived late.

"Greetings to the two Masters..."

As Song Hesong was bowing to greet them, he was met with two bolts of Purple Cloud Divine Thunder striking down from above.

"When did I get exposed?" Song Hesong was both shocked and angry. He subconsciously stimulated his spiritual power, blocking the lightning.

Just as he was about to notify the few people lurking in the city to act in advance, he found that the surrounding space had been sealed, and his heart sank.

"Although I can only use the strength belonging to Li Chen, my formation cultivation has reached the state of perfection."

"Setting up a formation casually to trap a mere Golden Core cultivator is as easy as turning my hand."

The formation Li Fan set up at this moment was not overly shocking; it was a slight modification of the Purple Cloud Sect formations he had seen in this body's memories from the past.

Zhang Qianmo also noticed his junior brother's actions: "Good lad, what have you been doing cooped up in your room every day? Turns out you were studying formations by yourself?"

Zhang Qianmo's tone held a hint of pleasant surprise. He took out his long halberd and engaged Song Hesong in battle.

Although Song Hesong was at the Golden Core realm, Zhang Qianmo, without using his purple core, only possessed the combat strength of the Foundation Establishment realm.

However, with the combined efforts of the brothers and the assistance of the formation, Song Hesong was captured alive shortly after.

Zhang Qianmo was decisive and immediately used the Purple Cloud Soul Searching Art.

After a struggle, Song Hesong slumped on the ground like a pile of mud.

Zhang Qianmo showed a fierce look: "The scene you foresaw, Junior Brother, was accurate to the last detail! This damned dog!"

Saying that, he was about to strike Song Hesong dead with a palm, but Li Fan stopped him.

"He is, after all, an outer sect steward of the sect. Let's take him back and hand him over to the sect for judgment."

Zhang Qianmo shook his head: "Junior Brother, you are good in every way, except you are too benevolent. Fine, I'll follow your lead."

Li Fan smiled without speaking.

"There are still a few bandits from the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance in the city. I'll go capture them now."

"Wait!" Li Fan stopped Zhang Qianmo again.

"What now?" Zhang Qianmo was somewhat speechless.

"Senior Brother, what do you think of this Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance?" Li Fan asked gravely.

"Mere clay chickens and pottery dogs, not worth fearing!" Zhang Qianmo said proudly.

"Is that so?" Li Fan stared intently at Zhang Qianmo and asked again.

"Uh..." Zhang Qianmo looked at Li Fan's serious expression and hesitated slightly.

Then he changed his tune: "Alright. This new law is indeed strange. Song Hesong, with such poor aptitude, managed to cultivate from Foundation Establishment to Golden Core in just a few years. If this is not dealt with seriously, it might lead to a great disaster."

"Exactly. That's what I think too. Currently, the righteous immortal sects do not seem to be taking this Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance very seriously. Why don't we take this opportunity..."

Li Fan secretly transmitted his voice.

Zhang Qianmo's expression shifted: "You mean, lure the snake out of its hole?"

Li Fan nodded: "Precisely. We should take this opportunity to summon all the修士 of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance near our Purple Cloud Sect territory, and then wipe them out in one go!"

(End of Chapter)

Chapter 1077: Scheme Foiled, First Act

"Only by personally witnessing the scale to which the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance has grown can we draw the attention of the Sect Elders," Li Fan said slowly.

"If we can wipe out all these petty thieves in one go, it will be a great merit for us. Then, entering and leaving the mountain gate won't be as troublesome as it is now."

Perhaps it was this last sentence from Li Fan that swayed Zhang Qianmo.

He agreed to Li Fan's plan.

Next, Zhang Qianmo, controlling Song Hesong, transmitted a message to Chu Liang and the others in the city. He said that the situation had changed, and the Zhang Qianmo who was supposed to come down to take the Longevity Fruit would not be coming. They needed to meet to discuss the ambush arrangements again.

Although Chu Liang and the others felt slightly puzzled, they suspected nothing.

They still came outside the city as agreed.

"Fellow Daoist Song, what exactly happened?" From afar, Chu Liang saw Zhang Qianmo disguised as Song Hesong and immediately asked.

"Hehe, it's actually good news," Zhang Qianmo replied in Song Hesong's tone.

"During his descent this time, Fellow Daoist Zhang Qianmo apparently stumbled upon a hidden secret realm. This secret realm happens to be a stronghold of the ancient Xuantian Sect..."

"This is a major matter, and he doesn't have time for the Longevity Fruit anymore. He just rushed over to instruct me and has already returned to the mountain to report."

Chu Liang felt somewhat inexplicable: "Xuantian Sect? What is that?"

"Hmph." Song Hesong pretended to be disdainful, but still patiently explained.

"So, this Xuantian Sect is an existence even older than the Ten Great Immortal Sects? Then, doesn't this secret realm contain many treasures?" Chu Liang and the others immediately became somewhat excited.

The reason they wanted to surround and kill Zhang Qianmo was partly for revenge. But the main reason was to force out the various cultivation techniques and divine abilities of the Purple Cloud Sect from Zhang Qianmo.

Although they had joined the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance and were taught the most basic Heavenly Net Divine Art, they were only peripheral members and only knew this one technique. When encountering disciples of the Ten Great Immortal Sects, they could only rely on their large numbers to barely win. In one-on-one combat, they had no chance of winning. Their foundation was too shallow, and they urgently needed to arm themselves.

"Then what are we waiting for? Before the people from the Purple Cloud Sect arrive, let's take the things in that secret realm first," Chu Liang said impatiently.

Song Hesong shook his head slightly: "The Xuantian Sect secret realm has all sorts of formations, mechanisms, and restrictions, making it extremely dangerous. Otherwise, why would Zhang Qianmo be in such a hurry to return to the mountain to call for reinforcements?"

"Just the few of us, I'm afraid..."

Chu Liang was dismissive: "Then let's call for more brothers! They might not care about a Foundation Establishment disciple from a minor sect, but they surely won't remain indifferent to this Xuantian Sect secret realm, right?"

The others also nodded in agreement.

"Then we need to be quick. It will probably take Zhang Qianmo over a day for the round trip..."

"Don't worry, the efficiency of our brothers is not something those decaying sects can compare to," Chu Liang thumped his chest.

Next, Zhang Qianmo, having received a message from Li Fan indicating that everything was ready, first brought Chu Liang and the others to the entrance of the so-called secret realm.

"Hiss... Fellow Daoist Song, you were right. This secret realm is indeed extremely dangerous. My heart races violently the moment I get close."

"It's fine, our brothers from the Immortal Alliance nearby are already rushing over. Among them are Golden Core realm cultivators, and even one Nascent Soul great cultivator," Chu Liang stared intently at the secret realm entrance, his eyes filled with greed.

It had to be said that the initial Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance had high efficiency.

Like a pack of wolves that smelled blood, they gathered from all directions in just half a day.

"Twenty-five Golden Core, one hundred and sixty Foundation Establishment..." Looking at the dense crowd of cultivators, although their clothing was very simple, the surging aura was full of vitality. Zhang Qianmo couldn't help but feel a chill.

"Within the territory of just our Purple Cloud Sect, so many cultivators have emerged without anyone noticing. Then, how many cultivators does the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance have in the entire world?"

Fortunately, the Sect Master of the Purple Cloud Sect had led his disciples to this place to suppress the demons after receiving the message.

This somewhat relieved Zhang Qianmo's heart.

After the people of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance gathered, they did not rush into the secret realm immediately.

Instead, they were waiting for a heavyweight figure to arrive.

It was said that a cultivator who was fortunate enough to be among the first to follow the Dharma-Preaching Immortal Venerable had now reached the Soul Transformation cultivation level.

With him present, no dangerous secret realm was to be feared.

Soon, this Soul Transformation cultivator arrived at the scene.

He did not display the arrogance of being several great realms higher in cultivation than others and still greeted the present cultivators warmly. Surrounded by everyone, he arrived at the entrance of the secret realm.

Looking at the formation sealing the secret realm, he frowned slightly.

Formations were not his specialty, so he finally chose to destroy the formation with the absolute strength of the Soul Transformation stage.

He took the first step into the secret realm.

However, a moment later, he retreated.

"Not good, this is a trap!" he shouted a warning at the same time.

But it was too late.

In the sky, surging purple energy arrived in an instant...

Watching Li Fan from afar as the cultivators of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance engaged in a fierce battle with the Purple Cloud Sect, he was deep in thought.

He had already sensed that this scene in the Immortal Falling Realm was beginning to become unstable.

The later Dharma-Preacher was not one of those who survived in later generations.

It was likely that he had unfortunately perished in the battle with the Ten Great Immortal Sects.

It was just that under Li Fan's push, the time of his death had been advanced slightly.

"This move of diverting disaster has changed the cultivator war that was originally supposed to break out in Ningyuan City to a desolate and uninhabited place."

"Although it took some effort, the task has been perfectly completed."

"As for these cultivators who died tragically, they should not be within the scope of the trials of the Profound Yellow Heavenly Venerable."

Li Fan thought this, and the surrounding scene began to blur gradually.

Like glass, it shattered inch by inch.

Li Fan's consciousness plunged back into darkness.

He did not immediately enter the next trial scene.

Instead, scenes flooded into Li Fan's mind like a revolving lantern.

That was everything that truly happened in Ningyuan City in the history of the Profound Yellow Realm, which Li Fan already knew.

However, this time, there were some different images.

On the ruins of Ningyuan City, Mr. Bai stood with a look of bewilderment on his face.

He looked up at the sky, as if silently questioning.

An unusual aura began to appear on him.

"This is..."

Li Fan vaguely had a feeling.

At this moment, it seemed as if Mr. Bai had received the gaze of heaven and earth.

Although still at the mortal cultivation level, he already possessed the presence of being the center of the world.

"Is this the destiny belonging to the protagonist?"

Li Fan sighed inexplicably in his heart.

Waking up again from the darkness, the scene before Li Fan, as Li Fan expected, had changed to the change in the Beast Taming Sect.

The scene of Little Black, not yet born, inside the bird egg.

(End of Chapter)

Chapter 1078: The Profound Yellow Fate Bird

While inside the bird egg, Li Fan began to ponder how to approach the changes in the Beast Taming Sect.

Since the scenes in the Immortal Falling Realm ultimately tested whether the participant in the illusion was qualified to serve as the Profound Yellow Great Heavenly Venerate, he must immerse himself in the role of the Profound Yellow Heavenly Venerate when acting.

Ning Yuan’s successful acquisition of the longevity fruit indicated that the first scene was a test of "benevolence."

And this second scene...

"The relationship between demonic beasts and human populations? Or what countermeasures should be taken when the great calamity arrives?"

The experiences from previous excursions to the Immortal Falling Realm flashed through Li Fan's mind one by one.

Time quietly slipped away as Li Fan pondered.

Soon, the first ray of light appeared in the dark world. Xu Ke’s voice also sounded instantly.

Li Fan skillfully crawled out of the crack and then ate the fragmented eggshell clean.

"Hehe, the little fellow must be starving..." Xu Ke chuckled foolishly.

"Right, I must quickly activate the Beast Taming True Art!" A moment later, Xu Ke slapped his forehead, realizing.

He circulated the cultivation technique, intending to subdue the newly hatched Fate Profound Bird before him.

But what Xu Ke never expected was that he failed!

"Kid, you think you can be my master with just that?"

Hearing the sudden transmission, Xu Ke was first stunned, then vigilantly scanned his surroundings. After seeing no suspicious people, he looked at Li Fan with disbelief.

"Don't show any strangeness, listen carefully!" Li Fang said with a serious tone.

"I am originally the Profound Yellow Fate, descending in person because I foresaw a great calamity about to descend upon the world. To deal with the disaster..."

Li Fan spun a tale about being a manifestation of the Profound Yellow Fate, coming down to save all living beings from suffering, which left Xu Ke utterly stunned.

After recounting all of Xu Ke's childhood experiences, the young Xu Ke completely believed him.

"You mean, Mr. Bai is also a manifestation of Fate, a person destined to face the calamity?" Xu Ke's eyes widened.

"Correct." Li Fan lazily perched on Xu Ke’s head.

"This world calamity will be unprecedentedly terrifying. Even the Profound Yellow Fate descending personally might not have an absolute chance of victory. So, it is split in two: one in the light, one in the dark. He took the first step; calculating the time, he should probably already be in the Longevity Realm now."

Xu Ke was instantly confused: "Qi Refining, Foundation Establishment, Golden Core..."

"What is the Longevity Realm?"
