Li Fan then let out a long sigh of relief, a feeling of having narrowly escaped death washing over him.

“The Faceless True Immortal did not come.”

He stood up and brushed the dust off his clothes.

Feeling his body becoming increasingly ethereal, Li Fan looked at the flashing Return to Truth prompt on the screen “before” him.

He still hadn't made any choice and temporarily ignored it.

Returning to the wooden house on the peak, he lay on the bed and pondered.

“What is the essence of returning to truth?”

“When the real is regarded as false, the false also becomes real.”

“For me, a bug that suddenly appeared in the True Immortal’s net without warning, the Faceless True Immortal chose not to investigate. Either it means she cannot perceive the specific situation in the small world of the Xuanhuang Realm. Or…”

“Before this, the world did not exist. The moment I returned, time began to flow, and everything truly gained meaning. From my perspective, it was because of the karma from my previous life that I suddenly appeared in the True Immortal’s net. But from the perspective of that Faceless True Immortal, I already existed on the True Immortal’s net. Therefore, it was not an anomaly. This is also why she did not descend.”

Countless thoughts churned in Li Fan’s mind.

“If this is a rewind of time, then the Faceless True Immortal at this present time node should be able to keenly sense the changes happening to herself. For a True Immortal, to have something happen beyond her control, she would definitely not let this anomaly go and would follow the thread to find me.”

“But none of that happened.”

Li Fan repeated the seven words that accompanied each appearance of [Return to Truth] in his mind.

“When the real is regarded as false, the false also becomes real.”

“Transforming the void into substance, reorganizing all things. With such a divine artifact by my side, to have fallen into such a sorry state is truly hard to explain.” Li Fan shook his head and gave a self-deprecating laugh.

Ultimately, he had underestimated the power of a True Immortal.

He hadn't expected that even after activating Return to Truth, that radiant immortal power could still trace its source.

Moreover, it seemed that the more powerful a being was, the more sensitive they were to the power of [Return to Truth].

The sudden burst of power from the Faceless True Immortal, suppressing the Immortal Ruins’ immortal power and arriving urgently, clearly indicated she knew something about returning to truth.

“The performance of Return to Truth is closely related to my strength. Until I reach the Longevity Realm, I should not provoke them.”

Li Fan thought this.

After making a preliminary guess and summary about True Immortals and Return to Truth, Li Fan finally began to consider how to resolve the current predicament.

“I am currently at the third anchor point. [Return to Truth] is a Foundation Establishment miraculous item, with a late-stage Foundation Establishment cultivation. If I choose to inherit my previous life’s cultivation, then I will instantly complete the transformation from Foundation Establishment to Spirit Transformation.”

“But I am currently within the True Immortal’s net. I haven’t attracted the attention of the Faceless True Immortal yet because my own strength is negligible. But if a Foundation Establishment ant instantly becomes a Spirit Transformation ant, it is possible to attract her gaze…”

“Therefore, the method to resolve the crisis in this life is very clear. Hide in the Netherworld, and at the moment of choosing to inherit my previous life’s cultivation, activate Return to Truth again, to avoid further infection by the Faceless True Immortal, while using Return to Truth to wash away the mark she left on me. Repeat this process.”

“But before that…”

Li Fan reached out, intending to pick up a teacup placed in the wooden house.

Initially, there was no problem, but as his body became somewhat transparent, the teacup actually slipped from his hand and fell directly to the ground.

“Is this the power of the Faceless True Immortal? Existence is being stripped away…”

The first thing Li Fan needed to solve was finding a way to stabilize his existence before Return to Truth completed its charge.

Otherwise, all would be in vain.

And judging from his current physical condition, Li Fan did not have much time left.

Fortunately, Li Fan was no longer the ordinary mortal Grand Tutor who had just entered the cultivation world.

Through multiple reincarnations, he had mastered too many secrets of the cultivation world.

Scenes from the past flashed through his mind at high speed, and he quickly found a feasible coping method.

"To minimize the possibility of the Faceless True Immortal noticing, my own strength and realm should ideally not change drastically. But at the same time, I need to increase my strength as much as possible, that is, my [existence] in the mortal world..."

"Emperor of Heaven Qi Canon."

A secret technique that did not belong to the Profound Yellow Realm instantly appeared in Li Fan's sea of consciousness.

This was a peerless miraculous skill that Senior Stone Slab had fished out in the fishing pond.

Senior Stone Slab was not interested in it and casually threw it to Li Fan at that time.

Now, it had become Li Fan's most suitable lifeline.

The Emperor of Heaven Qi Canon, which achieved the status of a mortal emperor and condensed the luck of all living beings and dynasties, allowed one to become a strong being comparable to the Longevity Realm without even needing to cultivate.

Although it would take hundreds of years and the joint efforts of more than ten generations to become a strong being in the Longevity Realm, Li Fan did not expect to reach the highest realm of the Emperor of Heaven Qi Canon.

He only needed to condense the luck of all living beings to help him overcome the current crisis.

"There is no time to delay. With a Foundation Establishment late-stage cultivation, it is enough to sweep across the empire."

Li Fan stood on the peak of Solitude Mountain, gazing at Xuanjing City.

His figure soared into the sky, and he swiftly departed.

...

Three days later, a piece of news spread like wildfire throughout the land.

The Emperor of the Great Xuan was a tyrant, causing the wrath of heaven and resentment among the people.

Fortunately, a destined Sagely Emperor descended into the world, deposed the tyrannical ruler, killed the sycophants, reopened a prosperous era, and recreated the universe.

The descriptions were fantastical, but the officials and commoners in various parts of the Great Xuan knew at a glance that a dynasty change had occurred.

Although it was a shocking event, after a few days of chaos, everyone quickly calmed down.

After all, imperial power had never truly reached the villages since ancient times; no matter who was in charge above, those who truly controlled the world were still the same people.

This was what the people of the Great Xuan initially thought.

However, it wasn't long before the extraordinary nature of this destined Sagely Emperor gradually became apparent.

Overnight, tall platforms sprang up across the Great Xuan.

No one knew how these hundred-zhang-tall structures were born, but these existences, named [Sagely Emperor Thrones], completely changed the official hierarchy of the Great Xuan Empire.

Because these Sagely Emperor Thrones could project the image of the destined Sagely Emperor onto the celestial screen.

Every commoner, even those living in remote mountain villages, could listen to the Sagely Emperor's teachings through these Sagely Emperor Thrones scattered throughout the empire.

Even more terrifying for the officials in various regions was that these Sagely Emperor Thrones actually had a function to connect to the capital.

Qingzhou was previously suffering from a drought, with no harvest in three months and widespread starvation.

However, not long after the construction of the Sagely Emperor Thrones, a team of Imperial Guards emerged from them, bringing a large amount of grain to relieve the disaster.

While saving countless people, this event was also instantly transmitted throughout the land through the Sagely Emperor Thrones.

Furthermore, subsequent messengers of the Sagely Emperor successively emerged from the Sagely Emperor Thrones to summon officials from various regions, further confirming the authenticity of the disaster relief.

The legends of the destined Sagely Emperor, an immortal reincarnated, displaying various divine abilities in the imperial court, also spread widely in a short period.

"The common people in all regions can pray to the Great Sagely Emperor through the Sagely Emperor Thrones. Officials who are corrupt or incompetent will be severely punished if investigated and found guilty." This was the teaching of the Sagely Emperor's messengers to the people of the Great Xuan.

"Do not think you can simply die and be done with it. The methods of the destined Sagely Emperor are beyond your imagination. The more than a hundred fat pigs tied up in the execution ground of Xuanjing City are officials who previously preyed on the people. They are still writing confessions with their hooves on the ground every day. I am here this time to take you to appreciate the spectacle." This was a warning from the Sagely Emperor's messengers to the officials of the Great Xuan.

And after the officials of the Great Xuan collectively visited the execution ground in Xuanjing City, their faces turned deathly pale. Upon returning to their respective territories, they all became incorruptible and strict for a time.

Xuanjing City.

Li Fan floated above the capital, watching the imperial luck change from black to blue, and nodded slightly.

"By using the Sagely Emperor Thrones to achieve strong centralized power, the Great Xuan Dynasty has undergone a transformation in a short period. The next step is to slowly gather the hearts of the people and elevate the imperial luck."

Li Fan observed his body.

The hundreds of millions of living beings in the Great Xuan were now all tied to him.

This was equivalent to a substantial "anchor," fixing his existence.

His body was no longer ethereal and transparent like a ghost.

However, he would still occasionally experience a state of nothingness.

It was clear that his existence had not yet stabilized completely.

"It's not a big problem. As long as the Great Xuan remains stable and prosperous, in another three years, he should be able to completely rid himself of the side effects of [nothingness]."

"But this only solves the side effects; to truly escape the net of the True Immortal, he still needs to go to the Netherworld to return to the truth."

Li Fan casually threw a punch forward.

He did not use his Foundation Establishment stage spiritual power, but only relied on the imperial luck condensed by the Emperor of Heaven Qi Canon.

A whistling sound of breaking through the air echoed, and the white clouds in the distance were split in two.

A phantom of a green dragon faintly appeared in the air, roaring upwards.

"White, green, red, purple, gold."

"In just one month, I have reached the second level of the five realms of the Emperor of Heaven Qi Canon."

"Now I am equivalent to a cultivator in the late Golden Core stage. The speed of cultivation is so fast, firstly, because the foundation of the Great Xuan was not bad to begin with, barely considered to be in a feudal golden age. And secondly..."

Li Fan looked at the towering Sagely Emperor Thrones below.

"The methods of immortals are simply a dimensionality reduction attack on mortal dynasties. After severely punishing a group of corrupt officials and solving the disasters in various regions, and then announcing it to the world through the Sagely Emperor Thrones, the hearts of the people were almost instantly gathered."

"If an ordinary feudal mortal emperor wanted to achieve what I have, it would take at least more than ten years, and they would also have to face the backlash from officials and local powers."

"I do not need to worry about these things."

Thinking thus, Li Fan slowly descended from the clouds and landed inside the palace.

"Greetings, Sagely Emperor!"

"Greetings, Teacher!"

The guards in the courtyard immediately knelt down.

"Rise," Li Fan said, raising his hand to help them all up.

The faces of these young people turned red with excitement.

They were all personally selected by Li Fan from various parts of the Great Xuan. Besides carrying out the duties of guarding the imperial palace, their main task was to eliminate corrupt officials and deter villains in various regions, maintaining the prosperity and invincibility of the Great Xuan Dynasty's imperial luck.

Among them, those who called Li Fan "Teacher" were two exceptionally talented youths from below Solitude Mountain, named Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba.

They bore even more important responsibilities.

"Erlang, how has your cultivation of the [Sitting Immortal Art] that I taught you progressed?"

After dismissing everyone else, Li Fan looked at Sun Erlang and asked in a deep voice.

He wore a black robe embroidered with nine coiling golden dragons. The bead curtain of his crown hung down, obscuring his face, making his features impossible to discern.

"As expected of the Son of Heaven, an imperial majesty mortals can only gaze upon from afar."

Sun Erlang felt Li Fan's gaze upon him and his body trembled slightly. He instinctively lowered his head.

"I apologize, Teacher," he said with a hoarse voice. "Your disciple is incompetent. I only broke through to the first level of Qi Refining yesterday."

"To have achieved qi circulation in such a short time, relying solely on the spiritual energy gathered within the palace, is not too difficult," Li Fan said, not reprimanding him, but rather nodding to comfort him.

Upon hearing this, Sun Erlang's face grew even more ashamed. "If not for the [Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Spell] you imparted to me, I fear I would still be affected by the miasma within my body, unable to embark on the immortal path."

After speaking, Sun Erlang sincerely kowtowed several times.

Li Fan did not stop him.

When Sun Erlang rose again, Li Fan calmly asked, "What is the overall progress of the Imperial Guard in cultivating the Immortal Heart Spell?"

"As of yesterday, one hundred and sixty soldiers have successfully entered the path and shed their mortal bodies. The rest who did not pass the trial have all been dealt with," Sun Erlang replied, a hint of reluctance flashing in his eyes before he quickly concealed it.

"You and your men will be the main force for my conquest of all realms. You must diligently cultivate day and night and not slacken."

"As for the issue of spiritual energy, you need not worry. In three days, you will personally take this immortal boat to the Eastern Ruins Abyss."

Li Fan casually gestured, and a wooden boat about thirty feet in size appeared before Sun Erlang. The boat was covered in silver lines, emitting an aura of profound mystery.

"Truly an immortal treasure. To entrust such a treasure to me so readily, my Master is truly remarkable," Sun Erlang thought, his heart filled with awe. He quickly nodded in agreement.

The immortal boat then flew into his embrace. A feeling of effortless control instantly surfaced in Sun Erlang's mind.

"You may go," Li Fan's voice sounded just as he was experiencing the profoundness of the immortal boat.

Sun Erlang bowed and took his leave.

Only Li Fan remained in the imperial palace's back garden. The faceless figure beneath the bead curtain, shrouded in shadow, appeared strange and eerie.

"Heh heh, if not for the fact that this world is destined not to last long, and I might as well try imparting my methods to others, I would have discovered much later that the [Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Spell] is not restricted by the rule of not cultivating multiple techniques."

"Is it that the Immortal Heart Spell does not fall under the category of cultivation techniques, or is it a special favor granted by the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao to the Grand Heavenly Venerable of Profound Yellow?"

"No matter the reason, the plan to select a suitable successor for the Grand Heavenly Venerable of Profound Yellow in the future will be much easier to implement than I imagined."

Li Fan's thoughts flowed, and with a flash, he arrived at the [Imperial Throne] standing in the capital of Great Xuan. A faint wisp of spiritual energy nourished Li Fan's body, preventing his current late Foundation Establishment realm from regressing due to the lack of spiritual energy.

Having experienced hundreds of reincarnations and reaching the peak Dao Integration realm, comparable to a Void Integration cultivator, Li Fan had now returned to the Foundation Establishment realm. However, the world he saw was different from before.

For instance, mortal worlds like Great Xuan did possess spiritual energy, as they were connected to the Profound Yellow Realm. However, due to the unique structure of these small worlds and the sealing array of the Celestial Severing Formation, the spiritual energy was extremely sparse, almost nonexistent. Ordinary cultivation methods could not utilize it. Only creatures with long lifespans, accumulating it bit by bit over time, could draw upon a limited amount. Take, for example, the giant snake hundreds of feet long on Mount Dissolution.

"The spiritual energy of an entire world is barely enough to sustain a Foundation Establishment cultivator..."

"However, it is not a problem to borrow from the Profound Yellow Realm."

The Grand Esoteric Boat that Li Fan had given to Sun Erlang was now equipped with additional formations. Its purpose was to fly automatically into the Profound Yellow Realm, absorb spiritual energy, store it, and then return. Sun Erlang, inside the Grand Esoteric Boat, naturally could not see what was happening outside. His only task was to bring the boat to the vicinity of the Ruins Abyss.

Although with Li Fan's current mastery of formations, his act of stealing spiritual energy from the Profound Yellow Realm would be difficult to detect under the concealment of the formations, it was not a long-term solution. To generate spiritual energy from nothing, he still needed the Dao One Insect. The Dao One Insect was a peculiar exotic beast that Li Fan could not create himself. However...

Skipping the prompt to "Return to True" and retain the option from the previous life, Li Fan looked at his status panel.

Name: Li Fan

Realm: Late Foundation Establishment

Physiological Age: 20/399

Psychological Age: 1399/9999

Void Transformation Charge Progress: 3%

Anchor Charge Progress: 0%

Current Anchor Count: 3

Available Anchor Count: 1

Bound Items: Profound Heavenly Mirror Origin (Fragmentary), Grand Esoteric Boat, Myriad Beast Condensing Crystal, Ten Thousand Man Blood Essence, Dao Dissolution Stone, Terminal Dissolution Disc

"My physiological age has returned to the 399 years appropriate for the Foundation Establishment realm, but I don't need to worry. Before my lifespan is up, I should have already returned to true," he mused.

"The upper limit of my psychological age, even after reaching the Void Transformation realm, has not increased correspondingly. It seems I've reached a bottleneck..."

Li Fan merely glanced at these details, his attention focusing on the anchor count and bound items. His available anchor count was originally 2, but after absorbing the nascent Five Elements Cave Heaven, it became 3. As for now, only one remained. This was because Li Fan had used a blank anchor to replace bound items. The [Thousand Mechanisms Jade Orb Golden Canon] had been replaced by the Profound Heavenly Mirror Origin, and the [Poised Fragmentary Stele (Damaged)] had been replaced by the Myriad Beast Condensing Crystal.

Anchors were not easily obtained. However, after absorbing the nascent Five Elements Cave Heaven and generating anchors, Li Fan gained a new understanding of their essence.

Heaven and Earth Wonders, Golden Core techniques, and Nascent Soul Cave Heavens. The reason for needing to absorb these things as anchors to "Return to True" was likely because "Return to True" was a process of completing its understanding of "external things." Just as the Heavenly Profound Mirror completed its sublimation by measuring heaven and earth, "Return to True" crudely absorbed and gained experience through consumption.

"So it's the opposite of what I thought before."

"The closer something is to the essence of the world, the more charge progress it provides. Foundation Establishment Wonders and Law Golden Cores are too superficial and cannot satisfy the needs of 'Return to True.'"

"Therefore, the number of anchors generated by absorption is limited."

"Conversely, Nascent Soul Cave Heavens, nascent transformations, and even the essence of heaven and earth will provide a large amount of charge progress."

"With the Profound Yellow Realm as a vast source of nourishment, the number of anchors is temporarily not a major concern."

Thus, Li Fan did not hesitate to use the anchor replacement function. The Profound Heavenly Mirror Origin was something he had obtained by chance in his previous life. As for the Myriad Beast Condensing Crystal... In his previous life, before enacting his world-ending plan, Li Fan had traveled to various small worlds for a final inventory. The Myriad Beast Reincarnation was the fruit of his labor from the Empire and Xu Ke. Li Fan's thoughts drifted back to that time.

"The Myriad Immortal Alliance's surprise attack, and the annihilation of the Federation Headquarters?" Xiao Qing's face turned deathly pale upon hearing Li Fan's words.

"If I hadn't severed the connection between the Spirit Wood Realm and yourselves in time, the Empire would likely be in ruins by now," Li Fan said with a slight sigh. The Imperial Daughter and Xiao Hong exchanged glances, their hearts filled with lingering fear.

"However, you need not worry too much. Although the Spirit Wood Realm was destroyed, the vast majority of the Headquarters' members managed to escape and have gone into hiding. Once the storm passes, the Federation will be able to rise again in an instant," Li Fan lied with a straight face. Hearing this blatant falsehood, the Empire and the others found their hearts calmed. While listening to the Empire's reports on their current situation, Li Fan made his way to the Empire's treasury.

All of the Empire's research results had backups stored here. Li Fan strolled through this vast treasury, all the way to the end where the Myriad Beasts Melting Furnace was located, before turning around.

He took out an item and showed it to the two of them. It was merely a palm-sized disc, but the pressure it inadvertently emitted caused Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong's bodies to tremble. They couldn't help but feel an urge to kneel.

"What is this?" They suppressed their bodies' instinctive reactions and looked at the disc in Li Fan's hand, their faces filled with shock. "Myriad Beasts Wheel?" The feeling that life and death were in the other's grasp instantly reminded them of this legendary treasure of the beast race.

However, after staring intently at the disc for a long time, they still noticed something was wrong. As beasts, their bloodline memories contained ancestral knowledge of the Myriad Beasts Wheel. But this item in Li Fan's hand was clearly different. The true Myriad Beasts Wheel had a more ancient and archaic aura. This one… it did have a certain controlling effect on them, but if they resisted with all their might, they might still be able to break free. It was still quite far from the legendary state of having no control over their own lives and deaths.

"A replica?" The thought occurred to both Qing and Hong simultaneously as they looked at Li Fan, filled with surprise and uncertainty.

"You guessed correctly. It is a replica created by the Federation Elder, based on the research data of the Myriad Beasts Wheel you provided earlier." Li Fan continued, "Besides being able to restrain myriad beasts, it has another function, which is the main purpose of my visit this time."

Li Fan suddenly sighed, "The Spirit Wood Realm was destroyed. Although the personnel losses were not significant, we fled in such a hurry that many precious supplies and research data could not be brought out in time."

"So, after deep reflection, the Elder decided to implement the backup plan for all realms, duplicating and preserving valuable items from each small world…" Li Fan hadn't finished speaking when Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong's expressions changed.

Li Fan continued indifferently, "This is also for your own good. After all, your Empire's self-defense capabilities are too poor. As long as the Myriad Immortal Alliance sends out one or two Unity Realm cultivators, they can completely destroy you."

"If we have a civilization seed left in the Federation, even if something unexpected happens, it can be rebuilt quickly." Li Fan fiddled with the disc in his hand, looking at the countless frozen beast specimens in the Empire's treasury. "Your greatest wealth is actually the various exotic beasts you have cultivated over the years. I know you all have more than one backup, and I will only take one of them."

With that, ignoring Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong's reactions, a beam of light shone from the disc, sweeping over these frozen beasts. Everything that was illuminated instantly disappeared on the spot. On the disc in Li Fan's hand, faint phantoms of these exotic beasts seemed to appear.

It appeared as if these frozen beasts were being absorbed and preserved within the disc. In reality, they were directly decomposed by the disc's beam of light. Simultaneously, the information regarding their structures, bloodlines, and tissues were all recorded into the disc.

"All beasts in the world originate from [Emperor One]."

"And the exotic beasts of the Empire are all cultivated and evolved from the beasts of the past. As the saying goes, all variations stem from the same root. As long as this information is mastered, all exotic beasts can be created 'out of thin air'."

As the collection of beast information increased, the phantoms on the disc became more numerous. Not only did the aura it emanated become more majestic and powerful, but the appearance of the disc itself also changed. It became increasingly similar to the true Myriad Beasts Wheel that Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong remembered.

As Li Fan collected the backup information of the exotic beasts, he couldn't help but marvel at the wonders of creation. Besides some exotic beasts that were specifically and intentionally bred, the birth of the vast majority of the Empire's exotic beasts was essentially due to various coincidences. Different bloodlines intertwined and mutated, and new species mutated into different offspring. It seemed endless.

"Infinite possibilities." The sentence spoken by the Emperor One Beast in the Fallen Immortal Illusion Realm suddenly reappeared in Li Fan's mind.

Just as Li Fan was about to absorb the information of a frozen beast as usual, he suddenly stopped. Because he sensed a familiar aura from this beast.

"Sky Patrol Arrow…" Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong saw Li Fan's movements halt and his gaze fall upon the creature, and immediately understood.

They quickly explained, "This exotic beast is the core of the arrow that the envoy previously instructed us to research. We named it [Void Splitter]. In the past, within the Beast Taming Sect, we had seen similar beasts, but they were far from as ferocious and swift as this one. Moreover, they had strong self-awareness and were difficult to control."

"The offspring cultivated so far are still lacking compared to the mother form you gave us. Therefore, we have not reported it until now." Li Fan searched and indeed found similar breeds next to the Void Splitter beast.

"The core is insufficient, but I can compensate with formations. Even if it doesn't reach the destructive power of the Myriad Immortal Alliance's true Sky Patrol Arrow, having half of it would be very practical." With that thought, Li Fan absorbed the information of these Void Splitter beasts into the disc.

…

His thoughts returned to the present. The disc that contained the essence of the Empire's research was naturally the [Myriad Beasts Crystal Condensation]. With the artifact refining level of the Heavenly Mystery Realm, combined with the detailed information about the Myriad Beasts Wheel obtained from Xu Ke, creating a replica was not difficult.

"To condense physical exotic beasts from the Myriad Beasts Crystal Condensation requires a large amount of spiritual energy. My current late Foundation Establishment cultivation level cannot support it. However, as long as Sun Er Lang pilots the Grand Origin Boat back from the Profound Yellow Realm, it will be fine."

"With the Dao One Worm and the Void Splitter, the Great Xuan will have the capital to conquer other small worlds."

To travel to the Underworld Realm required the Underworld race to perform a special ritual. Although Li Fan easily suppressed the Underworld race in his previous life, it was because he possessed the Five Elements Great Cave Heaven, and his true combat power was still above ordinary Unity Realm cultivators.

In this life, Li Fan, who was within the True Immortal Net, could not easily raise his cultivation level. The Underworld race would not be so easy to deal with relying solely on the Great Xuan Realm. Therefore, it was necessary to improve the combat power of the Great Xuan army and civilians as much as possible, as well as to improve Li Fan's own [Heavenly Emperor Qi Sutra].

Li Fan stood atop the [Sacred Emperor's Throne] and began to consider suitable targets for conquest.

A month later, Sun Er Lang successfully returned piloting the Grand Origin Boat. The Great Xuan's first step towards sublimation into a spiritual energy world also began. As the first Heaven and Earth Furnace was successfully forged, spiritual energy began to diffuse within the Xuan Capital City. The Great Xuan Forbidden Army were the first to sense the presence of spiritual energy.

After one night, the hundreds of forbidden soldiers who possessed the [Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Curse] all successfully introduced Qi into their bodies, thus embarking on the path of cultivation. Among them, the outstanding one, Sun Er Lang, directly advanced to the peak of Qi Refining with the power of the [Immortal Sitting Art].

If it weren't for the need for a rare heavenly item for his next advancement, Sun Er Lang would have directly leaped to the middle stage of Foundation Establishment.

Sun Er Lang’s demeanor was steady, and he did not show his joy outwardly. He simply reported the matter to Li Fan proactively.

"The Great Xuan Imperial Guard, and by extension all the armies and civilians who will be conquered in the future, will be your assistance in cultivating the [Immortal Sitting Art]."

"Within five years, I need you to help me forge an army that is capable of fighting and conquering."

Li Fan sat suspended above the [Sacred Emperor's Throne], looking at Sun Er Lang kneeling below, and said indifferently.

"As for the essential items for your advancement in cultivation, you need not worry."

Sun Er Lang’s heart surged with excitement, his blood boiled, and he responded with a cry before retreating. He went to train his subordinates, the Imperial Guard.

Meanwhile, Li Fan took out a small Heavenly Profound Mirror, and his divine sense probed into it.

This small Heavenly Profound Mirror was an unexpected gain from the Grand Origin Boat's journey to the Profound Yellow Realm. While the Grand Origin Boat was drawing spiritual energy from the Profound Yellow Realm, a Golden Core cultivator happened to pass by. Whether it was a coincidence or the cultivator’s extraordinary talent, he could vaguely sense the anomaly of the Grand Origin Boat beneath the formation’s concealment.

He thought he had discovered some hidden treasure and excitedly explored around it. As a result, he triggered the Grand Origin Boat’s defensive formation, was unfortunately taken in, and suppressed within the boat. Currently, he was imprisoned by Great Xuan in the dungeon, left to cool off for the time being.

"It's a pity that it's just a most ordinary small Heavenly Profound Mirror, without direct item transmission capabilities."

Even though he had not yet joined the Myriad Immortal Alliance in this life, and even though this small Heavenly Profound Mirror did not belong to him, Li Fan still accessed the Heavenly Profound Mirror unimpeded. This was precisely because of the existence of the Heavenly Profound Mirror's origin.

In his previous life, as the world-ending plan unfolded, Li Fan had exchanged the [Thousand Mechanisms Jade Vast Gold Chapter] for the Heavenly Profound Mirror’s origin through a blank anchor point. On the True panel, it became [Profound Heaven Mirror Origin (Incomplete)]. The Heavenly Profound Mirror seemed to have not noticed this inexplicable origin that had appeared in the world.

And in this life, as the true owner of this origin, when Li Fan entered the Heavenly Profound Mirror again, he felt that it was different from his previous life. In his previous life, the Heavenly Profound Mirror's origin was bestowed by the human clone of the Heavenly Profound Mirror. Although it indeed came with various permissions exclusive to the Heavenly Profound Mirror, its fundamental source, its source of authority, still belonged to the Heavenly Profound Mirror itself. If the Heavenly Profound Mirror wished, it could retract the bestowed origin and invalidate the permissions at any time.

But in this life…

Li Fan roamed through the countless pieces of information in the Heavenly Profound Mirror and felt true [freedom]. He possessed completely independent authority. He could even do things that the Heavenly Profound Mirror itself could not. For example, deleting certain transaction data. Perhaps influenced by the refinement of the Profound Heaven King in the past, the Heavenly Profound Mirror could not engage in acts of forgery or deception. And to maintain the stable operation of the Immortal Alliance, all data within the Heavenly Profound Mirror was undeletable and traceable. In his previous life, Mo Ru Bin’s act of deducing the Profound Heaven King’s whereabouts through the Heavenly Profound Mirror was eventually discovered by the Myriad Immortal Alliance. This was not a betrayal by the Heavenly Profound Mirror, but a characteristic inherent to it.

But now, empowered by this newly appeared origin force, Li Fan could accomplish this. He erased the information of the original owner of this small Heavenly Profound Mirror, and then Li Fan registered a completely new blank identity for himself. After earning over ten thousand points of contribution in a short period by selling key information, and using this as capital for frequent transactions, Li Fan’s account swelled to hundreds of thousands within half a month. He extensively purchased the required supplies. The agreed-upon trading location was set in the sea area near Great Xuan’s exit. Li Fan remotely controlled the Grand Origin Boat to retrieve the items.

Although it seemed troublesome, Li Fan operated with ease and grace. He purchased all the supplies needed for the Great Xuan Imperial Guard’s advancement. Without the constraint of heavenly items, the strength of the Great Xuan Imperial Guard experienced its first surge.

Foundation Establishment cultivators appeared one after another, and Sun Er Lang, as the leader among them, quickly rose to the peak of Foundation Establishment. He was even slightly stronger than Li Fan at the moment. However, with the blessing of Great Xuan’s national destiny, facing Li Fan, he would still be no match for a single move.

Sun Er Lang’s realm advanced too quickly, so Li Fan ordered him to suppress his strength for the time being. He also taught him the [Calamity Body] technique of the Supreme Sect, storing all the excess feedback cultivation.

By the anchor point of 3 years, the Great Xuan Imperial Guard had fifty-six Foundation Establishment cultivators and eight hundred and forty-two Qi Refining cultivators.

On this day, Li Fan lectured on the Heavenly Capital City. His image was transmitted throughout the land via the Sacred Emperor’s Throne. As Li Fan’s words, seemingly containing infinite Great Dao, resounded, various anomalies appeared in the Great Xuan sky screen. Flowers descended from the sky, accompanied by countless flying golden dragons. The furnaces of heaven and earth, previously sealed by Li Fan’s formation, began to emit the spiritual energy they had manufactured over three years. Even mortals could now feel the wondrous changes occurring in the world, let alone the cultivators in the Heavenly Capital City.

Among the fifty-six Foundation Establishment cultivators, three directly attained enlightenment and advanced to Golden Core. Sun Er Lang was naturally among them. However, it was purely an advancement in realm. In terms of actual combat effectiveness, they were still far inferior to ordinary Myriad Immortal Alliance cultivators. But for Li Fan, it was sufficient. Li Fan did not expect them to kill enemies personally; they only needed to act as spiritual energy filling machines for the operation of formations.

He imparted the formations to Sun Er Lang and ordered the Great Xuan Imperial Guard to practice day and night, ensuring seamless coordination. Great Xuan’s strength grew daily.

By the anchor point of 5 years, Great Xuan, having accumulated strength for a long time, finally began its first conquest. The target was the Spirit Wood Realm, a realm Li Fan was very familiar with. Since there were no integrated Dao cultivators, the entrance to the Spirit Wood Realm could not be directly connected to Great Xuan. Therefore, this campaign route was to pass through Profound Yellow and then invade the Spirit Wood Realm. To avoid detection by the Myriad Immortal Alliance, the expeditionary force consisted of only fifty cultivators led by Sun Er Lang. They traveled aboard the Grand Origin Boat and silently arrived in the Spirit Wood Realm.

Upon seeing the colossal tree that pierced the heavens and the earth, all the Great Xuan Imperial Guards could not help but be momentarily dazed. However, years of brutal training quickly allowed them to focus their minds. The formation was instantly set up, and a blur of motion whistled towards the Spirit Wood. It was the Sky Patrol Arrow! The flight of the Sky Patrol Arrow naturally provoked the anger of the Tree People tribe. They wanted to intercept it, but even an elder Tree Person with Nascent Soul strength was as fragile as paper before the Sky Patrol Arrow. Screams echoed continuously. The Tree People sacrificed their lives in an attempt to stop the Sky Patrol Arrow from landing in the Spirit Wood, but to no avail.

Boom! A terrifying hole was pierced through the center of the Spirit Wood. The constantly beating Spirit Wood Heart was faintly visible within. Sun Er Lang, clad in black and gold battle armor, soared forward. Ninety Sky Patrol Arrows circled before him.

"Submit, or die."

Ninety Sky Patrol Arrows, only half were actual physical projectiles with destructive power.

As for the other half, they were illusions created by formations, possessing only momentum and not true force.

However, the Tree People of the Spirit Wood Realm had already been terrified by the destructive power displayed by the first Sky Patrol Arrow, and were unable to distinguish between the real and the fake.

The central colossal tree was intrinsically linked to the Spirit Wood Realm.

If the tree flourished, the realm would prosper; if the tree was destroyed, the realm would perish.

The massive hole in the trunk of the colossal tree left the Tree People of the Spirit Wood Realm with no desire to resist.

The female tribal chief of the Tree People led her entire tribe to kneel in submission before the Great Xuan Imperial Guards, signifying their fealty.

Following the instructions of the Mandated Heavenly Emperor, Sun Er Lang began to engrave numerous formations onto the heart of the colossal tree.

He was unaware of the significance of these formations, but executing orders was the inherent duty of the Great Xuan Imperial Guards.

With Sun Er Lang’s current cultivation at the peak of Golden Core, activating the formations was still somewhat strenuous.

Furthermore, he had to remain vigilant against any potential counterattack from the Tree People.

Fortunately, the overwhelming deterrence of the Sky Patrol Arrows prevented the Tree People from making a desperate final stand.

Once the formations were complete, a brilliant green light erupted from the heart of the colossal tree.

The wound on the Spirit Wood began to slowly heal, and a figure emerged from the light.

"The Spirit of the Colossal Tree..." Sun Er Lang mused.

Just as he had anticipated, the Spirit of the Colossal Tree did not side with the Tree People after its appearance.

Instead, it communicated with Sun Er Lang through telepathy, "Are you Senior Brother Sun? Teacher has instructed you to leave half of the Imperial Guards here to assist in constructing the formation."

"By the way, my name is Lin Ling."

Lin Ling transmitted an image. Upon hearing the familiar voice of the Mandated Heavenly Emperor within the visual transmission, Sun Er Lang nodded slightly.

Without losing a single soldier and expending only one Sky Patrol Arrow, Sun Er Lang had successfully conquered the Spirit Wood Realm. However, Sun Er Lang was aware that this success had nothing to do with the combat power of the Great Xuan Imperial Guards. It was entirely due to the devastating and world-ending power of the Sky Patrol Arrows.

Sun Er Lang shook his head slightly, dispelling the feeling of dejection. He led the remaining forces towards the second target world.

"Great Li? Hmph..." A glint of killing intent flickered in Sun Er Lang's eyes.

...

After the Great Xuan Imperial Guards departed, Lin Ling, following the formations taught by Li Fan, began to direct the Tree People.

Lin Ling harbored no particular affection for these Tree People.

Instead, Li Fan, who had expounded the Dao, taught him, and resolved his doubts upon his birth, was the person he felt closest to in this world.

"The Grand Myriad Spirits Formation?"

"Upon completion of this formation, a passage to the world where my teacher resides will be opened. It will also increase the overall spiritual energy concentration of the Spirit Wood Realm, leading to its sublimation."

"First, complete the construction of the foundational formation. The remaining critical materials will be delivered by the Great Xuan Imperial Guards later."

Recalling Li Fan's explanation of the formation and remembering the promise that he would be allowed to travel to Great Xuan once he completed the Grand Myriad Spirits Formation, Lin Ling became filled with renewed vigor and began to urge the dull-witted Tree People once more.

...

Great Xuan.

Sensing the somewhat blurry images transmitted from the Spirit Wood Realm, Li Fan nodded with satisfaction.

Although he intended to fulfill his vows in the Netherworld in this life, utilizing the power of darkness to reduce the detection of the Faceless True Immortal.

However, Li Fan could not predict the extent of such a reduction.

Therefore, the Grand Myriad Spirits, All Beings Refining God formation was also a necessary construction, to guard against unforeseen circumstances.

If the first time he witnessed the scene of billions of living beings perishing simultaneously had stirred some emotions within Li Fan.

Then, the second time, and subsequent times...

Li Fan truly felt no psychological pressure whatsoever.

He calmed his mind and looked at what was ostensibly his second disciple in this lifetime, Wang Xuan Ba.

Unlike Sun Er Lang's treatment, Li Fan did not impart any new cultivation methods to him.

Instead, he taught Wang Xuan Ba the Creation Furnace Technique that he had researched.

This version had undergone a complete transformation from the initial, crude method of simply prying open the body's hidden reserves and brutally strengthening the flesh.

In his previous life, with the guidance of the Heavenly Physician and the thorough integration of the Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture and the Heaven Mending Record, Li Fan had gained a new understanding of how to stimulate the potential of the human body.

However, transforming theory into practice required experimentation.

Wang Xuan Ba's peculiar physique was precisely the ideal subject for such an experiment.

"The Xuanhuang World, at the brink of destruction, erupted with myriad mysterious and wondrous transformations in an instant."

"Human beings should be the same."

"In a normal state, the human body is in a state of balance. Only when an external entity invades and the body faces a fatal crisis will it mobilize its own potential."

Before Li Fan, Wang Xuan Ba, a mere seventeen years old, lay in a deep slumber.

His height had already reached nearly thirty feet, his muscles bulged all over, and his skin was covered with a golden, armor-like keratin.

Although traces of human features could still be discerned, a cursory glance would make him resemble an ancient fierce beast.

"Eighteen types of exotic beast flesh and blood have been implanted. Only seven of them have been fused and absorbed by him. The rest have exhibited severe rejection reactions. If I hadn't intervened to save him, he would have likely died of blood depletion by now."

"However, as his physique strengthens further, perhaps another attempt can be made."

With this thought, Li Fan injected a mass of flesh and blood from the exotic beast, the Celestial Silk Fox, into Wang Xuan Ba's body.

The relentless pursuit of pure strength seemed to have caused Wang Xuan Ba's physical development to become imbalanced and on the verge of collapse. He needed enhancement in dexterity.

Li Fan was eager to see the ultimate limit of the human physique.

...

Li Realm.

The conquest of Great Li was even easier than that of the Spirit Wood Realm.

They hadn't even deployed the Sky Patrol Arrows; the mere sight of the Great Xuan Imperial Guards hovering in the air caused the emperor and all the civil and military officials in the capital to prostrate themselves.

Adhering to the principle that there could only be one emperor, the Mandated Heavenly Emperor, Sun Er Lang unceremoniously executed the Emperor of Great Li.

He then selected the Prince of Zhennan, Xiao Tian You, as his proxy ruler.

As the Emperor's throne appeared in various regions of Great Li, the populace soon accepted the swift change of dynasty.

And the existence of the Mandated Heavenly Emperor.

Great Li gradually began to transform into a minor spiritual energy world.

Anchor Year 8.

"85%."

"It's slower than before."

"Is this due to my current physical condition?"

Li Fan stared at the numbers on the True Fulfillment panel, lost in thought.

In three years, with the inclusion of many minor worlds such as the Spirit Wood, the Beast Species, and the Li Realm into the Great Xuan's territory, his Heavenly Emperor Qi Art had successfully advanced to the third level.

Great Xuan's destiny was like the rising sun, radiating intense crimson light and vigorous vitality.

His actual combat capability was equivalent to the early Fusion stage of the Profound Yellow Realm.

However, Li Fan could already sense the bottleneck of the Heavenly Emperor Qi Art.

To advance to the fourth level, the Purple Qi realm.

At the current rate of development, it would likely take decades.

Chapter 1133: Dark Faith Power

To achieve the highest realm of the Heavenly Emperor Qi Art and become an unparalleled emperor comparable to an immortal, Li Fan estimated that it would take at least a massive dynasty whose sphere of influence enveloped the entire Great Xuan Yellow World.

"Hmph, if I had that kind of strength, why would I still cultivate the Heavenly Emperor Qi Art?" he scoffed.

However, it was merely a temporary measure to anchor himself, and Li Fan didn't harbor any grand illusions about it. In truth, his objective had already been achieved. With the ever-increasing prosperity of the Great Xuan Dynasty, the strange phenomenon of his body intermittently appearing and disappearing had all but ceased. Even his face, which had originally lost its features, showed signs of reappearing.

"The Faceless True Immortal, their power seems to be about severing all connections with the world," Li Fan mused. "And as the Mandated Sacred Emperor of Great Xuan, with hundreds of millions of living beings connected to me, I have, to some extent, influenced the power of the True Immortal Network."

Li Fan savored the intertwining of these two powers within him and suddenly had an epiphany. "The correct way to use the Myriad Spirits Grand Array of Heaven and Earth might not be simple obstruction... but rather..."

"To treat those hundreds of millions of lingering thoughts as a basin of dog blood and splash it over," he continued, "in simpler terms, to forcibly link those hundreds of millions of lingering thoughts with the Faceless True Immortal."

"For example, to make those who died unjustly believe that the Faceless True Immortal is the culprit."

Li Fan's thoughts raced, and after the End Dissolution Disc's deduction, he quickly made minor adjustments to the Myriad Spirits Grand Array of Heaven and Earth. He then summoned Lin Ling.

"Master," Lin Ling, clad in armor and looking valiant, appeared before Li Fan. Unlike her past life, in this life, Lin Ling hadshouldered the heavy responsibility of leading the Great Xuan Imperial Army to conquer myriad worlds since awakening her consciousness. She had traveled extensively and, following Li Fan's instructions, had never established any connection with the Earth Vein Ancient Tree. Her temperament had become forthright and uninhibited, like that of a soldier.

After Li Fan explained the subtle modification method of the Myriad Spirits Array, Lin Ling was about to depart to execute her mission when she suddenly remembered something.

"Hm?" Li Fan looked at Lin Ling.

"Master, while I was flying through the Great Xuan Yellow Main Realm, a certain consciousness detected me and has been trying to communicate with me."

"Is it the Earth Vein Ancient Tree?" Li Fan frowned slightly.

"No. But it's similar..." Lin Ling replied truthfully. Seeing Li Fan's expression, she quickly added, "However, I have strictly followed your teachings and ignored it. That consciousness is erratic, it doesn't even say who it is. It just wants me to meet it..."

Upon hearing this, Li Fan immediately understood. He wondered why the Ruomu had detected Lin Ling's trace. After inquiring in detail about the location of the encounter, Li Fan designed a formation for Lin Ling to shield her from external perception. Only then did he dismiss her.

He pondered for a moment. The main task for this life was to escape the influence of the Faceless True Immortal. Li Fan merely noted down the time and location of Ruomu's appearance, having no intention of further contact.

"Later, I can give the Earth Vein Ancient Tree a surprise," Li Fan snorted coldly.

His figure flickered, and Li Fan arrived in a secret chamber beneath the Sacred Emperor's throne. It was pitch black, and more than ten Nether race people were imprisoned there. After Great Xuan developed its initial combat capabilities, Li Fan had ordered Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba to launch an offensive against the Nether race. Even with the assistance of the Sky-Patrolling Arrows, the battles were mixed. The Great Xuan Imperial Army suffered hundreds of casualties, but they also captured some Nether race individuals. After some... persuasion, they recognized reality and agreed to open a passage to the Nether Realm for Li Fan. However, the core of Stillness was not yet fully charged, so Li Fan was not in a hurry to enter.

The Nether race individuals, seeing Li Fan approach, hastily fell to their knees. Li Fan remained still, sensing a statue of himself not far away in the darkness. After becoming the Mandated Sacred Emperor of Great Xuan, Li Fan had once considered recreating a power similar to Origin Essence. As it bore some resemblance to faith power, Li Fan had ordered statues of himself to be erected everywhere, hoping to condense Origin Essence through the sheer number of his populace. But clearly, he had been somewhat naive. Although Origin Essence was a discarded existence by the True Immortals, it was subtly one level higher than ordinary spiritual energy. Without special methods, pure collective prayer from mortals could not condense it.

However, things changed after these Nether race individuals were captured. Perhaps it was due to the Nether race's innate and extremely strong faith in the Nether Realm. The moment they submitted, Li Fan faintly sensed a peculiar aura appearing within him. It was crimson, like the national destiny of the Great Xuan Dynasty, and it felt to Li Fan... extremely similar to the golden Origin Essence of the Mortal Compassion Immortal from his past life! Later, Li Fan moved one of his statues into this dungeon and ordered these more than ten Nether race individuals to pray day and night. The effect was remarkable. The Origin Essence produced by these Nether race individuals was actually greater than that of hundreds of millions of Great Xuan citizens combined!

Li Fan studied their prayer methods and had the Great Xuan Imperial Army learn and imitate them, but they all failed. After much thought, Li Fan could only attribute it to the special physique of the Nether race. "It seems to be related to the dark power of the Nether Realm. King Xuan..." The Nether Realm, which could interfere with the True Immortal Network to a certain extent, clearly held many secrets. However, these were not secrets to be explored in this lifetime.

"It's a pity that the Nether race's fertility is also not very strong," Li Fan sighed. "Otherwise, without the statue of the Faceless True Immortal, I could weave a faith network." The ability to bestow, revoke, and even transmit across distances at will was too powerful and convenient. Having tasted its benefits, Li Fan naturally found it difficult to relinquish it. Thus, even though Stillness was not far from being fully charged, Li Fan had not given up on researching this power. Clearly, Li Fan lacked talent in this area. "I'll have to let those guys research it after everything is completely safe," Li Fan sighed lightly.

"Great Sacred Emperor..." At this moment, one of the Nether race individuals, who had been kowtowing and praying, suddenly trembled and spoke, as if he had something to say.

"Hm?" Li Fan became interested. This was the first time they had actively tried to communicate with Li Fan. After receiving Li Fan's permission, the Nether race individual continued hesitantly, "During my prayers, I discovered that the master I originally served... " He glanced cautiously at Li Fan, "that is, the Nether Realm, doesn't seem to be very angry about our rebellion." He swallowed, "The ancestral teachings passed down through generations in our tribe always said not to betray the dark. Otherwise, divine punishment would surely follow. But I have tried now, and it is all baseless."

The young-looking Nether race individual trembled as he explained to Li Fan, his eyes darting up intermittently to gauge Li Fan's expression.

However, how could the countenance of the Holy Emperor of Destiny be fathomed by such a coarse being?

Growing more fearful, he poured out all his discoveries from the recent period: "Holy Emperor, please enlighten me. Since pledging my allegiance, I have been utterly devoted. Yet, praying to the dark is as instinctive to me as breathing. Thus, while praying to you, Holy Emperor, during this time, it was unavoidable that I would also naturally appeal to the dark."

"The dark, as always, responded to me..."

At this point, the more than ten Nether race individuals in the secret chamber all knelt down in extreme trepidation.

It was clear that such a phenomenon had occurred to all of them.

Li Fan waved his hand lightly, helping them all to their feet.

As for these Nether race individuals serving two masters, Li Fan of this life did not particularly care.

For in his plan, these individuals were merely tools for him to research "Faith Power" during the extremely short time before "Returning to Truth."

Once he initiated "Returning to Truth," everything in the Xuanhuang Realm would be annihilated.

Let alone these Nether race individuals.

He was more interested in why "the dark" would permit such duplicitous behavior.

If a believer of the Faceless True Immortal dared to serve two masters, they would likely have been torn to shreds by the True Immortal's power long ago.

"Either the power behind the dark, the true master, is so noble as to be outrageous, tolerating its believers to such an extent."

"Or..."

Li Fan's heart churned instantly: "It has another ulterior motive. It wants to use these acts of betrayal by its believers to infect beings of its own caliber."

With this thought, Li Fan immediately became vigilant.

He had always been one to speculate about powerful beings in this world with the greatest malice.

He carefully discerned the streaks of crimson power within him, which, though not abundant, were extremely potent.

But after repeated confirmation, he indeed found no signs of connection to the power of the dark.

"Could I be overthinking it?"

After a brief period of contemplation, Li Fan made his decision.

He would not allow any variables to affect the progression of "Returning to Truth" in this life.

First, he verbally commended the Nether race individuals for their honesty.

After leaving the underground secret chamber, Li Fan ordered Wang Xuanba to bestow upon them slumber.

Not in a metaphorical sense, but true, literal slumber.

Li Fan was unwilling to become entangled with such impure Faith Power again, yet he worried that directly slaughtering the Nether race individuals might attract the attention of the dark's master.

Thus, he simply turned them into a state of living death.

"It seems I need to find a way to solve the Nether race's fertility problem and cultivate believers from the new generation."

Wang Xuanba quickly completed the task and returned to report to Li Fan.

Through years of continuous devouring and integrating exotic beast organizations, coupled with cultivating the refined version of the "Forge of Creation Skill," Wang Xuanba had transformed from his previous form of a ten-foot-tall giant into a normal human size.

He merely appeared somewhat burly and robust.

Possessing the abilities of numerous exotic beasts and an incredibly swift physical regeneration rate, even an expert at the peak of the Golden Core stage, Sun Erlang, would be no match for Wang Xuanba in a death match.

"Xuanba, have you encountered any confusion or unanswered questions in your recent cultivation?" Li Fan asked.

He was both helping Wang Xuanba resolve his doubts and understanding his physical condition with the intention of improving the Forge of Creation Skill.

"Master. Recently, my body has indeed become stronger and stronger. Every moment, I feel as if I have inexhaustible energy. However..."

Wang Xuanba organized his thoughts and scratched his head. "I've slowly developed two kinds of feelings. One is a sense of inexplicable crisis, as if there exists some kind of natural predator in the world. This feeling is particularly strong when passing through the original Xuanhuang Realm."

"The second is the occasional whisper. I can't understand what is being said, but it gives me a sense of familiarity and closeness."

After listening, Li Fan said faintly, "Although you've achieved a body like a furnace, your will has not. The lingering thoughts of those exotic beasts you've devoured still haunt your mind. Don't cultivate for now; go and recuperate."

Li Fan naturally knew the reason for Wang Xuanba's abnormal physical state but did not explicitly state it. He merely instructed him to rest and recuperate in the Great Xuan Minor World.

As the deadline for "Returning to Truth" grew closer, Li Fan needed to eliminate all unstable factors.

Therefore, under his will, the Great Xuan's campaign to conquer other realms also halted.

Under the guise of "resting and recuperating, preparing for battle."

The military and civilian population of Great Xuan praised the Holy Emperor of Destiny for his great benevolence. Time passed swiftly.

At the end of the eighth year of the anchor, Li Fan, seeing the charging progress bar at one hundred percent, resolutely rose from the Holy Emperor's Seat in Xuanjing.

Without alerting anyone else, he quietly went to the underground secret chamber.

He awakened the slumbering Nether race individuals and opened the passage to the Nether Realm.

In the depths of the Sea of Darkness, Li Fan opened the "Returning to Truth" panel.

You can choose one of the following options to retain:

1. One item you possessed in this simulation.

2. Your cultivation realm in this simulation.

3. The simulated memories of one person closely related to you in this simulation. This memory can be passed on to that person.

4. Forgo the above options and accelerate the charging progress.

The flashing runes had been there for eight years.

"Inherit cultivation."

Li Fan murmured in his heart, his vigilance reaching its peak.

Concurrently, on the firmaments of the minor worlds conquered by the Great Xuan, the Li Realm, and the Beast Tribe over the years, crisscrossing silver lines suddenly lit up.

Like a giant net, they enveloped all living beings.

Few beings within the net could sense the imminent fatal crisis. Some looked up at the sky in surprise.

Only those "experts" with some cultivation had a vague sense of unease.

The eternally unchanging Sea of Darkness seemed to suddenly stir with an invisible wave.

A tempestuous surge descended upon Li Fan, whipping up a violent storm around him.

Foundation Establishment, Golden Core, Nascent Soul...

Earth-shattering changes occurred instantaneously within Li Fan.

Li Fan saw his ethereal "Returning to Truth" foundation transform into a Golden Core in an instant.

Then, in an explosion that consumed all light, it evolved into the Five Elements Cave Heaven.

The Cave Heaven instantly completed an evolution that should have taken millions of years.

The majestic Five Elements, a magnificent spectacle.

Then, the boundaries between the Five Elements blurred.

Countless changes unfolded within the Cave Heaven, too rapid to fully comprehend.

"The Cataclysm of Xuanhuang."

The Five Elements merged into one. Everything within the newly born Cave Heaven was in preparation to face a world-ending crisis that did not exist in this world.

The towering ancient tree in the Wood element Cave Heaven, its leaves falling, leaving only bare branches.

It gradually turned as hard as gold and iron.

The boundless sea of the Water element Cave Heaven began to freeze for miles.

In the blazing Fire element Cave Heaven, the flames grew dim.

But they did not extinguish.

Instead, they continuously contracted and condensed,

Transforming into strange, wispy flames.

...

Various unbelievable changes occurred in succession on Li Fan.

His realm also broke through Nascent Soul, rapidly advancing in the Divine Transformation stage.

Early Divine Transformation, Mid Divine Transformation, Late Divine Transformation...

It only stopped at the Perfeected Divine Transformation.

Powerful.

Vital.

Full of aggression.

This was how Li Fan felt about himself at this moment.

But Li Fan had no time to savor it.

As he had predicted, his transformation within the True Immortal's Net, achieved so quickly, had already attracted the attention of that faceless True Immortal beyond the high wall.

The surroundings seemed to be no longer so dark, but with specks of light appearing.

There seemed to be waves rising and falling; the silent, dark sea had unwanted guests.

"Return to Truth." Li Fan said decisively.

The surrounding scene froze.

Then it quickly turned to mist.

Perhaps because the Faceless True Immortal did not fully investigate the anomaly within the net, or perhaps the dark sea shielded most of the Faceless True Immortal's power.

In any case, this return to truth process was very smooth.

The void of white mist did not last long before it dispersed with a bang.

Light reappeared.

Anchor 1 year, Solitude Mountain Peak!

"Safe return."

"Proof that my method is feasible."

Li Fan breathed a sigh of relief, ignoring the "Return to Truth" prompt for now.

He carefully examined his own face.

The influence of the Faceless True Immortal's power, after another return to truth, had indeed receded to a certain extent.

Li Fan's face was no longer smooth and blank.

Instead, faint features were slightly protruding.

However, this appearance looked even more unnerving than being purely faceless.

Li Fan did not care.

"Next, I just need to repeat the process."

He skillfully flew towards Great Xuan's capital city.

Next, what happened in Great Xuan and the other small worlds was almost exactly the same as in the previous life, the 120th life.

The only possible difference was that Li Fan was more proficient and skipped many trial-and-error steps.

To be on the safe side, Li Fan did not cause any trouble, and even stopped researching the use of faith power from the You clan.

Minimizing all variables.

In the 121st life, the charging progress for Return to Truth was faster.

The charging was completed three months in advance.

Hiding in the dark sea, inheriting cultivation, returning to truth.

All done in one go.

Next, the 122nd life, the 123rd life...

Up to the 125th life.

At the beginning of the 8th year of anchoring, Li Fan once again arrived at the dark sea.

He had a premonition that after returning to truth this time, he would completely break free from the Faceless True Immortal's influence.

His face now looked no different from a normal person.

But he still sensed some incompleteness that could not be detected by mortal eyes or divine sense.

The influence of the True Immortal's Net still existed,

But it was as fragile as a touch.

Li Fan held back the urge to court death in his heart.

He took a deep breath and silently recited.

"Return to Truth!"

The scene instantly shifted between reality and illusion; mist condensed and then dispersed in an instant.

The 126th life, anchor 1 year, Solitude Mountain!

"Hoo!"

A feeling completely different from the previous lives emerged in Li Fan's heart.

It was a feeling of being unbound, truly free.

"Long trapped in a cage, I can finally return to nature."

Li Fan murmured, walking slowly to the edge of the cliff.

"Xuanhuang Realm, I am back!"

Facing the boundless sea of clouds, Li Fan chose to inherit his cultivation.

Above Great Xuan, the wind and clouds immediately changed color.

The entire world seemed unable to withstand the pressure, emitting creaking sounds of being overloaded.

However, this change lasted only for an instant.

Li Fan's immense aura quickly subsided and dissipated.

The sky returned to normal.

"Perfected Divine Transformation, and the Great Xuan world already struggles to bear it."

"If I were at Perfected Dao Integration, the world might shatter the moment I inherit my cultivation."

"But it doesn't matter, I can go to the Xuanhuang Realm to inherit my cultivation then. Or first, I can elevate the Great Xuan world."

Li Fan shook his head slightly, then shifted his thoughts to the plan for this life.

"In this life, I will operate from the shadows."

"I will not act unless absolutely necessary."

"Everything else is secondary, merely to verify my previous conjecture."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes, his gaze distant, as if seeing the sky of the Great Xuanhuang World.

"What is the relationship between Dharma Transmission and Heavenly Physician..."

Setting aside the argument that Dharma Transmission and Heavenly Physician had never appeared together,

The reason Li Fan suspected their relationship was because of the "Heaven Mending Record" that Heavenly Physician passed down.

At the end of the "Heaven Mending Record," a theoretical method of healing the heavens was described,

That is, "borrowing a shell to return the soul, breaking then being born."

Worlds, even the most powerful immortal cultivation worlds, like living beings, have their own end of life.

When a world inevitably heads towards ruin and decay, no matter how skilled one's medical skills, it is futile.

One can only watch it perish.

This is the normal, theoretical situation.

Heavenly Physician, however, proposed a possibility of saving worlds.

That is, to find another immortal cultivation world that is still in its prime and perform a soul-seizing.

"The Heavenly Dao changes owners, the world transforms."

"Although it seems absurd and unbelievable, it may not be impossible for Heavenly Physician to achieve it."

"And..."

Since stepping into the Xuanhuang Realm, all the scenes he had witnessed flashed rapidly before Li Fan's eyes.

"The phenomena predicted in the Heaven Mending Record to occur during the transmigration of worlds as shells are too similar to the current state of the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Strange phenomena arise, the Heavenly Dao changes abruptly."

"More importantly..."

"Heavenly Physician is from the Heavenly Law Realm, yet he attaches such importance to the Xuanhuang Realm. He wanders desperately in the Sea of Ultimate Darkness, collecting fragments from other worlds."

"Coupled with Heavenly Physician's previous actions and behaviors..."

Li Fan's eyes flickered.

"The accuracy of Heavenly Physician's Heaven Mending Plan can almost be confirmed."

"The only chilling thought is the attitude of Dharma Transmission."

"If he knew that Heavenly Physician was from another world and wanted to use the Xuanhuang Realm to possess a new body, yet Dharma Transmission did not obstruct him at all from beginning to end."

"Instead, like Heavenly Physician, he also went out into the starry sea to collect world fragments."

"..."

Li Fan's heart felt heavy.

"Either, besides this, Dharma Transmission has no better way to save the Xuanhuang Realm and was forced to do so."

"Or..."

"Dharma Transmission and Heavenly Physician are actually the same person!"

"Or rather, Dharma Transmission is a clone of Heavenly Physician!"

A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

In the Xuanhuang Realm, countless cultivators shared a question.

Why did Dharma Transmission not leave a clone when he roamed outside the heavens?

As long as there was a clone, it would be enough to suppress all inferiors in Xuanhuang.

If Dharma Transmission, the Heavenly Venerable, had a clone to suppress the Xuanhuang Realm, there would be absolutely no possibility of a large-scale war between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Five Elder Council.

Perhaps the Five Elder Council was a tool deliberately indulged by Dharma Transmission to maintain the delicate balance of the Xuanhuang Realm. Dharma Transmission did not actually care about their wars, and might even be happy to see them happen.

However, the Xuanhuang Realm harbored too many demons and monsters, and the Immortal Ruins were also looming in the distance.

In a situation where the Xuanhuang Realm could be destroyed with a single disagreement, it would undoubtedly be more appropriate to leave a clone in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Yet, Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission, who regarded the Xuanhuang Realm as a treasure, did not do so.

Li Fan’s two experiences of world destruction saw one where Dharma Transmission arrived late from beyond the heavens and let out a roar of helplessness.

The other time, he did not appear at all, and only Heavenly Physician showed up.

This seemed very strange.

Was refining a clone difficult for Dharma Transmission?

Although clone cultivation techniques were rare in the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan had repeatedly stirred up trouble using his clones.

What about the progenitor of the new law?

He clearly could have done it easily, yet he chose not to…

In fact, although cultivators in the Xuanhuang Realm dared not discuss it openly, they had many private speculations about why Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission did not leave a clone to suppress them.

It was merely that Dharma Transmission had transcended worldly concerns and was no longer as concerned about everything in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Clearly, they understood neither the Xuanhuang Realm nor Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission.

But in Li Fan’s opinion, if Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission himself was a clone…

Then everything would fall into place.

It was not that he did not want to, but that he could not!

In the 119th life, Clone Li Qing’s strength had already approached the original body infinitely, reaching the peak of Nascent Soul.

It was only one step away from surpassing the original body.

At that time, Li Fan had the question, “Can a clone’s strength surpass the original body?”

Later, after consulting various ancient texts with the original authority of the Xuanhuang Mirror, Li Fan had a sudden realization.

A clone’s strength surpassing the original body, and a clone refining another clone.

The latter should be more difficult to achieve.

Because if a clone could also refine its own clone, then it could be extended infinitely. The ultimate outcome would be that only one person existed in the entire world.

It was not absolutely impossible, but it had already surpassed the limits of mortal law.

In comparison, it was easier for a clone’s strength to surpass the original body.

“Heavenly Physician, Dharma Transmission…”

Two faces flashed through Li Fan’s mind. He suddenly remembered the statue of Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission in the illusion he saw when he first entered the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters.

At that time, his body’s instinct warned him due to a sense of familiarity.

And before that, the only existence above the Dao Integration realm in the Xuanhuang Realm that he had seen was Heavenly Physician.

“Although their faces are not the same, there are subtle similarities between them.”

“In the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, there was a trace of Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission’s aura. Cultivators who went there for the first time would feel something and have hallucinations. My original body saw the statue of Heavenly Venerable Dharma Transmission, while Clone Li Qing, saw…”

The Dao Dissolution Stone emitted a faint white light, faithfully reproducing the recorded images from that time.

In a blurry ball of light, several figures stood.

Fragmented conversations could be heard from within.

“This journey, what confidence do you have?”

“Do your best, and leave the rest to fate.”

“This doesn't sound like you.”

“The strength difference is too great, there is only a fight to the death.”

“Fine, go then. Who knows if it’s good or bad fortune.”

…

Li Fan also recalled the scene he saw in his chaotic consciousness when he was treating Hanhai in the 119th life.

“Venerable Heavenly Physician has been gone for a long time, I don't know if things can be accomplished.”

Hanhai sat on the main hall of the sect. Gui She Taiyi, as small as an ordinary turtle at his feet, said sullenly.

“Venerable Heavenly Physician said before leaving that there was at least a ninety percent chance of success. We should have some confidence in Him.” Unlike Taiyi’s gloomy expression, Hanhai seemed very relaxed and comforted with a smile.

…

Li Fan rubbed his chin.

Under the premise of the hypothesis that "Dharma Transmission Heavenly Venerable is Heavenly Physician's clone," all the fragmented clues obtained in the past were instantly connected.

Li Fan reread his past memories.

Indeed, he found more clues.

…

Yinyin Island.

Elder Yin pointed at the two preserved human skeletons he treasured and brought them close to Li Fan, whispering, “These two people are not the same kind of people.”

“Not the same kind of people?” Li Fan was stunned. “What do you mean?”

Elder Yin gestured with his hands and thought for a while, seeming unable to find suitable words to describe it.

After struggling for a long time, he suddenly clenched his fist, his face full of confusion. “It’s just a feeling, a feeling that you understand, right? They are both humans, but these two humans lived in different eras and different regions. Maybe they looked similar, and I dug them both up from the bottom of the Congyun Sea, but there’s an extremely special boundary that marks the difference between these two skeletons…”

Elder Yin spoke mysteriously, but for a long time, he couldn't explain it clearly.

…

During the second duplication process of Tianyang’s eternal remnant thought.

In order to get rid of Tianyang’s weak body as much as possible and recover from his coma as soon as possible, Li Fan studied the “Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture,” wrote a prescription for himself, and instructed his senior brother to refine it.

It was indeed effective, but when he woke up later, his second senior brother Ling Xiao said to him.

“Little Junior Brother, you were lucky. Several of the medicinal ingredients in the prescription you gave are unheard of. We asked all around the surrounding markets, but couldn't find anyone selling them. Some even said that these herbs simply don't exist in the cultivation world.”

“Heh, I don't believe it. How could a prescription have all the other medicinal ingredients but for these few non-existent ones?”

“I argued with them and got into an argument.”

“Fortunately, a disciple from the Medicine King Sect passed by and overheard our argument. He was curious and asked us for the specific prescription.”

“Then, based on the medicinal principles, he chose a few common herbs as substitutes.”

“It’s only because of this that you, Little Junior Brother, could have this medicine!”

…

When he met Immortal Venerable Jicheng and received the reward of the Jade Tablet of Imperial Audience, Immortal Venerable Jicheng pointed to a “Green Cloud Willow” in his courtyard and asked him, Han Yi, and Xi Men Yue if they knew the details of this tree.

Han Yi and Xi Men Yue both did not know, only Li Fan, who had read the entire Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture, could answer it in one go.

Later, Immortal Venerable Jicheng gave Li Fan much guidance because of this.

Li Fan was puzzled at first, but after further investigation, he realized.

The hundreds of plants and creatures recorded in the Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture, such as Ink Ancient Bamboo, Green Field Wood, Unbounded Flower, Hundred Spirits Eagle, and Nine Refinements Deer, which should have been very common, had become rare in the current Xuanhuang Realm.

The Green Cloud Willow was now only found in small quantities in some areas of Luoyan State. Immortal Venerable Jicheng’s hometown was also Luoyan State. Jicheng mistakenly thought Li Fan was from the same hometown, thus he took extra care of him.

…

“Heavenly Physician is a cultivator from the Heavenly Law Realm. There are subtle differences in species between different cultivation realms. Therefore, many of the spiritual herbs I saw in the ‘Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture’ were not found in the ancient Xuanhuang Realm.
