Naturally, the disciples of the Dao Incarnation lineage asked all the surrounding cultivators, and all they got was the answer that such medicinal ingredients did not exist.”

“But the Green Cloud Willow, which was originally only found in the Heavenly Law Realm, now appears in certain states after many years. This is precisely a sign of the Heavenly Law merging with the Xuanhuang.”

“The intermingling of the two realms.”

“Two human skeletons at the bottom of the Congyun Sea, one is a native of Xuanhuang, and the other is the remains of a human from the Heavenly Law Realm. Although they are both human, they have subtle differences because they belong to different cultivation realms. This difference is so small that even with Elder Yin’s ability, he couldn’t study it.”

“Not only did the Congyun Sea come from the Heavenly Law Realm. Many more states in the Xuanhuang Realm also came from Heavenly Physician’s homeland.”

“The ‘Records of Ancient and Modern Mountains and Rivers’ written by Xi Men Yu deduced the changes in ancient and modern mountains and rivers. The Xuanhuang Realm did not expand outwards like it swallowed other small worlds and blessed lands, but rather it seemed to have been dismembered and then filled with fragments of other worlds in the gaps.”

Li Fan’s thoughts churned.

“In the Immortal Eradication Illusion, Ningyuan City and Zi Xiao Sect were not too far apart. But in the real world, Elder Bai’s underground secret chamber in Ningyuan City was deeply buried under Mount Taixu, while the ruins of Zi Xiao Sect were far away in Linlang State, in the central part of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Both were in the same state, but separated by thousands of years.”

“Merging, transforming.”

“It was like a precise surgical operation…”

“Heavenly Physician…”

“The Xuanhuang Realm underwent such earth-shattering changes in thousands of years. Ordinary cultivators had no way of knowing. Even those like Xi Men Yu, who were exceptionally talented and could see the truth through the mist, had their works banned by the Myriad Immortals Alliance and could not be spread.”

Piecing together all the clues, Li Fan roughly reconstructed a possible vague truth.

After the disappearance of King Xuan Tian and the destruction of the Xuan Tian Sect, the Xuanhuang Realm entered the era of the Ten Great Immortal Sects ruling.

However, the threat of the Immortal Ruins did not change with the change of power in the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Ten Great Immortal Sects still had to solve the danger of falling into the Immortal Ruins.

The “Floating Crossing Starry Sky Array” of the Xuan Tian Sect was clearly the most effective method.

Thus, the Ten Great Immortal Sects continued to promote the array, capturing other worlds in the void.

Finally, one day, they unexpectedly encountered the Heavenly Law Realm.

From the combat power of Tian Jue, Tian Yu, and others, the overall strength of the Heavenly Law Realm at that time was not much weaker than the Xuanhuang Realm.

Especially since the Xuanhuang Realm had already experienced internal strife, and its strongest cultivator, King Xuan Tian, and his twelve Dharma Kings were all uncertain of their lives and deaths.

The Heavenly Law Realm naturally would not sit idly by.

A massive bloody battle erupted between the two sides.

The Yun Shui Heavenly Palace in the Heavenly Law Realm and the Dao Incarnation in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Neither were particularly powerful sects, yet they almost exhausted all their disciples in this war.

“It is even possible that the Floating Crossing Starry Sky Array was damaged at that time.”

“In the later stages of the war, both sides were in a stalemate, unable to back down.”

“At this moment, Heavenly Physician planned to transform into ‘Dharma Transmission’ and infiltrate the Xuanhuang Realm, using the new law to shake its foundations and disintegrate Xuanhuang from within.”

“But for some unknown reason, by the time Dharma Transmission appeared on the land of Xuanhuang, a considerable amount of time had passed.”

“And by the time the Ten Great Immortal Sects were destroyed and the Xuanhuang Realm’s strength was greatly weakened…”

“When Heavenly Physician returned to the Heavenly Law Realm, he saw only ruins and devastation everywhere.”

…

Li Fan tried his best to reconstruct the history in the mist.

After a while, he frowned slightly.

Although most of it seemed to be connected, he still felt that a few things were not quite right.

“One is the timing of Dharma Transmission and Heavenly Physician’s appearance in the Xuanhuang Realm, or rather, there was a time difference in Heavenly Physician’s journey between the two realms.”

Recalling the strange journey at the Medicine King Sect, Li Fan couldn’t help but cast his gaze outside the Xuanhuang Realm towards the Immortal Ruins.

“Could it be due to the influence of the immortal power of the Immortal Ruins?”

“Besides this, there is another point of confusion. The Heavenly Dao of Xuanhuang should naturally produce some degree of rejection towards outsiders and foreign objects. Just like when merging worlds, strange phenomena would arise due to different laws.”

“If ‘Dharma Transmission’ was truly an outsider, then when he widely spread his teachings and attempted to subvert the world’s foundation, there would definitely be heavenly and earthly killing intent. Moreover, I recall that the Ten Great Immortal Sects had investigated Dharma Transmission’s background…”

“Although their true identities might not have been clearly identified, they shouldn't have been unable to determine whether he was a cultivator of the Xuanhuang Realm or not.”

“Dharma Transmission’s identity seems to be peculiar.”

…

At the summit of Jie Li Mountain, Li Fan stood for a long time, his thoughts in turmoil.

Half a month later, he finally emerged from his meditation.

He began to prepare for the plans of this life.

“Since I am to remain hidden behind the scenes, my original body will never reveal itself under any circumstances.”

“It is best to use a clone to create a target to attract attention.”

“Hmph, hmph, the Faceless Holy Emperor who unified tens of thousands of small worlds…”

Li Fan floated down the mountain and refined a clone using the vital blood of the young Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba.

“The ‘Heavenly Emperor Qi Scripture’ has no requirements for aptitude, and the cultivation talent of these two individuals is not too bad.”

“All memories related to ‘Returning to Truth’ and my own will be severed…”

As a faceless figure slowly took shape before Li Fan, he observed it for a long time and nodded with satisfaction.

“Destined Holy Emperor, conquer all heavens, and let all worlds submit.”

“Your name will be Li Ping!”

Li Fan thought this and his figure gradually faded.

When Clone Li Ping awoke, he first scanned his surroundings.

Then, as if thinking about something, he headed straight for the Great Xuan Imperial City.

Shortly thereafter, Li Fan’s original body slowly reappeared.

“Although he possesses the Nascent Soul realm, he lacks specific combat power. However, for the mortals of Great Xuan, this is more than enough.”

“The trajectory of Great Xuan in this life should be the same as before.”

“However, I will make minor adjustments.”

…

Li Fan gazed afar at the Eastern Xu Yuan of Great Xuan.

In fact, with his current cultivation of Outer Void Perfection, invincible among those below Longevity, and capable of fighting ordinary Longevity realm cultivators, he should not encounter any fatal dangers even if he went to the Xuanhuang Realm before ‘Returning to Truth’ was fully charged, as long as he did not actively court death.

But after thinking about it…

Li Fan shook his head and did not act impulsively.

“There is no rush.”

He turned back to the thatched cottage on the mountain peak and sat in meditation.

Chapter 1137: The Holy Dynasty Manifests Its Grandeur

If the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission had a clone suppressing the Xuanhuang Realm, there would be no possibility of a large-scale war between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Five Elder Council.

Perhaps, the Five Elder Council was a tool deliberately indulged by Dharma Transmission to maintain the delicate balance of the Xuanhuang Realm. He actually didn't care about the wars between them, and might even be happy to see them.

However, the Xuanhuang Realm harbored too many demons and monsters, and the Immortal Ruins were looming in the distance.

In a situation where the Xuanhuang Realm could be destroyed with a single disagreement, it was undoubtedly more appropriate to leave a clone in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Yet, the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission, who viewed the Xuanhuang Realm as a treasure, inexplicably did not do so.

Li Fan's two experiences of destroying the world both saw Dharma Transmission arrive late from beyond the heavens, letting out a powerless roar.

The other time, he didn't appear at all, only the Heavenly Physician showed up.

This seemed very strange.

Was refining a clone so difficult for Dharma Transmission?

Although clone techniques were rare in the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan could stir up trouble repeatedly through them.

Let alone the progenitor of the new law?

He could have easily done it, yet he did not...

In fact, although the cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm dared not discuss it openly, they privately speculated a lot about why the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission did not leave a clone to suppress the realm.

It was nothing more than that Dharma Transmission had transcended worldly matters and was no longer as concerned about everything in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Clearly, they understood neither the Xuanhuang Realm nor the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission.

But in Li Fan's opinion, if the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission himself was a clone...

Then everything would make sense.

It was not that he did not want to, but that he could not!

In the 119th life, his clone Li Qing's strength had already become infinitely close to his main body, reaching the peak of Nascent Soul.

It was just one step away from surpassing his main body.

At that time, Li Fan had the question arise in his heart: "Can a clone's strength surpass the main body?"

Later, with the original authority of the Heavenly Xuan Mirror, he consulted various ancient texts, and Li Fan gained some enlightenment.

A clone's strength surpassing the main body, and a clone refining another clone.

The latter should be more difficult to achieve.

Because if a clone could also refine its own clone, then it could be extended indefinitely. The ultimate outcome would be that only one person existed in the entire world.

It was not absolutely impossible, but it exceeded the limits of mortal laws.

Compared to that, a clone's strength surpassing the main body was easier to achieve.

"Heavenly Physician, Dharma Transmission..."

Two faces appeared in Li Fan's mind. He suddenly remembered seeing the likeness of the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission in a phantom when he first entered the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters.

At that time, his body's instincts had spontaneously warned him due to a sense of familiarity.

And before that, the only existence above the Integration realm he had encountered in the Xuanhuang Realm was the Heavenly Physician.

"Although the faces are not the same, there is a subtle similarity between them."

"There was a trace of the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission's aura remaining in the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. Those who went there for the first time would feel something and have hallucinations. My main body saw the likeness of the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission, while the clone Li Qing saw..."

The Dao Dissolution Stone emitted a faint white light, faithfully reproducing the recorded images from that time.

In a blurry mass of light, several figures stood.

Fragmented conversations could be heard from within.

"Going this time, what are your chances?"

"I'll do my best and leave the rest to fate."

"That's not like you to say."

"The disparity in strength is too great, I can only fight with my life."

"Fine, go then. I don't know if it's good or bad fortune."

...

Li Fan recalled the scene he saw in his confused consciousness when he healed Hanhai in the 119th life.

"Venerable Heavenly Physician has been gone for a long time. I don't know if this matter can be accomplished." Hanhai sat solemnly on the main hall of the sect, while the turtle and snake Taiyi, no bigger than an ordinary turtle at his feet, said dejectedly.

"Venerable Heavenly Physician said before he left that this matter has at least a 90% chance of success. We should have some confidence in Him." Unlike Taiyi's worried expression, Hanhai seemed very relaxed, comforting him with a smile.

...

Li Fan stroked his chin.

Under the premise of the hypothesis that "Dharma Transmission is a clone of the Heavenly Physician," all the fragmented clues obtained in the past instantly connected.

Li Fan re-examined his past memories.

Indeed, he found more clues.

...

Yinyin Island.

Yin Shangren pointed to two human skeletons he had collected and said in a very low voice to Li Fan, "These two people are not of the same kind."

"Not of the same kind?" Li Fan was stunned. "What do you mean?"

Yin Shangren gestured with his hands and thought for a moment, seemingly unable to find suitable words to describe it.

After struggling for a long time, he suddenly clenched his fist, his face full of distress. "It's just a feeling, you know? They are clearly both human, but these two humans lived in different eras and different regions. Perhaps they looked similar, and I dug them both out from the bottom of the Congyun Sea, but there is an extremely special boundary that marks the difference between these two skeletons..."

Yin Shangren spoke mysteriously, but after a long time, he couldn't articulate it clearly.

...

During the second imitation process of Tianyang's eternal remnant thoughts.

In order to escape Tianyang's frail body as much as possible and recover from his coma as soon as possible, Li Fan studied the "Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture," prescribed himself a formula, and instructed his senior brother to refine it.

It was indeed effective. However, when he woke up later, his second senior brother Ling Xiao told him this.

"Junior brother, you were lucky. Several of the medicinal ingredients in the formula you gave were unheard of. We asked all the surrounding markets, but we couldn't find anyone selling them. Some even said that these herbs simply didn't exist in the cultivation world."

"Heh heh, I didn't believe it. How could a medicinal formula have all the other herbs but these few ingredients don't exist?"

"I argued with the other party and got into an argument."

"Fortunately, a disciple from the Medicine King Sect passed by at that time. Hearing our argument, he curiously asked us for the specific formula."

"Then, based on the medicinal principles, he selected several common herbs as substitutes."

"It was only then that junior brother could take this medicine!"

...

When he met the Extreme Success Immortal Venerable and received the reward of the Jade Tablet of Audience, Extreme Success Immortal Venerable had pointed to a [Azure Cloud Willow] in his courtyard and asked him, Han Yi, and Xi Men Yue if they knew the details of this tree.

Han Yi and Xi Men Yue both did not know, only Li Fan, who had read the Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture thoroughly, answered immediately.

Later, Extreme Success Immortal Venerable gave Li Fan much guidance because of this.

Li Fan was initially confused. After further investigation, he realized.

The Ink Ancient Bamboo, Azure Field Wood, Unwrought Flower, Hundred Spirits Eagle, Nine Refinements Deer, and other hundreds of plants and creatures recorded in the Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture. These plants and animals, which should have been very common, had become scarce in the current Xuanhuang Realm.

The Azure Cloud Willow was now only found in small numbers in some areas of Luoyan Prefecture. Extreme Success Immortal Venerable's hometown was also in Luoyan Prefecture. Extreme Success mistook Li Fan for a fellow townsman at the time. That's why he gave him extra care. ...

"The Heavenly Physician is a cultivator from the Heavenly Law Realm. There will be subtle differences in species between different cultivation realms. Therefore, many spiritual herbs I saw in the 'Heavenly Physician Immortal Scripture' were not found in the ancient Xuanhuang Realm. His disciples naturally asked all the surrounding cultivators, and the answers they received were that such herbs did not exist."

"However, the Azure Cloud Willow, which was originally only found in the Heavenly Law Realm, has now appeared in some prefectures after many years. This is a sign of the Heavenly Law integrating into the Xuanhuang.

"The fusion of the two realms."

"The two human skeletons at the bottom of the Congyun Sea, one is a native of Xuanhuang, and the other is the remains of a human from the Heavenly Law Realm. Although they are both human, they have subtle differences because they belong to different cultivation realms. These differences are so small that even with Yin Shangren's ability, he could not study them."

"Not only did the Congyun Sea originate from the Heavenly Law Realm, but more prefectures in the Xuanhuang Realm also came from the Heavenly Physician's hometown."

"The 'Chronicles of Ancient and Modern Rivers and Mountains' written by Xi Men Yu calculated the changes in ancient and modern rivers and mountains. The Xuanhuang Realm does not seem to expand outward by devouring other small worlds and grotto-heavens. Instead, it seems to have been dismembered and then filled with fragments of other worlds in the gaps."

Li Fan's thoughts churned.

"In the Immortal Fallen Illusion, Ningyuan City and the Purple Cloud Sect are not too far apart. But in the real world, Mr. Bai's underground secret chamber in Ningyuan City is buried deep beneath Mount Taixu, while the ruins of the Purple Cloud Sect are far away in Linlang Prefecture in the central part of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Both were once in the same prefecture, but now, thousands of years later, they are in different corners of the world."

"Integration and transformation."

"It's like performing precise surgery..."

"Heavenly Physician..."

"The Xuanhuang Realm has undergone such earth-shattering changes in thousands of years. Ordinary cultivators have no way of noticing. Even those with extraordinary talent like Xi Men Yu, who can see through the truth from the mist, have their works banned by the Myriad Immortals Alliance and cannot be spread."

By piecing together all the clues, Li Fan roughly restored a possible vague truth.

After King Xuan's disappearance and the annihilation of the Xuan Clan, the Xuanhuang Realm entered an era ruled by the Ten Immortal Sects.

However, the threat of the Immortal Ruins had not changed with the change of power in the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Ten Immortal Sects still had to solve the danger of falling into the Immortal Ruins.

The Xuan Clan's "Great Array of Crossing the Void" was clearly the most effective method.

Thus, the Ten Immortal Sects continued to push the array, capturing other worlds in the void.

Finally, one day, they unexpectedly encountered the Heavenly Law Realm.

From the combat power of Tian Jue, Tian Yu, and others, the overall strength of the Heavenly Law Realm at that time was not much weaker than the Xuanhuang Realm.

Especially since the Xuanhuang Realm had gone through an internal strife, where the supreme expert King Xuan and his twelve law kings were all at large or missing.

The Heavenly Law Realm naturally would not sit idly by.

A massive and extremely large-scale bloody battle broke out between the two sides.

The Cloud Water Heavenly Palace in the Heavenly Law Realm and the Dao Manifestation in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Neither were particularly powerful sects, yet they both sacrificed almost all their disciples in this war.

"Even the Great Array of Crossing the Void might have been damaged at that time."

"In the later stages of the war, both sides were in a stalemate, unable to retreat."

"At this point, the Heavenly Physician decided to devise a plan to "create Dharma" and infiltrate the Xuanhuang Realm, using the new law to shake its foundation and disintegrate Xuanhuang from the inside."

"But for some unknown reason, by the time Dharma appeared on the land of Xuanhuang, a considerable amount of time had already passed."

"And by the time the Ten Immortal Sects were annihilated and the Xuanhuang Realm's strength was greatly depleted..."

"When the Heavenly Physician returned to the Heavenly Law Realm, he saw only ruins and devastation everywhere."

...

Li Fan did his best to reconstruct the history in the mist.

Shortly after, he frowned slightly.

Although most of it seemed to connect, he still felt a few things were amiss.

"One is the timing of Dharma and Heavenly Physician's appearance in the Xuanhuang Realm, or rather, there was a time difference in Heavenly Physician's travel between the two realms."

Recalling the strange journey to the Medicine King Sect, Li Fan couldn't help but cast his gaze towards the Immortal Ruins outside the Xuanhuang Realm.

"Could it be the influence of the immortal energy of the Immortal Ruins?"

"Besides this, there is another point of confusion. The Heavenly Dao of Xuanhuang should naturally produce some degree of rejection towards outsiders and foreign objects. Just like the birth of anomalies during the process of merging worlds due to different laws."

"If Dharma were truly an outsider, then when he preached extensively and tried to subvert the world's foundation, there would definitely be heavenly and earthly killing intent. Moreover, I remember the Ten Immortal Sects had investigated Dharma's background..."

"Although their true identity might not have been completely ascertained. But they wouldn't be unable to figure out whether he was a cultivator from the Xuanhuang Realm or not."

"Dharma's identity seems to be peculiar."

...

On the peak of Jie Li Mountain, Li Fan stood for a long time, his thoughts unsettled.

Half a month later, he finally emerged from his meditation.

He began to prepare for this life's plans.

"Since I'm hiding behind the scenes, my main body will never show itself under any circumstances."

"Using a clone as a target to attract attention would be perfect."

"Hmph, the Faceless Holy Emperor who unified tens of thousands of small worlds..."

Li Fan gracefully descended the mountain and refined a clone using the blood essence of the young Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba.

"The Overlord's Heavenly Emperor Scripture has no requirements for talent. Moreover, the cultivation talents of these two are not too bad."

"All memories related to 'Returning to Truth' and my own will be erased..."

As a faceless figure slowly took shape before Li Fan, and after observing it for a long time, Li Fan nodded with satisfaction.

"The divinely appointed Holy Emperor, conquering all heavens, and all worlds submitting."

"Your name shall be Li Ping!"

Li Fan thought this, and his figure gradually faded.

When the clone Li Ping awoke, he first scanned his surroundings.

Then, as if contemplating something, he headed straight for the Great Xuan Imperial City.

Shortly thereafter, Li Fan’s original body slowly reappeared.

"Although he possesses the Nascent Soul realm, he lacks specific combat power. However, for the mortals of Great Xuan, this is more than enough."

"The trajectory of Great Xuan in this life should be the same as before."

"However, I will make minor adjustments."

...

Li Fan gazed afar at the Eastern Xu Yuan of Great Xuan.

In fact, with his current cultivation of Outer Void Perfection, invincible among those below Longevity, and capable of fighting ordinary Longevity realm cultivators, he should not encounter any fatal dangers even if he went to the Xuanhuang Realm before ‘Returning to Truth’ was fully charged, as long as he did not actively court death.

But after thinking about it…

Li Fan shook his head and did not act impulsively.

“There is no rush.”

He turned back to the thatched cottage on the mountain peak and sat in meditation.

The changes of heaven and earth, the transformation of yin and yang, reside in a single heart…

Li Fan’s true body hovered above Mount Jieli, looking down upon the Great Xuan realm, sensing the intertwining between the coming changes within his body and the world outside. He couldn't help but sigh inwardly.

"Perhaps the Heavenly Doctor used a similar method to dismember and alter the Xuanhuang Realm back then."

"If he hadn't taken the first step, with my current strength, I could have actually carried out localized modifications to the Xuanhuang Realm."

At this time, one year had been anchored.

The clone, Li Ping, proceeded according to plan to Xuanjing City. With lightning speed, he assassinated the decadent ruler, followed the will of heaven, and established a new dynasty.

The dynasty in this life was not a tool built in haste to escape the Faceless True Immortal.

Instead, it was to prepare for investigating the true identity of the person who transmitted the Dharma.

Naturally, it had to be done formally, and the old dynastic name could not be used.

Therefore, seven days later, Li Ping announced to the world through his techniques that the new dynasty was named [Qi].

As [Imperial Thrones] rose from the ground in various parts of Great Xuan, the absolute authority of the Qi Dynasty was rapidly established among the populace.

Especially after the [Heaven and Earth Furnace] was forged and placed within the Imperial Thrones, the spiritual energy concentration of Great Qi increased daily.

Furthermore, Li Fan’s true body, during the spiritual energy recovery, quietly used his own immense spiritual power to accelerate and transform this process.

"What I am releasing in Great Qi is one of the natural changes that occurred in the Xuanhuang Realm after the world-ending crisis in my previous life."

In Li Fan’s vision at this moment, the small world of Great Qi was like a block of uncarved stone, constantly changing its image under the shaping of his hands.

"When heaven and earth transform, heroes emerge. Because heroes are often born in accordance with the will of heaven and are favored by it, their potential and talents are usually far beyond ordinary people. In the folklore of the mortal world, there is often talk of heroes of troubled times being celestial constellations descended to earth. The principle is actually the same."

"This transformation is called [Heaven Opens Its Favor, and the Stars Descend]."

As the power of the World's Coming Changes within his body dissipated, Li Fan could also clearly feel the changes occurring in the Great Qi world under the influence of this power.

In the coming decades, true children of destiny, like Mr. Bai and Su Yuqing, would emerge like bamboo shoots after a spring rain.

The actual innate talent of a child of destiny is closely related to the strength of the world.

As a person of destiny, Mr. Bai was naturally far superior to Su Yuqing, who was from the Mortal Realm.

The batch of children of destiny born in Great Qi might be slightly weaker at the beginning compared to the prodigies of the Xuanhuang Realm.

However, as Li Fan continuously transformed Great Qi and the small world gradually upgraded, the quality of geniuses in Great Qi would gradually catch up to and surpass those of the Xuanhuang Realm!

"This is the change of the resonance between heaven and man, the way of nurturing man with heaven."

Li Fan carefully observed the subtle changes as the world was slowly shaped in his hands, a sense of pride and detachment rising in his heart.

"This is truly changing heaven and earth with a mere turn of the wrist."

"What I am changing now is merely a mortal's small world. I truly wonder what it would feel like to casually knead the Xuanhuang Realm like the Heavenly Doctor did…"

World and man.

Vastness and insignificance.

But now, insignificant humans were, in turn, shaping the world.

This intensely contrasting joy was even more satisfying than the improvement of cultivation or realm.

It almost made Li Fan lose himself in it, unable to extricate himself.

Fortunately, the Xuanhuang Immortal Heart Incantation operated on its own, awakening Li Fan shortly thereafter.

"Hmm… this is the confusion that naturally arises after grasping power that does not originally belong to one's own level."

"If one were to indulge in it continuously, it is highly possible to be assimilated by the world's heavenly dao, losing self-awareness and becoming a part of the world's heavenly dao."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes and pondered.

While shaping the brand new Great Qi mortal world, Li Fan also discovered that the World's Coming Changes was not a power that would persist indefinitely.

"As the world operates according to its changes, this part of the energy will be consumed. For example, the [Heaven Opens Its Favor, and the Stars Descend] that I activated, if there is no further reinforcement, it will likely only last for about fifty years based on the initial driving force, or even less due to various unexpected factors."

…

During the time Li Fan was waiting for Huizhen to complete its charging, he had been contemplating and comprehending the principles of the world's heavenly dao and his future path.

Within the Great Qi Dynasty, terrifying changes were happening moment by moment.

One year anchored, [Purification Spirit Pools] were being built everywhere, accompanied by a cultivation method called the [Clear Heart Incantation].

The populace everywhere could go to the spirit pools and, with the aid of the Clear Heart Incantation's power, expel the mortal miasma from their bodies.

Two years anchored, the spiritual energy concentration in Great Qi had already reached the average level of the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Fated Holy Emperor appeared in the sky, personally bestowing immortal techniques upon all beings.

It was named [Enlightenment Spirit Yuan Gong].

Any citizen of Great Qi who shed their mortal form could cultivate it.

Those who achieved minor success in the cultivation method could go to Shengjing and meet the Fated Holy Emperor, receiving his personal guidance.

At the same time, in a secret underground base in Shengjing City, tens of thousands of robust soldiers began to temper their bodies and absorb the power of exotic beasts using the [Forge of Creation Gong].

Three years anchored, the Fated Holy Emperor issued a policy encouraging childbirth.

Families with three or more children would have their taxes halved.

For more, the court would provide additional rewards.

To support this policy, [Holy Medical Offices] were gradually established throughout Great Qi.

The physicians in the Holy Medical Offices were all cultivators who had embarked on the path of immortality. They had personally received medical knowledge from the Fated Holy Emperor and were all highly skilled. While they might not be able to bring the dead back to life or flesh to the bones, they could easily resolve common illnesses and the various dangers encountered during childbirth.

In addition to the [Holy Medical Offices], buildings like [Holy Academies] and [Holy Heart Halls] were slowly being constructed.

As the name suggests, the Holy Academies were places of learning.

Through synchronized image transmission, citizens of Great Qi in every city could receive direct instruction from renowned masters in Shengjing City at their local Holy Academies. Even the great Fated Holy Emperor would occasionally give lectures.

The Holy Emperor's gaze seemed to see all beings in heaven and earth simultaneously.

When he lectured, he would also ask questions to students in various locations.

Those who were too nervous and couldn't answer were not reprimanded; instead, they were kindly encouraged.

As time passed, the Fated Holy Emperor's status in the hearts of the people became increasingly lofty and unshakeable.

Consequently, the number of people visiting the Holy Heart Hall to pray grew daily.

Within the Holy Heart Hall stood a towering statue of the Fated Holy Emperor.

Its face was indistinct, but its aura was sacred and not to be profaned.

The citizens of Great Qi who had worries, desires, or regrets…

Nothing could be unsaid to the Holy Emperor.

The Holy Emperor was all-encompassing and would not blame anyone.

It was even rumored that he would occasionally bestow his grace, resolving the worries of his faithful followers silently.

While the dynasty implemented various benevolent measures, necessary punitive institutions were not absent.

The Holy Supervision Court monitored the world, and any act that violated the laws of the dynasty would be met with the most severe punishment.

The most terrifying punishment was not death, but having one's consciousness extracted and being imprisoned in the Holy Heart Hall.

For all eternity, they would have to face the scoldings of the people of Great Qi.

…

The entire Great Qi Dynasty was like a flying boat with increasingly powerful propulsion, its strength surging forward and growing daily.

However, it had not launched any external wars, merely accumulating strength.

Early in the eighth year anchored.

Seeing that Huizhen had completed its charge, Li Fan rose abruptly.

He stretched his muscles and bones, then headed towards the Eastern Xu Yuan.

Hiding in the background did not mean he had to stay in the Great Qi small world forever.

Just like in the final moments of the 119th life, he hid in the Nether Prison.

The enemy's territory, the place under the brightest light, might be the safest and most unexpected location.

Upon arriving at the familiar Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan did not stop. He transformed into a blur of light and headed straight for Tianyu Prefecture.

According to the secret information previously spied through the Heavenly Profound Mirror, in Tianyu Prefecture, there was an identity that was perfectly suited for disguise.

In the central part of Tianyu, the Luojia Mountain Range.

Inside an underground cave.

Li Fan, like a wraith, silently infiltrated.

After discerning the surrounding fluctuations in energy, he revealed a faint smile.

"Nascent Soul cultivator Sun Ang discovered the Soul of Heaven and Earth here."

"He used formations to seal the underground cave and spent a full three years alone wearing down the Soul of Heaven and Earth to death."

"Ultimately achieving the Dao Integration Immortal Venerable realm."

"Sun Ang's family held important positions in the Law Protector Hall for generations. Shortly after he became a Dao Integration Immortal Venerable, he was selected to enter the headquarters of the Law Protector Hall to guard the Yanfa Jade, becoming one of the elders I encountered when I met Yanfa Jade in the past."

"The Soul of Heaven and Earth refined by Sun Ang is very mysterious. After achieving Dao Integration, he has never made another move, and his true capabilities are even unknown to me."

"But it doesn't matter…"

As Li Fan's thoughts raced, he had already located his target.

The originally pitch-black underground cave suddenly became colorful.

Sun Ang sat cross-legged, his expression solemn, his hands continuously forming seals.

He sent out streams of multicolored rainbow light, carefully binding the silhouette in front of him.

The Soul of Heaven and Earth, for some reason, was dormant.

It seemed completely unaware of Sun Ang's small movements, allowing him to act.

"Soul of Heaven and Earth, Zilong."

"Chosen by celestial mandate, to foster the Luojia Thousand Crystals and Hundred Flowers…"

The moment Li Fan saw the silhouette of the Soul of Heaven and Earth, he understood its essence.

"The Luojia Thousand Crystals and Hundred Flowers is a famous scenic spot in the Luojia Mountains. Appearing once every five hundred years, born from the earth, covering the mountains and plains like flowers. In reality, they are special crystals like spirit stones…" All sorts of information flashed through Li Fan's mind.

"One of the orders of heaven and earth, not of much consequence to me."

In fact, Li Fan had no intention of making a move on this Soul of Heaven and Earth.

He looked at Sun Ang, who was engrossed in the spellcasting to imprison Zilong, his eyes flashing.

He instantly laid down a heavy formation, trapping Sun Ang in the center.

At this moment, Sun Ang was startled awake.

"What…"

Before he could utter a sound, his vision went black, and he lost consciousness.

He roamed through Sun Ang's sea of consciousness, examining all his memories.

Then, he extracted a trace of Sun Ang's vital blood and casually suppressed it within his own inner world.

Li Fan then activated the Profound True Spirit Transformation, changing into Sun Ang's appearance.

Chapter 1139: Sun Family's Hidden Moves

Li Fan lay on the bed with his eyes closed, as if he hadn't heard Wu Ninglu's words at all.

Wu Ninglu's beautiful eyes darted about, about to shed her clothes and climb into bed with him.

However, just as her body was about to approach Li Fan, a bone-chilling coldness caused her to involuntarily shiver and instinctively step back.

Upon closer inspection, Wu Ninglu was horrified to find that a layer of frost had formed on her skin in that instant.

If she hadn't dodged instinctively, Wu Ninglu had no doubt that she would have been frozen into an ice sculpture by her husband!

She was both happy and angry.

With a thousand words left unspoken, Li Fan suddenly spoke faintly, "I've just broken through and can't perfectly control my power yet. You should avoid approaching me casually for now."

Rejected in her attempt to offer warmth, Wu Ninglu was no longer angry.

Her face lit up with joy, and she nodded repeatedly, "Good, good. I didn't expect my Sun Lang to give me such a big surprise upon reappearing after disappearing for more than half a year. Such a major event must be announced to the entire clan."

As Wu Ninglu was about to leave, she saw an ice wall blocking the door, obstructing her path.

Turning her head, she looked at Li Fan.

Li Fan's eyes were still closed, but he said something seemingly unrelated.

"Have the three elders in the family decided who will take the position in the Law Enforcement Hall?"

Wu Ninglu paused for a moment, then immediately reacted.

"The Family Head naturally cannot leave. My eldest uncle and third uncle have been pushing it back and forth for a while, but it was recently decided that my eldest uncle ultimately couldn't compete and compromised..."

Speaking of this, Wu Ninglu couldn't help but retract her steps.

"Our branch is not particularly favored within the clan. If my promotion to the Dao Integration stage gets out, I'm afraid I'll have to go to the Law Enforcement Hall on their behalf. I'll be confined for at least three hundred years..."

"Hmph."

"If I hadn't been injured during my advancement, my realm would be unstable, and I'd be afraid of being discovered by outsiders and having my achievements stolen. I wouldn't have returned so rashly."

Li Fan sighed faintly.

"Although taking office in the Law Enforcement Hall will provide a certain material compensation from both the clan and the Immortal Alliance, that is basically useless to me now. Moreover, three hundred years is far too long."

Li Fan suddenly opened his eyes and looked at Wu Ninglu.

"Therefore, my promotion should not be leaked for the time being."

Her gaze met Li Fan's, and Wu Ninglu's body trembled violently, and she nodded involuntarily.

Li Fan closed his eyes again to recover.

Silence fell upon the room once more.

With a faint, ice-sealing aura surrounding him, Wu Ninglu had to circulate her spiritual energy with all her might to maintain her body temperature.

Crouching in the corner of the room, Wu Ninglu felt both wronged and envious.

"Is this the might of Dao Integration? I never thought he would reach the Dao Integration stage. I originally thought Sun Weizhou would be the first to break through among the younger generation."

Wu Ninglu looked at her husband, who was recuperating and cultivating, with a myriad of thoughts racing through her mind.

Only when the surging aura on his body gradually calmed down, yet he still remained silent and meditating with his eyes closed, did Wu Ninglu, in a huff, quietly leave the room.

...

"If I'm not mistaken, soon this foolish woman will leak the news that her Dao companion has already become a Dao Integration expert."

"It's just for the little bit of benefit promised by Sun Luchang."

"It's not entirely accurate to say she's that foolish. After all, benefits held in one's own hands are real. As long as Sun Ang is a Dao Integration expert, no matter where he is, others will treat his wife, the lady of Dao Integration, with respect." Li Fan's gaze was distant, as if he could see through time.

Indeed, as Li Fan had predicted.

Half a month later, after personally witnessing the generous conditions that her eldest uncle and third uncle promised each other to avoid taking up positions in the Law Enforcement Hall, Wu Ninglu couldn't help but be tempted.

After all, she and Sun Ang had not had a particularly good life in the past. They had no say in the clan's decisions, and good things always went to others first.

However, due to Li Fan's previous instructions, she did not speak up directly.

But Wu Ninglu's unusual expression did not escape the notice of the few Dao Integration elders of the Sun family.

Coupled with the faint fluctuation that Li Fan had deliberately released when he returned earlier, it made them vaguely suspect something.

After some questioning, Wu Ninglu, half-heartedly, revealed the matter.

Sun Luchang was overjoyed and immediately pulled his two brothers to visit them.

Li Fan feigned a look of helplessness and anger, looking at Wu Ninglu.

The three Dao Integration elders, however, actively interceded for her.

Then, they persuaded Li Fan through reason and emotion, taking turns to reason with him.

For the overall benefit of the clan, he reluctantly agreed to go to the Law Enforcement Hall in their stead.

"Don't worry, Lu'er. During your absence, we will take good care of Ninglu and will not let her suffer any grievances." Sun Luchang promised.

Lu'er was Sun Ang's childhood name.

Logically speaking, even as elders and fellow Dao Integration cultivators, it was inappropriate to call him by his childhood name as before. However, Sun Luchang continued to do so to remind "Sun Ang" of his status as a disciple of the Sun family.

To ensure that Sun Ang could pass the review of the Myriad Immortal Alliance, the three Dao Integration elders of the Sun family joined forces to test Sun Ang's actual combat strength.

Li Fan primarily focused on defense, occasionally casting one or two spells of moderate power.

After several hundred rounds, he gradually showed signs of weakness.

"Lu'er, the essence of heaven and earth you have absorbed is truly extraordinary. Although its offensive power is lacking, the domain that freezes everything around can block most offensive techniques."

The three Dao Integration elders of the Sun family were very satisfied with Li Fan's performance.

Even as a newly promoted Dao Integration cultivator, this level of strength was sufficient to satisfy the Immortal Alliance.

Before Li Fan left for the headquarters of the Myriad Immortal Alliance, he quietly called Wu Ninglu to his side.

"I know you've been avoiding me lately, are you afraid I'll blame you?"

"How can that be?"

"In fact, I also know that even if you didn't say anything, the news of my promotion to Dao Integration wouldn't be hidden for long. Some things are unavoidable."

"Besides, you and I are one. After I worked hard for three hundred years, it's nothing to get some benefits for you."

Wu Ninglu was greatly surprised by Li Fan's words and was momentarily stunned.

She was even somewhat moved.

"While I'm away, you should still be careful on your own."

"Those old guys in the family say nice things, but their actual actions are uncertain."

"During this trip, I met a good friend. He helped me a lot in my breakthrough."

As Li Fan spoke, he handed over a communication jade slip.

"If you encounter any problems that you can't solve, contact him."

"He should be able to help you resolve them."

"However, this person is also a Dao Integration cultivator and has a peculiar personality. Don't bother him unless it's absolutely necessary."

"Remember, remember."

——

The next chapter will be around 1 AM. My hand is injured, so typing is a bit slow.

Wu Ninglu put away the jade slip from Li Fan, wanting to speak but hesitating.

"It's only three hundred years! I'm going!"

Li Fan waved his hand and said no more.

He followed the Sun family patriarch to the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

The jade slip given to Wu Ninglu, besides acting as a communication talisman, was essentially a miniaturized aggregation array.

It contained a split soul of Li Fan.

This allowed for comprehensive surveillance of Wu Ninglu, while its primary purpose was to plant an eye in the outside world and constantly monitor the movements of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

The split soul possessed the origin of the Sky Profound Mirror, allowing it to remain hidden within the Sky Profound Mirror and constantly oversee the situation within the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

After all, during the period of guarding the Creation Jade Slip, it might have been completely isolated, making it difficult to even use the Sky Profound Mirror.

And his main body was in the Great Qi Minor World, rarely venturing out.

It was necessary to leave a contingency.

With Li Fan's current strength, this split soul had combat power comparable to an ordinary Dao Integration cultivator.

The only drawback was that, unlike normal cultivators, it couldn't recover quickly after combat.

Without replenishment from the main body, for every bit of power used, there was one less bit.

As for the friend Li Fan mentioned to Wu Ninglu...

It was naturally the Holy Embryo created by him.

However, without the infusion of the True Immortal Net and Origin Essence, the Holy Embryo had only just managed to break through to the Qi Refining realm.

Li Fan had sent it into the ruins of the Sky Sword Sect to subdue the marvel of the Black Sword Heaven.

With previous experience, there shouldn't be any problems, only requiring patience.

...

The patriarch of the Sun family, Sun Xingyao, had been in Dao Integration for over five hundred years.

In his youth, he had also guarded the Creation Jade Slip.

On their way to the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, he introduced the details of this "job" to Li Fan.

"The Creation Jade Slip is the foundation of our Immortal Alliance. Although we are at the headquarters, which seems incredibly safe, we must constantly guard against the tricks of the wicked.

"In the past thousand years, the Five Elders Council has planned at least three operations targeting the Creation Jade Slip. They tried in every way to approach it and then used a technique called a 'curse' to launch mental and spiritual attacks on it.

"The Creation Jade Slip, she..."

"Her defense against such attacks is almost non-existent. Once hit, it means at least a century of stagnation. The last time the Five Elders Council succeeded, the Immortal Alliance suffered heavy losses. And yet, this matter could not be publicized, causing the exchange price of cultivation techniques in the Sky Profound Mirror to nearly double. Immortal Alliance cultivators grumbled incessantly..." Sun Xingyao recalled the events of his youth and shook his head in dismay.

"So, your task is not as simple as it appears."

"Patriarch, what would happen if, during my tenure, these malicious attacks were not stopped and the Creation Jade Slip was damaged?" Li Fan asked.

Sun Xingyao's forward steps immediately stopped.

He looked back at Li Fan and paused before saying, "Regardless, the promise remains unchanged. We will take good care of Ninglu. You can rest assured and go."

Li Fan was momentarily speechless.

He hadn't realized before that this Sun Xingyao had quite a sense of humor.

As the scenery shifted, Li Fan once again found himself back at the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters.

As before, visions appeared before him.

However...

This time, it was different from the previous vision of the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable's statue.

On an endless field, smoke curled from cooking fires. On the roof of a farmhouse lay a young boy who looked very simple and honest.

His eyes were unfocused, staring at the sky, as if deep in thought.

"Gou Dan, come down for dinner."

The scene ended there.

Emerging from the vision, Li Fan couldn't help but be slightly stunned.

Sun Xingyao, thinking he was shocked by the incredibly realistic illusion, explained, "There is a trace of the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable's aura remaining at the Immortal Alliance headquarters, so..."

Li Fan was already aware of this. He was thinking about something else.

"That simple and honest boy named Gou Dan..."

"Was he the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable in his youth?"

Recalling the brief image he had just seen, it did bear some resemblance to the older Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable.

"Could it be that Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable was a native of the Xuanhuang Realm?"

"No."

Li Fan replayed that short segment of the scene several times.

"The face of this Gou Dan, no matter how you look at it, has no connection to the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable who once dominated the Xuanhuang world for a generation."

"That confused gaze, and the subsequent huge turning point in his life trajectory, seem more like..."

A word suddenly appeared in Li Fan's mind.

Transmigration.

"If my previous guess is correct, then this young man named Gou Dan should be Heavenly Doctor soul transmigration?"

"Coming from the Heavenly Law Realm, with consciousness dormant from the womb. Only awakening years later."

"Was this how he escaped the pursuit of the Ten Immortal Sects and the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao?"

Just as Li Fan, in the eyes of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, was undoubtedly a native cultivator,

At that time, Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable, no matter how the outside world investigated, did not reveal his true identity.

Li Fan didn't understand the mechanism behind "transmigration."

But he was very clear that it was definitely different from simple possession.

"Through some secret technique, he deceived the heavens and became a native of the Xuanhuang Realm."

Li Fan's thoughts slowly churned.

As he was thinking, Sun Xingyao casually inquired about the illusion he had seen.

Li Fan naturally replied with the vision of the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable's statue he had seen before.

Upon hearing this, Sun Xingyao nodded slightly, "It seems your future achievements, Lu'er, are destined to surpass mine."

Without waiting for Li Fan to ask, he proactively explained, "Every cultivator who comes here for the first time sees different illusions.

"It is said to be closely related to one's fundamental path. As everyone knows, all cultivation techniques in the world come from the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable. Therefore, the closer the vision is to the Heavenly Venerable, the more boundless the future prospects.

"It is said that some true geniuses can see the scene of the Heavenly Venerable's first discourse back in the day..."

Sun Xingyao said with envy.

Li Fan remained silent, his vigilance suddenly rising.

This time, his strength had increased rapidly, and he had glimpsed the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable in his youth.

If he went any further, he might directly arouse the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable's aura's suspicion.

The two traversed the void of the Immortal Alliance headquarters, utilizing formations.

Soon, they arrived at the headquarters of the Law Enforcement Hall.

"Follow me," Sun Xingyao commanded softly, forming a hand seal.

An invisible force field instantly enveloped him and Li Fan.

The spiritual energy within their bodies, which had become dormant due to the "Spirit Transformation Stone" beneath their feet, became active again.

"It has a certain suppressive effect on me, but it's not as obvious as it was at lower realms."

"If a fight were to break out, I would still be invincible among Dao Integration cultivators."

Li Fan felt at ease and followed Sun Xingyao into the Law Enforcement Hall.

Unlike before, when they were in the waiting space using the "Jade Token of Audience,"

They had now truly entered the Law Enforcement Hall.

The circular dome was densely covered with countless starlike points.

Upon closer inspection, those starlike points resembled countless tiny windows. Through these windows, varying scenes were reflected. Countless characters fluttered, clearly representing various cultivation techniques. Under the dome, no cultivators from the Law Enforcement Hall were visible; only streams of light continuously traversed the space.

The Patriarch of the Sun family, Sun Xingyao, seemed to be reporting the situation to someone. Before long, a figure descended from the dome and landed in front of Li Fan and the other person. This form, entirely composed of flowing characters, was not a real person. The figure scrutinized Li Fan and nodded slightly. "I saw this little fellow over a hundred years ago. Back then, he was still a Golden Core cultivator. In the blink of an eye, he's grown so much…"

"Follow me," the character figure said. Afterward, characters paved a path, leading directly to the dome. Li Fan followed Sun Xingyao, standing on this path of characters. Moments later, his body seemed to transform into countless characters itself, about to scatter as an essay on the path. A sudden sense of crisis arose in his heart. Li Fan realized that under the influence of the surrounding characters, the memories in his soul seemed to be uncontrollably seeping out, inscribing the chapters of his past life.

"Is this a method of probing the visitor's past experiences by perceiving soul memories?" Li Fan mused. Instantly, he brought forth the memories of the first half of Sun Ang's life, which he had taken over, within his soul. He then let these memories emanate, allowing the surrounding character path to perceive them. The resulting characters bore a unique personal mark, clearly distinct from the path underfoot. As for Sun Xingyao, he did not appear to be subjected to any scrutiny.

The character path quickly reached its end, and Li Fan and the other person arrived within a starlight window on the dome. Their forms transformed back from characters into people, though Li Fan's experiences were individually compiled into a booklet. The cultivator who had guided them now revealed his true appearance. He looked even younger than "Sun Ang," a boy of seventeen or eighteen. His long hair hung to his shoulders, and a dot of cinnabar adorned his brow. He appeared refined and demure.

"This is Elder Nangong of the Law Enforcement Hall," Sun Xingyao introduced Li Fan. Nangong glanced at the booklet in his hand and nodded slightly. "No issues. This first test is considered passed." With a casual toss, the booklet, detailing "Sun Ang's" life, transformed into a stream of light and flew off to an unknown destination.

Li Fan, meanwhile, observed his surroundings. It was as if he were in the void outside the Profound Yellow Realm, with a colossal ball of light floating before him. It resembled the miniature model of the Profound Yellow Realm he had seen in the long-distance teleportation formation.

"Pass through the [Profound Yellow Realm]; if the ball of light does not ripple, this second test is passed," Nangong said, transforming into a beam of light and departing first. Li Fan did not hesitate and followed closely. The yellow halo was dreamlike and illusory, even giving off a strangely warm feeling, like returning to his mother's womb. Without encountering any deviations, Li Fan soon flew out of the ball of light. Upon leaving, he even felt a faint sense of reluctance. Li Fan also keenly noticed that the operation speed of his [Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Incantation] had increased by several times compared to normal!

"Is this to verify if I'm a native cultivator of the Profound Yellow Realm?" Li Fan suddenly understood. The third test was to verify if he was a cultivator of the Five Elder Council. In the void, five stone statues, whose faces were unclear, formed a circle. Li Fan had to stand still within the circle of statues for half an hour. If there were no anomalies during this period, he would pass the test.

In this life, Li Fan was pure and untainted. He had not yet had any connection with the Five Elder Council. Therefore, he naturally passed the test with ease. "These stone statues have something special about them. They seem to possess a trace of the power of the Five Heavenly Venerates' contrary principles…" While being observed by the Five Elder Council statues, Li Fan was also observing the five Heavenly Venerates. He also felt, "Even if the Heavenly Venerates themselves are not here, it's not far off." "If I were to come here after experiencing Senior Sister Zhao's illusion, even if only a clone had experienced it…" "It would probably trigger a reaction from the statues."

The five stone statues dispersed, and Li Fan faced the final test before officially taking up his post. The surroundings suddenly plunged into a void. Sun Xingyao and Elder Nangong, who had been by his side moments ago, had vanished. Li Fan frowned slightly and scanned his surroundings. He detected no anomalies. This was not a trap, nor was there any conspiracy. This was simply a void. Apart from Li Fan, there was nothing else.

"What is this testing?" Li Fan understood and did not rush. He stood in the void, observing the Law Enforcement Hall's stratagems. In the void, time itself seemed to have lost its meaning. After an unknown duration, even Li Fan, with his patience, began to feel annoyed. It was as if he had been forgotten by the entire world; all existence outside of himself had vanished. Elder Nangong still showed no signs of appearing. "They wouldn't just leave me here, would they?" Due to his inherent distrust of others, this thought arose in Li Fan's mind. The idea of revealing his true cultivation and breaking through this mechanism to leave directly even crossed his mind. However, he suppressed it in the next instant.

Calming his mind, Li Fan opened his True Observation panel. Confirming that the time anchor was still set at 8 years, all his unease and anxiety vanished completely. He continued to wait in the void. After what felt like hundreds or thousands of years, Li Fan suddenly thought of something. He began to act impatient. No longer standing still, he flew around, exploring, looking like he wanted to find a way out. Then, Li Fan slowly amplified the emotions he was revealing. However, he never showed any loss of control, only exhibiting some negative emotions. After another hundred or thousand years passed like this… Finally, in the dark void, light reappeared.

Elder Nangong and Sun Xingyao reappeared. Li Fan narrowed his eyes slightly, feigning a look of having experienced an era. He even looked closely at the two, as if contemplating their identities. "This last test has also been passed," Elder Nangong finally revealed a smile. He looked at Li Fan and praised, "You have a good disposition. You lasted over two hundred years in the time rift before showing the slightest sign of losing control, and you maintained your reason. This performance is quite good among all previous tests."

Li Fan remained silent for a long time after hearing this. He seemed to be processing the information. Elder Nangong then explained, "This test is to examine the mental stability of the cultivator. After all, you will accompany the Dharma Preaching Heavenly Venerable for over three hundred years and cannot leave for any reason. If you cannot endure this torment and go mad midway, it would be troublesome."

Li Fan suddenly asked, "Have there been cultivators who were calm from beginning to end, showing no signs of impatience?"

(End of this chapter)

Elder Nangong seemed not to have expected Li Fan to ask this, and was stunned for a moment.

Then his gaze suddenly deepened: "If such a person truly exists..."

"Then he cannot be allowed to approach Yan Fa Jue."

"Being alone for hundreds of years, with a consistently calm mood from beginning to end. They are either lunatics or extremely eccentric individuals..."

Li Fan interrupted him: "I have heard that there are peerless geniuses who can immerse themselves in seclusion for a hundred years without distraction. Is it not normal that they would not suffer a mental breakdown from being trapped?"

Elder Nangong gave a sneering smile, shook his head slightly, and said with certainty: "Geniuses like that would not come here. Unless they have ulterior motives."

Li Fan was immediately rendered speechless.

Sun Xingyao, standing by, also wore an awkward expression.

"Alright, welcome to the Dharma Protector Hall. Next, I will inform you of some special precautions. In addition to the various regulations of the Immortal Alliance, there will be more points to consider when interacting with Yan Fa Jue."

"Brother Sun, you may return now. Your task is considered complete."

Elder Nangong's words were what Sun Xingyao had been waiting for, and he felt relieved.

After giving Li Fan a few more reminders, he took his leave.

After chattering for nearly half an hour, Nangong then took Li Fan and flew out of this space.

The employment procedures were completed, and the supplies for the Dharma Protector Hall elders were received.

Changing into the Dharma Protector Hall's unique black and gold trimmed robes, Li Fan followed Nangong to the brightest light spot at the very center of the dome.

"Once I send you in and complete the final handover, I will be free."

Nangong smiled, and it was clear that he was genuinely happy.

"By the way, one last piece of advice. There are two other Dharma Protector Hall elders who will guard with you. Do not communicate with them through telepathic transmission or speak to them unless absolutely necessary."

"The space where Yan Fa Jue resides records every ripple of telepathic transmission. And there are dedicated personnel who review them regularly."

Nangong transmitted this message quietly, his expressionless face betraying nothing.

It was as if he were not the one speaking.

Li Fan cupped his fists in gratitude.

Then, bidding farewell to Nangong, he leaped into the white star point.

What greeted his eyes was a scene he was already very familiar with, the space where Yan Fa Jue resided.

A giant sphere composed of countless characters.

The characters on the sphere were in a state of endless transformation every moment.

Occasionally, the entire passage of characters on the sphere would pause for a moment, then emit a flashing light and disappear.

And then the endless transformation and deduction would begin anew.

Beneath this giant sphere, a desk floated in the void.

A little girl, who looked about five or six years old, was slumped over the desk.

She looked listlessly at the text that continuously appeared on the desk.

www.

Just as she had looked every time Li Fan had seen her before.

As if sensing the newcomer, Yan Fa Jue slightly lifted her head.

Seeing Li Fan's stern expression and the black and gold robe he wore, she pouted and lowered her head again.

"Another one who's not good-looking."

Li Fan clearly heard Yan Fa Jue's soft mutter.

His body involuntarily paused.

"Hehehe, you'll get used to it later." An ancient voice sounded beside Li Fan.

It was one of the Harmonious Dao elders in hiding, responsible for guarding, transmitting his voice.

"Zhang Xu." He briefly introduced himself and then fell silent again.

As for the other colleague, he never greeted Li Fan.

Li Fan paid no mind, and flew towards his "work post." The so-called "work post" was actually a special location in this space.

It was like a critical node in a formation, and being there felt like looking down from a high vantage point. All ambient energy fluctuations were clearly visible.

Most of the time spent guarding Yan Fa Jue was spent in this specific location.

"This is truly worse than being in prison. No wonder none of the Sun family's Harmonious Dao cultivators were willing to come."

Arriving at his post, Li Fan sighed inwardly.

He feigned observing his surroundings, seemingly familiarizing himself with the work environment. In reality, he was secretly contemplating the loopholes in this surveillance space.

Apart from the constantly changing light and shadow of the giant character sphere, a quiet, almost suffocating atmosphere was maintained here.

And Li Fan, in a short time, had no clue how to break through the restrictions and quietly contact Yan Fa Jue.

Thus, about half a year passed like this.

The little girl who had been working at her desk suddenly straightened up and raised her hands high.

She excitedly exclaimed, "Hooray! It's break time!"

After speaking, she slumped down again.

"Six hours."

At this moment, the voices of Zhang Xu and the other guarding Harmonious Dao cultivator sounded simultaneously.

Six hours was Yan Fa Jue's rare break time.

When the time was up, she had to be woken up on time.

Looking at Yan Fa Jue sleeping soundly, Li Fan secretly sighed, "This is truly a bit inhumane."

"She should at least get twelve hours of rest."

During the half-year of his watch, for some unknown reason, no cultivators had used the Jin Fa Jade Token to enter this space.

This meant Yan Fa Jue had almost no opportunities to slack off.

After some thought, Li Fan still raised his doubts to Elder Zhang Xu.

After all, this was within the scope of his duties. Zhang Xu was silent for a moment and replied, "Three years ago, a spy from the Five Elders Association somehow obtained a Jin Fa Jade Token and snuck in, intending to do something nefarious. Although we discovered and stopped them in time, and no serious consequences ensued, it alerted the high levels of the Immortal Alliance."

"Until the responsibility for this matter is investigated and resolved, Jin Fa has been completely suspended."

"It is estimated that it will take several more years to resume."

Zhang Xu said a few words and then fell silent.

Li Fan pondered, "Each Jin Fa Jade Token is a precious reward given by the Immortal Alliance to cultivators who have made outstanding contributions."

"It actually ended up in the hands of the Five Elders Association. And according to Nangong's previous instructions, the probability of spies from the Five Elders Association sneaking in is not low. It happens about once every few decades..."

"Although in direct confrontation, the Five Elders Association is no match for the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance, when it comes to these schemes and tricks, the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance is inferior."

Thanks to the Heaven Profound Mirror's innate ability, which could be described as heaven-defying, Li Fan had a nearly complete understanding of the whereabouts of the Jin Fa Jade Tokens currently in circulation.

"As one of the three guardians, I am strictly monitored, making it difficult to act."

"Perhaps I can achieve victory through a roundabout path, using the Jin Fa Jade Token to create an opportunity for private interaction with Yan Fa Jue."

Li Fan mused to himself.

Twelve hours quickly passed.

However...

Yan Fa Jue was still slumped over the long table, fast asleep.

Showing no signs of waking up.

From the other two guarding Harmonious Dao cultivators, Li Fan vaguely sensed a hint of helplessness.

"Brother Sun, you take over,"

Zhang Xu transmitted with a smile.

Li Fan could clearly sense that Yan Fa Jue had already woken up.

Currently, she was still slumped over the long table, absolutely pretending to be asleep.

The three Harmonious Dao cultivators guarding her were all aware of this. They only asked Li Fan to wake the little girl because he was "new."

Li Fan was well aware of Yan Fa Jue's temperament. She was childlike, held grudges, and was petty.

She would definitely not give a good look to anyone who disturbed her rest.

As for them, the guardians, they were only responsible for supervision. They couldn't really do anything to Yan Fa Jue.

When the little ancestor threw a tantrum, they could only coax and indulge her.

Sensing the two divine senses falling upon him, Li Fan did not refuse.

Following the method taught by Elder Nangong beforehand, he utilized the sealing power of the Harmonious Dao space here and conjured a gong above the little girl's head.

Then, he struck it fiercely.

Clang!

Yan Fa Jue's body trembled violently, and she suddenly lifted her head.

In an instant, she locked onto Li Fan, the culprit, her small face full of anger.

Li Fan shrugged, looking very innocent, "Your rest time has exceeded six hours. It's time to get to work."

Yan Fa Jue continued to stare at Li Fan with her eyes wide open.

It was as if Li Fan had committed some heinous crime.

Li Fan put on a stern face and continued, "By the way, according to regulations, the time exceeded this time will be deducted from your next holiday."

"Uh... the time you spent staring at me counts too."

Li Fan touched his face, seemingly unbothered by Yan Fa Jue continuing to stare.

When Yan Fa Jue heard that her next holiday time would be reduced, she immediately became like a little cat with its fur blown.

A mist covered her large eyes, and she looked at the other two guardians with a face full of grievance.

Zhang Xu and the other two turned their heads away.

Li Fan, on the other hand, revealed a kind smile and looked at Yan Fa Jue as if watching a good show.

He even conjured an hourglass to record the passage of time.

After a period of stalemate, seeing the ever-increasing sand below the hourglass, Yan Fa Jue finally couldn't hold back.

She glared at Li Fan fiercely and slammed her small hand on the table.

The originally somewhat stagnant stream of characters and light spheres instantly began to evolve rapidly again.

Li Fan's smile remained unchanged.

Having been here for hundreds of years, he could only rely on teasing the little girl to pass the time.

Just as Li Fan had successfully infiltrated and approached Yan Fa Jue.

In Da Qi, the Holy Capital.

After eight years of earth-shattering development, the aura of the Holy Dynasty had transformed from crimson to purple.

As a result, the clone Li Ping's cultivation of the Heaven Emperor Qi Manual had successfully entered the fourth level.

"With the magnificent destiny of countless living beings, I now possess the strength to fight against cultivators at the peak of the Spirit Transformation realm in the Xuan Huang Realm."

"If I can develop for a few more decades and maximize the potential of this small world, it might not be impossible to rival the Harmonious Dao realm."

"However, to go further and rival Longevity..."

The clone Li Ping shook his head slightly.

"The Great Array of Ten Thousand Spirits has been preliminarily established. It is time to expand our territory."

With a thought from Li Ping, Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba appeared before him moments later.

"Greetings, Master."

The two bowed in unison.

The clone Li Ping waved his hand, and a map that appeared to be densely packed with stars materialized out of thin air.

Each white dot represented a grotto-heaven or a small world.

The location of Da Qi was emitting a sacred purple light.

Sun Erlang looked up at the map before him, lost in thought.

As his divine sense focused on the white dots, information about the small worlds they represented appeared in his mind.

"I have already explained the current specifics of the Xuan Huang Realm to you."

"Currently, we have not yet directly confronted the forces of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Association. Therefore, the national policy for the next hundred years is to gather the power of all the small worlds and expand the territory of the Holy Dynasty."

"Unite the myriad worlds and counterattack the Xuan Huang."

The clone Li Ping did not shy away from the current weakness of the Da Qi imperial dynasty. Instead, he painted a bright future prospect of the Holy Dynasty for his two beloved disciples.

Sun Erlang was not completely ignorant of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance. He even knew of the existence of the highest authorities of the Alliance, such as the Law-Preachers and the Mirror-Holders.

Upon hearing the great plan of the Fated Holy Emperor, he did not feel a sense of absurdity, like trying to hit a rock with an egg.

Instead, his blood boiled, and he felt eager to try.

It was not that Sun Erlang was shallow and ignorant. It was that he had personally witnessed the various changes in the Holy Dynasty over the past eight years, and compared it to the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance he had seen with his own eyes. Sun Erlang was convinced that the Holy Dynasty would sooner or later eliminate the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance and unify the Xuan Huang Realm!

In the past eight years, the population of Da Qi Holy Dynasty had increased fivefold, and the average lifespan had surged from forty years to seventy-three years.

With no more exploitation and oppression, everyone could study and cultivate.

It was a hundred times more beautiful than the rule of the sages described in ancient texts!

In the past eight years, Sun Erlang had also secretly visited neighboring small worlds.

They were no different from the corrupt Great Xuan Dynasty of the past.

In some places, the people lived even worse lives than the citizens of Great Xuan.

Sun Erlang felt that it was a noble and glorious thing to spread the brilliance of the Holy Dynasty and the Holy Emperor to these corrupt small worlds.

Therefore, upon hearing that the Holy Emperor had finally made his stance clear, Sun Erlang's heart ignited with infinite fighting spirit.

Currently, Da Qi had a total of nine legions.

Each legion commander had already reached the Nascent Soul cultivation realm.

As the commander of these legions, Sun Erlang, who cultivated the Immortal Sitting Art, had a strength close to the Spirit Transformation realm.

If it weren't for the Holy Emperor saying that his foundation was unstable and needed more time to accumulate, he would likely have been able to absorb the changes in heaven and earth and complete his breakthrough by now.

To reach Spirit Transformation in eight years, Sun Erlang believed that this cultivation speed was astonishing enough even in the Xuan Huang Realm.

Those so-called proud sons of heaven in Xuan Huang were not even as good as the legion commanders under him.

...

The more he understood, the more confident Sun Erlang became in the future of the Holy Dynasty.

"I will give you one year to prepare."

"After one year, the Holy Dynasty's army will depart from the Holy Capital and conquer the myriad worlds!"

As Li Ping declared with killing intent, countless purple lines extended from the purple dot representing the Xuan Huang Realm on the map before them. They were like tentacles that tightly bound all the countless small worlds of the Xuan Huang Realm.

Weaving into a giant net that covered the entire map of the Xuan Huang Realm!

Witnessing this scene, Sun Erlang and Wang Xuanba could not help but hold their breath, their hearts surging with emotion!

With this feeling, Sun Erlang excitedly went down to summon the legion commanders and plan the preparations for war.

Wang Xuanba, on the other hand, remained and accepted a secret mission from the Holy Emperor.

"The 'Gathering of Stars'?"

Wang Xuanba looked at the codename of the mission, somewhat puzzled.

"First, go to Yun Hai and Yin Yin Island to find a cultivator named Shangren Yin."

Wang Xuanba murmured to himself.

One more chapter in 15 minutes.

Chapter 1144: Crossing the Past and Present

"After finding cultivator Yin, persuade him and bring him back to the Great Qi Dynasty."

Looking at the persuasion instructions, which consisted of only a few words, Wang Xuanba couldn't help but scratch his head.

Even though he didn't quite understand the meaning of the words, it didn't stop Wang Xuanba from believing them wholeheartedly.

With a low growl, the shadow beneath him began to writhe. Soon, a body identical to Wang Xuanba's crawled out from the shadow.

This was an ability he awakened after merging and absorbing the exotic beast [Ru Ying].

The shadow body possessed half the strength of the main body, and its death would have no effect on the main body.

It was perfect for such a somewhat risky errand.

With this thought, Wang Xuanba's shadow body transformed into a dark, swimming dragon and soared into the sky.

More than ten days later, he finally found the location of Yin Yin Island.

The faint wails coming from the island made Wang Xuanba's heart feel uneasy.

He called out a few times, but no one answered. Wang Xuanba walked into the building and was even more horrified by the strange and bizarre creatures he saw.

"These things are more disgusting than the exotic beasts I've merged with."

As he went deeper, he finally found the person he was looking for in front of a transparent cage.

"Sir, my master wishes to invite you for a gathering," Wang Xuanba said respectfully.

Cultivator Yin showed no reaction at all.

Wang Xuanba repeated himself several times with the same result.

Seeing this, Wang Xuanba decided to follow the Holy Emperor's instructions directly and said, "Does sir wish to know who created the 'Immortal-Mortal Miasma'?"

Cultivator Yin's body trembled, and he slowly shifted his gaze from the experimental subject to Wang Xuanba.

"What did you say...?"

With the double repetition, Wang Xuanba gulped.

However, he still repeated himself bravely.

Then, before cultivator Yin could speak, he added, "Does sir wish to know the perfect method of [Foundation Building With My Own Body]?"

Cultivator Yin's previously hunched body slowly straightened.

He stared at Wang Xuanba, a dangerous glint in his eyes: "Who exactly are you?"

Wang Xuanba chuckled: "I am merely an errand boy. If sir wishes to know the answer to your questions, just come with me."

"Lead the way!"

To Wang Xuanba's surprise, cultivator Yin agreed so readily this time.

Thick mist spewed out from the cage behind him, and several mortals screamed and disappeared.

Wang Xuanba's body tensed, and he quickly nodded.

"By the way, my master also reminded me to remind sir not to forget to bring that rib bone, and take it along as well."

Cultivator Yin's gaze turned cold, and the killing intent in his eyes could no longer be concealed.

However, seeing Wang Xuanba's nonchalance, he forcefully suppressed his killing intent.

He searched his body but could not find the rib bone.

He finally found it in the nest of a small dog that looked like a human hand.

Kicking the dog away, cultivator Yin indicated that they could leave.

Wang Xuanba then flew ahead as a guide. They passed through a small world entrance concealed by formations and returned to the Great Qi Dynasty.
