He was slightly surprised by the dense concentration of spiritual energy here, but cultivator Yin still focused his attention on the tallest, tower-like building in the Holy Capital.

He could sense that there seemed to be an extremely powerful being there.

Soon, cultivator Yin stood before Li Ping, the faceless Holy Emperor.

"Fellow Daoist, you have gone to great lengths to lure me here. What is your intention?"

Cultivator Yin's expression was not very pleasant.

"I have merely long admired your talent," Li Ping said indifferently, sitting on the high Holy Emperor's throne and looking down at cultivator Yin.

"May I ask if this method is acceptable?"

Before cultivator Yin could react, Li Ping gently tapped his hand.

A light screen appeared before cultivator Yin.

Cultivator Yin was initially not very interested, but after a glance and seeing the content, his expression suddenly became solemn.

Solemnity quickly turned into shock. "This..."

He repeatedly examined it several times before looking at the clone Li Ping with disbelief.

"I heard that you have a treasured rib bone? May I ask if it is true?" The clone Li Ping did not explain but instead asked again.

Cultivator Yin nodded: "It is the bone of the first cultivator in this world to be infected by the 'Immortal-Mortal Miasma'..."

"May I borrow it for a look?"

Cultivator Yin hesitated for a moment but finally took it out and handed it to Li Ping.

Li Ping held the rib bone and seemed lost in thought.

Then he sighed, appearing somewhat lonely and sad.

Afterward, he returned the rib bone to cultivator Yin.

The clone Li Ping's behavior made cultivator Yin somewhat apprehensive and uncertain.

"You..."

"To see an old acquaintance in such a state... I feel some emotion, sir, please do not blame me."

Li Ping's words struck cultivator Yin like thunder.

"What? Old acquaintance?"

His eyes filled with doubt, cultivator Yin stared intently at Li Ping.

Li Ping seemed unconcerned and said in a low voice: "Heh heh, besides me, who else in this world remembers him now?"

"Great Heavenly Venerate Xuan Huang, a perfect man of this world. Su Bai, Mister Bai..."

As he said this, a figure appeared before cultivator Yin.

Instantly, the figure attracted cultivator Yin's full attention.

The person in the image had such perfect features that not a single flaw could be found.

His eyes were filled with gentleness and love, and even though it was a mere illusion, looking into his gaze made one's heart tremble.

Cultivator Yin was lost in a daze for a long time.

Then, recalling Li Ping's words, his body trembled violently as he reacted: "What did you say? Great Heavenly Venerate Xuan Huang?"

He instinctively gripped the rib bone in his hand, as if struck by lightning.

His eyes were vacant, and he muttered to himself: "Against the principles of heaven and earth, against the principles of heaven and earth..."

"Immortal-Mortal Miasma, Dual Heavenly Venerates..."

"It turned out to be like this?"

...

Cultivator Yin stumbled and fell to the ground powerlessly.

As if he had suffered a major blow, he lost his direction and seemed bewildered and lost.

Li Ping waited for a long time until cultivator Yin slowly recovered from his shock.

Only then did he continue, revealing his true intentions.

"The immortal path cannot be trod upon, with the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate above.

"Sir, could you help me fulfill Mister Bai's unfinished wish, to use a new method to break the foundation of the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate and save Xuan Huang from dire straits?"

Li Ping descended from the throne, approached cultivator Yin, helped him up, and asked with utmost solemnity.

Cultivator Yin quickly understood Li Ping's meaning.

"Are you saying that this flawless [Foundation Building With My Own Body] method is his work?" Cultivator Yin's voice trembled slightly.

Li Ping nodded, sighing: "Yes. In the entire Xuan Huang Realm, besides him, who else could possess such talent?"

Cultivator Yin's heart was even more shaken.

"Yes, yes," he kept repeating.

Looking again at the characters on the light screen before him, cultivator Yin seemed to gaze across time through the words, crossing gazes with Mister Bai.

"My thoughts and desires are actually the same as his from thousands of years ago?"

"Moreover, he is even far superior to me..."

...

Li Ping looked at the completely lost cultivator Yin, knowing that his plan had succeeded.

"Can you tell me his story?"

Cultivator Yin, slumped on the ground, asked dazedly.

The prolonged silence was finally broken.

Not long ago, cultivator Yin, who had still clung to a sliver of hope, conducted his final experimental verification in the underground prison of Sacred Capital City. The results were no different from what Li Ping had told him. Thus, he said no more, carefully collecting the ribs of Mister Bai. He then returned to the Sacred Emperor's throne and stared blankly at the image of Mister Bai. Li Ping did not interrupt, also gazing intently at the portrait, seemingly in remembrance.

At this moment, cultivator Yin's question was exactly what Li Ping had hoped for. He immediately recounted the general life experiences of Mister Bai. Cultivator Yin listened with great absorption.

"I only knew that in the ancient Xuan Huang Realm, there existed Great Heavenly Venerates who transcended all Longevity Realm cultivators. I never imagined..."

"Someone like that would sacrifice himself for mortals."

Confusion and bewilderment flickered across cultivator Yin's face.

"The departed have departed. What we can do is to fulfill Mister Bai's last wish and comfort his spirit in heaven."

"The reason I founded this [Sacred Dynasty's Emancipation] was also for these mortals. Sir, observe the lives of mortals within my dynasty, how do they compare to those in the Xuan Huang Realm?"

Cultivator Yin turned his head, his gaze seemingly sweeping across all corners of Great Emancipation in an instant. After a moment, he nodded slightly, sighing in admiration, "Compared to the situation in the Xuan Huang Realm, where mortals are treated like livestock, your realm is a prosperous utopia for mortals."

"My vision is to extend this system to all the smaller worlds of Xuan Huang, and even to the Xuan Huang Realm itself!" Li Ping declared proudly.

Cultivator Yin looked at Li Ping, sighed, and did not retort.

Li Ping smiled faintly, "Sir, there's no need to be disheartened. Please listen to me first."

"The strength of Xuan Huang lies in the impartation of laws. Invincibility in the impartation of laws lies in new laws. If we can use the law-imparting methods passed down by Mister Bai to break the foundation of the law-imparting..."

"Once the law-imparting is resolved, the myriad immortal alliance and others in the Five Elders Council will be nothing more than mere dogs."

Cultivator Yin stared blankly at Li Ping, wondering why this cultivator, whose aura was only at the Nascent Soul realm, spoke with such arrogance. More critically, cultivator Yin felt an intense confidence emanating from him.

"It doesn't seem like he's speaking idly? Could it be that he's hidden his strength?" Cultivator Yin scrutinized Li Ping again.

"To break the foundation of the law-imparting, I believe only you in this world can do it." Li Ping did not evade cultivator Yin's scrutinizing gaze, and said again with utmost solemnity.

Cultivator Yin hesitated, "With my talent alone, I'm afraid..."

Li Ping moved closer, gripping cultivator Yin's hands tightly. "Sir, I believe in you!"

Li Ping's eyes were filled with sincerity. "If it takes ten years, then a hundred. If it takes a hundred years, then a thousand! I have waited so long, and finally found this sliver of hope, how can I give up easily?"

"I presume you also do not wish to let down Mister Bai's expectations?"

Cultivator Yin trembled slightly and clenched his fists subconsciously.

"Sir, you just focus on researching the new laws. All other problems, I will handle."

After this conversation, cultivator Yin finally felt inclined to stay and research the methods following the 'Building the Foundation With My Own Body' technique. For him, time was no longer a constraint. If he didn't find something he was willing to do, he would soon lose his sense of self and assimilate with the spectral souls of the world.

Upon receiving cultivator Yin's promise, Li Ping was overjoyed. He immediately led him to the secret space beneath Sacred Capital City. It turned out that a large area had already been prepared for cultivator Yin as a dedicated research facility.

"I have a plan, Sir, see if it's feasible."

"Select a large group of extremely talented and innocent young boys, bestow upon them the [Building the Foundation With My Own Body] method, and then..." Li Ping detailed the method he had previously used.

Cultivator Yin pondered for a moment, his expression growing solemn. "Perhaps it's feasible. However, the specifics will still require further practical verification."

Li Ping waved his hand, "The thoughts and desires of children are like wild horses running free. Even if they cannot genuinely forge a path through their confusion, as long as it can provide Sir with even a little inspiration, it will suffice."

Cultivator Yin was clearly not a pedantic person and agreed to Li Ping's plan. He felt little sympathy for the destined tragic lives of these chosen children.

"By the way, there's something that has been bothering me, something I've wanted to accomplish but have never found a way to do..." Li Ping paused, appearing hesitant.

Cultivator Yin looked at Li Ping, signaling him to continue.

"Mister Bai's remains are scattered throughout the Xuan Huang Realm. I wish to gather and bury them. The other parts are mostly privately collected by cultivators. Only..."

"His skull is collected by the myriad immortal alliance in their headquarters' Museum of Divine Treasures."

A flicker of ferocity flashed in Li Ping's eyes as he said hatefully, "The insects of the myriad immortal alliance parade it around, shamelessly observing it. Every time I think of it, I wish I could rush in and snatch the skull back, disregarding everything."

"Unfortunately, I tried once. There was no possibility of success whatsoever. The Museum of Divine Treasures seems to hide a mysterious powerful being. Even placing Mister Bai's skull in the very center of the Museum of Divine Treasures was his idea. It's clearly a trap, designed to lure people like me who value Mister Bai to come forth..."

"You entered the Myriad Immortal Alliance headquarters?" Cultivator Yin was startled by this revelation.

After Li Ping described all the scenes and details of his infiltration, his gaze towards Li Ping changed subtly.

"If I can sneak in once, I can sneak in a second time. But only the Museum of Divine Treasures..."

"Is truly troublesome." Li Ping sighed.

Cultivator Yin then said, "Fellow Daoist, there is no need to be discouraged. Actually, I once had the same thought back then. However, after clarifying the identity of the museum curator, I abandoned the idea."

"This person is one of the three Great Emperors of the ancient beast race, existing from the remote antiquity. Even the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate treated him with courtesy back then..."

Li Ping frowned slightly, "Such power? Back then, Mister Bai killed these ancient beasts like slaughtering chickens and dogs."

"The Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate was even superior to Mister Bai. With the strength and status of the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate, why would he need to be so courteous to that so-called Great Emperor?" His tone was full of doubt, clearly indicating Li Ping did not believe cultivator Yin's words.

Cultivator Yin shook his head slightly. "Regardless, I can confirm that when the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate saw that individual back then, it was indeed so. His attitude was completely different from how he treated others."

"Either his strength was recognized by the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate, or..."

Cultivator Yin paused. "They already knew each other."

"But that should have been their first meeting!" Cultivator Yin lowered his voice, apparently quite puzzled himself.

Li Ping knew that cultivator Yin was a remnant soul from a previous world swallowed by the Xuan Huang Realm. Possessing fragments of memories from a bygone era, what he saw should not be false.

"Great Emperor San Mo was originally an elder of the Beast Taming Sect, belonging to the lineage of the Ten Immortal Sects. When the Ten Sects conflicted with the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate, he surprisingly chose to side with the Law-Imparting Heavenly Venerate. Millennia later, he transformed and became the Museum of Divine Treasures curator, and one of the three supreme ruling powers of the Immortal Alliance, the 'Illusionary Sage'..."

"An old acquaintance?"

Li Ping suddenly pondered a question. Did demonic beasts exist in the Heavenly Law Realm? All Xuan Huang demonic beasts were derived from Great Emperor Yi. Then what about the Heavenly Law Realm?

...

At the same time.

Li Fan's main body, within the Dharma Refinement Jade space at the Immortal Alliance headquarters, suddenly had a barely imperceptible gleam flash in his eyes.

"Perhaps, I need to make another trip to the Fallen Immortal Realm."

Only one chapter today. Another chapter will be released tomorrow during the day. My heart is pounding, so I'll go to sleep early.

The beast Di Yi had long since led the demon beast clans and fled the Xuan Huang Realm, while Di San Mo was hidden deep within the Immortal Alliance headquarters, rarely seen by ordinary people. However, both appeared in the Fallen Immortal Realm during the "Beast Taming Sect's Calamity," so they could be approached directly to ask for a clear explanation.

"Fellow Daoist Sun?"

Elder Zhang Xu's spiritual transmission interrupted Li Ping's thoughts. His attention returned to the Dharma Refinement Jade space, where the young girl was handling an urgent Dharma refinement mission. Having unexpectedly been given an extra chore, she looked pouting and full of resentment. The mission only required a Dao Integration cultivation technique, but it had already taken three days and three nights, and it was still not deduced. There was a high probability that this little ancestor was slacking off.

In the Dharma Refinement space, besides the three overseers who had reached Dao Integration, there was also a young man in a green robe. Although he stood straight and still, his demeanor revealed his inner anxiety. Considering the high level of this Dharma refinement mission, delaying it might cause trouble. Overseer Zhang Xu secretly transmitted again, asking Li Fan to be the bad guy. Anyway, during this period, Li Fan's image in the young girl's mind had been categorized as the most detestable person in the world.

There was no need for a bronze gong to be materialized as a reminder. When a sand timer silently appeared above the young girl's head, her expression changed drastically, and the speed of the character light sphere increased several times. Not long after, the cultivation technique required by the young man in the green robe was deduced. The young man expressed his profuse thanks and then left in a hurry.

"So urgent, it seems the Qing Xuan Army has encountered trouble," Zhang Xu sighed.

After repeatedly intervening and stopping the young girl's slacking behavior, Li Fan gradually became familiar with the other two Dao Integration overseers. Zhang Xu had entered more than a hundred years before Li Fan. The other one was named Hua Yueye. His name sounded a bit feminine, but he was a complete he-man. He hated evil and injustice. Because he couldn't stand the conduct of a certain Dharma Sower, he actually fought with him on the spot. The consequences were predictable. Although he was eventually spared death with the help of his friends and relatives, he was punished to guard the Dharma Refinement Jade here for five hundred years. Not even half of the time had passed yet. When Li Fan first arrived, Hua Yueye couldn't even be bothered to say hello. Now that they were familiar, he actually talked more than Zhang Xu.

"Although I really dislike Young Master Shang's pretentious demeanor, standing guard in the Demon Abyss, never leaving for hundreds of years, is truly admirable..."

"Qing Xuan Army..."

During their idle chat, Li Fan also recalled the identity of the green-robed cultivator from just now. He had met him once before, and his name was Yan Huan. He was a confidant of Young Master Shang, stationed in the Broken Palm Immortal City within the white mist, responsible for guarding and suppressing the "Roaring Abyss" along with millions of Qing Xuan Army soldiers.

"Young Master's temper is even more stubborn than mine. Once he sets his mind on something, even a Heavenly Venerate might not be able to change his mind. He still hasn't given up on a rejected case that was denied by both Dharma Sow ers and Mirror Holders, even after so many years."

"Ahem, be careful with your words!"

...

Based on the snippets of conversation between the two, combined with some secret information he had browsed earlier, Li Fan painstakingly pieced together a hidden past event of the Immortal Alliance. Back then, the Immortal Alliance had advocated for "deepening exploration into the White Mist Maze." This was somewhat different from the great exploration era Li Fan had experienced. In that era, the exploration undertaken by the Heavenly Abyss Mirror for its sublimation was more like a full scan of the White Mist. Various mazes and secret realms hidden within the White Mist were identified. However, there was no in-depth investigation into the mazes themselves. The proposal, which was rejected by the Dharma Sow ers, was to thoroughly clear out the mazes.

The White Mist barrier of the Xuan Huang Realm appeared too strangely. And the mazes within the White Mist were even more bizarre, hiding who knows how many secrets. Just what Li Fan had encountered included world fragments destroyed by the "Chaos Character Art," an ice seal array that reversed life and death, and a giant formed from countless corpses... Setting aside the dangers, Li Fan didn't believe that the cultivators of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance were not curious about the mazes. But this curiosity was decisively suppressed by the high echelons of the Immortal Alliance.

"The Dharma Sowing was dismembered and Xuan Huang was remade. Coupled with such consistent actions from the high echelons of the Immortal Alliance, it's clear that these mazes in the White Mist are inseparable from Him." Li Fan recalled that when he was in the White Mist back then, he could always hear groans and murmurs similar to those of a Heavenly Physician. And following the sensation of the sound, he would always discover unknown mazes. Li Fan suddenly had a guess.

"These mazes, like the Cloud Sea and the Luo Yan Prefecture, should be remnants of the former Heavenly Law Realm. However, perhaps due to the influence of calamities like the Chaos Character Art, their remaining laws are even more distorted and chaotic. They are not suitable for direct integration with the Xuan Huang Realm. So, they were hidden in the White Mist first. Hmm... perhaps there are also remnants of other immortal cultivation realms."

"The Dharma Sowing is waiting. Waiting for the moment when the Heavenly Law Realm successfully possesses another body and returns to life."

His attainments had not yet reached the level of Dharma Sowing, so Li Fan could not guess the specific uses of these world fragments for the time being.

"However, this gives me inspiration. Although the Dharma Sowing Heavenly Venerate monopolizes everything, the cultivators of the Xuan Huang Realm still have doubts about the drastic changes brought about by His remaking of the world. Perhaps I can guide them to uncover the truth." Li Fan knew that the more something was forbidden, the more it would pique people's curiosity. Once these cultivators discovered the enormous conspiracy that might be involved behind this, whether they wanted to or not, they would become Li Fan's allies.

"Young Master Shang, let's start with him." Li Fan nodded slightly, hiding the gleam in his eyes.

...

Tian Jian Sect ruins, Sword Tomb.

The Saint Embryo Li Fan sat cross-legged beside the black sword, comprehending the myriad sword dao swirling around him. Although he had already built his dao foundation with the black sword's Heavenly Peculiarity, at this moment, surrounded by countless swords within the Sword Tomb, the Saint Embryo Li Fan still felt new insights constantly arising.

"Heavenly Peculiarity is the manifestation of Heavenly Dao laws."

"The world changes, laws flow. They are not immutable. The time node at which I collect the black sword here is different, and the sword dao generated will have subtle differences." The Saint Embryo Li Fan felt joy. His understanding of the world's operation deepened.

With a sense of inspiration, he let out a long cry, and the tens of millions of swords on the ground trembled slightly. In the center of the myriad swords, the wooden sword left by Mr. Bai actually curved slightly, as if resonating with the Saint Embryo Li Fan's comprehension.

"Good." The Saint Embryo Li Fan's lips parted, and the black sword soared into the air, entering his abdomen and transforming into his own dao foundation.

—

This time, when taking the Heavenly Peculiarity, the Saint Embryo Li Fan had already obtained its recognition in advance.

Therefore, the wooden sword did not obstruct him. The profound aura contained within the wooden sword gradually disappeared. A mysterious and profound fluctuation slowly emerged on the Saint Embryo Li Fan. The Profound Yellow Sword Dao was transferred at this moment. Amidst the bowing of countless rusted swords in the Sword Tomb, the Saint Embryo Li Fan slowly departed.

"Possessing the Heavenly Peculiarity allows one to directly enter the Dao Integration realm."

"The Dao Foundation of the Sword, the methods of the Sword, the Sword transforming into a Grotto-Heaven, and..."

Li Fan, whose main body had already reached the Spirit Transformation stage, instantly understood the path the Saint Embryo was about to take.

"The self-transformation of the Profound Yellow Sword Dao."

"After this, one only needs to completely integrate the Heavenly Peculiarity with oneself, which is equivalent to devouring and completely controlling the power of the Heavenly Dao laws. Thus, one achieves the Dao Integration Immortal Venerable."

"Compared to ordinary cultivators of the new path, it is indeed much easier. But as a price..."

"It almost severs the possibility of achieving longevity through proving the Dao against the natural order. Just like Mr. Bai, as the Profound Yellow Grand Heavenly Venerate, defied the very principles of the world he ruled. Even if he was exceptionally brilliant enough to succeed against the odds, he could never escape the backlash of Heaven and Earth."

"The day of proving the Dao will be the day of his demise."

Thoughts churned in the mind of the Saint Embryo Li Fan, and his realm also ascended step by step. When he left the Sword Tomb, he was merely at the early stage of Foundation Establishment. However, by the time he exited Tianyou State, the Saint Embryo Li Fan had already advanced to the Golden Core stage. And when the Saint Embryo Li Fan appeared outside the white mist barrier concealing the Chizha Abyss, he had already entered the Nascent Soul stage.

There was no need for him to deliberately absorb; the spiritual energy of heaven and earth surged towards him without any obstruction, entering his body spontaneously. It transformed into a ladder for steady advancement.

"This is the benefit of being recognized by the Heavenly Dao."

"This is only for the Dao of the Sword. If it were the entire Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao, I dare not imagine. No wonder Mr. Bai was able to advance to Spirit Transformation in one step and achieve longevity instantaneously..."

With the Heavenly Peculiarity within him, cultivation no longer required external resources. Coupled with the active cooperation of the forces of heaven and earth, the Saint Embryo Li Fan's cultivation speed could no longer be measured by ordinary standards.

Sword Dao fluctuations emanated outwards, pushing back the Essence Devouring White Mist. The Saint Embryo Li Fan transformed into a beam of sword light, heading directly for the Broken Palm Immortal City.

When he faintly heard the wails of countless beings, as if of vengeful spirits, the Saint Embryo Li Fan had already reached the same realm as his main body: Spirit Transformation. However, after breaking through to the Spirit Transformation stage, he found himself lacking in understanding of the evolution of his own sword dao. This caused his cultivation progress to slow down considerably.

"If I delve deeper and refine it further in this lifetime, my progress will be even faster if I start anew later."

"Halt! Who goes there!" a furious shout interrupted the Saint Embryo Li Fan's thoughts. At the same time, a figure blocked Li Fan's path. Clad in green radiant scale armor, wielding a heavy halberd, he pointed it at Li Fan.

"Who are you?! How dare you trespass into the Eternal Immortal Fortress?" the heavily armored cultivator's tone was unfriendly.

Li Fan narrowed his eyes slightly, recognizing the voice. In the 114th life, he had been ordered to construct the [Heavenly Profound Spirit Locking Array] in the white mist outside the Eternal Immortal Fortress. Later, the Chizha Abyss had suddenly become active, and his assigned stronghold, Jiaxu, lost contact with the Immortal City. Seeing his supplies dwindling, Li Fan cultivated his Dao heart in reverse and, alone, returned from the stronghold to the Immortal City seeking rescue. Although he encountered some minor setbacks along the way, accidentally entering the [Chaotic Character Maze], he eventually escaped unharmed. Finally, before his lifespan ran out, he managed to reach the Broken Palm Immortal City under extreme pressure. He had originally had a few decades left, but at the last moment, a shout of "What impudent fellow!" had stopped him. Li Fan was forced to explain his reasons, causing further delays. By the time he finally returned to the Immortal City, his lamp was almost extinguished, and he did not have long to live.

"Hmph!"

The Saint Embryo Li Fan glanced indifferently at the other party and did not explain. He simply used his finger as a sword and gently pointed forward. The white mist, which seemed to have existed since ancient times, parted instantly. The wails from the Chizha Abyss were suppressed by a clear and resonant sword cry. Brilliant white sword light illuminated heaven and earth. The Eternal Immortal Fortress, built with the material of the ancient Heavenly Venerate's broken palm, and the terrifying abyss brimming with malevolent energy... all were now exposed and revealed by the Saint Embryo Li Fan's sword light! The vast sword light pierced through the figure blocking Li Fan's path, crossed the Broken Palm Immortal City, and fiercely stabbed into the Chizha Abyss!

Heaven and Earth fell silent. As if captivated by this world-shattering sword strike, the wails from the abyss did not resurface for a long time. Only when the white mist slowly gathered, the torn wound healed, and the abyss was once again hidden beneath the white mist did the murmuring cries gradually resume. However, compared to their previous scale, they were far less significant. Perhaps fearing that a loud noise would once again attract Li Fan's sword strike.

Recovering from their shock, the Qingxuan Army within the Eternal Immortal Fortress turned their gaze to Li Fan's location, all falling silent. It was as if even the thick white mist could not conceal his figure, which resembled an immortal sword. None of them, who guarded the abyss day and night, understood the terror of those demonic sounds better than they did. Yet, at this moment, myriad demonic sounds were suppressed by a single sword strike. What kind of cultivation was this? The Qingxuan Army stared in a daze, their minds blank.

The Saint Embryo Li Fan stood with his hands behind his back, quietly looking ahead. The green scale-armored cultivator before him had long since turned as rigid as stone. Facing Li Fan's sword strike, although the sword light did not injure him, it had deeply imprinted itself into his mind. From now on, he would be unable to accommodate anything else besides this sword light. He appeared to be in a stupor, unresponsive to the outside world. However, conversely, if he could comprehend this sword strike of Li Fan and absorb it to transform it into his own understanding, this strike would be a great fortune for him in the Nascent Soul stage. Even without resources for advancement, he could defeat enemies in higher realms with this sword alone. For Li Fan today, there was no need to exact revenge on all those who had offended him in the past. If he happened to meet them again, a lesson would suffice. The Saint Embryo Li Fan's sword strike was primarily a show of force to draw out Shang Shaojun, the commander of the Qingxuan Army. After all, one had to first display their strength to better discuss subsequent matters. As expected, facing Li Fan hovering in mid-air within the white mist, not a single person from the Qingxuan Army dared to step forward to greet him. After a moment, the white mist rippled, and a figure, whose form was extremely peculiar, constantly swaying like the surface of water, appeared before Li Fan.

"A good sword from a fellow Daoist!"

"I have guarded the Chizha Abyss for many years, and I never imagined that a figure like you would appear in the world!" Shang Shaojun stared at Li Fan, "Fellow Daoist, what is your purpose in coming here?"

Li Fan pointed to the Chizha Abyss not far below and said with a smile, "The demonic sounds are discordant and vexing. I wish to wield my sword and kill my way into the abyss, to perpetually end the demonic sounds."

"May I ask if Young Lord is willing to accompany me?" The Saint Embryo Li Fan's gaze was sincere, speaking very earnestly.

"Are you willing to accompany me?"

Li Fan's voice boomed like thunder, piercing through the white mist, even temporarily suppressing the wails from the Chizha Abyss and echoing throughout the Eternal Immortal Fortress.

Sensing the countless eyes of the Qingxuan Army fixated on him, Shang Shaojun's constantly shifting form settled. He revealed his true appearance: clad in a green robe, his sleeves fluttering, his figure tall and slender. A sharp glint flashed in his eyes as Shang Shaojun stared at Li Fan, "Fellow Daoist, you may be a bit too arrogant. Your sword may be sharp, but it might not be able to withstand the terrifying tide of demonic sounds. And you still dream of eternally suppressing the abyss..."

"How will we know if we don't try? I think Young Lord has guarded the outside of the abyss for so long that your courage has been worn away!" Saint Embryo Li Fan retorted, not yielding an inch.

"Hmph, all just empty talk."

In an instant, it was as if thousands of shadows appeared on Shang Shaojun's body. He seemed to dive into this dark tide, secretly observing Li Fan, ready to launch a fatal strike at any moment. Saint Embryo Li Fan, on the other hand, felt as if he were surrounded by an army of thousands, even having the illusion of facing the Chizha Abyss alone.

"There's a rumor within the Immortal Alliance that the demonic sounds from the abyss are beneficial to Shang Shaojun's cultivation, which is why he's willing to stay here and not leave for a hundred years. It seems the rumors are true now."

Even when he was still at the Foundation Establishment realm, Li Fan had experienced the terrifying power of the abyss's demonic sounds up close. Now, Shang Shaojun was like a walking abyss, capable of unleashing the tide of demonic sounds at any moment!

Above Saint Embryo Li Fan's head, a simple, unadorned black longsword suddenly appeared. The tip pointed directly at Shang Shaojun. Even with the pressure of millions of demonic sounds, the moment he was locked onto by the sword's edge, Shang Shaojun felt a sense of crisis. He seemed to see, behind the black sword, countless other swords raining down from the sky, all pointed at him!

"Where did this expert come from..." Shang Shaojun's heart grew serious.

The two faced each other in mid-air, their battle on the verge of erupting.

At this crucial moment, a strange fluctuation emanated from not far from them. It began with a few sharp tearing sounds, like the rustling of autumn wind. Then it escalated into the sound of hurried horse hooves, erupting like a sudden storm. It was like an endless hell, with ten thousand ghosts crying in unison, or the desperate wails echoing across the world before the apocalypse.

The white mist was stirred, churning incessantly. The Broken Palm Immortal City, like a small boat on the sea, trembled non-stop, its fate hanging precariously!

"The tide of demonic sounds!"

It seemed that due to the suppression of Li Fan's sword light just now, the power of the Chizha Abyss had rebounded. This time, the intensity and scale of the demonic sound tide far surpassed that of previous occasions. The Eternal Immortal Fortress, which bore the brunt of the tide's impact, felt like leaves on a branch, on the verge of being blown away at any moment!

Shang Shaojun's expression changed dramatically. He could no longer concern himself with Li Fan and, with a flash of his figure, returned to the Broken Palm Immortal City. With Shang Shaojun's presence, a verdant light swirled and enveloped the fortress, and the Eternal Immortal Fortress slowly stabilized amidst the tide of demonic sounds.

Just as the Qingxuan Army was recovering from their shock, they were horrified to discover that Li Fan, whom they had thought had disappeared in the tide of demonic sounds, was still standing quietly in mid-air. Despite the roaring demonic sounds all around and the churning white mist, he remained completely unmoved.

What Li Fan did next was even more astonishing. He leisurely, as if strolling, approached the outside of the Broken Palm Immortal City. Facing the endless Chizha Abyss, Li Fan sat down cross-legged. A black longsword appeared beneath him at the opportune moment. Li Fan tapped the sword body with his right index finger.

"Ding!"

The crisp sound was so distinct, even amidst the raging tide of demonic sounds! As the sword's hum reverberated, countless different sword shadows instantly appeared behind Li Fan. The sword shadows stretched on, forming a wall like the Great Wall, blocking the path to the Broken Palm Immortal City. Ten thousand swords stood like a forest, all pointing at the abyss!

"The demonic sounds pierce the brain, yet he is completely unaffected! How did he do it?"

"What is he doing sitting in front of the city?"

This shocking sight left the millions of Qingxuan Army soldiers stunned. Even Shang Shaojun jolted awake, gazing at Li Fan's retreating figure outside the city. If the tide of demonic sounds was a continuous, surging, and violent colossal wave, then Li Fan at this moment was a giant rock standing by the sea, unwavering and unmoving, impervious to any harm from the rampant demonic sounds.

Li Fan's performance had just begun. "Go!" he whispered softly before the tide. From the Great Wall of ten thousand sword shadows behind him, one sword instantly flew out. Just like the world-shattering sword light Li Fan had unleashed before, it flew headlong into the tide of demonic sounds. Facing the surging tide of demonic sounds, the sword light gradually dimmed. However, the Qingxuan Army within the Broken Palm Immortal City clearly felt that the power of the demonic sound tide had weakened somewhat due to that beam of sword light!

"Could it be..."

A thought couldn't help but surface in their minds. Everyone in the Immortal City trembled slightly. Then, a scene unfolded that they would never forget. Ten thousand flying swords, one after another, charged fearlessly towards the Chizha Abyss. Countless sword lights flashed continuously, illuminating the Eternal Immortal Fortress. Each attack weakened the tide of demonic sounds a little more. The terrifying wails that reached their ears gradually became feeble. The vast Immortal City fell into silence. Everyone silently watched Li Fan's back. No other thought could possibly enter their minds.

As if a heavy rain had finally ceased and the sun had broken through the clouds, no more demonic sounds echoed outside the Immortal City. Yet, the sword lights behind Li Fan remained, countless and seemingly inexhaustible.

"That Lord..."

"Perhaps what he said about eternally suppressing the abyss wasn't impossible." This thought arose in the minds of the Qingxuan Army soldiers simultaneously.

Li Fan, his back to the Broken Palm Immortal City, did not rise. The Qingxuan Army also seemed frozen, daring not to make the slightest move.

"Blocking the tide of demonic sounds with my sword, the Xuanhuang Sword Dao's recognition of me has deepened considerably." Saint Embryo Li Fan was actually comprehending the changes happening within him. "Indeed, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao instinctively rejects these 'foreign objects.' If one can align with destiny, they will gain the Heavenly Dao's favor."

With this thought, Li Fan slowly stood up, turned around, and looked at the numerous cultivators within the Eternal Immortal Fortress. He smiled and asked, "Does Young Lord still think I was arrogant?"

The Immortal City was dead silent. After a moment, Shang Shaojun's figure reappeared before Li Fan. He bowed slightly and sighed in admiration, "I was wrong."

"Fellow Daoist's talent is rarely seen in this world."

As he was about to say something more, Li Fan waved his hand, interrupting him. "So, does Young Lord still wish to accompany me?" Li Fan asked again.

Seeing this, Shang Shaojun gritted his teeth and reluctantly replied, "Since that is the case, I shall risk my life to accompany you, a gentleman!"

Upon hearing the Young Lord's words, an earth-shattering cheer erupted from the Broken Palm Immortal City.

The Azure Profound Army had guarded the Chizha Abyss for too long.

Some of them had even been born here, never leaving until death.

Family, friends.

Everything they knew had bloomed and withered within the Eternal Immortal Fortress.

Regarding the true beauty of the Xuanhuang Realm they protected, most of the Azure Profound Army had only heard of it through the Heavenly Profound Mirror.

They had never truly seen it with their own eyes.

The horror of the Chizha Abyss also made it impossible for them to even fantasize about leaving one day.

But now...

Li Fan's appearance brought a ray of light into their endlessly bleak lives.

"With the two lords joining forces, perhaps the demonic sound can truly be eradicated forever..."

The Azure Profound Army cheered loudly, their hearts filled with hope as they stared intently at Li Fan and Shang Shaojun standing outside the abyss.

"The most cruel thing in this world is to give hope, and then brutally shatter it." Shang Shaojun looked back at the expressions on the faces of the generals under his command and sighed slightly.

"I was forced to agree to your request by the circumstances just now. But in reality, I am not optimistic," he transmitted telepathically.

"The Chizha Abyss's true trouble is not just the demonic sound. Otherwise, any Dharma Transmission Elder from the Immortal Alliance could easily suppress it. What gives the Immortal Alliance's higher-ups such great concern is the distorted path of world destruction from the bottom of the abyss."

"It is like a festering wound. If it is poked, pus will flow out and infect the Xuanhuang Realm..."

Forced into a corner, Shang Shaojun had no choice but to explain why the Immortal Alliance only guarded the abyss and did not choose to eradicate the root of the problem.

"The demonic sound is just a superficial manifestation. To truly eradicate the demonic sound, one must deal with this wound while suppressing the demonic sound."

Shang Shaojun originally wanted to use these words to dissuade Li Fan from dragging him to the bottom of the abyss.

But he did not expect that after hearing his explanation, the other party showed no surprise at all, as if he already knew the truth of the Chizha Abyss.

He even smiled slightly and retorted, "The demonic sound is a superficial manifestation, and the wound..."

"is also a superficial manifestation."

"The Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao circulates, endlessly creating and destroying. If it were an ordinary world wound, it would heal within a hundred years at most. However, the Chizha Abyss has been raging for hundreds of years, yet it shows no signs of stopping, and instead, it intensifies. Young Lord, are you not curious about this?"

Shang Shaojun was stunned by these words.

"You..."

His gaze towards Li Fan was filled with uncertainty.

He had initially thought Li Fan was a cultivator with immense strength and a passionate heart, but now it seemed...

"My identity is not important; what is important is you, Young Lord."

"Regarding everything in the White Mist Forbidden Zone, and the strange attitude of the Myriad Immortal Alliance in this matter back then, are you truly not curious?"

Shang Shaojun's expression changed: "Are you from the Five Elders Council?"

Li Fan shook his head: "I am merely a sincere individual who cannot bear to see the truth buried."

Then Li Fan sat down again, resting his sword horizontally. "I will wait here for three days."

"After three days, I will draw my sword and enter the abyss."

"As for whether Young Lord wishes to accompany me... I will not force you."

Shang Shaojun remained silent.

His figure rippled like water and disappeared.

Three days passed in the blink of an eye.

During this time, Li Fan always stayed at the mouth of the abyss.

Whenever demonic sounds reappeared, he easily extinguished them with beams of sword light.

The Azure Profound Army within the Eternal Immortal Fortress watched Li Fan's retreating back with admiration. Many intelligent individuals even recorded the images of Li Fan's sword light annihilating the demonic sounds.

They studied them repeatedly.

Indeed, some gained insights and their strength advanced greatly.

The agreed-upon time arrived. The Saint Embryo Li Fan did not hesitate in the slightest.

Under the gaze of all, he slowly stood up and walked towards the interior of the Chizha Abyss.

He showed no intention of waiting for Shang Shaojun.

Watching Li Fan about to set off alone, whispers inevitably began to spread within the Eternal Immortal Fortress.

After all, no matter how high Shang Shaojun's prestige was before, if he did not react to this matter, his image would irrevocably collapse.

These Azure Profound Army soldiers were all his direct subordinates, cultivated over a hundred years. If he lost their genuine support, it would undoubtedly be an extremely painful loss for Shang Shaojun.

And given Shang Shaojun's strength, even if he ventured deep into the Chizha Abyss and failed to suppress the demonic sound, he would at most be slightly injured. His life would be preserved.

Therefore, Li Fan was certain that Shang Shaojun would appear.

Even if it was just to go through the motions behind him.

As expected, just as Li Fan stepped into the Chizha Abyss resolutely, Shang Shaojun's figure appeared at the opportune moment.

"We bid farewell to our Military Commander!"

The Azure Profound Army's thunderous cheers suddenly ceased after Li Fan had completely entered the abyss.

"The last time I set foot here was nearly three hundred years ago," Shang Shaojun's voice sounded from behind him.

Li Fan did not respond, only observing his surroundings.

It was somewhat similar to the situation in the Netherworld.

Endless darkness, heart-pounding. The difference was that within the darkness, there were continuous dark red bands of light, like the flowing blood of some ancient beast.

From these bloody light bands, substances like ash occasionally drifted out.

Li Fan reached out and caught a piece. A decaying aura instantly began to erode his entire body from the point of contact.

In just a few breaths, the Saint Embryo Li Fan's body transformed into the same ashen material.

A beam of sword light sliced through the darkness, and Li Fan was reborn from his inner world.

"These remnants are the result of being tainted by the distorted path of world destruction. This is merely the outermost perimeter of the abyss. The deeper one goes, the greater the distortion. It can even contaminate and destroy the very foundations of our cultivation." Shang Shaojun transmitted telepathically.

What he referred to as the foundations of cultivation were the Foundation Establishment Marvels, Nascent Soul Caves, and so on.

As long as these new method foundations were not destroyed, cultivators could be reborn continuously. But if even they were damaged, then cultivators would naturally perish.

"In addition to this, we need to worry about sudden outbreaks of demonic sound tides. The demonic sound outside the abyss and inside the abyss are two completely different concepts. I once prided myself on my strong will, but I couldn't last more than a few breaths before I was almost driven mad by those terrifying whispering sounds."

...

Shang Shaojun chattered on, but Li Fan ignored him, resolutely flying towards the bottom of the abyss.

As he passed, beams of sword light flashed, and all the continuous, drifting dark red blood shadows were annihilated.

Shang Shaojun watched for a while and was secretly astonished to find that those strange entities showed no signs of regeneration.

"This is the [Sword of Annihilation]. Wherever the sword light reaches, it turns into nothingness."

Li Fan's voice suddenly echoed in his ear.

"As for the festering wound, it only needs to be cleaned out," he said calmly.

"As for the demonic sounds..."

"I have a supreme secret technique. I will impart it to you, and it will keep you safe."

"Supreme secret technique?"

When Shang Shaojun heard these four words, he was a little dismissive. After all, with his status and position, he had even entered the treasure trove left by the Heavenly Venerable of Dharma Transmission. There, no divine ability or secret technique dared to call itself "Supreme."

"Although his strength is great, his foundation is a bit shallow," Shang Shaojun thought to himself.

But after reading just two or three sentences of the text transmitted by the other party, his expression suddenly changed, and he became instantly serious. By the time he had read more than half of it, his mind was already in an uproar, and he stood there stunned.

"Though subjected to ten thousand tribulations, the heart remains unchanged. This..." Although he didn't know the name of this secret technique, it was undoubtedly a true profound art that surpassed all the cultivation methods he currently knew. It truly deserved the title "Supreme"!

What shocked Shang Shaojun even more was that such a secret technique, which would definitely cause countless fierce battles in the Profound Yellow Realm, was so easily given to him! It was as if it were a foundation-building technique readily available!

"Just what..." Shang Shaojun suddenly looked up at Li Fan, who was diligently cleaning the festering wound of the abyss, filled with indescribable shock. However, Li Fan had no intention of revealing his identity, and Shang Shaojun dared not press him. He could only follow honestly behind, while secretly practicing the supreme technique.

This technique was calm, peaceful, righteous, and upright. There was no need to worry about any hidden traps within it. Shang Shaojun soon genuinely felt its power.

In the dark abyss, countless dark red "blood vessels" suddenly lit up. They were like continuous mountain fires, their light flickering. With the appearance of these blood-red lights, the interior of the abyss seemed to suddenly begin to contract. Space was being squeezed, and a sound of destruction, indescribable and from before the ancient times, spread from the blood-red lights that suddenly extinguished.

Illusions instantly appeared before Shang Shaojun's eyes. He seemed to see worlds being destroyed one after another. Cultivators wailed in despair. Even the heavens and the earth themselves had reached their end. On the celestial dome, countless black fissures tore the sky apart. The earth cracked, and crimson lava erupted from the abyss. Countless fireballs fell, causing monstrous flames. A幽 blue wind blew, freezing all things in the world.

...

Scenes of doomsday played out one after another in Shang Shaojun's mind. Even though he considered himself a favored son of heaven, facing such immersive and terrifying scenes, he couldn't help but tremble and feel great fear in his heart.

However, it was different from before... As the supreme secret technique circulated unconsciously, an extremely cold aura instantly spread throughout his body. Shang Shaojun then extricated himself from boundless fear. Although the doomsday illusions were still vivid in his mind, his consciousness was clear and serene. Without worry, without fear. He observed from the side, like a passerby.

"Though it has experienced hundreds of millions of tribulations, its heart is not extinguished."

"This, this is indeed a supreme divine art..."

Shang Shaojun's state of mind was somewhat strange at this moment. Despite the great fortune bestowed by the cultivation technique, he remained unperturbed. Moreover, his doubts about Li Fan, who had imparted such a divine art to him, grew.

"There are very few places in the Profound Yellow Realm that possess such a level of secret technique inheritance."

"He is not from our Myriad Immortals Alliance, nor is he from the Five Elders Association. Could he be from another ruined immortal cultivation world?" Shang Shaojun knew that there were refugees from other worlds in the Profound Yellow Realm. However, these people often hid very deeply, and even the Myriad Immortals Alliance did not know them all.

"What is his true purpose for coming to the Chizha Abyss?" Shang Shaojun pondered as he helped Li Fan suppress and eliminate the demonic sounds. The eruption of demonic sounds in the Chizha Abyss was not continuous. After surviving a wave of demonic sound, the interior of the abyss became quiet again. Li Fan and Shang Shaojun also discovered some lingering remnants of the demonic sound tide in the darkness. They were somewhat similar to the ash-like substance encountered before, but they lacked that evil, distorted, and corrosive aura.

"Do you know what this is, Shaojun?" Li Fan suddenly asked.

Shang Shaojun observed for a while and shook his head slightly. "This is the residual material from the intermingling of different worlds."

"Before, Shaojun said that the demonic sounds of the abyss were the distorted path of a ruined world. In reality, that is not the case."

"The Profound Yellow Realm is a complete, vast, and prosperous immortal cultivation world. How could other ruined immortal cultivation worlds easily erode it? Even if there were the paths of destruction from other worlds, they would not manifest such a scale of demonic sounds."

"The key is here, in this wound of the Profound Yellow Realm. It is where the path of the ruined world connects with the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao." Li Fan explained to Shang Shaojun as he observed the interior of the Chizha Abyss.

"The laws of the ruined world have been transformed into the laws of the Profound Yellow Realm itself."

"It's like drawing out the blood from one's body and transferring it to another person. Here, two different Heavenly Daos collide. The Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao naturally emerges victorious, but..." Li Fan suddenly fell silent. He withheld the latter half of his sentence.

"The essence of the Heavenly Dao is also gradually being altered in this process."

"Is this the method of a Heavenly Physician?"

"Dissecting fragments of worlds, grafting and stitching them together. Transmitting the Heavenly Dao of an old world, subtly altering the nature of the Heavenly Dao, so that the side effects of fusion are minimized..." Li Fan seemed to see countless existences like the "Chizha Abyss" hidden deep within the white mist barriers that pervaded the Profound Yellow Realm. Under their collective modifications, the Profound Yellow Realm was undergoing transformation, drop by drop, silently.

"A grand and meticulously executed surgery." Li Fan couldn't help but marvel in his heart. If he hadn't received the "Book of Mending the Heavens" from a Heavenly Physician, even if Li Fan cultivated to the Dao Integration or Longevity realm, he probably wouldn't have had the ability to detect these things happening to the Profound Yellow Realm. Just like Shang Shaojun now, even after Li Fan's guidance, he still couldn't grasp the hidden truth at once.

"If I want to test them in this world, I cannot be timid."

"Since I am here, I will destroy one place first and see how they react." Li Fan's eyes flickered. Thousands of sword shadows appeared behind him, and he suddenly accelerated, rushing towards the depths of the abyss. Shang Shaojun, who was still in a daze, quickly followed.

The deeper they went, the shallower the interweaving and fusion of laws from different worlds. The collision of Heavenly Daos, even between ruined worlds, was not something ordinary cultivators could withstand. Turbulent fluctuations swept through the darkness like a gale. Shang Shaojun, a Dao Integration realm cultivator, even felt that the spiritual essence of heaven and earth he had refined was in danger of being decomposed.

"A Dao Integration cultivator here is like a small boat in the rain, a candle in the wind, unable to sustain themselves." Shang Shaojun looked at Li Fan again, his heart filled with confusion. Clearly, the other party's realm was not as high as his own, yet he remained so calm and composed amidst the fluctuations caused by the collision of laws from different worlds.

"What realm is he in?"

“Could it be…”

“Everlasting?”

The thought couldn't help but surface in Shang Shaojun's mind.

As far as he knew, among the survivors from other immortal cultivation worlds, there were indeed some beings at the Everlasting realm.

While not as peerless as the Heavenly Venerates of the Profound Yellow World, they were certainly not individuals ordinary Dao Integration cultivators could deal with.

"It should be so." Shang Shaojun's heart grew solemn, and he treated Li Fan with even more caution.

The two continued deeper into the Chizha Abyss. As the interweaving and fusion of laws from different worlds reached their peak, new anomalies began to appear in the darkness.

A faint, blood-red light illuminated the path ahead.

Shattered continents, inverted and floating above their heads.

From afar, one could vaguely discern the ruins scattered across these landmasses, and the dense white bones within those ruins.

All the floating world fragments were deathly silent.

Thick, root-like red threads grew out from these fragment continents, extending into the Chizha Abyss and hiding in the darkness.

Eerie sounds occasionally echoed through the space.

Like metal scraping against bone, or like a dying person's labored breathing.

The bizarre atmosphere here caused Li Fan and Shang Shaojun, who had come to explore the secrets, to stop in their tracks simultaneously.

Seeing Li Fan observing the strange scene ahead, Shang Shaojun pondered for a moment and then transmitted his thoughts: "These broken worlds, they seem to be still alive?" He was uncertain.

The Sacred Embryo Li Fan did not reply.

Instead, he unleashed a sword beam that flew straight towards one of the shattered worlds.

Shang Shaojun's heart tightened upon seeing this, and he immediately became wary.

Although he had witnessed the extraordinary nature of Li Fan's swordsmanship, the backlash from a world, even a dying one, was not to be underestimated.

The silver-white sword beam crossed space in an instant, arriving above the broken continent.

To Shang Shaojun's surprise, the sword strike Li Fan unleashed did not seem intended for destruction.

After piercing the barrier and descending, it remained in a suspended state.

The trace it left in the air had not dissipated.

The sword light solidified, appearing to form a thin silver line.

Connecting Li Fan to the broken world.

Li Fan floated, standing on the silver line, his eyes closed as if sensing something.

"This is..."

At first, Shang Shaojun was bewildered by Li Fan's actions.

But as he watched, for some reason, an image of an ordinary physician taking a pulse and treating an illness came to his mind.

"Using the sword as a guide, to probe life and death."

"Could it be that this person not only possesses unparalleled swordsmanship but also has profound attainments in the Way of [Medicine]?"

Shang Shaojun was greatly shaken.

And Li Fan's next move made his heart pound.

Li Fan lightly stomped on the silver line, and a ripple of energy spread along the thin thread into the broken world.

Initially, it was an imperceptible tremor.

Then, as if resonating with something, the tremor grew more violent. The land, which had been deathly still, suddenly awoke.

A booming sound came from beneath the ground, and magma, accompanied by the world's roar, erupted fiercely.

...

At this moment, Li Fan lightly flicked his finger, severing the sword light beneath his feet.

He then retreated rapidly in the direction they came from.

"Move further away."

Before Li Fan's words even finished, Shang Shaojun felt a powerful force strike him, sending him flying backward uncontrollably.

His blood churned, and he had suffered a minor injury.

Shang Shaojun looked back in horror and saw that the world Li Fan had "diagnosed" had, through violent self-collision, plunged into destruction.

It was already a fragment, and the world was inherently fragile.

It could not withstand such intense internal energy fluctuations.

The land completely disintegrated, transforming into countless crimson flames.

As they emitted their final light in the darkness, they also signaled the passing of a world.

Shang Shaojun gazed at the scene, lost in thought for a moment.

Li Fan stood beside him and explained, "If I had destroyed this world with external force, it would not only have caused a backlash from the world itself, but it might have alerted the entity behind all of this."

"But if I forcibly stimulated the last remaining power of the world, causing it to die naturally..."

As Li Fan spoke, a thousand sword projections appeared behind him.

The sword lights intertwined, flashed brightly, and then merged into the air.

"Enter the formation."

Hearing Li Fan's transmission, Shang Shaojun's heart leaped again.

However, he was already numb with shock and followed instinctively.

Upon entering the formation space, Shang Shaojun saw sword shadows rapidly circling around them.

A thousand swords flying together, creating a very concealed hiding place.

Before hiding in this sword formation, Shang Shaojun had seen Li Fan do the same, destroying several more broken worlds ahead.

The terrifying shockwaves released by the destruction of the worlds turned the deepest part of the Chizha Abyss into a temporary purgatory.

Innumerable dark red ashes, carried by the violent energy, surged outwards from the abyss.

Like a thousand ghosts walking at night, or a stampede of beasts.

The thousand-sword formation seemed to be straining.

It was constantly shrinking.

The rotating sword lights spun faster and faster, almost forming circles.

Yet, Li Fan showed no signs of worry that the formation would fail.

He stood with his eyes closed, presumably doing something.

"Wait."

As if sensing Shang Shaojun's confusion, Li Fan simply transmitted, and then fell silent.

Shang Shaojun took a deep breath, and under the invigorating coolness, his mind quickly calmed.

The flying sword lights around them not only blocked the external view but also obstructed his divine sense, preventing him from seeing what was happening outside.

However, through the muffled thuds of large objects impacting the sword formation, it was clear that the destruction of several world fragments had caused a tremendous impact on the outside.

"If it weren't for this person, just this impact alone would have forced me to retreat in disarray."

"Swordsmanship, medicine, formations... How can there be someone proficient in so many arts in this world?"

Shang Shaojun's thoughts churned. Even with the aid of the Immortal Heart Curse, he could not completely suppress the speculations in his heart about Li Fan's identity.

An unknown amount of time passed.

The storm outside the sword formation finally began to subside.

However, Li Fan still showed no intention of dismantling the formation.

And judging by his increasingly serious expression, it seemed there was some other existence outside, even more terrifying than the destruction of countless worlds.

"The mastermind behind the scenes?"

Shang Shaojun's mind recalled the horrifying scene of countless world fragments hanging inverted overhead.

This was clearly not a natural occurrence.

The thought of a powerful being treating worlds like playthings, possibly appearing not far away at this very moment, made Shang Shaojun's scalp tingle.

"I wonder if this sword formation can truly hide us?"

"If He discovers us, it will surely be a dead end!"

"So many arts in this world?"

Shang Shaojun's thoughts churned. Even with the aid of the Immortal Heart Curse, he could not completely suppress the speculations in his heart about Li Fan's identity.

An unknown amount of time passed.

The storm outside the sword formation finally began to subside.

However, Li Fan still showed no intention of dismantling the formation.

And judging by his increasingly serious expression, it seemed there was some other existence outside, even more terrifying than the destruction of countless worlds.

"The mastermind behind the scenes?"

Shang Shaojun's mind recalled the horrifying scene of countless world fragments hanging inverted overhead.

This was clearly not a natural occurrence.

The thought of a powerful being treating worlds like playthings, possibly appearing not far away at this very moment, made Shang Shaojun's scalp tingle.

"I wonder if this sword formation can truly hide us?"

"If He discovers us, it will surely be a dead end!"

Chapter 1152: Reshaping Worlds With a Single Hand

Shang Shaojun, despite being the commander of the Azure Profound Army, had never directly confronted an existence at the Longevity Realm.

As he waited with trepidation, he felt restless, as if each moment stretched into an eternity.

After an unknown duration, the constantly rotating sword lights around them finally ceased.

Li Fan, who had been waiting with his eyes closed, finally opened them.

As the sword lights dispersed, Shang Shaojun instinctively looked around.

The scene that met his eyes plunged him into an abyss of cold, chilling him to the bone.

The several broken worlds that Li Fan had just shattered with his sword lights had, for some unknown reason, reappeared!

They hung upside down, tangled by more robust, bizarre red threads.

These threads extended densely, reaching towards the Chizha Abyss.

"Not only have they not disappeared, but they've even..." Shang Shaojun's heart trembled as he looked at Li Fan.

He even began to doubt if the scene of world destruction he had witnessed earlier was merely an illusion.

"He has been here."

Li Fan stated in a deep voice.

"Who is He?" Shang Shaojun couldn't help but ask.

The Holy Embryo Li Fan shook his head.

"However, it will be clear with a glance."

Li Fan, counting on his fingers, pointed towards the void ahead.

The thousand sword lights that formed the sword array reappeared before the two of them.

They then began to rotate rapidly.

As the sword lights spun faster and faster, hazy images began to appear on the screen formed by the light!

"Anyone who can achieve this must be an extremely powerful being. If we had been secretly peeking just now, even with my supreme formation concealing us, even with the impact of world destruction surrounding us as natural cover..."

"We would likely still have been detected by Him."

Li Fan explained at this point, the reason why he had used the formation to shield Shang Shaojun's intrusive gaze earlier.

Shang Shaojun's heart grew stern, but he heard Li Fan continue, "Even this recording using these sword lights was not concentrated in one place. Each sword light only recorded fragments of information. Only by combining them all could the true scene be pieced together."

"This way, the possibility of us being discovered was minimized."

As Li Fan whispered, the images on the sword screen began to shift.

World fragments shattered, and waves of destruction erupted outwards and raged.

Just as this violent scene slowly subsided.

A figure suddenly appeared in the center of the storm.

The scene recorded by the sword lights did not capture the person's face.

Or perhaps, he never revealed his true form?

Shang Shaojun only knew that the moment the true culprit behind the scenes appeared, the previously frenzied energy fluctuations instantly calmed down.

The figure observed for a moment, appearing somewhat puzzled.

Then, he glanced in the direction of the Chizha Abyss.

Even though it was merely a recording, even though the other party's appearance was not clear, even though they were separated by different timelines.

Being swept by that gaze, Shang Shaojun felt his body, and even his soul, almost freeze.

His entire body stiffened, unable to think.

Fortunately, the figure only checked briefly and did not probe further.

He withdrew his gaze.

Shang Shaojun felt as if he had gone through a terrible battle, his body drained, gasping for air.

Yet, he still stared intently at the ever-changing, rotating sword screen.

The figure pressed his hands forward in the void, and the storm in this space immediately subsided.

With a wave of his hand, the residual world ashes were collected.

Then...

The figure seemed to become solemn, carefully taking out an equivalent number of world fragments from an unknown source!

Like a titan from ancient myths, cleaving the heavens and earth.

He hung these broken worlds upside down at the bottom of the Chizha Abyss.

Then, with a light touch of his finger, bizarre red threads emerged from these world fragments.

As if possessing self-awareness, they flew towards the Xuanhuang Realm.

Roars echoed from within the Chizha Abyss.

This was the sign of two worlds merging.

After doing all this, and waiting for the inverted worlds to stabilize, the figure finally departed.

...

The screen abruptly went blank.

After Li Fan retrieved the thousand sword lights, Shang Shaojun was still immersed in the incredible scenes he had just witnessed.

"The Xuanhuang Realm actually hides such a figure?"

"Even the immortals of legend, who pluck stars and grasp the moon, would be no more than this!"

Recalling the scene of that figure taking out world fragments and gently cradling them, Shang Shaojun couldn't help but tremble.

Li Fan's reply, however, suddenly pulled him out of his endless fear.

"Although this person is strong, they are still not comparable to a True Immortal."

His tone was indifferent, as if he had truly met an immortal.

"It seems my guess was correct. The Xuanhuang Realm's current bizarre state is due to someone behind the scenes plotting an unknown conspiracy."

Without waiting for Shang Shaojun to reply, Li Fan continued.

"The figure we saw is one of them."

"Young Commander, what do you plan to do?"

Shang Shaojun was suddenly stunned.

What to do?

The power of that unknown and terrifying existence was certainly at the Longevity Realm, or even beyond.

What could he, a mere cultivator at the Dao Integration stage, do?

"I will immediately return to Immortal Alliance headquarters and report this matter."

Shang Shaojun stated righteously.

Li Fan gave him a knowing smile: "Are you sure?"

"If you are truly determined to do so..."

"Then this might be our last meeting," Li Fan said in a low, melancholic tone.

Shang Shaojun's expression changed: "What do you mean?"

"The Chizha Abyss clearly hides secrets. Years ago, discerning individuals from the Immortal Alliance voluntarily organized an investigation, but it was rejected by the Immortal Alliance..."

"Doesn't Young Commander understand yet? On the territory of the Myriad Immortal Alliance, how could such a large operation be carried out without their knowledge?"

Li Fan said calmly.

In truth, Shang Shaojun understood this principle well.

But he had always been unwilling to admit this conclusion in his heart.

Now that Li Fan had mercilessly exposed it, Shang Shaojun's expression shifted repeatedly.

He knew very well that if all of this involved the participation, or even the leadership, of the Myriad Immortal Alliance.

Then the implications behind this...

Even though he had witnessed countless conspiracies and struggles, Shang Shaojun felt a deep sense of powerlessness at this moment.

"Young Commander, you needn't despair."

"This matter clearly exceeds the scope of what you and I can handle. Such an act of polluting the Xuanhuang Realm through the destruction of worlds is akin to being an enemy of all in the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Although the Myriad Immortal Alliance might have high-level figures involved, those individuals likely cannot cover up the sky with one hand."

"The Transmission Law Heavenly Venerate is wandering outside the heavens, detached from worldly affairs. But I've heard that the Transmission Law disciples have a special method to summon him back..."

The Holy Embryo Li Fan persuaded him gently.

Shang Shaojun's eyes lit up upon hearing this: "That's right. The situation is so dire and critical, perhaps only by summoning the Transmission Law back can it be resolved. However, only... can connect with that venerable Heavenly Venerate."

Shang Shaojun frowned slightly.

Li Fan, meanwhile, was recalling the scene just now.

"Transmission Law Heavenly Venerate..."

### Chapter 1153: Immortal Heart Descends to the Mortal Realm

It wasn't that Li Fan intentionally obscured the figure of that person.

Rather, the mysterious figure that appeared at the bottom of the Chizha Abyss was too powerful. The already unstable environment at the bottom of the abyss could not accommodate an existence of such a realm.

This caused the view from the outside to be blurry.

However, from the aura inadvertently revealed by that figure, Li Fan had more than a fifty percent chance of confirming that the person was the Transmission Law Heavenly Venerate.

"But it's different from the aged elder in my impression; he seems younger. What's going on?"

The Holy Embryo Li Fan fell into deep thought.

At this time, Shang Shaojun also snapped out of his contemplation and transmitted, "I know a method to invite back the Heavenly Venerate, but with just a blurry image..."

"It's not enough. We need more evidence."

"Furthermore, even with our efforts, we can't directly present the collected evidence to him. Persuading him would be even more difficult."

Li Fan heard Shang Shaojun's apprehension and responded with a smile, "Young Master Jun, you don't need to be overly pessimistic. While it's true that the two of us are weak in numbers, the vast Xuanhuang Realm will surely have like-minded individuals we can find."

"We can collect evidence while seeking reliable people to strengthen ourselves." Li Fan's words already implied an intention to travel with Shang Shaojun.

"But the Chizha Abyss..." Shang Shaojun still hesitated.

Li Fan immediately and solemnly advised, "If the skin is gone, where will the hair attach? If the entire Xuanhuang Realm falls into crisis, what's the use even if you, Young Master Jun, suppress this abyss and ensure your safety?"

"Moreover, I've already devised a perfect plan that allows you to suppress the demonic sound of the abyss even while you are away traveling."

As they were speaking, they had already returned to the entrance of the abyss.

Li Fan's eyes focused, and a gigantic sword, seemingly composed of tens of thousands of different sword lights, instantly spanned the abyss. With a mere point of his finger in the air, the giant sword skillfully maneuvered with Li Fan's movements. Correspondingly, continuous dark red threads were sliced off. Deprived of the constraints of the original world's rules, these threads should have scattered chaotically and then annihilated. But with Li Fan's sweeping gestures in the air, they slowly gathered together, quietly weaving into a giant red net!

Upon seeing this, Shang Shaojun's heart trembled slightly once more. Although it wasn't as shocking as the mysterious figure casually manipulating a broken world, this effortless weaving of broken world laws into a net was enough to show that Li Fan's attainment in Dao arts was far beyond the ordinary.

"The reason the demonic sound tide is difficult to defend against is because the conflict between the broken world and the Xuanhuang Realm's laws is focused in this narrow area, being too intense with no buffer. So, I've slightly altered the spatial structure here, maximally delaying the time for the laws to merge..."

"In fact, that mysterious figure could have easily done this, covering his tracks so as not to be discovered. But he didn't. Perhaps this is also a form of confidence," Li Fan shook his head slightly.

"With the buffer of this net of rules, the power of the demonic sound tide's eruption is expected to be reduced by half." As Li Fan spoke, he lightly clenched his hand, and the giant sword in the abyss transformed back into myriad sword lights. Countless sword shadows, following a certain pattern, soared like dragons, subtly forming a formation. Shang Shaojun saw the sword formation swirling around the outer edge of the net of rules, with a massive vortex seemingly forming at its center. The dark red remnants spilling from the net of rules were occasionally absorbed into the sword formation.

"This formation, with its sword intent that breaks everything, shatters the accumulated broken rules in the Chizha Abyss. It can extend the period of the demonic sound tide's eruption by more than two times."

"Young Master Jun can order the sword cultivators of the Azure Profound Army to come here. Not only can they comprehend the sword intent condensed within the formation, but they can also help charge the sword formation..." Li Fan calmly laid out the solution to the demonic sound tide that the Azure Profound Army dreaded.

Shang Shaojun looked at the formation and the net, speechless. He had been called a genius by those around him since childhood. But in front of Li Fan...

"Indeed, there is always someone better. I was shallow before." With his worries resolved, Shang Shaojun had no reason to refuse Li Fan's companionship.

The two returned to the Eternal Immortal Stronghold, announcing the news that the demonic sound tide had been temporarily suppressed, drawing stormy cheers from the Azure Profound Army. Then, Shang Shaojun summoned his confidantes and passed down the method of controlling the formation that Li Fan had named the "Sound Annihilation Sword Formation."

With all matters settled, before their departure, Shang Shaojun summoned Yan Huan privately.

"Young Master Jun, please rest assured. The cultivation method deduced by Yan Fajue is very effective. Those brothers who occasionally lost their minds previously have been having fewer episodes recently," Yan Huan replied respectfully with his head bowed.

...

Through their conversation, Li Fan also learned the reason why Yan Huan had rushed to use a precious Jade Tablet of Imperial Decree to have Yan Fajue deduce a cultivation method. The Azure Profound Army, having guarded the Chizha Abyss for a long time, was subtly influenced by the demonic sound. Some of them would become mentally unstable, even going as far as to draw their swords against their comrades. Previously, when the number of affected individuals was small, it was relatively easier to handle. But with the accumulation of time, nearly one-fifth of the Azure Profound Army in Broken Palm Immortal City had contracted this strange illness. Not long before the Holy Embryo Li Fan arrived, there had been a large-scale outbreak among the Azure Profound Army, resulting in heavy casualties. What was particularly unbearable was that they died not at the hands of the demonic sound tide, but by their own brothers. The morale of the Azure Profound Army was low, and their hearts were scattered. Shang Shaojun, having no other recourse, had used his hard-earned Jade Tablet of Imperial Decree to ask Yan Fajue to resolve this matter.

"The 'Heart Tempering Demon Warding Technique.' Those who cultivate this method can help others solidify their Dao hearts and dispel evil thoughts in their minds. Although it can only help one person at a time, making it slow, it is indeed very effective. The soldiers who have recovered have even developed some resistance to the demonic sound," Shang Shaojun explained to Li Fan.

"How does this Heart Tempering Demon Warding Technique compare to the secret technique I imparted to you, Young Master Jun?" Li Fan asked.

Shang Shaojun was slightly stunned, then blurted out, "It's far inferior, naturally!"

"Then, Young Master Jun, why not pass down the 'Immortal Heart Incantation'? That way, everyone will be spared the suffering of the demonic sound," Li Fan said with an expression of compassion.

Shang Shaojun's eyes widened at this, his heart greatly shaken.

"Immortal Heart Incantation..." He finally knew the name of that supreme secret technique. The words "Immortal Heart" within it made his mind race with possibilities. While surprised by Li Fan's generosity, Shang Shaojun felt a pang of reluctance to simply impart such a secret technique to everyone unconditionally.

"Doing this, is it not a waste of heavenly resources?" Shang Shaojun secretly transmitted his voice to Li Fan in front of his confidant Yan Huan.

Afterward, Shang Shaojun looked at Li Fan's smiling expression and felt that something was amiss. He coughed slightly to cover his embarrassment.

"The name 'Immortal Heart Incantation' is too ostentatious. Young Master Jun can change it to a more ordinary name when imparting it," Li Fan reminded him.

Shang Shaojun thought of the cultivation technique that Dharma Deduction had previously derived and said to Yan Huan, "This is the [Heart Tempering Technique], imparted by this senior. It can protect you all from being eroded by the demonic sound. You must spread it quickly throughout the entire army and ensure everyone learns it."

The name "Heart Tempering Technique" was too ordinary, so Yan Huan did not show much surprise after hearing Shang Shaojun's words. He simply bowed to receive the order and began to practice it on the spot.

"To have such a secret technique by their side, yet they are unaware, is truly..." Looking at Yan Huan's retreating back, Shang Shaojun still felt some emotion.

"If they knew the preciousness of this secret technique, they might become overly anxious and find it difficult to learn," Li Fan said.
