Yet, something as seemingly flashy and useless as this was now being preemptively purchased by people at the Myriad Immortal Alliance headquarters, risking severe consequences afterward. It was clear that these Empty Bright Flowing Crystals were likely related to the prophecy of sixteen Dao Integration cultivators leaving the Xuanhuang Realm.

Inside the Sun family's secret chamber, Li Fan, using both the Heavenly Profound Mirror's origin and the Boundless Mirror to spy, quickly detected numerous obscure communications and transaction records related to them.

These people acted secretly and cautiously. Most would arrange things through the Heavenly Profound Mirror and then conduct face-to-face transactions using standard spirit stones. Occasionally, if a purchase was made on the Heavenly Profound Mirror, they would still list it for sale after obtaining it, ensuring a certain amount of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals circulated on the market without significant price fluctuations. However, through continuous transfers, the vast majority of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals on the market were gradually brought under the control of the same group of people. The so-called transactions were merely passing them from one hand to another.

"A decent method, much more pleasing to the eye than my crude market manipulation in person," Li Fan praised, using the power of the Heavenly Profound Mirror's origin to participate. With his ability to erase traces and information from the Heavenly Profound Mirror at any time, he wouldn't be as hesitant as these shadowy rats. He bought wildly and without restraint, disregarding the price and offering prices that no one could refuse. Like a giant whale, he stirred up a tidal wave in the Heavenly Profound Mirror's trading market.

Soon, the price of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals soared, rising sharply. This anomaly naturally attracted the attention of more cultivators. Although they didn't yet know the true use of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals, it didn't stop them from following suit and buying.

The fake Heavenly Profound Mirror identity created by Li Fan's clone soon received several unfamiliar messages:

"Whose subordinate are you? Acting so recklessly, aren't you afraid of death?"

"Brother, restrain yourself. Don't make it so no one else can make a living."

"Hmph, I advise you, greed is useless. Spit out what you've swallowed, and we can all survive together."

…

Li Fan replied to all these nuisance messages with a single sentence: "Very good, I've lured you out. Wait to be purged!"

The other cultivators immediately fell silent. Upon investigation, many had inexplicably died within that short period.

"They are so ruthless even to their own people."

"But they are also a bunch of idiots."

Li Fan didn't take these people seriously. While toying with them, he didn't stop his acquisition of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals.

Unfortunately, this time, the Myriad Immortal Alliance's reaction was unusually swift.

"Senior, hurry and collect them!" Sun Luyao sent a warning.

Li Fan's "tail-cutting" operation had already begun. One by one, Empty Bright Flowing Crystals were removed from the small Heavenly Profound Mirror, and the created identity information was immediately erased. Li Fan's divine sense then unleashed a dark light of annihilation, destroying the small Heavenly Profound Mirror directly.

At this moment, an announcement from the Myriad Immortal Alliance in the Heavenly Profound Mirror finally arrived. It directly declared Empty Bright Flowing Crystals to be prohibited items. All cultivators currently holding them would have them repossessed by the Myriad Immortal Alliance. The Myriad Immortal Alliance urged all parties to cooperate fully with the relevant work. Anyone who obstinately obstructed would be severely punished for betraying the alliance.

The news sent shockwaves in all directions. This was arguably the most severe measure announced by the Myriad Immortal Alliance since its establishment. It was all for a small item, previously of little interest to anyone. What profound mystery did this item hold to warrant such a grand mobilization by the Myriad Immortal Alliance?

Those cultivators who possessed Empty Bright Flowing Crystals but were unwilling to hand them over simply decomposed and studied them. However, just like before, they discovered nothing. Suspicions and discussions brewed like a storm. The Myriad Immortal Alliance showed no intention of explaining, instead using even harsher methods to implement a lockdown. No information related to Empty Bright Flowing Crystals could be found in the Heavenly Profound Mirror anymore. Members within the alliance who dared to discuss Empty Bright Flowing Crystals privately were directly dismissed from their positions. Gatherings of non-members discussing them would be monitored by the martial arts academies of each state and result in warnings. This high-pressure stance made it clear to cultivators across the land that this time was different; Empty Bright Flowing Crystals had truly become a taboo topic.

The cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm valued their lives. For a time, the Myriad Immortal Alliance was silent as if struck by fear. Voices could be suppressed, but how could the doubts and curiosity in their hearts be permanently silenced? The Myriad Immortal Alliance's control hadn't yet reached every cultivator. Therefore, in deep mountain caves far from the immortal cities of each state, and in heavily guarded secret chambers, discussions about Empty Bright Flowing Crystals were unavoidable. However, all Empty Bright Flowing Crystals in the world had already been confiscated. They could only speculate based on their imagination.

Not to mention merely speculating, even with the actual items in hand, it would be difficult to understand the true method of using Empty Bright Flowing Crystals. In the Sun family's secret chamber, Li Fan even used the Boundless Mirror to conduct a detailed analysis of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals but found no special properties.

"It seems that Empty Bright Flowing Crystals are just an important component among related materials. There should be other steps." After consuming hundreds of Empty Bright Flowing Crystals, Li Fan reluctantly paused his research.

"I can only wait until the Myriad Immortal Alliance completes the departure of the sixteen Dao Integration cultivators from the Xuanhuang Realm before finding a way to inquire."

"But I can make preparations for observation in advance."

At the Sun family's residence, Wu Ninglu, who was cultivating with her eyes closed using the supplies bestowed by Sun Luyao, did not notice a dark shadow emerge from her storage ring. The dark shadow burrowed into her sea of consciousness and quickly gained control of Wu Ninglu's body. It was none other than the soul fragment Li Fan had left behind before entering the Myriad Immortal Alliance's Protectorate Hall. Compared to the lurking divine sense, this soul fragment's power was much greater. After the divine sense unleashed a sword strike, destroying the small Heavenly Profound Mirror and cutting off the clues for investigation, it fell into a weakened state. This soul fragment, however, like a cultivator, could absorb the spiritual energy of heaven and earth to replenish its own consumption.

"This split soul originally intended to remain for the most crucial moment."

"But it seems I have no choice but to activate it now."

Concealed beside Wu Ninglu, he had become intimately familiar with her actions and decisions.

Li Fan's soul fragment took control of her body, found an excuse to leave the Sun family, and departed without raising any suspicion.

After evading the pursuit of the Chen family from the Hall of Medicine, he arrived at a secluded, uninhabited spot in the wilderness. Using materials at hand, he began constructing stone puppets.

He intended to send these stone puppets to the borders of the Xuanhuang Realm before the sixteen Dao Integration cultivators departed.

His objective was to closely observe their method of escape.

With Li Fan's current mastery of formations, he wasn't worried about being detected by the Myriad Immortal Alliance.

"They say one cannot be in multiple places at once. I've already split myself somewhat, yet it still feels insufficient."

Li Fan's soul fragment felt a sense of helplessness.

To be precise, his main body was concealed within the space of Faults Law Glaze within the Protectorate Hall.

His Holy Embryo had journeyed to the far reaches of the star sea, probing the mysteries of reverberating starlight.

The divine sense of the Boundless Mirror was too weak, its strength lacking…

As for his Holy Emperor clone, it had unfortunately been drawn into the Netherworld by Elder Yin.

Therefore, only this hidden soul fragment could personally handle the task.

Leaving the situation in the Sea of Profound Darkness aside for now.

The day the Myriad Immortal Alliance completed its Dharma Transmission mission arrived sooner than Li Fan had anticipated.

On the thirty-third day after the Azure Void Flowing Crystal was classified as a prohibited item.

A brilliant rainbow, suddenly appeared in the heavens and earth of the Xuanhuang Realm.

As if blending all the colors in the world, it was twisted and ethereal.

Like a meteor flying in reverse, it pierced the firmament and surged forth.

The rainbow, under the watchful eyes of many, tore through the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm.

The myriad afterglow it left behind lingered, permeating the sky and persisting for several days.

For the next half month, the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm remained opalescent and dreamlike.

Some curious cultivators attempted to capture these scattered rainbow lights.

These colors seemed to possess physical form, capable of being collected and refined.

Moreover, they possessed the characteristic of making objects emit a similar multi-colored glow.

Recalling the Azure Void Flowing Crystal, which had been strictly forbidden from discussion by the Myriad Immortal Alliance with repeated decrees…

Cultivators understood immediately.

This was the Azure Void Flowing Crystal, used to forge vessels for leaving the realm.

The revelation of this mystery did not cause any significant turmoil.

This was because, for most cultivators, they were unaware of the existence of the Immortal Ruins, nor did they know that the Xuanhuang Realm was fundamentally incapable of escape.

They only knew that communication between the Xuanhuang Realm and the outside world had been severed for a long time, and they speculated that the Myriad Immortal Alliance's actions were aimed at re-establishing contact.

But these people were not important.

The important cultivators, upon understanding, began to harbor different thoughts.

Undercurrents began to stir within the Myriad Immortal Alliance.

Time returned to the moment the multi-colored rainbow departed the Xuanhuang Realm.

Through the eyes of approximately a hundred stone puppets, Li Fan was able to observe the entire process of the rainbow's departure from the Xuanhuang Realm with greater clarity.

The instant it left the Xuanhuang Realm, its flight trajectory, as predicted, changed from a straight line to a sudden bend.

It veered in the direction of the Immortal Ruins.

However, not entirely.

It was like a ball of dough being gradually stretched.

Only a portion of the multi-colored rainbow had its trajectory forcefully altered by the gravitational pull of the Immortal Ruins.

The remainder continued to steadfastly speed towards the depths of the star sea.

As the multi-colored rainbow continued its advance, more and more colors were drawn towards and fell into the Immortal Ruins. Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo…

The disappearance of these colors caused the rainbow's hues to gradually become singular.

Eventually, only a streak of purple energy remained.

It flew alone into the unknown star sea.

From the perspective of the Xuanhuang Realm below, it appeared as a ray of light shot into the star sea, dispersed into various colors.

It was a slightly surprising phenomenon, not even warranting much discussion.

But in Li Fan's eyes, this scene was almost miraculous.

"It actually resisted the suction of the Immortal Ruins?!"

"No, rather than resisting, it was more like delaying and dissolving!"

"It released a portion of the suction it received, offsetting the force to a certain degree. Then, with each successive stripping away, it rapidly distanced itself from the Immortal Ruins, lessening the pull."

"Countless precise calculations were required to achieve this feat!"

"It was not a victory of pure strength, but a triumph of 'skill'."

Li Fan's mind replayed the dynamic curve of the color separation.

It seemed to contain infinite mysteries.

The Transforming Dao Stone crystals whirred rapidly, attempting to deduce and reproduce it in his sea of consciousness.

However, after the yellow light separated, he felt dizzy and could not persist.

Feeling regret, he had no choice but to stop.

"Is this the method devised by Dharma Transmission?"

"Elegant."

Li Fan could only offer these two words of evaluation.

"Azure Void Flowing Crystal was likely only used for separating different color spectrums."

"As for the initial driving force to escape the Xuanhuang Realm, it was likely still those sixteen Dao Integration cultivators."

"With their connection to the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao, unless they reached a realm comparable to Dharma Transmission, they would not be able to leave easily. Dao Integration is already the highest combat power the Xuanhuang Realm can muster."

"Although they were accelerated by the Myriad Immortal Alliance, I can sense that the aura of those sixteen Dao Integration cultivators is not weak."

Li Fan's thoughts churned.

The scene of the multi-colored rainbow departing the Xuanhuang Realm had deeply stimulated him.

When someone easily accomplished a goal that you had tried for a long time and failed to achieve, people truly feel the gap.

"Revered Dharma Transmission Celestial, is indeed beyond ordinary reach."

"But it matters not. Once I master this method, when I return and truly..."

"I will be ahead of him again."

…

The Great Ascension Dynasty.

Sun Erlang looked at Yi Shu with some confusion.

Lately, this elder would occasionally pause mid-sentence, lost in thought.

If he hadn't personally witnessed the terrifying power of the Transforming Dao Stone Mother and knew this was likely the Stone Mother utilizing its computing power, Sun Erlang might have suspected him of developing some form of dementia.

But what was the Stone Mother doing that even these clones of the Taiyan Sect were affected?

Having spent some time with Yi Shu and understanding the general temperament of the Taiyan Sect, he didn't speculate wildly. He directly inquired.

Yi Shu took a while to snap back to reality.

"It's nothing. I was just thinking of a way to escape even without abandoning the Stone Mother's main body in certain extreme circumstances."

"Before achieving complete information immortality, losing the main body of the Transforming Dao Stone would still have a significant impact on us," Yi Shu explained to Sun Erlang.

"Extreme circumstances?" Having personally witnessed the Stone Mother's might and experienced reincarnation in the simulated world, Sun Erlang found it hard to imagine what kind of disaster could force the Stone Mother into a desperate flight.

"If that day truly comes, Senior, don't forget to bring me along," Sun Erlang teased with a smile after a moment.

"No problem," Yi Shu glanced at Sun Erlang and agreed with a nod.

Sun Erlang was stunned.

"Is your master not in the Great Qi Minor World recently? I can't sense his presence anymore," Yi Shu diverted the topic and asked instead.

Sun Erlang frowned upon hearing this, "Yes. I just don't know where he went? As far as I recall, this is his first time leaving the Sacred Dynasty."

Yi Shu looked at the seemingly increasingly towering Sacred Emperor's Seat, myriad lights and shadows flashing in his eyes.

Inside the secret chamber below the Sacred Emperor's Seat, where the You clan members were being nurtured.

Over a thousand You clan members circled, dancing and performing a mysterious ritual.

In the center of their circle, a black gate that seemed to swallow all light stood prominently.

Passing through this mysterious dark gate led to the other side of the Profound Yellow Realm, into the Sea of Darkness.

Sacred Emperor Li Ping was currently within.

He was accompanied by Venerable Yin.

In the Sea of Darkness, sight, sound, and even spiritual sense lost their communicative properties.

Yet, Li Fan could still feel Venerable Yin's whispers by his ear.

It was as if some mystical power was directly attached to his skin, enabling close-quarters communication.

Being in the Sea of Darkness, disconnected from the Sacred Dynasty's destiny, Li Ping's current strength was incredibly weak. Any Nascent Soul cultivator from the Myriad Immortals Alliance could likely kill him with ease.

However, the Sacred Dynasty's Chosen Emperor in this dark, alien realm felt no fear.

Because within him lay a power that ordinary cultivators could not detect.

A vast golden force that transcended the mortal realm.

The You clan's cultivation plan was progressing smoothly.

It even bypassed the physical growth process; upon birth, they were mature individuals with all bodily functions at their peak.

Although the drawback was a further reduced lifespan, expected to be only three to five years.

However, as long as the flesh factories produced continuously, a substantial scale of You clan members, loyal to the Sacred Emperor's prayers, could be maintained.

After the You clan population surpassed four digits, the daily generated essence of wish power reached a considerable level.

Under Li Ping's deliberate manipulation and weaving, a giant golden net formed within him, centered around his heart.

The essence of wish power surged like a ceaseless river. Now, even without using his cultivation, Sacred Emperor Li Ping could perform incredible divine abilities with a mere thought.

For example, with a single thought, he could trace the source of the wish power essence and instantly return to the Great Qi of the Sacred Dynasty, regardless of his location in the Profound Yellow Realm. Even if other forces interfered, it would at most merely delay his return, unable to completely prevent it.

Furthermore, when he was attacked, the giant net of wish power essence would spontaneously defend and retaliate.

With the current scale of power within his body's golden net, Sacred Emperor Li Ping was confident that even an Immortal cultivator of the Profound Yellow Realm could not keep him. Of course, this was excluding the transmission of dharma.

This was the confidence that allowed him to personally venture into the Sea of Darkness. Through the power of the spirits in Venerable Yin's world, the two communicated, word by word.

"Don't you feel the strangeness here?" Venerable Yin's voice was intermittent. His true form was somewhere else.

"Pitch black, nothing else," Sacred Emperor Li Ping said in a deep voice.

"Ah, right. You're different from me; it's normal for you not to hear these sounds. The hushed whispers of various eras and individuals from the Profound Yellow Realm are surging and ebbing in this Sea of Darkness..."

With Venerable Yin's explanation, Li Ping finally understood what he meant by strangeness.

The Underworld was the collection of the Profound Yellow Realm's powers that had deviated from the Immortal Ruins.

These were originally part of the Profound Yellow Realm. While being drawn to the Underworld for unknown reasons, they also brought along some "information." This could be a sound, a few images, or even a complete divine sense.

Over time, suppressed by the powers of this place, they all sank into the Sea of Darkness.

"So, the Sea of Darkness is actually quite bustling," Li Ping mused.

"Not necessarily. The nature of this place dictates that all information becomes dormant. I can only access these fragments of time by absorbing them. Didn't you ask me why the You clan members have special physiques? I think I know the answer."

As he said this, Li Ping felt the darkness behind him stir.

Venerable Yin suddenly appeared.

Contrasting with the gloom of this place, the small vortex-like state around him, like a small whirlpool in the sea, allowed Li Fan to "see" him clearly.

"If we consider the power of the Immortal Ruins as an attraction, then the power that sustains the existence of the Underworld can be seen as a repulsion. This repulsion is not constant like the attraction from the Immortal Ruins. Instead, it appears and washes over like ocean tides, regularly. The cumulative effect over time has formed this peculiar existence in the Profound Yellow Realm."

Venerable Yin's tone was filled with astonishment.

Previously, although he vaguely knew of this region's existence, he had never systematically studied it. This deep investigation had deeply impressed him with the wonders of the Sea of Darkness.

"The attraction comes from power outside the Profound Yellow Realm, while the repulsion originates from the Profound Yellow Realm itself, but not from the heavens and earth of the Profound Yellow Realm..."

Venerable Yin fell silent for a moment, as if calculating something.

"If my guess is correct, this periodic, spontaneous repulsion should be from the **Floating Sky Star Array** of the ancient Profound Heaven Sect!"

Upon mentioning this array, Venerable Yin's tone instantly became somewhat subtle.

Certain unpleasant memories seemed to flash through his mind.

But he quickly suppressed this emotion stemming from his innate nature and continued his analysis.

"So that's how it is. Floating Sky, Floating Sky. If it cannot counter the attraction of the Immortal Ruins that caused the birth of the Darkest Star Sea, how can it float in the boundless sea of stars?"

"Compared to that, the golden chains' method of capturing other worlds is more like salvaging resources, an act of strengthening themselves, with other things being incidental."

"Indeed, it is a world-shaking, unprecedented, and grand array of the Profound Yellow Realm. It's a pity that the grand array is now damaged. And if I'm not mistaken, each activation of the repulsion in the Sea of Darkness also consumes the Profound Yellow Realm's essence as a price. In the past, the Profound Yellow Realm could capture other worlds to offset this consumption."

"But times have changed. Not to mention supplying the repulsion of the Sea of Darkness, the Profound Yellow Realm can barely protect itself."

Venerable Yin, uncharacteristically, revealed a gloating tone.

"Hmph," Venerable Yin cleared his throat, sensing that Holy Emperor Li Ping's gaze seemed to be fixed on him.

"Alright, let's get back to the main topic. Creating the Dark Sea is an instinctive behavior of the grand array. Even if the grand array is damaged, it will continue to execute according to its original logic. This Floating Sky Grand Array is truly remarkable. After losing the Profound Yellow energy supply, it must have started to find a substitute on its own."

"The Yin clan people were born because of this."

"You must have seen it too. The power that the Yin clan people pray for can, to a certain extent, replace the supply of the Profound Yellow Realm's world essence..."

"I don't know how much you understand about array formations. If I say this, will you understand?"

Venerable Yin was speaking, but he noticed that Holy Emperor Li Ping's emotions seemed a bit strange, and he thought he was speaking too obscurely and couldn't explain it clearly.

So he asked.

"I understand a little. The Floating Sky Grand Array was built by King Xuan Tian. If what you say is true, then this Dark Sea here, like the array module that captures worlds in the Star Sea, is also an important functional part of the Floating Sky Grand Array," Li Ping pondered.

"That's right," Venerable Yin nodded.

"Moreover, according to my judgment, apart from these two and the main control of the grand array, the Floating Sky Grand Array should have other functions..."

"The principle of array formations flows infinitely. The golden chains and the Dark Sea cannot form a complete array cycle. There should indeed be two other subsidiary array modules for this grand array to operate at its peak efficiency."

Before Venerable Yin could speak, he heard that Holy Emperor Li Ping had already stated his judgment.

"It seems your attainments in array formations are much greater than mine," Venerable Yin said with a sigh.

Li Ping did not reply, but was contemplating the other missing parts of the Floating Sky Grand Array.

At the same time, he continued to communicate with Venerable Yin without stopping.

"If we consider the Profound Yellow Realm as a flying boat struggling near the vortex of the Star Sea, then in a sense, this place is the power source of the flying boat?"

Venerable Yin pondered for a moment and agreed.

"Then if... I'm just saying, if we could provide enough energy supply to the Dark Sea, would it be possible to gradually struggle out of the vortex?" Holy Emperor Li Ping asked slowly, his tone unreadable.

"...It is theoretically possible. I don't know the energy conversion efficiency of the Dark Sea. It is more likely that even if the entire Profound Yellow Realm were burned, it might not be able to move the Profound Yellow Realm. Moreover, I have a feeling that due to the shortage of Yin clan population for a period of time, the energy supply of the Dark Sea has encountered problems again. Perhaps it has begun to trigger new evolutionary methods of energy absorption." Venerable Yin shook his head.

"I always feel a faint sense of crisis in my heart. I cannot be careless," Venerable Yin's tone was somewhat solemn.

"However, haven't you recently created a large number of Yin clan people? If you can restore the energy supply of the Dark Sea, perhaps you can prevent this evolution from happening." Venerable Yin suddenly said.

Great Qi Holy Emperor Li Ping remained silent.

...

Headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Li Fan, who had just failed to decipher the colorful rainbow light, could not afford to rest and adjust. He immediately rushed into deducing the Profound Yellow Realm's [Floating Sky Grand Array].

Li Fan thought of the scene in the 119th life of Mo Ruobin, where he mysteriously disappeared in the Dark Sea, leaving only an empty shell.

"So the Dark Sea is also part of the Floating Sky Grand Array."

"Mo Ruobin had successfully learned information related to King Xuan Tian through the Heavenly Xuan Mirror at that time. He finally went to the Dark Sea. I am not sure if he truly perished, but his cultivation is very likely to have been directly swallowed by the Dark Sea and turned into Profound Yellow motive energy."

"Whether he sacrificed himself for the Profound Yellow Realm with great love, or used it as an opportunity to fake his death and escape, it is almost certain that King Xuan Tian, or at least matters closely related to King Xuan Tian, should be hidden in the Dark Sea."

"I previously thought that this Dark Sea was a manifestation of pure exotic power, so I could do nothing about it. But now I know that it is the manifestation of the grand array's power..."

"I may not be unable to decipher it!"

All the senses of Holy Emperor Li Ping in the Dark Sea, and the scenes witnessed in the 119th life, flashed through Li Fan's mind.

The End Dissolution Disk, empowered by the Dao Transformation Stone, hummed.

It was operating at its limit like never before.

"No wonder the Heavenly Xuan Mirror was hesitant and even offered an immortal-grade array diagram to temporarily deal with me when I asked for the Floating Sky Grand Array back then. Now it seems that this Floating Grand Array is simply the ultimate modification array for the Profound Yellow Realm, transforming the Profound Yellow Realm from a pure immortal cultivation world into an eternal immortal boat capable of traversing the Immortal Ruins."

"If the grand array were not damaged, if there were no high wall outside the Immortal Ruins..."

"Perhaps the Profound Yellow Realm would have long broken free and roamed the Star Sea."

"Perhaps it was when I asked the Heavenly Xuan Mirror for the Floating Sky Grand Array diagram that I finally showed a flaw. After all, given the importance of this array, the Twelve Dharma Kings of the Heavenly Xuan Sect had no reason not to know. And my performance at the time did not show the corresponding attention. I only treated it as an ordinary array..."

Various thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind simultaneously.

Time slowly passed, and the light of the Dissolution Disk and the Dao Transformation Stone flickered continuously.

Sensing the long-lost and increasingly intense stinging sensation between his brows, Li Fan frowned slightly: "It seems that the complexity of this Floating Grand Array is beyond my imagination. I have too little information. Even with three immortal-grade array formations as a basis, it is too difficult to force a deduction. It is even difficult to even attempt to find a flaw in the Dark Sea."

"Moreover, does this grand array also have the ability to prevent people from deducing and deciphering it?"

Li Fan was somewhat shaken inwardly.

Each time the End Dissolution Disk reached a critical juncture in its deduction, most of the array data would inexplicably collapse and disappear.

It was as if some power was interfering across space and time.

Li Fan even suspected that if his main body were not hiding in the Myriad Immortals Alliance's Array Derivation Jade Space, he might have been directly locked onto by this power, rather than just being interfered with.

"Fortunately, there is still data retained from each array deduction and restoration. It's just slower."

"Of course, it's best to maintain the current state of the Dark Sea without change."

...

As Li Fan's main body's thoughts churned, Holy Emperor Li Ping's decision also suddenly changed.

"I wish to compete with the Myriad Immortals Alliance for the Profound Yellow Realm, so I will naturally not stand by and do nothing."

"The Profound Yellow Realm, our sole dwelling place, must naturally be protected." Holy Emperor Li Ping stated as a matter of course.

"After we return, I will allocate a portion of the You people for them to return to the Dark Sea to worship. Since the Myriad Immortals Alliance has captured You people and caused the imbalance of the You Realm, the Holy Dynasty will bear the full responsibility."

"However..."

Li Ping gazed out at the deep, dark ocean before him.

"Although the Source Energy Essence is vast, its quantity is limited after all. I wonder how many You people must pray day and night to restore the Dark Sea?"

Yin Shangren was somewhat moved by Li Ping's attitude and, after pondering for a moment, replied, "According to the leader of the You people, during their peak period, their members' footprints could be found throughout the entire underground cave world. I estimate there were at least five hundred thousand of them..."

Li Ping slowly said, "It seems we need to improve our methods of treating the You people bit by bit."

Yin Shangren also nodded in agreement.

"This investigation will end here for now. I have a feeling that we are gradually being targeted by this darkness."

"Good."

A golden light enveloped Li Ping's body, making him appear incredibly sacred and majestic.

As the light and shadow rippled, time and space seemed to distort.

The next moment, Holy Emperor Li Ping's figure vanished into thin air, returning to the Lesser World of Daqi.

He did not use the portal created by the You people's sacrifices and prayers, but instead directly utilized the power of the Great Net of Source Energy Essence.

"Currently, the Source Energy Net's origin is only in Daqi. If, one day, You people throughout the Profound Yellow Realm pray to me, then I can use this connection to appear wherever I wish." Holy Emperor Li Ping mused.

Having understood the significance of the You people, Li Ping summoned Wang Xuanba.

He conveyed his new strategy for dealing with the You people to him. In addition to increasing the production of You people in the flesh and blood factories, they would also simultaneously strive to grow the normal You population for sustainable development.

"For these additional You people, you must find ways to increase their lifespan."

Wang Xuanba, kneeling on one knee, listened to the Holy Emperor's instructions. Although he didn't know the reason for the sudden, significant shift in the other party's attitude, he loyally accepted the task.

After Wang Xuanba left, Li Ping then summoned Sun Erlang.

He assigned Sun Erlang the task of leading an army to conquer several underground worlds. Sun Erlang, who had been idle for a while, gladly accepted the order.

However, he did not dismiss Sun Erlang immediately as he had Wang Xuanba. Instead, he continued to inquire.

"How has Yi Shu of the Grand Origin Sect been performing recently?"

The Holy Dynasty's destiny was intrinsically tied to Li Ping. As the Holy Emperor of Destiny of Daqi, he naturally knew everything that happened within the Lesser World of Daqi, yet he still asked this question knowingly.

Sun Erlang did not dare to conceal anything and truthfully replied.

"I didn't expect the Grand Origin Sect to agree to your request." Li Ping's voice was cold and devoid of emotion, echoing in the Holy Emperor's throne room.

"But it's for the best. If, one day, the Holy Dynasty falls, seeking refuge at the Grand Origin Sect would be a good outcome for you."

Sun Erlang suddenly froze, and his expression changed: "Master, how can the Holy Dynasty..."

Li Ping, in a rare display, actually chuckled: "Where is there absolute certainty in this world? What's wrong with having multiple escape routes? However, this is only for you. Do not mention this to your junior brothers and sisters."

"You may go."

Sun Erlang departed in trepidation and unease.

Li Ping sat on his throne, alone in the empty Holy Emperor's seat.

Although the exploration of the You Realm only lasted a short while, it had caused quite a stir in his mind.

"The Space Ferry Grand Array, the fishing pond..."

"My strength has already reached the pinnacle of the Profound Yellow Realm, standing at the threshold. However, there are too many strange things hidden within the Profound Yellow Realm. The Myriad Immortals Alliance has ruled half of the Profound Yellow for so many years; their foundation must be even deeper than what is revealed. Moreover, the war with the Myriad Immortals Alliance must not only be won but also concluded swiftly. Otherwise, prolonged wars among cultivators will inevitably inflict irreparable damage on this world once again. A tattered boat that has been patched up time and again, how can it withstand further turmoil?"

As the Holy Emperor of Destiny, he had many considerations.

After pondering for a long time, Li Ping's figure flickered and disappeared from the Lesser World of Daqi.

When he reappeared, he was already in the Nine Mountains Province of the Profound Yellow Realm. Protected by the Source Energy Essence, he was now qualified to venture out occasionally without excessive worry about his personal safety.

"Tian Beast."

Standing in mid-air, Li Ping sensed the chaotic and disordered space around him.

"If my guess is correct, the Tian Beast should also be a part of the Space Ferry Grand Array."

"The sea of stars is fraught with danger. To successfully ferry across, it is essential to scout the path ahead and avoid dangers."

"The Eye of the Tian Beast..."

Faint images flashed through his mind. Outside the Profound Yellow Realm, in an independent space called the Eye of the Tian Beast, it seemed possible to observe deeper into the sea of stars than from within the Profound Yellow Realm.

"It's a pity the Tian Beast is already dead. To find that unique space, one can only rely on chance. The vast sea of stars, coupled with the constant pull of the Immortal Ruins, makes it even more difficult than finding a needle in a haystack."

"Three out of the four components of the Ferry Array have revealed their traces. The last one remains completely elusive."

"..."

He shook his head slightly, suppressing his thoughts for the time being. Silently, Li Ping had already arrived at the headquarters of the Spirit Origin Sect.

The Spirit Origin Sect was the largest native power in the chaotic region of the Nine Mountains Province. Its disciples all cultivated the Common People's Spirit Origin Art. Although it seemingly broke the rule of not being able to cultivate multiple methods simultaneously, in reality, they were merely tools for refining and absorbing Source Energy, as devised by the leader of the Spirit Origin Sect.

Easily bypassing various restrictions, Li Ping followed the scent of Source Energy to the underground base of the Craftsman Hermit. It was filled with all sorts of strange and peculiar components, and busy at work was the Craftsman Hermit himself.

"Where exactly is it lacking?"

"Source Energy, Source Energy Essence, a difference of two words, yet a chasm of distinction!"

A puppet sculpted from golden Source Energy exploded with a bang, scattering streams of light. As if the experiment had failed, the Craftsman Hermit became somewhat agitated.

"Come here!"

He turned to a female cultivator standing nearby and snorted, a whip suddenly appearing in his hand. The female cultivator's expression was blank, her eyes lacking the usual liveliness of a normal person.

"Not like it, it's nothing like it! Not like the real Shangguan at all!"

Seeing the female cultivator's appearance, the Craftsman Hermit grew even more annoyed. Just as the whip was about to fall, he suddenly saw the faceless Holy Emperor's figure in the secret chamber. As if a guilty secret had been discovered, the Craftsman Hermit's hands trembled, and the whip almost fell to the ground.

"Who's there?!"

The Craftsman Hermit, both startled and angry, glared at Li Ping and shouted. In the secret chamber, the puppets, which had been like inanimate objects, suddenly came to life, staring at Li Ping.

Chapter 1218: The Holy Emperor Receives Heaven's Mandate

Though surrounded, Li Ping showed no sign of panic.

These puppets were all driven by Source Energy refined and extracted from the myriad beings' spiritual energy.

Currently, the Enlightenment Spiritual Energy Art practiced by the populace of the Great Beginning Holy Dynasty was an evolved version of the myriad beings' spiritual energy art.

With just a glance, Li Ping understood the method by which Source Energy influenced the puppets. The network of golden Source Energy within his body emitted invisible fluctuations.

The purity of his energy was infinitely close to Source Energy Essence, exerting a natural suppression on the puppets controlled by the Craftsman.

In the blink of an eye, the dozens of puppets in the secret chamber, who had been glaring menacingly, became wobbly and unable to stand.

This included the female Shangguan puppet.

The Craftsman's expression turned extremely ugly. Having dealt with Source Energy for most of his life, how could he not recognize the mysterious person's method of influencing the puppets?

He had already abandoned any thought of fighting and began plotting how to escape, and even how to abandon this current body and be reborn from his memory backup.

Li Ping observed the Craftsman's shifting expression and naturally saw through his hidden thoughts.

Leisurely, he revealed the locations where the Craftsman had hidden several memory backups.

The Craftsman's mind was greatly shaken, and he could no longer hide his shock.

"Who exactly are you?!" His voice cracked with fear.

Unable to fight, unable to flee.

Since escaping to this Profound Yellow Realm, the Craftsman had never felt such despair.

"Fellow Daoist Craftsman, please do not misunderstand. I have come to bestow upon you a grand fortune," Li Ping said slowly.

However, his slightly somber tone, combined with his inscrutable face, offered no conviction.

The Craftsman Hermit naturally did not believe him, and his fear intensified.

This was because he had never mentioned the name "Craftsman" to anyone in the Profound Yellow Realm.

The world only knew him as the mysterious and unfathomable Spiritual Energy Sect Master.

Now, a faceless, mysterious figure had appeared, one who could speak of his origins and knew everything about him!

The Craftsman even wondered if there had been other survivors from the Heavenly Mystery Realm besides himself.

For a moment, the Craftsman's mind was in turmoil. However, his scattered thoughts vanished as a ball of shining golden light rose in Li Ping's hand.

"Source Energy... Essence?!"

"How is this possible!"

The Craftsman exclaimed again, his face filled with disbelief.

Before he could get a closer look, Li Ping retracted the golden sphere.

"Fellow Daoist, are you not seeking Source Energy Essence without success? I can teach you." This statement from Li Ping completely stunned the Craftsman once more.

"Fellow Daoist, are you not trying to recreate the immortal-grade puppet 'Ancestor'? I can also help you," Li Ping continued unhurriedly.

The Craftsman was now numb with shock. Li Ping's knowledge of the existence of Ancestor did not surprise him at all.

While feeling an immense sense of absurdity, a sliver of hope also emerged.

What if the other party was telling the truth?

"What are your conditions?" the Craftsman asked directly.

Li Ping chuckled, "Hearing is false, seeing is believing. Please, follow me, fellow Daoist."

The Craftsman followed Li Ping, traveling eastward from Jiushan Prefecture all the way to the depths of the Congyun Sea.

Near an undersea volcano.

"Hmm?"

The Craftsman gazed at the terrain and vaguely sensed that within the subterranean earth fire, a being seemed to be slumbering. Li Ping's next words confirmed his suspicion.

"You mean, a puppet with complete self-awareness?" The Craftsman sounded somewhat disbelieving.

"Not a direct creation of a puppet, but one that has transformed into a puppet through profound and wondrous methods. It has absorbed the power of the earth veins for thousands of years and has yet to complete its full metamorphosis. If it were awakened rashly, it might result in a defective puppet body. I have brought fellow Daoist here to see if you have any solutions," Li Ping said calmly.

"Transforming itself into an object?" The Craftsman repeatedly mulled over the meaning of these words.

Then, a golden light shot from his eyes, scanning the continuous earth veins below.

After a long while, the golden light faded, and the Craftsman nodded. "This puppet below, having been tempered by the earth fire for thousands of years non-stop, has indeed seen its power expand to an unimaginable degree. However, the intensity of the earth fire is limited. Even if it absorbs for another thousand years, its power is destined to be capped at the peak of the Nascent Soul stage. Further advancement is impossible."

"And this earth fire formation was something it set up before falling asleep. After so long, the two have begun to show signs of merging. If it were easily modified, it might also startle it awake."

"Unless..."

The Craftsman Hermit pondered for a moment and then mused, "Unless the earth fire that tempers this puppet itself undergoes a change."

"As you know, the Heavenly Dao of this Profound Yellow Realm is extremely peculiar, with frequent major transformations of heaven and earth. And earth fire is a manifestation of the laws of the Heavenly Dao..."

"However, this opportunity is rare and hard to come by," the Craftsman stated truthfully.

Li Ping slowly said, "I understand."

"As expected of a descendant of the Heavenly Mystery Realm. My original plan was to use heavenly treasures to modify and elevate the Earth Fire Returning Origin Formation. But now, I think your suggestion is better. To recreate heaven and earth with the power of heaven and earth..."

The Craftsman blinked slightly and then repeated emphatically, "I said, this opportunity is rare and hard to come by."

"Is that so?" Li Ping gave a wry smile.

"Fellow Daoist, observe my methods."

After boasting grandly, Li Ping closed his eyes and stood still.

The Craftsman thought he was accumulating power to unleash some divine ability and immediately observed intently.

However, after waiting for more than half a day, there was no sign of any movement.

If not for the faint aura of Source Energy Essence that still locked onto him, the Craftsman would have taken this opportunity to slip away.

But the situation was beyond his control. Since the other party remained silent, he could only continue to wait.

They waited for nearly half a month.

Only the Craftsman, as a master artificer with an exceptional temperament, could barely endure it.

And in a place invisible to the Craftsman, within the small world of the Great Beginning Holy Dynasty.

The numerous You Clan people who had been captured, along with those produced by the flesh factories, began to pray to the Dark Sea once more.

Perhaps it was because they were naturally created to provide power for the Dark Sea.

With little to no guidance, their praying efficiency was several times higher than praying to the Faceless Holy Emperor.

A subtle influence began to take hold in the Profound Yellow Realm.

And the Faceless Holy Emperor of the Great Beginning, standing in the depths of the Congyun Sea, silently felt this change in the world.

The occurrence of certain things was not an overnight affair but a gradual accumulation.

Half a month later, when Li Ping sensed that this accumulation had finally surpassed a certain threshold...

"Reverse the heavens and earth!"

The Faceless Holy Emperor softly chanted, his figure imposing, and pointed gently towards the continuous earth fire below.

It seemed like a casual gesture, yet moments later, the Craftsman, who had been observing, was deeply startled!

The Earth’s core fire, which had already reached its theoretical limit, began to burn even more fiercely.

Blazing flames surged and erupted.

Cracks appeared on the seabed, and countless bubbles churned incessantly.

What startled Craftsman was not this anomaly.

Instead, it was another peculiar being that was silently born amidst this earth fire before his eyes.

Having been in the Profound Yellow Realm for so many years, he was no stranger to such existences.

It had a name known to almost everyone: the Soul of Heaven and Earth!

As the materialized embodiment of the Profound Yellow Realm’s laws, any cultivator who absorbed it could ascend to the heavens in a single step, reaching the Dao Integration stage.

The Soul of Heaven and Earth was an extremely precious cultivation resource, and its appearance was never predictable.

But now, the Soul of Heaven and Earth had materialized under the finger of this faceless mysterious person!

“This…”

As Craftsman perceived it with incomprehension and extreme shock, something even more miraculous occurred.

The Soul of Heaven and Earth, born from the earth fire, exhibited no unusual behavior.

Instead, it quietly catalyzed the earth fire. After its color changed from orange-yellow to pitch black, it actively threw itself into the Earth Fire Conversion Array!

It was a clear act of self-sacrifice, meant to exchange itself for the possibility of further progress for the slumbering puppet within the array!

The black fire flickered silently. Within the continuously operating Earth Fire Conversion Array, it merged into the massive puppet body buried beneath the ground.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Continual sounds of collapse and explosion emanated from underground.

These were signs of the impurities within the puppet’s body being refined.

“This Soul of Heaven and Earth, not only did it not attack cultivators, but it actually followed that person’s will and aided this underwater puppet?”

“How is this possible?”

It was widely known that the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao and Profound Yellow cultivators were irreconcilably opposed.

Upon seeing the Soul of Heaven and Earth, cultivators would be uncontrollably driven by the desire to devour it.

And the Soul of Heaven and Earth, in turn, showed no mercy to cultivators who dared to appear before them, killing them without exception.

But what was happening before Craftsman’s eyes completely shattered his understanding of the world.

“Even the Soul of Heaven and Earth listens to him so obediently… Could it be that the person before me is the embodiment of the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao?” Craftsman thought, finding the idea absurd.

“The Soul of Heaven and Earth is born to fulfill its heavenly duty. The black flame before you is called Ink Flame. Its duty is to assist in the birth of the Dao Integration puppet…” Li Ping explained in a calm tone.

He did not directly voice his thoughts at that moment: “The ability to manipulate heaven and earth, to forge the will of heaven, and to generate the Soul of Heaven and Earth from nothing. But that is only where it ends. Under normal circumstances, to make the Soul of Heaven and Earth, which opposes cultivators, sacrifice itself to aid a cultivator’s advancement…”

“This completely violates the will of the Heavenly Dao and is fundamentally impossible under normal conditions.”

“However…”

“I am the embodiment of the Profound Yellow Heavenly Dao, and all my actions are for the sake of the Profound Yellow Heaven and Earth!”

“Heaven and Earth will naturally assist me!”

Li Ping felt the subtle shift in the Heavenly Will that had occurred within him since the Dark Race people, under his command, had resumed their faith in the Dark Sea.

It was precisely because of the synergy of these various factors that the Soul of Heaven and Earth that appeared this time was the extremely powerful Ink Flame.

That unsettling black flame even made Li Ping feel a trace of danger.

Under the refinement of the Ink Flame, the underwater puppet also progressed at an unimaginable speed.

“It won’t be long before this puppet emerges.”

“Although its realm is only Dao Integration, if it were to truly fight, I’m afraid I would be far from its match. And this is merely the result of the mysterious person’s casual gesture…” Craftsman secretly observed Li Ping again.

While filled with dread, he became even more expectant of the two boons the other party had mentioned.

“It seems he wasn’t boasting…”

Li Ping and Craftsman waited for the puppet’s emergence.

As the Ink Flame and the puppet continued to merge, the commotion in the surrounding sea area grew increasingly violent.

However, Li Ping concealed it with arrays.

Otherwise, such an anomaly would have long ago attracted a large number of cultivators.

Another half a month passed.

As if its energy was completely depleted, the Earth’s core fire beneath the sea had been extinguished. The lava solidified into black crystals.

Only the seabed remained shrouded in thick mist due to the high temperature.

The aura of the Soul of Heaven and Earth, Ink Flame, had completely vanished. In its place, a new, powerful aura emerged from the seabed.

A sense of danger from within made Craftsman cautiously move a little closer to Li Ping’s location.

Suddenly, that aura disappeared from Craftsman’s perception.

Craftsman’s face changed drastically. A layer of silver-white armor materialized, protecting him.

A silhouette of profound darkness silently appeared beside them.

Its target was not Craftsman, but Li Ping, the Faceless Holy Emperor of Great Beginning!

The newly awakened Heavenly Yang was extremely vigilant. Sensing the two powerful auras beside him, he attacked without a word.

As the crisis struck, facing Heavenly Yang’s attack, Li Ping did not dodge.

He did not even utilize the power of his Source Essence for defense.

With a simple telepathic message, he awakened the somewhat confused Heavenly Yang, halting his rash actions.

“Heavenly Yang, do you wish to avenge your master and senior brothers?”

Heavenly Yang’s body trembled violently. He revealed his true form, staring intently at Li Ping.

His appearance was still that of a child no older than ten, just as he was before falling into slumber.

However, a profound weariness beyond his years occasionally flickered in his eyes.

After calming down slightly, the memories of Li Ping helping him absorb the Soul of Heaven and Earth during his slumber surfaced in his mind.

Knowing that his current strength was entirely due to the other party’s assistance, the hostility in Heavenly Eye’s heart gradually faded.

He still stared intently at Li Ping, awaiting an answer to Li Ping’s question.

“The prime culprit behind the war with the Profound Yellow Realm, which resulted in the deaths of countless sects and cultivators, still remains…”

“I intend to…”

Li Ping slowly transmitted his plan.

Heavenly Yang listened quietly to his plan, his aura fluctuating.

Then, he restrained himself and flew to Li Ping’s side.

“It’s not advisable to linger here. Let’s return first,” Li Ping said.

He then looked at Craftsman, “Will you accompany us, fellow Daoist?”

Ever since Heavenly Yang appeared, Craftsman’s gaze had not left him.

“Do I have a choice but to come along…” Craftsman muttered inwardly, nodding in agreement.

It was only after the three of them traversed the void and arrived in the minor world of Great Beginning that Craftsman’s gaze finally shifted away from Heavenly Yang.

The Five Elements Great Cave-Heaven led the way.

A total of nine cave-heavens, surrounding the minor world of Great Beginning.

They provided the towing power for its traversal through the void.

And this mysterious minor world possessed a spiritual energy concentration far exceeding that of the Profound Yellow Realm itself.

It was as if an invisible force concealed it, making it impossible for even Craftsman to probe its details with his divine sense.

…

Just as Craftsman was once again plunged into shock,

An aura streaked across the sky like a rainbow, causing Craftsman’s heart to suddenly leap.

Heavenly Yang, who had been silent, also became alert.

A cultivator of the Longevity Realm?

How is that possible?

Chapter 1220: The Fishing Yields a Treasure

Hundred Flowers Daoist came to report to Li Ping. Of course, the main purpose was to request source energy essence. After absorbing it a few times and making rapid progress in strength, Hundred Flowers had developed a taste for it and found it difficult to give up.

In reality, the golden source energy created by the prayer rituals of the You clan was still a small distance from true source energy essence. However, for an ancient Longevity cultivator like Hundred Flowers, anything that allowed her to advance further was practically indistinguishable from the real thing.

After greeting Li Ping, Hundred Flowers also noticed Qiao Gong and Tian Yang beside him. Although Tian Yang appeared to be a teenager, the power contained within him made Hundred Flowers inwardly awe. As for Qiao Gong, he exuded a familiar aura, one that belonged to a cultivator from beyond the Profound Yellow Realm.

After carefully observing the two, Hundred Flowers said nothing more. The Great Beginning Holy Dynasty had gathered too many strange and peculiar individuals; she had long since become accustomed to it. This was, in fact, a good thing for her.

Having received the source energy essence from Li Ping, Hundred Flowers happily returned.

"Fellow Daoist, who is that?" Qiao Gong asked somewhat timidly.

"Hundred Flowers Daoist, formerly the sect master of the Lotus Sect of the Myriad Blossoms Realm," Li Ping introduced concisely.

This simple statement shocked Qiao Gong and also set his mind to imagining countless possibilities. He was indeed from another cultivation world, just like her. Then, were there even more such beings in this small world?

With this question in mind, Qiao Gong and Tian Yang, led by Li Ping, took a general tour of the Great Beginning Holy Dynasty. Both the Immortal Spirit Pagoda, which continuously released spiritual energy day and night, and the Sky Patrol Arrows, which flew through the heavens on vigilant guard, left the two in awe. During their journey, they occasionally encountered unfathomable individuals, which further enlightened them: the Great Beginning Holy Dynasty was full of hidden dragons and crouching tigers, and there were many beings like themselves.

Finally, they arrived within the Holy Emperor's Seat. Li Ping returned to his rightful position, looked down at the two, and his voice echoed in the empty building.

"Fellow Daoist Qiao Gong, I know your artifact refining skills are superb. I have some ideas for refining new types of puppets, which you may find useful to consider."

Qiao Gong was quickly captivated by the schemes Li Ping displayed. "Source energy essence, combined with the 'Dao Embodiment' technique, and augmented by the artifact refining technology of the Heavenly Mechanism Realm... to create beings with their own consciousness, capable of rivaling immortal-grade puppets."

The more Qiao Gong read, the more excited he became. In his opinion, the plan was completely feasible, and many of the ideas within it even coincided with his own long-held beliefs.

"I will specially carve out a space within the Great Beginning small world as your research facility," Li Ping continued. "Tian Yang will also assist you. First, refine some puppets as trials. Once they are perfected, you will help modify Tian Yang."

Upon hearing this, Qiao Gong glanced at Tian Yang and suddenly understood. "With Ink Flame as the foundation, and source energy essence as an aid to sublimation... once perfected, his strength will not be inferior to a Profound Yellow Longevity cultivator!"

Thinking of the possibility of truly creating Longevity, or even immortal-grade existences in a sense, in his hands in the future, Qiao Gong couldn't help but become immensely excited.

Shortly after completing the coordination with the personnel of the Great Beginning, Qiao Gong eagerly began his work.

"With all arrangements made, the next step is to await the return of the Medicine King Sect," Li Ping mused. He had long since laid a vast trap. Once the Medicine King Cauldron returned to the Profound Yellow Realm, it would be directly drawn into the Great Beginning small world.

Although elixirs were not very effective in boosting the overall strength of the Great Beginning, Li Ping possessed many malicious elven recipes that could severely weaken the cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

The faceless Holy Emperor sat upon the Holy Emperor's Seat, his mind reviewing all the recent affairs of the Holy Dynasty. Without him needing to inquire about every matter, everything was proceeding in an orderly and stable manner. Everyone knew that the Holy Emperor was constantly watching, and indeed, no one dared to slack off.

After a cursory review of minor matters, the Holy Emperor's thoughts gradually calmed. His figure flickered, and the next moment he arrived in the dark secret chamber beneath the Holy Emperor's Seat. This place resembled the endless starry sky, with dozens of treasures floating quietly like stars, emitting brilliant light.

The Holy Dynasty's fishing competition had never ceased. The treasures caught from the fishing pools were countless. Li Ping's initial promise had not been broken either. All these treasures belonged to the individual citizens of the Holy Dynasty. Of course, for those who, due to personal disposition or an inability to grasp their specific uses, did not require these treasures, they could choose to turn them in for other rewards.

Within this treasure vault were the unclaimed prizes from the fishing pools. Li Ping was not particularly interested in most of them. Only one...

Li Ping extended his right hand, and golden source energy essence appeared. One of the light clusters in the treasure vault reacted the fastest. Before the other light clusters could make any movement, it had already come to Li Ping's side, rotating incessantly as if to please him. Within the light cluster, a tiny kitten could be vaguely seen, gazing expectantly at Li Ping.

Li Ping condensed the source energy essence to his fingertip, and the kitten instantly understood his intention. It nuzzled joyfully, approaching and licking Li Ping's finger.

"Neither beast nor artifact. The vast sea of stars, indeed, is filled with wonders. To think that even such a creation exists," Li Ping couldn't help but sigh inwardly. This kitten, though seemingly harmless, actually triggered a subconscious defensive response from the golden source energy web within Li Ping's body when it approached. Despite seeming alive, it had no life aura whatsoever.

In fact, after it was fished out, it was initially just a statue in the shape of a kitten. No matter how the lucky angler tried to probe its uses, he found none and eventually grudgingly turned it over to the Holy Dynasty for other rewards. At first, even Li Ping had not noticed anything unusual about it. It wasn't until one day, he suddenly discovered that the treasures in the vault had mysteriously decreased, and after using source energy essence for extensive fishing investigations, he apprehended the culprit.

The cat was merely one of its forms. After eating its fill, it was preparing to sleep lazily when it sensed Li Ping's intent. Although still somewhat unwilling, considering its future meals, the kitten let out a weak growl. With a flash of greenish-blue light, the kitten transformed into a small, square box. Around the box, peculiar images were engraved: stars falling, myriad beasts emerging from the earth, countless colossal ships traversing the sea of stars, and two giant figures facing each other, separated by a river of light and shadow.

Li Ping held the small square box and aimed it at one of the light clusters in the treasure vault. One end of the box instantly emitted a faint greenish-blue light, enveloping the light cluster within it.

A moment later, a beam of light also shot out from the other end of the small square box.

The small box shook violently, as if it had expended a great deal.

Seeing this, Li Ping poured in some golden source energy.

Nourished, the small square box slowly stabilized.

Finally, the light from both ends disappeared, and an item identical to the previously enveloped light cluster appeared in the Saint Dynasty's treasure vault.

Li Ping took both light clusters into his hands and compared them carefully.

Inside both light clusters were two identical swords. They seemed to be forged from ten-thousand-year-old ice, and their blades emanated an icy blue light.

"The Ten-Thousand-Year Ice Sword is forged from the core of a strange object, the Nether Cold Core, which caused an entire realm to freeze completely."

"If the cold energy within were to be fully released, it would be enough to instantly freeze an entire province of the Xuanhuang Realm."

"I believe that even within the current Myriad Immortal Alliance, this sword would be a treasure of considerable value."

"However..."

Li Ping looked at the other Ten-Thousand-Year Ice Sword in his hand. There was no discernible difference.

"It was actually so easily replicated by this square little box," Li Ping's thoughts churned.

While Li Ping was contemplating, the square little box squirmed and transformed back into the appearance of a small kitten. It seemed quite depleted and listless, letting out a yawn and refusing to move. It settled directly onto Li Ping's shoulder and fell into a deep sleep. Clearly, it was not faking, not even showing interest in the golden source energy Li Ping had sent.

Li Ping did not drive it away. It was such a treasure; it was good to keep it close.

"Currently, it appears that when this treasure transforms into the square box, its function is replication."

"It can achieve complete replication of items. This treasure seems to still be in its growth phase; some things cannot yet be replicated. And each replication consumes a great deal, requiring a period of rest and recovery."

"Moreover, this treasure has more than just the square box and cat forms. It likely has other transformations..."

Li Ping gently petted the sleeping cat, which let out an unconscious mewl in response.

"Interesting."

"It was worth my effort in setting up the fishing pond; it finally gave me a surprise."

"Since its form when it appeared in the mortal world was a feline statue, let's call it [Cat Treasure]."

When Cat Treasure was fished up, it was merely the most ordinary white light cluster. But it was clear that Cat Treasure, with its [Replication] ability, could not possibly be of only white quality.

"Although it's possible its abilities weren't activated initially. Regardless, it could even fool the Immortal Treasure Fishing Pond."

"The origin of this [Cat Treasure] is very unusual."

"It might even be from beyond the high walls..."

Li Ping's figure flickered, and he returned to the Saint Emperor's throne.

"This [Cat Treasure] will be a great aid in my struggle against the Myriad Immortal Alliance."

...

In a secret chamber of the Sun family.

Li Fan's main body and his other divine senses already knew about Cat Treasure's existence. However, in this lifetime, Cat Treasure could exert its greatest value by remaining with the Saint Emperor, so there was no rush to replace it with an anchor.

"Furthermore, it's still in its infant stage. Its ultimate potential needs further observation."

"Besides man-made magical treasures, can it also replicate natural wonders of the Xuanhuang Realm, or even existences like the Ultimate Dissolution Disk?"

"If it can..." Li Fan pondered. At most, it would only accelerate his collection progress. Wasn't each of his 'Return to Truth' attempts equivalent to replicating the entire world?

With this thought, Li Fan's initially fluctuating state of mind instantly calmed down.

His thoughts returned to the Sun family.

The Myriad Immortal Alliance headquarters had lifted its lockdown. Sun Luyao had been summoned by the 'Mirror Holder' Fu for a detailed consultation. However, the seven-colored rainbow light that could escape the Xuanhuang Realm remained under the strictest secrecy. Even with the combined scrutiny of the Xuanhuang Mirror's origin and the Boundless Mirror, nothing was detected.

Li Fan was not in a hurry. Walls have ears, and even the strongest protective measures would eventually fail over time. All he had to do was wait patiently. Moreover, he was not the only one interested in the seven-colored rainbow light within the Myriad Immortal Alliance. By utilizing the Xuanhuang Mirror, he could constantly monitor the Myriad Immortal Alliance. As long as they learned this secret through some means, it would mean Li Fan also knew.

"Senior, can the method you mentioned for resolving the Annihilation Wind Tribulation really work?" Sun Luyao, who had always been fearful of Li Fan, suddenly spoke up.

"It's like this." Before Li Fan could answer, Sun Luyao quickly explained, "Recently, for some unknown reason, strange images have been flashing through my mind. They are scenes I've never experienced before. After much thought, they are most likely remnants left by the Annihilation Wind Tribulation..."

At the hint from Li Fan's divine sense, Sun Luyao projected the images he had seen. The scenes were blurry and changed rapidly. Li Fan could only see scenes of countless beings turning to dust in an instant. And the methods those beings displayed in their struggle on the brink of life and death... did not seem like something ordinary cultivators could perform.

"A vision of the Great Tribulation of the Immortal Realm." Li Fan mused inwardly, but he showed no heaviness in his voice. He snorted, "Don't scare yourself. Do you think what you are experiencing is the true Annihilation Wind Tribulation? It's merely a remnant passed down countless times."

"Don't worry, as long as your elder brother can find information related to the Nether race, I have a ninety percent chance of helping you expel it."

His confident tone immediately put Sun Luyao at ease. In his opinion, the mystical methods displayed by this mysterious senior were probably no less than those of a legendary True Immortal.

Sun Lu Yuan did not make them wait long. Three days later, he quietly returned to the secret chamber. Unlike his previous heavy demeanor, his face was now uncontrollable with joy.

"Brother, have you found a clue about the Nether race?" Sun Luyao asked.

Sun Lu Yuan shook his head, "I'm still inquiring about that. I believe clues will surface soon."

"Then...?"

Sun Lu Yuan lowered his voice but could not hide his excitement, "The Heaven-Conferring Heavenly Venerate has communicated with the Myriad Immortal Alliance this time, and they also conducted a sweep of the Alliance headquarters, issuing relevant directives and making certain personnel adjustments."

"That old thing Fu, because his strength hasn't improved much over the years, seems to have been criticized by the Heaven-Conferring Venerate himself. He's extremely anxious and will be in seclusion for a long time, unable to manage us for now."

Sun Luyao was also delighted to hear this.

"By the way, did the Heavenly Venerate discover the human avatar of the Xuanhuang Mirror during his inspection of the Myriad Immortal Alliance?" Sun Luyao asked.

"I'm not sure about that. However, based on the current situation, it seems he hasn't discovered it."

"I've also been monitoring the Xuanhuang Mirror's human avatar, and there have been no abnormalities so far."

"I'll surface soon."

"Then...?"

Sun Lu Yuan lowered his voice but could not hide his excitement, "The Heaven-Conferring Heavenly Venerate has communicated with the Myriad Immortal Alliance this time, and they also conducted a sweep of the Alliance headquarters, issuing relevant directives and making certain personnel adjustments."

"That old thing Fu, because his strength hasn't improved much over the years, seems to have been criticized by the Heaven-Conferring Venerate himself. He's extremely anxious and will be in seclusion for a long time, unable to manage us for now."

Sun Luyao was also delighted to hear this.

"By the way, did the Heavenly Venerate discover the human avatar of the Xuanhuang Mirror during his inspection of the Myriad Immortal Alliance?" Sun Luyao asked.

"I'm not sure about that. However, based on the current situation, it seems he hasn't discovered it."

"I've also been monitoring the Xuanhuang Mirror's human avatar, and there have been no abnormalities so far."

CHAPTER 1222: THE SUN FAMILY WELCOMES THE HOLY FETUS

Sun Lu Yuan was silent for a moment, then quietly said, "That Sheng Chao Da Qi, I plan to go and contact them personally."

"Hmm?" Sun Luyao was startled by this.

He knew his brother intended to contact Sheng Chao Da Qi, but he had previously planned to send his subordinate assassins to scout first.

"Why the sudden change of heart?"

"Times have changed," Sun Lu Yuan said with a solemn expression. "Who knows how long that old geezer Fu will remain in seclusion. I want to take advantage of this rare period of freedom to make plans for both of us, and for the future of the Sun family."

Sun Lu Yuan's eyes were sinister. "Originally, I was still a bit hesitant. However, that seven-colored rainbow light that left this world has completely extinguished any doubt I had. In the Myriad Immortal Alliance, we will always be mere tools to be exploited. If one day disaster befalls the Xuanhuang Realm, those mirror masters and dharma transmitters will surely not take us with them when they flee."

"The situation with Da Qi is different. They say that the greatest merit is to follow the dragon. If we pledge our allegiance before they rise to power, and our cause succeeds, we will become the dharma transmitters of Da Qi."

"Of course, in the end, it all depends on the strength of this Sheng Chao Da Qi."

Sun Luyao nodded slightly.

"However, the small world of Da Qi is exceptionally mysterious. Even the Heavenly Xuan Mirror doesn't have much information about it. Brother, how will you find them?"

Sun Lu Yuan smiled mysteriously. "I've enlisted the help of a friend to deduce its location. Although I couldn't pinpoint the exact spot, I did find an entrance to the small world. We'll know once we see it with our own eyes."

"Brother, won't it be dangerous?" A sudden unease welled up in Sun Luyao's heart.

Sun Lu Yuan was full of confidence. "Don't worry, with my strength, even if Da Qi is a dragon's pool and a tiger's den, I can still retreat."

After comforting his brother, Sun Lu Yuan continued, "Oh, and there's more good news. Ning Lu has broken through. She's in the late stage of Soul Transformation, and only one step away from Dao Integration."

"Her aura was chaotic when she broke through, which is how I detected another life force hidden within her."

"She was already carrying Lu'er's child, but due to some hidden thoughts, she had been sealing it with a secret technique," Sun Lu Yuan said with a half-smile.

Seeing his brother's somewhat strange gaze, Sun Lu Yuan said seriously, "I've already examined it. It's undoubtedly our Sun family's bloodline. No matter what Ning Lu's identity is, as long as she can bear offspring for our Sun family, it doesn't matter."

"I plan to have Ning Lu temporarily seal the life force of the fetus in her belly. She can give birth after she achieves Dao Integration," Sun Lu Yuan suddenly added.

"Lu'er's talent is already extraordinary, and Ning Lu's aptitude is also decent. Their offspring will undoubtedly be the most promising among the younger generation of the Sun family."

"When cultivators absorb the essence of heaven and earth, the laws of heaven and earth are imprinted upon them. If the fetus in the mother's womb can sense this simultaneously..."

Sun Lu Yuan's tone was somewhat excited. "I'm afraid this little one's talent will not be inferior to any prodigy in the Immortal Alliance after they are born. Our Sun family will finally have a true successor."

"Most importantly, we now have the strength to scheme for a heaven and earth essence for him."

When it came to the future of the Sun family, Sun Lu Yuan always seemed to have endless things to say.

His younger brother, Sun Luyao, was also rarely seen to listen quietly, with a smile.

"What a touching scene of brotherly affection." It wasn't until Sun Lu Yuan left that a mysterious phantom elder's cackling laughter startled him.

Sun Luyao then realized that he had already done many things under duress for his elder brother.

"That child of your Sun family... is quite interesting."

Li Fan's clone's words suddenly made Sun Luyao's heart race.

"Don't worry, I'm not covetous of a child's body," Li Fan scoffed.

"I have a technique called the [Creation Furnace Technique], which can continuously excavate the potential of the physical body. The most crucial point is that there are no cultivation thresholds, and it can be cultivated even in the womb. I also have a technique called the [Boundless Void Method], which can continuously strengthen the soul through the mutually generative and destructive forces of the five elements..."

Li Fan's clone's brief words deeply shook Sun Luyao.

"Although the [Boundless Void Method] requires the aid of supreme five-element treasures to cultivate, I believe that with your Sun family's current foundation, it shouldn't be too difficult."

"From the prenatal period, they will be constantly tempering their soul and body. They can also use the mother's body to feel the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao up close. Tsk tsk... I'm almost looking forward to what kind of monster this little one will become when they are born," Li Fan's clone let out a sinister smile. "Senior... what are your conditions?" Sun Luyao was clearly tempted.

However, he deeply understood that there was no such thing as a free lunch. He asked in a deep voice.

"Conditions?" To his surprise, Li Fan's clone cold-ly laughed, "Your Sun family is not worthy of discussing conditions with me?"

"The entire clan has only three Dao Integration cultivators. I can destroy them with a flick of my finger."

Sun Luyao was silent.

"It's just a whim, an experiment," Li Fan's clone said in a faint tone.

Li Fan was not lying.

In reality, he understood the situation of the fetus in Wu Ninglu's belly even better than the two Sun brothers.

Previously, in order to observe the seven-colored rainbow light that left the Myriad Immortal Alliance, his split soul had borrowed Wu Ninglu's body, gone out undercover, and created some puppets.

And Li Fan discovered that during the time he possessed her body, the fetus had faintly sensed him.

It had sent waves of instinctive "expulsion" thoughts towards him.

This piqued Li Fan's interest.

He had a premonition that if this fetus were to be born successfully, its future achievements would be extraordinary.

Under normal circumstances, it would not be easy for a fetus that had been sealed and suppressed by its mother for too long to survive successfully.

Even if it could barely be born, it would be born with congenital deficiencies.

Let alone cultivation.

However, in this lifetime, with Li Fan's intervention, it would usher in a brand new destiny.

Just as Li Fan's clone was acting as a prenatal tutor, Sun Lu Yuan had found the entrance to the small world of Da Qi.

The formation-breaking disc in his hand flickered, and he was about to deduce and find the flaw in the formation here.

This was a treasure he had specifically borrowed from Ji Hongdao to break formations. Although it was definitely not as good as him coming in person, it should be able to crack ordinary protective formations.

Unexpectedly, the formation-breaking disc acted as if it were broken. It only flashed and produced no results.

"This shouldn't be..."

Sun Lu Yuan was a little confused.

He held the formation-breaking disc and changed his position.

"It's fine to just say it directly. How could our Sheng Chao Da Qi refuse to let you in?"

Just as Sun Lu Yuan was still probing, a voice suddenly sounded in his ear.

Sun Lu Yuan was startled and quickly put away the formation-breaking disc, looking vigilantly in the direction of the voice.

He saw a rather handsome young man, with his arms crossed, looking at him with a half-smile.

"Young friend, may I ask who you are?"

Although the other party only had the aura of a Nascent Soul cultivator, the subtle wickedness he exuded made Sun Lu Yuan dare not underestimate him.

The wicked youth chuckled and said, "Just an insignificant nobody. But if you wish to visit our Sheng Chao Da Qi, I can introduce you."

Sun Lu Yuan pondered for a moment, then cupped his hands and said, "Since that is the case, I will trouble you, young friend."

The wicked youth, who was Ou Shang Tian, gave a meaningful smile.

"Hold on tight."

With a cold shout, his figure instantly closed in, placing his hand on Sun Lu Yuan's shoulder.

Sun Lu Yuan's vision blurred, and in the next moment, he found himself in the boundless void.

Ou Shang Tian was already speeding ahead, leading the way.

Sun Lu Yuan quickly followed.

"This young man's speed in fleeing is so fast," Sun Lu Yuan marveled inwardly.
